text.body:
(kriyāyā ekatvam)
1. ekā kriyā sattvabhāvāpattau, praviveke ekatvenābhidhānāt | iha kriyā sattvabhāvaṃ pratipannā yadā sādhanebhyaḥ pravivicyate, na bhavati tadā dvivacanādiyogaḥ, brāhmaṇairāsyata iti; tasmādekā | nanu ca sattvabhāve 'pyetadupalabhyate yathā guḍatilaudanānāṃ pākaḥ 'tāmraḥ palāśeṣu babhūva rāgaḥ' iti; tanna; tasyāpi vyabhicārāt, yathā—
tāṃ pratyabhivyaktamanorathānāṃ tato nṛpāṇāṃ praṇayāgradūtyaḥ |
pravālaceṣṭā iva pādapānāṃ vilāsaceṣṭā vividhā babhūvaḥ || 1 || (raghu. 6.12)
vyabhicāre kinnimittamiti cet, kṛdabhidhānameva; kṛdabhihito bhāvo dravyavat prakāśate | dravyasya ca satyapi nānātve saṃbandhibhedādeva bhedāvagatau k‍vacidabhedābhidhānam | yathā—
ūrumūlacapalekṣaṇamagh‍nan yairvataṃsakusumaiḥ priyametāḥ |
cakrire sapadi tāni yathārthaṃ manmathasya kusumāyudhanāma || 2 || (māgha. 10.67)
yathā ca vedavākyam— (taisaṃ. 3.14.3)
'yatpaśurmāyumakṛtoro vā padbhirāhate |' iti || 3 ||
k‍vacit punastada‌‌vivakṣāyāṃ bhedenaiva yathā— (raghu. 7.11, kusaṃ. 7.62)
tāsāṃ mukhairāsavagandhagarbhaivyarvyāptāntarāssāndrakutūhalānām || iti || 4 ||
brāhmaṇairāsyata iti sarvadaikavacanameveti viśeṣaḥ, sādhyatvāt | siddhasyaiva vastunassaṃkhyāyogo yujyate, na sādhyasya, apariniṣpannatvenāśrayatvānupapatteḥ | sādhyā ca kriyā prādhānyataḥ tiṅbhirabhidhīyate; tasmānna bhedasaṃkhye ityekā |
2. ekaśeṣāt | iha yeṣāṃ sarūpaśabdābhidheyānāmanekatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, tadabhidhānānāmekaśeṣo dṛṣṭaḥ | tadyathā vyaktipakṣe brāhmaṇāḥ, puruṣā iti | na ca brāhmaṇairāsyate, puruṣairgīyata iti kriyābhidhānānāmekaśeṣo dṛśyate | sa cāyamekaśeṣo vyāvartamānastvavyāp‍tamanekatvamapi gṛhītvā vyāvartata iti ekā kriyā (mabhā. 1.2.64) |
nanu ca kathamekaśeṣābhāvaḥ ?
na tiṅantānyekaśeṣaṃ prayojayantīti (mabhā. 5.3.66) |
kā punaratropapattiḥ ? kriṃyāpradhānatvamākhyātānām (mabhā. 3.1.66) | tadeva cintyate | iha khalu kriyākārakayoḥ prādhānopasarjanabhāvena vṛttisaṃsargeṇa catuṣṭayī gatiḥ | kriyā vā kriyāyāṃ nyagbhavati yathā cikīrṣati, adhyāpayatīti; kārakaṃ vā kārake yathā
ākṣikaḥ, niṣkauśāmbiḥ; kārake vā kriyā yathā pācakaḥ, pacanīyam; kriyāyāṃ vā kārakaṃ yathā putrīyati, upaś‍lokayati | ākhyāteṣu caiṣāmanyatamo 'pi na prakāraḥ; tatra hi sādhyā kriyā viprakṛtā kramavatī sādhanatantrā savyāpārasādhanā aparisamāptā pacādibhirucyate, siddhāni ca sādhanāni tibādibhirabhidhīyanta iti na kasyacit prādhānyamaprādhānyaṃ vā | pratyuta prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ | prādhānyeneti, pratyayārthasya prādhānyaṃ syāt; evaṃ ca dvivacanabahuvacane api tannibandhane upapadyete |
tanna; siddhaṃ sādhyāyopādīyate; siddhāni ca sādhanāni ca, tāni parārthamupādīyamanāni śeṣatāṃ labhante | sādhyaṃ tu paropakāreṣu asamarthamātmasiddhaye 'rthāntaramapekṣamāṇaṃ tad‌vaidharmyāt pradhānabhāvamanubhavati |
nanvevaṃ hyekaśeṣābhāvo na sidhyati; na hyekaśeṣābhāve prādhānyena guṇabhāvena vā kiñcidāśrīyate | pacādayo hi kriyāvacanāḥ, teṣāmeka evānekasādhanasamavetānekatvena vivakṣitāṃ kriyāmabhidhāsyati |
tanna; yadyapyeko dhātuḥ yathā uktāṃ kriyāṃ bravīti tathā lakārasyānekakarmakartṛviṣayatvāt pratisādhanamupapattāvanekatvaṃ prāp‍noti, tadanurodhāc‍cārthāḥ pradhānāḥ (varttanta) vyāvartanta ityekaśeṣārambhaḥ syāt | kriyāprādhānyena tu guṇabhūtayoḥ kartṛkarmaṇā(kṛti 2.3.65) ssupta iti(?) | evaṃ tarhi bhinnasādhanamabhinnamarthaṃ vakṣyāmīti ekaśabdatvaṃ, sādhānabhedāttu dvivacanabahuvacanayogaḥ |
anye bruvate— yadyekasyāḥ prakṛtessādhānabhede bhinnā lakārāḥ prasajyeran, tathāpi yathaikasthāne ekavacanameva dvayordvivacanaṃ bahūnāṃ (bahuvacanaṃ) bhaviṣyantīti | idameva hi dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ dvivacanabahuvacanatvaṃ, yattadekaśabdarūpamekaśeṣaśabdavadanekārthābhidhāne samarthamiti vyākhyāyate | itaś‍ca kriyāpradhānamākhyātaṃ, karotinā praś‍ne nirṇayārthatvāt | kiṃ devadattaḥ karotīti praś‍ne pacati, āsta ityuttaraṃ bhavati, na tvāsakaḥ pācaka iti (1.3.66 kāśikā) |
na cāyaṃ kartṛpraś‍naḥ, kiṃ devadatta iti, viśeṣasyābhyantarīkṛtatvād bhinnaliṅgatvāc‍ca | nāpi karmapraś‍naḥ, anirjñāte vyāpāre karmapraś‍nāsaṃbhavāt; pacati paṭhatīti kartṛviśeṣamantareṇa prativacane praṣṭuḥ kṛtārthatvāt; pacati paṭhatīti cākhyātasya ākhyātenāyogāt | yadi sādhanaṃ pradhānaṃ syāt, yathā pācakaḥ pacatīti, sāmānādhikaraṇyena na yogo bhavati, yathā
pacati paṭhatītyatrāpi syāt | na caitadastyataḥ kriyāpradhānatvamevākhyātānāṃ, kriyāpradhānatvāc‍ca na ekaśeṣārambhaḥ | tadanārambhādekatvam, ekatvena vīpsābhāvaḥ, vīpsābhāvac‍ca gantā gantā gacchati gacchatīti śabdāvṛttiḥ, śabdāvṛtterbuddhibhedaḥ, buddhibhedāc‍ca kriyāyāḥ kārakebhyo vyatireka iti |
nanu ca pacati pacataḥ pacantīti dhātvartha evāyaṃ, na kriyā |
tanna; dhātvarthasya pratyayārthasyaivāvacchedakatvād‍dhātvarthāt tu kriyāyāḥ pṛthak‍tvaṃ sādha yamānamapradhānavyapadeś‍yatāyāmevaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate | yathaiva tarhi kārakabhede 'pyabhedaḥ kriyāyāḥ, tathā dhātvarthabhede 'pyabheda evāstu; satyametat | kiṃtu vastunaḥ sarvathaikatvamanekatvaṃ vocyamānaṃ bhedābhedanibandhanaṃ lokavyavahāraṃ sarvamatikrāmati | tasmād bhedamabhedaṃ vā abhyupagacchatā vyavahāraprasiddhyarthamabhedo bhedaś‍cābhyupagantavyaḥ | kasyacit kiñcinmukhyaṃ kiñcidaupacārikam | sarvo hi bhedavādī nirupakāreṣvayaḥ śalākāvadasaṃbandheṣvanyonyavyāvṛtteṣu bhedeṣu tadevedamiti pratyayasya abhedādekatvamāśritya laukikaṃ vyavahāramanugacchati | ekatvavādī ca bhedādhiṣṭhānāmiva bhavatāṃ sarvāṃ vṛttiṃ sarvaṃ ca viśeṣaśabdavyavahāraṃ dharmāntarasaṃsargapūrvakaṃ loke vyavasthitaṃ manyamāno lokamanugacchan abhinnamapi bhedaireva nidarśayati | tasmād bhinnadhātvarthāvacchinnā bhinnāpi kriyā abhinnaiveti | etenaitadapi saṃgṛhītam—
1. bhavati vrajati pacatyasti śvetata ityādau pratyayārthadhātvarthayorudvāpāvāpābhyāmanya— tvenāvadhārito dhātvarthāvacchinnaḥ, paricchinnakālaḥ kālaparicchinno vā, upasargā— dibhirupaskṛtaḥ, kṛtapratyayārthopakāraḥ kārakairasaṃkhyaśaktibhissaṃkhyopādhyupakṛtairupakriyamāṇa upakramaprabhṛtyapavarga paryantamantaḥ pratibhayā sākalyenollikhya sādhyatvenādhyavasitaḥ tathā sūbhṛto (?) bahirniṣpannaḥ prakrāntakramarūpāvayaṃvasamudāyātmā anapekṣitāntarāla— kriyāntaropanipātaḥ, tathāvidhāvayavo vā puruṣavyāpāraḥ kriyā |
2. yathoktaviśeṣaṇotpannadhātvartho vā,
3. sādhyaphalaniṣpattipūrvakṣaṇopalabhyamānatadavayavo vā
4. avayavasamūhopalabhyamānaikākārapratyayanimittajāti viśeṣo vā,
5. pūrvāvayavopakṛtānyāvayavapratīyamānajātiprādurbhāvo vā,
6. dhātvarthavyāpriyamāṇakartṛkarmaṇoḥ svavyapadeśanimittasattāsaṃbandho vā, vyāpriyamāṇeṣu svaparātmanoḥ pūrvasvarūpavilakṣaṇarūpāntarābhimāno vā,
7. tatraiva ca tayostathāvidhābhinnasvakāraṇasattāsaṃbandho vā,
8. buddhisattābhāveṣu pratyastamitarūpamanekabuddhyanusyūtaṃ buddhisāmānyaṃ vā kriyāśabde— nābhidhīyate | api ca—
yāvat siddhamasiddhaṃ vā sādhyatvena vivakṣitam |
āśritakramarūpatvāt tat kriyetyabhidhīyate || 5 || (vāpa. 3.1)
(kriyāyāḥ parokṣatvam)
sā ca kāryānumeyatvāt parokṣetyeke | gacchatipacatyādipratyayeṣu pratyakṣeṇa, devadattādisvarūpe 'tiriktakriyātattvānupalabdheḥ | tathā hi—
ya eva devadattātmā tiṣṭhatpratyayagocaraḥ |
calatītyapi saṃvittau sa eva pratibhāsate || 6 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
kiṃtu calatīti pratītiḥ saṃyogavibhāgamālambate, saṃyogavibhāgaḥ kadācidevotpadyamānaḥ paridṛś‍yamānapadārthasvarūpātiriktaṃ kāraṇamanumāpayati, yac‍ca kāraṇaṃ sa parispandaprayat‍nādirūpaḥ puruṣavyāpāro 'tīndriyaḥ kriyeti |
tadanupapannamityanye | calatītyādipratyayānāṃ pratyakṣa kriyā 'valambanatvāt | tathā ca na calatīti pratītessaṃyogavibhāga ālambanamavyāp‍tyādiprasaṅgāt | tatra ākāśe vihaṅgamo gacchatīti pratītirna syāt, saṃyogavibhāgayoragrahaṇāt | na ca dvayorvihaṅgamavihāyasoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau pratyakṣau, pratyakṣetaravṛttitvāt, vāyuvanaspatisaṃyogavibhāgavat |
atha vitatālokāvayavī ākāśaḥ, tatsaṃyogavibhāgau ca pakṣiṇaḥ pratyakṣau; tanna; santamase 'pi khadyotavidyutoḥ kriyābuddheḥ |
na ca tamo nāma vasturūpamasti, bhūkampe ca kampate vasundhareti ca jñānamasti | na ca saṃyogavibhāgagrahaṇamastītyavyāptiḥ | saṃyogavibhāgopajanaprabandhe 'pi tayorvartamānayoreva grahaṇam; tau ca gatvāpi sthite gavādau sta iti | tatrāpi gacchatīti jñānaprasaṅgaḥ; niś‍cale ca ś‍yenasamavāyāpāyaparamparāvati vadhyaśūle, pravāhajalāś‍leṣamālahāriṇi saritkūle, raṅgaturaṅgamasaṃyogavibhāgaśreṇimati ca vāhyālīmahītale calatīti pratyayaḥ prāp‍noti | atha kriyājanyatvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgajānāṃ, tatraiva calatīti ś‍yenādau, calatīti
pratyayo na niṣkriye śūlādāviti; tarhi kriyāvayavānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt kriyālamban evāyaṃ pratyayo, na saṃyogaviyogālambanaḥ |
kiñca nityaparokṣāyāṃ kriyāyāmidamapi na jñāyate— 'kiṃ śūlakūlamahītalakriyājanyatvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgānāṃ, kiṃ vā ś‍yenajalaturagakriyājanyatvamityativyāptiḥ; saṃyogavibhāgālambanatve ca saṃyujyate viyujyata iti ca pratītiḥ syāt, na calatīti, yathāviṣayaṃ pratyayotpādād, anirjñāne jalasya anirjñātalakṣaṇasya ālambanatā syāt | calatīti ca vartamānābhāsaḥ pratyayaḥ saṃyogavibhāgānumeyatvena saṃbhavati | tathā hi— 'saṃyogāntaṃ karme'—ti nyāyāt | na ca saṃyogo vartamānāṃ kriyāmanumāpayati; vibhāgo 'pi kāryatvādātmanaḥ prākkālīnameva kāraṇaṃ gamayati | kāraṇasya hi sattvaṃ prākkalīnameva kāryopayogi, na tulyakālaṃ, tadānīṃ tasya asiddhatvāt | ataḥ kāryāt kāraṇabhūtāṃ kriyāmanumimāno, bhūtāmevānumimīte, na vartamānām | tasmāt saṃyogavibhāgābhyāṃ kriyānumāne vartamānābhāsaś‍calatīti pratyayo na saṃbhavatītyasaṃbhavaḥ | na ca nityaparokṣakriyānumānamapi śakyaṃ, kāryaṃ kāraṇapūrvakamiti saṃbandhagrahaṇānupapatteḥ | na hi dravyamātraṃ kāraṇam, api tu kriyāviśiṣṭaṃ, kriyāyāś‍ca parokṣatvānna tadānīṃ viśiṣṭadravyakāraṇagrahaṇaṃ sughaṭamiti ghaṭādāvapi durghaṃṭā vyāp‍tipratīti | tasmānna kāryānumeyā kriyā | api tu utkṣepaṇādibhedavataḥ parispandarūpasya karmaṇaḥ pratyakṣeṇopalambhāt pratyakṣaiveti | etena pacatīti pratītirapi pratyakṣakriyālambanaiveti vyākhyātam | tatra hi pacatyādikriyā bahvyaḥ pratīyante 'devadattaś‍calati, cullī jvalati, sthālī ūṣmāyate, payaḥ k‍vathayati, pidhānamapidhatte, taṇḍulāni vik‍lidyanti, darvyapavidhyati, odanassidhyati' iti |
nanu ca pāko nāma dhātvarthaḥ paridṛś‍yamānadevadattādivyāpāravyatirikta eṣitavyaḥ, tamantareṇa phalanirvṛterabhāvāt; tadabhāve ca kimadhikṛtya kārakāṇi saṃsṛjyeran ?
atrocyate—yaṃ tamekaṃ pākaṃ nāma dhātvarthaṃ calanādibhyo 'tiriktaṃ kriyeti manyase, sa kiṃ vastudharmaḥ, tatkārya vā ? tatra vastudharmatve rūpavajjātivad vābhyupagamyamāne yāvadvastu sarvakālaṃ vā phalaniṣpattiprasaṅgaḥ | tatkāryatve sati sa kiṃ sakalakārakaniṣpādyaḥ, ekaikakārakanirvartyo vā ? tatrādyapakṣe ekaikaṃ bhavet kārakamakriyam; ekaikaniṣkriyatve tu sākalye 'pi kāryatvād vyāpārāntarakalpanāyāmanavasthā | pakṣāntare tu kriyāmiva phalamapi niṣkriyāṇyeva kārakāṇi kuryuriti kiṃ kriyayā ?
nanu karotīti kārakam ?
satyam; karoti phalaṃ na tu kriyām |
nanu karotīti yad brūṣe seyamuktaiva kriyā | caitraḥ kaṭaṃ karotīti caitrasyaiva kaṭasyaiva karoterapyartho vācya eva |
ucyate— parissanda eva bhautiko vyāpāraḥ karotyarthaḥ | na hi vayaṃ paridṛśyamānaṃ parispandātmakaṃ vyāpāramapahnumahe, pratikārakaṃ vicitrasya calanādervyāpārasya pratyakṣeṇopalambhāt | atīndriyastu tadatiriktaḥ karotyartho nāstīti brūmahe | kriyātīndriyatve hi tadyogakṛtaṃ kārakatvamadhigacchantaḥ phalārthinastadupādadīran |
tāvadeva viniś‍citya tadupādīyate 'rthibhiḥ |
tadevopādadānaiś‍ca phalamapyadhigamyate || 7 ||
kārakatvaṃ ca pakṣe 'smin‍nāsti kiñ‍cidatīndriyam |
kārakatvaṃ svarūpasya sahakāryādisannidhiḥ || 8 ||
nirvyāpārasya nanvasya ko guṇassahakāribhiḥ |
vyāpārayogino 'pyasya ko guṇassahakāribhiḥ || 9 ||
atha vyāpāra evaiṣa sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya sādhyate |
kiṃ phalenāparāddhaṃ vastaddhi saṃbhūya sādhyatām || 10 ||
tasmāt kārakacakreṇa calatā janyate phalam |
na punaś‍calanādanyo vyāpāra upalabhyate || 11 ||
calanto devadattādyāstadanantaramodanaḥ |
etāvad‌dṛś‍yate tatra na tvanyā kācana kriyā || 12 ||
kriyānimittasaṃsargavādino 'pi dvayī gatiḥ |
satyāṃ kriyāyāṃ saṃsargassaṃsarge sati vā kriyā || 13 ||
atrāpi pakṣe pūrvasmin saṃsargaḥ k‍vopayujyate |
tathā sati phalaṃ sidhyet kāṣṭhādeḥ kevalādapi || 14 ||
saṃsargāt tu kriyā siddhā punarekaikamakriyam |
tathā ca sati naidhāṃsi jvaleyuḥ piṭharād vinā || 15 || (nyāyamaṃ)
1. jvalantyedhāṃsi na punaḥ pacanti piṭharānvitāḥ |
piṭhare satyapīmāni jvalantītyeva me matiḥ || 16 ||
2. tasmāt kriyāntarābhāvāt kāṣṭhāmbupiṭharādayaḥ |
saṃsṛjyantāṃ phalāyaiva kimadṛṣṭena karmaṇā || 17 ||
nanu ca phalaṃ siddhaṃ sādhyaṃ vā ?
kiñcātaḥ ?
siddhaṃ cet kārakāntarāṇyapi siddhānīti saṃsargābhāvaḥ | atha sādhyaṃ, saiva kārakavyāpāravyatiriktā kriyeti |
tan‍na, phalasya kriyātvānupapatteḥ | odano hi phalaṃ, na kriyā; kriyānāmni tu kriyamāṇe na vipratipattiḥ |
pākastarhi kaḥ ? (na ca) pacervācyaśūnyataiva yuktā; ucyate— samuditadevadattādikāraka— nikaraparispanda eva viśiṣṭaphalāvacchinnaḥ pākaḥ | sa eva ca pacerarthaḥ; devadattādikriyā hi calanajvalanādirūpāḥ pṛthak‍tayaivāvabhāsante, samuditāstu satyaḥ phalāntarāvacchedād rūpāntareṇa pākādinā parisphuranti, vyapadiś‍yante ca; tathā devadattaḥ pacatītivat kāṣṭhāni pacanti, sthālī pacatītyapi vyapadeśo bhavati | nanu ca yathā sthālī pacati kāṣṭhāni pacantīti dṛś‍yate, naivam odanaḥ | pacati, taṇḍulāḥ pacantīti |
satyametat, kāraṇaṃ tu vācyam |
kiṃ taditi cet pacerakarmakakriyātvameva |
nanvodanasya taṇḍulānāṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ, na tūbhayossaṃbhavati |
naivam, taṇḍulānodanaṃ pacatītyapi vyapadiś‍yate |
na ca karmavad‌bhāvāt na kartṛpratyayaḥ | nanvevaṃ sati, odanataṇḍulānāṃ nirvṛtti— vikārayossvātantryāt sidhyati odano 'pi k‍lidyanti, taṇḍulā ityapi na syāt | tanna;
nirvartyādiṣu tatpūrvamanubhūya svatantratām |
kartrantarāṇāṃ vyāpāre karma saṃpadyata punaḥ || 18 || (vāpa. 3.7.54)
bhavatu nāma taṇḍulānāṃ siddhānāṃ kathañcidetat, odanasya tu sādhyasya nopapadyate |
naivam, bhavatyarthe sarvasya kartṛtvāt bhavatyarthaś‍ca sidhyatīti na doṣaḥ | kathaṃ na doṣaḥ ?
3. yadyodano na paktavyaḥ paktavyo yadi nodanaḥ |
yathā—
4. śāṭakaś‍cenna vātavyo vātavyaś‍cenna śāṭakaḥ || 19 ||
atrocyate |
5. antastattvaṃ bahistattvaṃ niṣpattau dvayamiṣyate |
antastattvaṃ puraskṛtya bahistattvaṃ prakāśate || 20 ||
6. dvayī sattā padārthānāṃ bāhyā cābhyantarīti ca |
āntarī vyavahārārthā bāhyā tvarthakriyāṃ prati || 21 ||
anyathā hyaṅ‌kuro jāyata ityapi na syāt | ata idamuktamaṃ upakramaprabhṛtya— pavargaparyantamantaḥ pratibhayā sākalyenollikhya sādhyatvenādhyavasitaḥ puruṣavyāpāraḥ kriyeti | na ca puruṣavyāpārasya kriyātvam; ratho gacchati, kūlaṃ patatītyādiprayogābhāvaḥ upacāro vā | puruṣaśabdeneha prathamamadhyamottamalādeśatrikābhidheyayoḥ kartṛkarmaṇorabhidhānāt |
na caivametad vyāpārayoreva kriyātvaṃ, phalābhidheyatvena prādhānyataḥ kārakopalakṣaṇatvāt |
yathā ca bhāgāḥ pacateś‍calanajvalanādayaḥ |
calanajvalanādīnāṃ jñeyā bhāgāstathā 'pare || 22 || (vāpa. 3.8.9)
tathāhi — devadattaś‍calatītyatra kiṃ pratīyate ? yugīmādatte, ā XXX udakamāsiñcati, taṇḍulānāvapatīti | evaṃ kārakāntaravyāpāreṣvapi draṣṭavyam |
nanu devadattāderbhautiko vyāpāraḥ ātmavyāpārapūrvako bhavitumarhati |
naitadevam, na hyātmano vyāpāraḥ kaś‍cidasti, icchādveṣapūrvakaprayat‍naśādeva sa bhautikavyāpārakāraṇatāṃ pratipadyate | calatīti pratītivat pacatīti pratītirapi pratyakṣa— kriyālambanaiveti |
atrānumeyakriyāvādinassamādadhate—
astu nāma devadattādikārakanikaraparispandasamudāyaḥ kriyā | kintu pacatītyādā— vadhiśrayaṇāvacapanavicaṭanādīnāṃ samudāyaṃ kimāyuṣmān kriyeti manyate |
omiti brumaḥ |
kimarthaṁ sarvāṇyeveti ?
pṛcchāmi cāyuṣmantaṃ kimadhiśrayaṇādayaḥ kriyāvyapadeśamekaśo vā lakṣeran ? na tāvadekaśaḥ, kramarūpābhāvāt | etacca tatkriyāyāḥ kriyātvaṃ yaduta sādhenaissādhyamānatā kramarūpopādānaṃ ca | na caikasya kramassaṃbhavati, avaś‍yābhidheyaś‍cetadupāttakramassādhya— tayā 'bhidhīyamānapadārthaḥ kriyeti | anyathā hi pākadīnāmupasaṃhṛtakramāṇāmapi kriyātvaprasaṅgaḥ | te hi paryavasitāḥ svarūpatayopasaṃhṛtakramā eva svaśabdairabhidhīyante | teṣāṃ pūrvāparībhāvavirahānna kriyātvam | ata eva te sādhanabhāvena taiśśabdairupādīyante, na sādhyabhāvena | pākaṃ karotītyādau hi sādhanaviśeṣanibandhanā vibhaktirupalabhyate, dvitīyānirvṛttirūpaṃ ca sādhananamupapadyate |
nanvevam asti vidyate tiṣṭhatītyādīnāmapi na kriyātvaṃ prasajet, yāvatā nehāpi krama upalabhyate |
naivam, atrāpi kramasya pratīyamānatvāt | tathā hi—
kālānupāti yadrūpaṃ tadastītyapadiśyate |
paritastu paricchinnaṃ bhāva ityeva kathyate || 23 || (vāpa. 3.8.12)
evaṃ vidyate tiṣṭhatītyatrāpi draṣṭavyam; kālādhikāre caitad viśeṣato varṇayiṣyāmaḥ | nāpi kṣaṇaśaḥ kramajanmatā adhiśrayaṇādīnām, utpannamātrapradhvaṃsitvād, ayaugapadye samūhānupapatteḥ | tadabhāve ca kathamiva abhinneṣu bhinnaśabdo vartatāṃ pacatīti |
ucyate—kramopajātāvayavaparicchedaprāpta—saṃskārāntaṃ yadā sakalaṃ kriyākalāpatteḥ (kalāpaṃ) kalayati, tadā pratyayaḥ parivarti samudāya ekakāryatvādapihitabhedaḥ pacatītyā— diśabdavyapadeśanimittaṃ bhavati | tathā odanādikāryakriyākalāpastirodhāya bhedamabhedena vyapadiś‍yate | pacatīti phalasya ca sakasakriyāvayavasādhyatvāt sādhanabhāvenāpi sa evāpekṣyate | tadananta(tadanta ?)rgatāstvadhiśrayaṇādayaḥ pratyekaṃ phalamabhinirvartayitumaparyāp‍tāḥ paryāp‍tasya samudāyasya rūpasampādanārthatvāt samudāyaṃ prati guṇabhūtā vijñāyante | tadāha—
guṇabhūtairavayavaissamūhaḥ kramajanmanām |
buddhyā prakalpitābhedaḥ kriyeti vyapadiś‍yate || 24 || (vāpa. 3.8.4)
yadyevaṃ pacatīti vyapadeśo nopapadyate, dhātūpādānā kriyā yadā nātītā na cānāgatā, tadā vartamānakālavihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prayujyate | na cāsya kriyāpratānasyeyaṃ vyavasthā saṃbhavati, adhiśrayaṇādīnāṃ pūrvāparībhāvaniyamāt | na caikaḥ kriyābhāgaḥ pacatiśabdanibandhanaṃ, śabdaśaktisvabhāvāt | na hyupāttakriyāvayavārthapratyāyakaśśabdo yathābhūtamarthaṃ pratyāyayati;
tataś‍ca kathamekasya vartamānakālatāṃ pratyayo 'nurudhyeta ?
naitadasti; śabdaśaktayo hi bhinnarūpāmabhinnāmarthavyaktimupāttabhedāṃ darśayanti; yataḥ pūrvāparībhūtāvayavasamudāyāvagraharūpā buddhiryathā 'vagṛhītaṃ samudāyākāramavayaveṣu pratyasyati; te 'vayavāḥ pratyayena samāropitasamudāyarūpāḥ pacatiśabdavācyāssantaḥ svarūpasannidhānāt taṃvartamānādivyapadeśamanubhūya pratyayaviśoṣotpattinimittaṃ bhavanti | tathā hi—abhisamīhitaphaḷaḥ kriyāyāṃ phalopajananasādhanabhūtāyāṃ pravartamānaḥ pumān samudāyamevādhāya cetasi tāsvavayavakriyāsu pravartate | tato hyasya samudāyābhisandhisamutthāpitāḥ kriyābhāgāḥ samudāyasaṃpādanārthatvāt samudāyarūpeṇādhyavasīyante | tathādhyavasitakriyārūpaistu tasya kriyākṣaṇasya sannidhānād‌vartamānakālavihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prayujyate pacatīti | atra cotpannāmātra— pradhvaṃsitvāt sarve kriyāvayavā vartamānā ca saṃbhavantīti sphuṭamevāvasīyate; kintu pratyekaṃ samudāyiṣu samudāyādhyāsena prayujyate pacatīti | adhiśrayaṇādyavayavakriyāsamudāyavacaneṣu pacādiṣu yasminnavayave 'dhyāropya samudāyo 'dhiśrayaṇādiḥ vilkittyantaḥ pratyāyyate, tatkālapratyayo 'nuvartate | tatra tadā vartamānāvayave samudāyādhyāsastadā pacatīti bhavati | yadā tu bhūtabhaviṣyayossamūhāropaṇe tadā 'pākṣīt pakṣyatīti | yaduktam—
samūhassa tathābhūtaḥ pratibhedaṃ samūhiṣu |
samāpyate tato bhede kālabhedasya saṃbhavaḥ || 25 || (vāpa. 3.8.5)
samudāyasya ca samudāyiṣu pratyekaparisamāp‍tau nidarśanaṃ grāmo dagdhaḥ, paṭo dagdha iti | yadi hyekasminnaṃśe samudāyo na syāt, pāṇimātrasyāṅgulimātrasya vā caṇḍālatvavirahāt caṇḍālapāṇyaṅgulisparśe naivocyeta caṇḍālaḥ spṛṣṭa iti, na cāṅgavikāreṇāṅgino vikṛtirlakṣyate, akṣṇā kāṇa iti |
taduktam 'avayave hi spṛṣṭe samudāyo 'pi spṛṣṭo bhavati; avayave hi kṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ samudāyasyāpi viśeṣakaṃ bhavati (mabhā. 1.3.62); yaś‍ca samudāyaḥ so 'vayavānna vyabhicarita | tasya viśeṣakaṃ yathā 'gossak‍thani kaṇṭhe 'pi kṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ goreva viśeṣakaṃ na gomaṇḍalasya' iti | tadevamukte kimuktaṃ bhavati upāttakramādhiśrayaṇādivik‍lityantānāmavavānāṃ samudāyaḥ pacatikriyeti ? tarhi ciraṃ jīvatu bhavān; bhavataiva pratijñātā naiva kriyā pratyakṣeti | tasmādupāttakriyā kramāḥ kriyāvayavāḥ; tadasya kriyāsaṅghātasya kecidavayavā nivṛttāḥ, kecidanivṛttāḥ, kaś‍cideva pratyupasthitaḥ | pratyupasthitaviṣayāḥ cakṣurādayaḥ; tato 'tha
kriyākalāpāḥ pratyakṣayitum, cakṣurādibhiranabhisaṃbandhāt; na vyatītānāgatarūpasyāsataḥ kriyāvayavasya sadasadanupātinā karaṇagrāmeṇa saṃbandhaḥ, na vā 'nadhigatendriyasaṃbandhasya padārthasya darśanaparicchedyatā saṃbhavati | taduktam—
kramāt sadasatāṃ teṣāmātmāno na samūhinām |
sad‌vastuviṣayairyānti saṃbandhaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ || 26 || (vāpa. 3.8.6)
darśanābhimānaḥ kathamiti cet, yathā gauraśva ityevamādiṣu padeṣu gakārādayo varṇabhāgāḥ kramarūpānuvidhāyino vyaktāvupajane vā prāptayaugapadyāḥ saṅghātarūpeṇa na pāryante 'vadhārayitum indriyāyattayā buddhyā, tasyāḥ pratyupasthitākṣarāvasāyaśakteḥ pūrvottarabhāgayorasaṃsparśāt | samabhihitāvayavaparicchedaprāpitātiśayāstu buddhayaḥ svānurūpaṃ saṃskāraparamparāyāmante samālocitaviśeṣavarṇabhāgāmupajanayanti buddhiṃ tasyāmuttīrṇamiva tatpadaṃ samudāyātmanā nirūpyate | tadāha—
yathā gauriti saṅghātassarvo nendriyagocaraḥ |
bhāgaśastūlapalabdhasya buddhau rūpaṃ nirūpyate || 27 || (vāpa. 3.8.7)
kālpanikastu yugapad‌grahaṇābhimānaḥ pratyakṣabhramanibandhanam | yathā 'lātasya āviddhaviṣvaggate deśe nairantaryeṃṇa parivṛttirūpamavirāmeṇāvadhārayannana(vasitakālabhedo yugapatsakaladeśavyāpi a) paricchindannadhyavasyati cakramiti; yathā kramavantaḥ kriyābhāgāḥ krameṇaivāvasitā laghutaraṃ parivartitvādanavadhṛtakālabhedairyugapadevādhyavasīyante; yathādhyavasāyaṃ ca darśanābhimānamutpādayantaḥ pratyakṣavyavahāraṃ vartayanti | yaduktam—
indriyairanyathāprāptau bhedāṃśopanipātibhiḥ |
alātacakravad rūpaṃ kriyāṇāṃ parivartate || 28 || (vāpa. 3.8.9)
(kriyāyā apratyakṣatvam)
apratyakṣaiva tu kriyā | yadāha mahābhāṣyakāraḥ—kriyā nāmeyamatyantāparidṛṣṭā aśak‍yā piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayituṃ, yathā garbho nirluṭhitaḥ sā 'sāvanumānagamyeti | nanu pratyakṣāpravṛttau saṃbandhagrahaṇābhāvāt kathaṃ kriyāviṣaye 'numānaṃ pravartate ?
naiṣa doṣaḥ; dhātuvācyasya samūhasya yugapadasannidhānādapratyakṣatvam; ekaikasya tu kṣaṇasya pratyakṣatve buddhyā saṅkalayya pacatīti prayujyate; yadāpyekasmin kṣaṇe pacatīti prayogastadā tatra samūhāropaṇam | yadāha—
pūrvottarairyadā bhāgaissamavasthāpitakramaḥ |
ekasso 'pyasadadhyāsādākhyātairabhidhīyate || 29 || (vāpa. 3.8.11)
yaś‍cāpakarṣaparyantamanuprāptaḥ pratīyate |
tatraikasmin kriyāśabdaḥ kevale na prayujyate || 30 || (vāpa. 3.8.10)
na tvevam; indrayairabhisaṃbandhāt sarūpasannidhānāya vartamānavyapadeśāc‍ca kathamapratyakṣatvaṃ kriyāyāḥ ?
ucyate; neha vastvartho nirūpyate, api tu śabdārthaḥ tatra cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ yaḥ prakṛtyartho 'vasthāpyate, yā kriyāvacanasya dhātusaṃjñā, nāsau śak‍yā sākṣādupalabdhum | tatra hi ācāryāṇāṃ matabhedaḥ |
eke manyante— adhiśrayaṇādīnāṃ samudāyo buddhyā nigṛhītaḥ, ekatvena sa pacatītyādīnāṃ vācya iti | na ca samudāyaṃ pacatīti prayuñjānaḥ pratyekamadhiśrayaṇādiṣu pratyasyati, pratyayāś‍ca na samudāya ityevaṃrūpaṃ pratyasyanti | nāpi 'ayaṃ ca ayaṃ ca' iti saṃbandhino buddhyāvagṛh‍ṇāti | kiṃ tarhyāśritakramarūpamiva pratyekamavayaveṣu pratyasya pacatīti prayuṅkte, tadā tasyaiva samīhitaṃ bhavati, adhiśrayaṇādyānupūrvyā phalamodanādi nirvartayitavyamiti | yathā prathamakriyāsaṃbhāge pacirityevādhyavasyati nādhiśrayaṇamiti | itarathā hyevaṃ prayogaḥ tasyādhiśrayatīti; yadā cādhiśrayaṇe nirvṛtte nāgate vā bhūtabhaviṣyatkālābhidhāyinaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte, tadā samudāyarūpapratyāsenaiva tamavayavabuddhyā nigṛhya prayuṅkte apākṣīt, pakṣyatīti | na tvadhiśrayaṇarūpeṇa, anyathā hyevaṃ prayogassyāt adhyaśiśrayat, adhiśrayiṣyatīti | evamāvapane vicaṭane vā samūhini samudāyarūpapratyāsādeva dhātutāvyapadeśāt, pacatyapākṣīt pakṣyati | evaṃbhūtaś‍cārthātmā 'dhikṛtaḥ sādhanatantrasādhyāvasthaḥ śabdena prakrānto 'śak‍ya upalabdhum; yathā gauriti gakāraukāravisarjanīyā evopalabhyante, samudāyastu buddhinirgrāhya eva, tathā pacatītyādiṣvevādhiśrayatītyādiṣu avayavā eva hastaprasaraṇasthālī— vinyāsādayo 'śabdavācyā, apratyakṣā eva | yāvadapakarṣaparyantaprāp‍tā kriyeti sāpi nāpratyaste kramarūpe samudāye ākhyātaśabdenābhidhīyate | apakarṣaparyantā cet kramarūpeṇa na avagṛh‍ṇāditi avācaka evākhyātaśabdaḥ | yathā ś‍lokaśabdaṃ prayuñjānaṃ ādyaṃ padaṃ padarūpeṇāvagṛh‍ṇāti na tadā ślokassamuc‍cāryata iti prayuṅkte yadā vāśritottaraprabandhamavagṛh‍ṇāti tadā ślokaśabdaṃ prayuṅ‌kte | evaṃ kṛtvā nirukte 'pyuktaṃ 'pūrvāparībhūtaṃ bhāvamākhyātenācaṣṭa' iti |
anyeṣāṃ darśanaṃ(vāpa. 3 kriyā) yad vicaṭanaṃ taṇḍulāvayavānāṃ taṇḍulāvayavebhyo vibhāgaḥ, yadanantaraṃ mārdavādayo niṣpadyante, tadyadā 'dhiśrayaṇādiṣu pratyastarūpaṃ bhavati tadā ' 'khyātenā— bhidhīyate | tatra yadupalabhyate 'dhiśrayaṇaṃ tadaśabdavācyam; kārakanirākāṅkṣaṃ yacchabdenābhidhīyate tadaniṣpannaṃ sādhanatantramapratyakṣam; niṣpannāniṣpannayoś‍caikātmyāpattau pacatyādiśabdaprayogaḥ | sa cāyamevaṃrūpo 'rthātmā guṇakriyāṇāṃ paurvāparyātmanāṃ na pūrvo na paraś‍ca pūrvāparībhūto vyapadiś‍yate |
anye tu vicaṭanamevādhiśrayaṇādirūpaṃ pratipannāḥ, na rūpaśūnyānadhiśrayaṇādīn apratyastavicaṭanarūpān; āhuś‍ca kaḥ punaḥ paceḥ pradhānārthaḥ? yā 'sau taṇḍulānāṃ vik‍littiḥ | (mabhā. 3.1.26) |
athavā yadabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ preṣaṇamadhyeṣaṇaṃ vā sa sarvaḥ pacyartha iti | sarvasminnapi darśane yathābhūtākhyātaśabdena kriyā prakramyate, tathābhūtāyāḥ siddhamapratyakṣatvamiti phalenaiva samādhigamo yuktaḥ | sa kathamiti cet, iha sarveṣu sādhaneṣu sannihiteṣu kadācit pacatītyetad bhavati, kadācinna bhavati, yasminnimitte sannihite pacatītyetad, bhavati sā nūnaṃ kriyā, 'yathā devadatta iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati, sā nūnaṃ kriyā' iti (mabhā. 1. 3. 1) | dvitīyahetuśak‍tyā so 'pyartha iti cennaivam; iha kasyacideṣā buddhiḥ syāt; asatyevāsminnimitte pacatyādibuddhayaḥ prabartante, yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikādiṣviti tadanena nirvartayati (vāpa. 3 kriyā) | mṛgatṛṣṇikādibhyo hi tṛp‍timalāpakarṣaṇagharmāpanodanādi na phalaṃ nirvartate | asarvagatayorhi devaṃdattapāṭaliputrayorgamanakriyāntaranairantaryeṇāvasthānarūpaṃ phalamupalabhyate |
athavā etadayaṃ pratipadyeta, śaktikṛtāḥ pacatyādayo viśeṣoḥ sapratyayāś‍ca syuḥ, na kriyākṛtā iti, tadanena nirvartayati, yayā devadatta iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati sā nūnaṃ kriyeti | yadi hyete śaktikṛtāssyuḥ śak‍tyanantarameva pāṭaliputreṇa prāptiḥ syāt | na ca bhavati, tasmād bhavitavyaṃ śaktikṛtenānyena dharmeṇa, yasya phalaṃ deśāntaraprāptiriti |
kriyāmanye tu manyante k‍vacidapyanapāśritām |
sādhanekārthakāritve pravṛttimanapāyinīm || 31 || (vāpa. 3.8.37)
sāmānyabhūtā dhātvarthaissā punaḥ pravibhajyate |
tato vyāpārarūpeṇa sādhye paryavatiṣṭhate || 32 || (vāpa. 3.8.38)
prakṛtissādhanānāṃ sā prathamaṃ tac‍ca kārakam |
śaktirekādhikaraṇe strotovadapakarṣati || 33 || (vāpa. 3.8.39)
apūrvaṃ kālaśaktiṃ vā kriyāṃ vā kālameva vā |
tamevaṃlakṣaṇaṃ bhāvaṃ kecidāhuḥ kathañcana || 34 || (vāpa. 3.7.34)
sā tu yathā asti bhavati karotītyādyacchede bhedādabhinnāpi bhinneva prakāśate, tathā kramarūpopādānānnityameva kālasaṃbandhopādhibhūta—bhūta—bhaviṣyadādivyapadeśamāsādayati ||
(2. kālaḥ)
kaḥ punarayaṃ kālo nāma ?
kriyaiva, kriyāntarāvadhṛtaparimāṇavyavacchinnā vā kriyāparicchedahetuḥ kālaḥ |
kathaṃ punaḥ kriyayaiva kriyāparicchitti ?
śrūyatām iha tu kriyāḥ kāś‍citkriyāntaraiḥ kaiś‍cid buddhyaiva parimīyante | yathā arkādīnāṃ gatayaḥ, yathā ca godohādayaḥ, yathā 'smadādivyāpārāḥ, yathā puruṣāyuṣādayasta— trāvadhṛtaparimāṇābhiritarāḥ paricchidyante; yathā divisaṃ gacchati, varṣaśataṃ jīva, odanapākamāste, godāhaṃ svapiti; tatra paricchedakālavyavahāraṃ vartayanti; yathā 'saviturudayādirastamayaparyantaḥ kriyāprabandho divasaḥ, sa evāstamayādiḥ punarudayāvasāno niśā, sarvarkṣāṇāṃ sakṛtparivṛtti— rahorātraḥ, kālabhirindorāpyāyanaṃ parikṣayo vā pakṣaḥ, candrasya sakalanakṣatrātikramo māsaḥ, sūryācandramasorgati vibhāgādekāhorātrakṣayaḥ ṛtuḥ, raverdakṣiṇata uttarato vā gamanamayanam, bṛhaspaterekārāśya tikramassaṃvatsara iti | tena coktānuktakriyayā kālo 'vacchidyate | yathā divā divasaḥ, divaso niśā cāhorātraḥ, pañcadaśāhorātraḥ pakṣaḥ, pakṣadvayaṃ māsaḥ, māsadvayamṛtuḥ, ṛtutrayamayanaṃ, ayanadvayaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ, pañca saṃvatsarā yugam, yugāni dvādaśa kalpaḥ, kalpaśatāni dvādaśa mahākalpaḥ, mahākalpaṣaṣṭiś‍caturyugam, caturyugāni dvisaptatirmanvantaram, manvantarāṇi caturdaśa brahmadivasaḥ, tāvatyeva tanniśā pralayaḥ, tanmānena varṣaśatānte brahmaṇo 'pavargo mahāpralayaḥ | yathā vā sūryasya bhagaṇabhogo varṣaṃ, rāśibhogo māsaḥ, māsatriṃśāṃśo dinaṃ, dinaṣaṣṭyaṃśaḥ kalā, kalāṣaṣṭyaṃśo vikalā, vikalāṣaṣṭyaṃśaḥ tatpareti | tatra 'yathā rajatādyadhikaraṇagauravamavadhṛtaparimāṇadravyāntarasaṃbandhasamutkīrṇarekhastulādaṇḍaḥ rekhāsūtrāvasthānaḥ palaśaḥ karṣaśo bhāgaśo paricchinatti, tathā kalādivyavasthānavaśena bhāgaśaḥ kālāntaraṃ paricchinatti | parimāṇaṃ parimimītekriyāniyamaiḥ kālāvacchedaniyamaḥ, yathā paramāṇoḥ svāvaṣṭabdhapradeśa kramalakṣaṇaḥ kālaḥ kṣaṇaḥ, pakṣmasaṃpāto nimeṣaḥ, iyatkṣaṇā iyannimeṣā vā nāḍikā, dvināḍiko muhūrtaḥ, pādonacaturmuhūrto yāmaḥ, yāmāṣṭakamahorātra iti | buddhyavacchedena
vā kālaparicchedaḥ, yathā arkasya udayāvidūratā pratyūṣaḥ, (virāṭ)puruṣabhrūpradeśagatā dīrghatā pūrvāh‍ṇaḥ, tapamā madhyāhnaḥ, parāvṛtya darśanamaparāh‍ṇaḥ, astamayāsannatābhisandhiḥ sandhyeti | rātreḥ prārambho niśāmukham, niśāmukhād rātresturyāṃśaḥ pradoṣaḥ, ardharātramubhayato niśāṣṭamo niśīthaḥ, niśīthāt tāvanmātramapararātraḥ, parato niśāvaśeṣaḥ prabhāvamiti kriyāviśeṣaiḥ kālaviśeṣāvagamaḥ | tathā hi—
śayāne śorate rātrau divā jāgrati jāgrati |
jagatpradīpe padmāni kalatrāṇīva bhartari || 35 ||
ratāntakālakāntastrīdṛgvilāsaikasākṣiṇī |
niśā nīlotpalānīke nimīlati nimīlati || 36 ||
cañcvagracumbitā ' 'tāmracūtāṅ‌kurakadambakaiḥ |
kathyate kokilaireva madhurmadhurakūjitaiḥ || 37 ||
divākarakarālātapatānirdagdhavīrudhaḥ |
mārgāssamallikāmodā bhāvigrīṣmasya śaṃsinaḥ || 38 ||
śikhaṇḍimaṇḍalārabdhacaṇḍatāṇḍavaḍambaraiḥ |
prāvṛḍākhyāyate meghamedurairmedinīdharai || 39 ||
mauktikākāravistāri tārānikaracitritam |
śarat piśunatāṃ yāti yāmunāmbhonibhaṃ nabhaḥ || 40 ||
āyāmiyāminībhogasaphalābhogavibhramāḥ |
hemantamabhinandanti soṣmāṇastaruṇīstanāḥ || 41 ||
āskandana—dalatkundakalikotkaradanturāḥ |
vadanti śiśiraṃ vātāstuṣārakaṇakarkaśāḥ || 42 ||
bālyakaumārayauvanādayo maugdhyamādhyaprāgalbhyādayaś‍ca kriyāviśeṣavyaṅgyāḥ kālaviśeṣā eva | vayo hi dehināṃ vatsarādibhiḥ kālabhedaḥ; vayonimittāś‍ca teṣāṃ maugdhyādaya iti | ucyate— ﻿
uttālālakabhañjanāni kabarībhāreṣu śikṣāraso dantānāṃ parikarma nīvinahanaṃ bhrūlāsyayogyāgrahaḥ |
tiryaglocanaval‍gitāni vacasāṃ chekoktisaṅkrāntayaḥ strīṇāṃ mlāyati śaiśave pratikalaṃ ko 'pyeṣa kelikramaḥ || 43 ||
(bārā. 3.23)
vyasanotsavanityanaimittikakṣaṇaprakīrṇacandrodayacandrāstamayaprabhṛtayaś‍ca kālavyapadeśa— bhājo godohādivad veditavyāḥ | api ca
parāva/para—cirakṣipra—kramotkrama—vibhāgavān |
kālakriyāviśeṣābhivyaṅgyayarītiḥ pratīyatām || 44 ||
tathā hi— utpattyādikriyāṇāṃ prathamatve paraḥ; yatheyaṃ bālā jyeṣ‍ṭhā ca; vaiparītye punaraparaḥ, yathaiṣā pragalbhā kaniṣ‍ṭhā ca | sādhanānāṃ mandasaṃpātitve ciraḥ, yathā vatsyati kālaḥ pakṣyate tālaḥ, bhokṣyate tālaphalam; tadanyathātve kṣipraḥ, yathodbhinnaś‍ca vaṃśakarīraḥ śirāgataś‍ca pramāṇam | kriyāṇāmapaurvāparye yugapat, yathā kapitthayoḥ pratibhedaḥ, meṣayorabhighātaḥ | paurvāparye tvayugapat, yathā divasāgrato niśā, niśāgrato divasa iti | seyaṃ vastunaśśaktiḥ pākaprabhavā svābhāvikī kriyaiva; kriyāparicchedahetuḥ kālaḥ; kriyāś‍ca bhūtā bhaviṣyanti, vartamānāḥ avyaktāś‍ca | tatra vyatipatitasādhanabhūtā yathā 'pākṣīditi; anāgatā 'sannihita— sādhanā ca bhaviṣyati yathā pakṣyatīti; āvāp‍tā apracyutasvarūpā vartamānā yathā pacatīti; anirdhāritaviśeṣā avyaktā yathā pacedayamiti | tannibandhanaśca loke adya, śvaḥ, paraśvaḥ, paredyuḥ, anyedyuḥ, ubhayedyuḥ, idānīm, etarhi, aiṣamaḥ, parūt, parāri, śaśvat, svaḥ, bhūḥ, sadyuḥ, purā, ha, sma, yāvat, tadā, yadā, anyadā, ekadā, sadeti vyavahāraḥ luṅādīnāṃ bhūtādiṣu smaraṇamiti |
anye punaḥ kriyāvyatiriktamanudayāstamayamabhinnamanavacchinnadeśaṃ ca dravyaṃ pṛthagvidhānekaśaktiśatasahastrapākāyatanaṃ jagatpravṛttiniyamakāraṇaṃ kriyāparicchedahetumadṛṣ‍ṭādyapekṣaṃ kālamācakṣate | sa ca kriyāparicchedyaḥ kileti kecit; āhuś‍ca "nityo vyāpī saṃpratibhūtabhaviṣyatkriyāsamāveśāt ākāśakalpa eko dravyātmā bhidyate kālaḥ ||" tac‍cāsamīcīnameveti brūmaḥ | kriyā hi sādhyatvāt sādhanamevāpekṣate | na ca kriyāviśiṣ‍ṭasyāpi dravyātmanaḥ kālakārakeṇa saṃbandho ghaṭate, dvayorapi siddhatvāt | tasmād dravyarūpe kriyārūpe ﻿
vā kālaḥ kriyāmeva viśeṣayati | sā ca tadviśiṣ‍ṭā kārakaviśeṣamupatiṣṭhate | yadāha—
guṇaḥ kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ pradhānaṃ pratipadyate |
pradhānasyopakāritve tathā bhūyasi vartate || 45 ||
kalābhiḥ pṛthagarthābhiḥ pravibhaktaṃ svabhāvataḥ |
kecid‍buddhyanusaṃdhānalakṣaṇaṃ taṃ pracakṣate || 46 ||(vāpa.3.9.57)
sattālakṣaṇamanye tu kṣaṇarūpaṃ tathā 'pare |
devatāvastuśak‍tyātmasvarūpamapare viduḥ || 47 ||
tamasya lokayantrasya sūtradhāraṃ pracakṣate |
pratibandhābhyanujñābhyāṃ tena viśvaṃ vibhajyate || 48 ||
pratibaddhāś‍ca yāstena citrā viśvasya śak‍tayaḥ |
tāssa evānujānāti yathā tantraśakuntikāḥ || 49 ||(vāpa.3.9.15)
pratibandhābhyanujñābhyāṃ vṛttiryā tasya śāśvatī |
tayā vibhajyamāno 'sau labhate kramarūpatām || 50 ||(vāpa. 3.9.70)
tṛṇarājasya yā vṛddhistavacisārasya va dadhat |
cirakṣiprādibhede ca kālatattvaṃ vikalpate || 51 ||
vyatikrame 'pi mātrāṇāṃ na tasyāsti vyatikramaḥ |
na gantṛgatibhedena mārgabhedo 'sti kaś‍cana || 52 ||(vāpa.3.9.74)
dūrāntikavyavasthānamadhvādi karaṇaṃ yathā |
cirakṣipravyavasthānaṃ kālo 'dhikaraṇaṃ tathā || 53 ||(vāpa.3.9.47)
kriyopādhissa yā bhūtabhaviṣyad‍vartamānatāḥ |
parāvaravibhāgārthe sa śaktīḥ pratipadyate || 54 ||(vāpa.3.9.37)
bhūtānāṃ caiva yad rūpaṃ rūpaṃ yad bhāvināmapi |
sudurdarśa ivādarśe kāla evopalabhyate || 55 ||
﻿
kriyābhedād yathaikasmiṃstakṣādyākhyā pravartate |
kriyābhedāt tathaikasmin nṛtvākhyā copajāyate || 56 ||(vāpa. 3.9.32)
viśiṣ‍ṭamavadhiṃ taṃ tamupādāyāvakalpate |
kālaḥ kālavidāmekaḥ kalādipravibhaktaye || 57 ||(vāpa. 3.9.68)
tṛṇaparṇalatādīni yathā stroto 'vakarṣati |
pravartayati kālo 'pi mātrā mātrāvatāṃ tathā || 58 ||(vāpa. 3.9.41)
prārambhāveśaniṣ‍ṭhāsu sthitivipratipattiṣu |
sāmyotkarṣāpakarṣeṣu nimittaṃ kāla iṣyate || 59 ||
saṃsargiṇāṃ tu ye bhedā viśeṣāstasya te matāḥ |
saṃbhinnastairvyavasthānāṃ kālo bhedāya kalpate || 60 ||(vāpa. 3.9.8)
prativyavasthaṃ kālasya vyāpāro 'tra vyavasthitaḥ |
kālo vā viśvarūpātmā vyāpāra iti kathyate || 61 ||(vāpa. 3.9.12)
kriyāvacchedahetuṃ vā kriyāvacchedyameva vā |
kālatmānamanāśritya vyavahartuṃ na śakyate || 62 ||
tasyāvyaktasvarūpasya vyavahāre kriyākṛtāḥ |
bhūtādayo mahābhedā yān loko nātivartate || 63 ||(vāpa.3.9)
ke punaste? yān bhūta upādhau (bhūtādyupādhau) luṅādiviṣayānudāhariṣyāmaḥ ||
tadetad dravyātmanaḥ kriyātmano vā kriyāparicchedinaḥ kālasya svarūpamabhihitam |
athāparamaparimeyātmano devatādirūpasya svaśaktinimittaviśvapravṛttiparicchedyasya tasya paricchedino vā kriyāhetuśak‍tyāyatanabhūtaṃ dravyarūpapariṇataṃ vivṛttaṃ vā, yat samastavivṛtta— saṃgrahānugrahādinityanaimittikādirūpaṃ svarūpamastiḥ tat purastāt pratipāditaṃ, agrataś‍ca viśeṣataḥ pratipādayiṣyata iti neha pratanyate, saṃbandhāvacchedārthaṃ tu leśato '— bhidhīyata iti | tatprabhedād dravyarūpo 'pi kālaś‍caturdhā— nityo, naimittikaḥ, svābhāviko, vaiparāmārśika iti | teṣu — ﻿
1. nityaḥ śāśvatiko, vaikalpikaḥ naiyogikaś‍ca tridhā |
2. naimittiko 'pi audyogikaḥ, aupabhogikaḥ prāyogikaś‍ceti trividhaḥ | evaṃ
3. svābhāviko 'pi āgantukaḥ, naisargikaḥ, sāṃsargika iti tridhā |
4. vaiparāmārśiko 'pi saṅkīrṇaḥ, prakīrṇo, viprakīrṇa iti tridhaiva |
(1. nityaḥ)
(śāśvatikaḥ) teṣu kṣaṇanimeṣanāḍikāmuhūrtapraharāhorātrasvarūpaśśāśvatikaḥ |
ayaṃ hi śaśvatpravartamāno nāvadhiviśeṣamapekṣate | yathā—
kṣaṇe nimeṣe nāṅyā vā muhūrte prahare 'hni vā |
gate tvameṣyasītyukte rūrodha pathikaṃ priyā || 64 ||
(vaikalpikaḥ) dinarātripakṣamāsartvayanarūpo vaikalpikaḥ |
ayaṃ hi suryodayādiviśiṣ‍ṭamavadhimapekṣamāṇo vikalpāya prabhavati | yathā—
dināni rātrayaḥ pakṣamāsāvṛturathāyanam |
jarā vai yadyadaṅgānāṃ tat tatpremṇo rasāyanam || 65 ||
(naiyogikaḥ) saṃvatsarayugakalpamanvantarapralayamahāpralayarūpo naiyogikaḥ |
ayaṃ hi bṛhaspatinārāyaṇapuramathanabrahmaṇāṃ rāśyādipravṛttiśeṣaviśiṣ‍ṭamevāvadhimapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇino viśiṣ‍ṭāsu pravṛttiṣu niyuṅkte | yathā—
saṃvatsarairyugaiḥ kalpairmanubhiḥ pralayaiḥ kṣayaiḥ |
hīyate hi jagat sarvamekaḥ kāmo na hīyate || 66 ||
te 'mī śāśvatikavaikalpikanaiyogikāsrayo 'pi kālabhedā nityā ucyante, nityarūpeṇaivānivāritapravṛttitvāt |
(2. naimittikaḥ)
(audyogikaḥ) prātaḥpratyūṣaprāha‌ṇamadhyāhnasandhyārūpa audyogikaḥ |
ayaṃ hyapekṣitāharbhāgapaurvāparyāvadhiḥ prāṇināṃ prabodhotthānas‍nānabhojanaprasādhana— vihārāderūdyogasya nimittaṃ bhavati | yathā—
prātaḥpratyūṣayoss‍nāti bhuṅkte sandhyāparāhaṇayoḥ |
prāhaṇamadhyāhnayoryūnāṃ śete manasi manmathaḥ || 67 ||
﻿
ayaṃ hyapekṣitarātrivibhāgāpaurvāparyāvadhiḥ kāmināṃ dūtīsaṃpreṣaṇaprekṣānidrāsukha— madhupānābhisaraṇāderūpabhogasya nimittaṃ bhavati | yathā—
niśāmukhe pradoṣe ca niśīthāpararāratrayoḥ |
indoḥ prakaśe nāśe va sup‍taḥ kāmo vibudhyate || 68 ||
(prāyogikaḥ) śaraddhemantaśiśiravasantagrīṣmavarṣārūpaḥ prāyogikaḥ |
ayaṃ hyapekṣitasaṃvatsaraviṣu— paurvāparyāvadhiṃ prāṇināṃ kāmakṛtacittavaikṛtānāṃ prayoganimittaṃ bhavati | yathā—
śaraddhemantayoranyadanyad varṣāvasantayoḥ |
himartugrīṣmayoranyat kāmāvasthā pravartate || 69 ||
te 'mī trayo 'pyaudyogikaupayogikaprāyogikāḥ kālabhedā naimittikā ucyante | nityatve 'pyeṣāmudyogādernimittatvāt |
(3. svābhāvikaḥ)
(āgantukaḥ) madapramadābhyudayotsavavyasanaparihāsābhirūpa āgantukaḥ |
sa hi viśiṣ‍ṭakriyopanipatādikamavadhimapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇināṃ madapramadādirūpeṇaivāgacchati |
yathā—
madapramadaharṣeṣu vyasaneṣūtsaveṣu ca |
parihāseṣu ca prāyaḥ kāmassaṃmānamarhati || 70 ||
(naisargikaḥ) bālyakaumārayauvanamaugdhyamādhyasthyaprāgalbhyādirūpo naisargikaḥ |
ayaṃ hi vayovibhāgādikaṃ viśiṣ‍ṭamevāvadhimapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇināṃ nisargata eva bhavati |
yathā—
maugdhyaprāgalbhyamādhyasthyabālyakaumārayauvanaiḥ |
ātiṣ‍ṭhati padaiṣṣaḍ‌bhiḥ s‍trījātiṃ kāmaṣaṭpadaḥ || 71 ||
(sāṃsargikaḥ) parāparayaugapadyacirakṣiprarūpassāṃsargikaḥ |
ayaṃ hi pravṛttisādhanānāṃ pūrvāparatve sahaikatve mandaśīghrasamapātitve ca kriyāsvapekṣamāṇo mithaḥ saṃsargāya prabhavati | yathā—
krameṇa yugapat pūrvamagrato drāk cireṇa vā |
samāsajantyaḥ cetāṃsi na jñāyante smarārtayaḥ || 72 ||
te 'mī āgantukanaisargikasāṃsargikās‍trayo 'pi kālabhedāḥ svābhāvikā ucyante, svabhāvata eva pravartamānatvāt |
(4. vaiparāmarśikaḥ)
(saṅkīrṇaḥ) deśyakrīḍākelikelidyūtavratagoṣṭhīprekṣādirūpassaṅkīrṇaḥ | sa hi viśiṣṭaṃ taṃ tamavadhimapekṣamāṇassaṃbhūya pravartitassaṅkīrṇa eva bhavati | yathā—
vrateṣu goṣṭhīprekṣāsu kelidyūteṣu keliṣu |
deśyakrīḍāsu cānaṅgaḥ punaraṅgena yujyate || 73 ||
(prakīrṇaḥ) viviktadīrghikodyānasaudhakrīḍādidarśanādirūpaḥ prakīrṇaḥ | sa hyekasya vā parimitaparivārasya vā viśiṣṭāvadhika eva prakīrṇakanyāyena yadākadācidutpadyate |
yathā—
vivikta—dīrghikodyāna—saudha—krīḍādi—darśane |
latāveśmopaveśe ca kāmaḥ kāmena yujyate || 74 ||
(viprakīrṇaḥ) aṣṭamīcandrakendrītsavayakṣarātrikundacaturthīsuvasantakamadanatrayodaśyādirūpo viprakīrṇakaḥ | sa hi viśiṣṭamaṣṭamyādikālabhedāvadhimapekṣamāṇaḥ kāmibhirnirvartyate | samasteṣvapi deśeṣu viprakīrṇa iva dṛśyate iti | yathā—
aṣṭamīcandrake kundacaturthyoṃ suvasantake |
smarassmarārcā—śakrārcā—yakṣarātriṣu vardhate || 75 ||
sa eva kālaḥ kārtsnyena dvirūpa iva darśitaḥ |
kriyāpadaikavācyo yaḥ kriyāyāssādhanaṃ ca yaḥ || 76 ||
(3. kārakam /dravyam (sādhanapadārthaḥ))
kiṃ punassādhanam? svaparāśritakriyābhinirvṛttihetuśśaktimad‍dravyaṃ, yat kārakam ityācakṣate | kārakaśabdaś‍cāyamavyutpannaḥ kriyānimittavacano lokatassiddhaḥ karotīti vā kārakaśabdena śaktimad dravyamucyate | tathā hi—
niṣpannamātre kartṛtvaṃ sarvatraivāsti kārake |
vyāpārabhedāpekṣāyāṃ karaṇāditvasaṃbhavaḥ || 77 ||
putrasya janmani yathā pitroḥ kartṛtvamucyate |
ayamasmādiyaṃ tvasmāditi bhedavivakṣayā || 78 ||
śaktimātrāsamūhasya viśvasyānekadharmiṇaḥ |
sarvathā sarvadā bhāvāt kvacit kiñcid vivakṣyate || 79 ||
sarvatra sahajā śaktiryāvad‍dravyamavasthitā |
kriyākāle tvabhivyaktirāśrayaḥ parakāriṇī || 80 ||
svāṅgasaṃyoginaḥ pāśā daityānāṃ vāruṇā yathā |
vyajyante vijigīṣūṇāṃ dravyāṇāṃ śaktayastathā || 81 ||(vāpa. 3.7.30)
taikṣṇyagauravakāṭhinyasaṃsthānaiḥ svairasiryadā |
bhedyaṃ prati vyāpriyate śaktimān gṛhyate tadā || 82 ||(vāpa. 3.7.31)
svāśraye samavetānāṃ tadvadevāśrayāntare |
kriyāṇāmabhiniṣpatternimittaṃ śaktiriṣyate || 83 ||
tattve vā vyatireke vā vyatirik‍taiva socyate |
śabdapramāṇako lokassa śāstreṇānugamyate || 84 ||(vāpa. 3.7.38)
tatra śaktimato dravyasya kārakākhyāyāmavāntaravyāpāranibandhanāḥ ṣaḍupākhyā bhavanti, 1. kartā, 2. karma, 3. karaṇam, 4. saṃpradānam, 5. apādānam, 6. adhikaraṇam ceti | teṣu—
svatantraḥ kartā |
kiṃ punastasya svātantryam, yat karaṇādīni prayuṅkte, na taiḥ prayujyate, tāni nyakkaroti, na tairnyakkriyate, na tairnirvartyate, tāni nirvartayati, tāni pratinidhatte, na taiḥ pratinidhīyate; tebhyassaḥ prathamamātmānaṃ labhate, na tāni | tasmāt sa tairvinā 'pi dṛśyate, na tāni teneti | tadāha—
prāganyataśśaktilābhānnyagbhāvāpādanādapi |
tadadhīnapravṛttitvāt pravṛttānāṃ nivartanāt || 85 ||(vāpa. 3.7.101)
adṛṣṭatvāt pratinidheḥ praviveke ca darśanāt |
ārādapyupakāritve prādhānyaṃ kartturucyate || 86 ||(vāpa. 3.7.102)
kathaṃ tarhi kartṛśaktyā nyakkṛteṣu karaṇādiṣu kārakatvam, svavyāpāre pradhānavyāpāre ca svātantryāt | taduktam—
guṇakriyāṇāṃ kartāraḥ kartrā nyakkṛtaśaktayaḥ |
karaṇatvādibharjātāḥ kriyābhedānuvādibhiḥ || 87 ||1
1. vākyapadīye 3.7.20—3.7.21 iti kārikayoḥ pūrvārddhe |
vyastā(nyak‍tā)yāmapi saṃpūrṇaissvavyāpāraissamanvitāḥ |
svātantryamuttaraṃ labdhvā pradhāne yānti kartṛtām || 88 ||1
yathā rājño niyukteṣu yoddha‍ṛtvaṃ yod‍dhṛṣu sthitam |
teṣu vṛttau tu labhate rājā jayaparājayau || 89 ||(vāpa. 3.7.22)
tathā kartrā niyukteṣu sarveṣvekārthakāriṣu |
kartṛtvaṃ karaṇāditvairuttaraṃ na virudhyate || 90 ||(vāpa. 3.7.23)
kartrādīnāṃ ca ṣaṇṇāmapi pratyekaṃ triprakāratvādaṣṭādaśaprabhedā bhavanti | tatra —
kartā svatantraḥ, hetuḥ, karmakartā ca |
karma nirvartyaṃ, vikāryaṃ prāpyaṃ ca |
karaṇaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca |
saṃpradānaṃ dadātikarmāpyaṃ, karmamātrāpyaṃ kriyāpyaṃ ca |
apādānaṃ nirdiṣṭaviṣayamanirdiṣṭaviṣayamupāttaviṣayamapekṣitakriyaṃ ca |
adhikaraṇaṃ vaiṣayikamaupaśleṣikaṃ naimiktikaṃ ceti |
(1. kartā)
(svatantraḥ —6) tacca(tra)kartṛbhedeṣu svatantraḥ samartho 'samarthassamarthāsamarthaḥ, saṃbandho 'saṃbandha— ssaṃbandhāsaṃbandhaś‍ca | teṣu—
samartho yathā— vrajati, pacati, asti, śvetate |
asamartho yathā— jāyate, viramati, naśyati, vikaroti |
samarthāsamartho yathā— caitrasya rujati, caitrasyāmayati, coraṃ jvarayati, coraṃ saṃtāpayati |
saṃbandho yathā priyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaṃ bhavati, ripuṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhamutpadyate, ramyaṃ śrutvā didṛkṣā jāyate, rahaḥ prāpya ratirnirvartate |
asaṃbandho yathā— merau dogdhari dharitrīmadrayo duduhuḥ, pañcabhirhalaiḥ kṣetraṃ grāmaṇīḥ karṣati, śailairvālmīkirammodhiṃ bandhayati, ujjaninyāḥ prasthito māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryamudgamayati |
saṃbandhāsaṃbandho yathā— bhavati pacati, bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāt |
1. vākyapadīya 3.7.20—3.7.21 iti kārikayoḥ uttarārddhe |
(hetuḥ —6) karmaprayojakaḥ, kartṛprayojakaḥ, karmakartṛprayojakaḥ, hetuprayojakaḥ, ahetuprayojakaḥ hetvahetuprayojakaś‍ca | teṣu—
karmaprayojako yathā— gāṃ dogdhi payaḥ, pauravaṃ gāṃ yācate, gargāñchataṃ daṇḍayati, kāśān kaṭaṃ karoti |
kartṛprayojako yathā— yajñadattaḥ pācayati, māṭharaḥ pāṭhayati, bhikṣā vāsayati, kārīṣo 'gniḥ adhyāpayati |
karmakartṛprayojako yathā— ārohayati hastitaṃ hastipakaḥ, ārohayate hastinaṃ hastipakaḥ, ārohayate hastī, niṣādayati kramelakamauṣṭrikaḥ, śrapayati yavāgūṃ yajñadattaḥ, sādhayati odanaṃ sūpakāra iti | kathaṃ punaḥ śrāyati—siyati—kartroryavāgvodanayoḥ karmakartṛtvaṃ ghaṭate?
śrātisidhyatī akarmakau karmakartṛviṣayasya pacerarthe vartete | etau punaḥ prākṛtaṃ pacyarthamāhaturiti |
hetuprayojako yathā—avīvadat pravīṇo vīṇāṃ parivādakena, apīpaṭhat kaṭho māṇavakaṃ māṭhareṇa, ajighrapat priyaḥ kusumaṃ kāntayā, adūduhad gāṃ vallavo gopālakena | kathaṃ punaḥ duhikartuḥ kartṛprayojakasya hetutvam?
duherantarbhūtaṇijarthatvāt | vakṣyati hi—
antarbhūtaṇijarthānāṃ duhādīnāṃ ṇijantavat |
siddhaṃ pūrveṇa karmatvam (ṇijantaṃ niyamastathā) || 91 || iti (vāpa. 3.7.73) |
ahetuprayojako yathā— saṃvarmayati, atihastayati, abhiṣeṇayati, upaślokayati |
hetvahetuprayojako yathā— putra upādhyāyamadhyāpayati, kanyā nadau na (?) vartayati, yājyayājakau yājayati, kanyāvarau vivāhayati |
(karmakartā —6) vikarmakartā, prayojyakartā, karmaprayojyakartā, prakṛtikartā, vikārakartā prakṛtivikārakartā ca | teṣu—
vikarmakartā yathā— avakirate hastī, grathate mālā, prasnute gauḥ, cikīrṣate kaṭaḥ |
prayojyakartā yathā— pācayati devadattena, pāṭhayati viṣṇumitreṇa, bhārayati bhāraṃ vāhakena, kārayati kaṭaṃ varuṭena |
karmaprayojyakartā yathā— ārohayate niṣādinaṃ kareṇuḥ, lāvayate pāmaraṃ kedāraḥ, darśayate rājā bhṛtyaiḥ, abhivādayate gururdevadattena |
prakṛtikartā yathā—kāṣṭhāni bhasma bhavanti, mahadbhūtaś‍candramāḥ, tvad bhavanti jñātayaḥ, mad bhavanti dāyādāḥ |
vikārakartā yathā—mūtrāya saṃpadyate yavāgūḥ, abhyūṣāya kalpate yavānī, ghaṭāya kapālau bhavataḥ; suvarṇapiṇḍaṃ kuṇḍale bhavataḥ |
prakṛtivikārakartā yathā—saṅghībhavanti brāhmaṇāḥ, vargībhavanti gāvaḥ vatso vṛṣassaṃpadyate, bālā pragalbhā bhavati |
sa eṣo 'ṣṭādaśaprakāro 'pi abhihitānabhihitaprayujyamānā 'prayujyamānaprasiddhaprakṛtā— pekṣitaupacārikaprakalpitavikalpitānusyūtasāmānyādibhedādanekadhā kartṛbhedassaṃbhavati | tatra—
abhihito yathā— sa āste, bhavān karoti |
anabhihito yathā— bhavatā kṛtaṃ, tena supyate |
prayujyamāno yathā— tvaṃ pacasi, ahaṃ pacāmi |
aprayujyamāno yathā— pacasi, pacāmi |
prasiddho yathā— varṣati, heṣate |
prakṛto yathā— bhremuḥ, vavalguḥ |
apekṣito yathā— ityācakṣate, yamayuṅkta |
upacarito yathā— dhunarvidhyati, mañcāḥ krośanti |
prakalpito yathā— ātmano 'pi nātmāno jāyante, ātmaivātmānaṃ jānāti |
vikalpito yathā— ahamanyo vā gacchatu, anyo 'haṃ vā gacchāmi |
anusyūto yathā— sa ca tvaṃ ca pacathaḥ, tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca pacāvaḥ |
sāmānyo yathā— pacati paṭhati ceti | ete ca bhedāḥ karmādiṣvapi yathāsaṃbhavamūhanīyā iti vibhaktaḥ kartā ||
(2. karma)
kriyāpyaṃ karma; yadāha 'karturīpsitatamaṃ karma' (1.4.49) iti |
tattu trividhaṃ. nirvartyaṃ, vikāryaṃ prāpyamiti |
tatra yadavidyamānamutpādyate vidyamānaṃ vā janmādinā prakāśyate tannirvartyaṃ,
yadabhinirvṛttameva prakṛtyucchedena guṇāntarādhānena vā vikāramāpadyate tad vikāryaṃ, yasya kriyākṛtānāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ sarvathānupalabdhistat prāpyam | taduktam—
yadasajjāyate sad‌vā janmanā yat prakāśate |
tannirvartya vikāryaṃ tu karma dvedhā vyavasthitam || 92 ||(vāpa. 3.7.49)
prakṛtyucchedasaṃbhūtaṃ kiñcit‌kāṣṭhādibhasmavat |
kiñcid guṇāntarāpattyā suvarṇādivikāravat || 93 ||(vāpa. 3.7.50)
kriyāgata/kṛtaviśeṣāṇāṃ siddhiryatra na gamyate |
darśanādanumānād‌vā tat prāpyamiti kathyate || 94 || (vāpa. 3.7.51)
tatra nirvartye vikāryaḥ prāpyadharmassvadharmaś‍ca vikārye prāpyadharmassvadharmaś‍ca, prāpye tu svadharma eva | kaḥ punarasau— (vāpa. 3.7.53)
ābhāsopa/so 'vagamo vyaktissoḍhatvamiti karmaṇaḥ |
viśeṣāḥ prāpyamāṇasya kriyāsiddhau vyavasthitāḥ || 95 ||
nirvartyavikāryayostu nirvṛttivikāryāveva | yathocyate—
nirvartyādiṣu tat pūrvamanubhūya svatantratām |
kartrantarāṇāṃ vyāpāre karma saṃpadyate punaḥ || 96 || (vāpa. 3.7.54)
(nirvartyam—6)
tatra nirvartyam 'utpādyaṃ' prakāś‍yamupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ vyavahitamaprāpyaṃ' ca | teṣu— yadasadutpādyate tadutpādyam, yathā saṃyogaṃ vidhatte, sukhamutpādayati, vibhāgaṃ kurvate, duḥkhaṃ janayati | vidyamānameva yadāvaraṇāpāyādāvirbhavati tat prakāś‍yam, yathā śabdaṃ janayati, putraṃ sūyate, tailaṃ kurute, payo dogdhi | apradhānabhūtamupasarjanam, yathā kaṭaṃ kartumārabhate, grāmo vāsayitumiṣyate, pak‍tvodano bhujyate, paktumodanaś‍cintyate | svānuraktapratyayajanakaṃ viśeṣaṇam, yathā bhīṣmamudāraṃ kaṭaṃ karoti, mahāntamavyaktaṃ śabdamuccārayati, dīrghāyuṣaṃ guṇinamātmajaṃ prasūte, citramacchapaṭaṃ vayati | kriyāntareṇa vyavadhānavad vyavahitam, yathā māsamāste, godohaṃ pacati, krośamadhīte, kurūn (gacchan) svapiti |
kālādhvabhāvadeśānāmantarbhūta— kriyāntaraiḥ |
sarvairakarmakairyoge karmatvamupajāyate || 97 || (vāpa. 3.7.67)
sakarmikāpi kriyā dravyādikarmaṇyeva niviśate, na kālādikarmaṇi, yathā māsamodanaṃ pacati, krośamanuvākamadhīte |
ādhāratvamiva prāptāste punardravyakarmasu |
kālādayo bhinnakakṣyā/kakṣyaṃ yānti karmatvamuttaram || 98 || (vāpa. 3.7.68)
kriyāviśeṣaṇam aprāpyam, yathā sukhamabhidhatte, duḥkhaṃ nirvartayati, mandaṃ gacchati, śīghramāyāti |
kathaṃ punarupasarjanādīnāṃ nirvartyamānatā ? yathā nirvartyamānasya 'yathā hyasau kaṭaṃ nirvartayati, evaṃ tad‍gatabhīṣmodārādikaṃ taddharmamapi iti | evaṃ śabde 'pi | pakvaudano bhujyata iti | atra tu pākenaudano nirvartyate; kevalaṃ sāsya śaktiḥ; pradhānabhujikriyāviṣayakarma— śaktisannidhau pak‍tyupasarjanībhūtākhyātena pradhānaśak‍tyabhidhāne 'bhihitavat prakāśate | paktumodanaś‍cintyata ityatra pacyarthatvāt cintāyāḥ yadyapi pākasya vāstavaṃ pradhānatvaṃ tathā 'pyākhyātapratyayena prādhānyataś‍cintābhidhānāt pacikriyopasarjanaṃ bhavati | atastadviṣayā karmaśaktiḥ pradhānaśak‍tyabhidhāne 'bhihitavad bhavati | etena kaṭaḥ kartumārabhyate, grāmo gantumiṣyate ityapi vyākhyātam |
nanu gamergrāmaḥ, iṣerubhe karmaṇī, tat kasyātropasarjanatā ? naivam; iṣerubhe karmaṇī iti yaducyate tatsāmarthyapradarśanaparamavagantavyam | iṣyate grāmaḥ kiṃ kartum? gantum, grāmo grāmamiti vā | na punariṣeḥ yugapadubhe karmaṇī saṃbhavataḥ | evamahite 'pi kaṭādivadeva māsādīnāmāsanādibhirabhinirvartyamānatā pratīyate | tathā hi vaktāro bhavanti iha sthito 'yaṃ māsaṃ nirvartayatīti | evaṃ pacan godoham, adhīyānaḥ krośaṃ, svapan kurun iti kālabhāva gantavyānāmeva kurukrośādīnāṃ karmatvam | yadāha—
kālabhāvādhvagantavyāḥ karmasaṃjñā hyakarmaṇām || 99 || (mabhā. 1.4.41) iti |
aprāpyam— yatkriyāviśeṣaṇatvāt kriyāvadeva nirvartyamānam | tatkriyāyāḥ kathamiti cet, puruṣavyāpārasāmānyāśrayaṇāt | aprāpyatvaṃ punastasya dhātvarthābhiprāyeṇa | na hyasau dhātvarthena prāpyate; api tu puruṣavyāpāreṇa | dhātvarthasya tu tatra karaṇatvam | viśvajitā yajetetyādau dhātvarthanāmadheyebhyo viśvajidādibhyaḥ karaṇavibhaktidarśanādagniṣṭomayājī— tyādisiddhyartha 'karaṇe yajaḥ' (3.2.85) iti ca sūtrārambhāt | agniṣṭomādayo hi svargādiphalabhāvanāyāṃ karaṇam |
(vikāryaṃ—6)
vikāryam— avināś‍yaṃ vināś‍yamīpsitamanīpsitamāsthitaṃ kartṛkarma ca | tatra—
avināś‍yaṃ yathā— suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍalīkaroti, kāṇḍaṃ lunāti, kāntāṃ kopayati, priyaṃ prasādayati |
vināś‍yaṃ yathā— kusūlaṃ bhinatti, kāṣṭhaṃ dahati, dhānāḥ pibati, udapeṣaṃ pinaṣṭi |
īpsitaṃ yathā— striyaṃ gacchati, payaḥ pibati |
anīpsitaṃ yathā— corān paś‍yati, dhanaṃ tyajati, viṣaṃ bhakṣayati, ahiṃ laṅghayati | kaḥ punareṣāṃ vikāraḥ? prakṛteranyathātvam; na hi corādayo darśanādiviṣayā bhavanti |
āsthitaṃ yathā— panthānaṃ gacchati, nadīṃ tarati, parvatamārohati, gartamuttarati | kaḥ punaranyato 'sya bhedaḥ ? | ucyate—
tyāgarūpaṃ prahātavye prāpye saṃdarśanādike/saṃsargadarśanam |
āsthitaṃ karma yat tatra dvairūpyaṃ bhajate kriyā || 100 || (vāpa. 3.7.135)
kartṛkarma yathā— lūyate kedārassvayameva, pacyata odanassvayameva, bhidyate kusūlassvayameva, bhajyate kāṣṭhaḥ svayameveti |
(prāpyam—6)
prāpyamapi prāpyaṃ, prayojyaṃ, aparihāryamabhihitamanabhihitamakathitaṃ ca | tatra prāpyaṃ yathā— ādityaṃ paś‍yati, himavantaṃ śrṛṇoti, vedamadhīte, carcāḥ pārayati |
prayojyaṃ yathā— māṇavakaṃ gamayati, śiṣyaṃ bodhayati, brāhmaṇamāsādayati, patiṃ śāyayati | nanu ca vikāryametat; tanna, prayojakavyāpāramātrasya vivakṣitatvāt | vikāraś‍caiṣāṃ svakriyānibandhana iti |
aparihāryaṃ yathā— vibhāgaṃ janayan saṃyogamucchinatti, kaṭaṃ kurvan kāśānāharati, grāmaṃ gacchan vṛkṣamūlānyupasarpati, āmikṣāṃ bhāvayan vājinamāpnoti |
abhihitaṃ yathā yathā— uṣṭrāsikāḥ āsyante, hataśāyikāśśayyante, raipoṣaṃ puṣyati, udapeṣaṃ pinaṣṭi |
anabhihitaṃ yathā— 'paś‍ya mṛgo' dhāvati, smarasi devadatta kāś‍mīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, na marṣayāmi yat tatra bhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet |
bhāvarūpaṃ tu yat karma tadihābhihitaṃ viduḥ| kriyārūpaṃ tu manyante karmā 'nabhihitaṃ budhāḥ || 101 ||
atha akathitam, tadyathā— gāṃ dogdhi payaḥ, pauravaṃ gāṃ yācate, vrajaṃ gāmavaruṇaddhi, māṇavakaṃ panthānaṃ pṛcchati, pauravaṃ gāṃ bhikṣate, vṛkṣamapacinute phalāni, māṇavakaṃ dharmaṃ brūte, māṇavakaṃ dharmamanuśāsti, śatānīkaṃ śataṃ jayati, gargāñchataṃ daṇḍayati, upasaramaśvaṃ muṣṇāti, ambunidhimamṛtaṃ manthāti, śākhāṃ grāmaṃ karṣati, ajāṃ grāmaṃ nayati, edhān grāmaṃ harati, bhāraṃ grāmaṃ vahati, evaṃ nagaraṃ harati bhāram, samāhartāramayutaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti, kāśān kaṭaṃ karoti |
kiṃ punarihākathitam?
payaḥprabhṛti |
kenākathitam?
lakṛtyaktakhalarthādibhiriti | na hi payaḥprabhṛtayo lādibhiḥ kathyante, api tu gavādayaḥ; yathā duhyate gauḥ payaḥ, dogdhavyā gauḥ payaḥ, suduhā gauḥ paya iti | yattu tairākhyāyate tadīpsitatamaṃ pradhānakarma, prāgeva kriyāsaṃbandhāt | taduktam—
tasmācchuddhasya duherbhavati gavā pūrvameva saṃbandhaḥ |
gorduhinā payasastu prāk tasmāllādayastasmin || 102 ||1
evaṃ grāmā diṣvapi ānayanādibhyaḥ prāgeva nayatyādisabaṃndhāt lādibhirabhidhāne taddhitotpattiravagantavyā | taccākhyānataḥ kathitamucyate, tad‍ivaparītaṃ tvakathitamiti || 'duhiyācirudhipracchibhikṣiciyām' (mabhā. 1.4.51) ityādi,
jidaṇḍimuṣimanthānāṃ gatyarthānāmakīrtite |
nīhṛñvahigrahādīnāmupasaṃkhyānamiṣyate || 103 || (mabhā. 1.4.51)
asyārthaḥ duhyādīnāṃ ya upayogaḥ prapūraṇādistasya yannimittaṃ payaḥprabhṛti, yacca bruviśāsyoḥ kriyā(kriyayā) dharmādikaṃ(ka)samavāyena saṃbadhyate tadapādānādisaṃjñānāmavidhāne dvitīyā— vācyamapradhānakarmākathitam ucyate | jiprabhṛtīnāṃ cāpradhānakarmaṇastatraivopasaṃkhyānamiti |
1. tasmācchuddha = ya(ta)smācchabdasya śuddha rāghavaḥ
anye tūpayujyata ityupayogaḥ payaḥprabhṛti, tasya yannimittaṃ gavādi | bruviśāsiguṇena ca pradhānena dharmādikarmaṇā māṇavakādi yat saṃbadhyate tadakathitamityācakṣate | tatpakṣe lādivācyānāṃ gavādīnāṃ prādhānyaṃ (na) vyāhanyeta, akathitasaṃjñā ca nārthā syāt | lādayaś‍ca teṣāmapi mate pradhānakarmaṇyeva, yathā ajā nīyate grāmamiti | yathoktam—
pradhānakarmaṇyākhyeye lādīnāhurdvikarmaṇām |
apradhāne duhādīnāṃ ṇyante kartuś‍ca karmaṇaḥ || 104 || (mabhā. 1.4.41) iti
tanmitho viruddhārthatvādeṣāmevāvimṛś‍yavāditāmāpādayati | kathaṃ samāna eva yogakṣeme gavādīnāmaprādhānyam, ajādīnāṃ ca prādhānyam, kathaṃ vā pradhānaṃ gavādi lādibhirajādivadevābhidhīyate? kiṃ ca—
antarbhūtaṇijarthānāṃ duhyādīnāṃ ṇijantavat |
siddhaṃ pūrveṇa karmatvaṃ ṇijantaniyamastathā || 105 || (vāpa. 3.7.73)
asmin pakṣe gavādīnāṃ vyaktameva prayojyatvāt prāk‍sūtreṇaiva pradhānakarmatvam | tathā ca gāṃ dogdhi paya ityatra gāṃ payaḥ kṣārayatītyarthaḥ | yato duhiḥ prapūraṇārthaḥ, pūraṇamāpyāyanaṃ, prapūraṇaṃ tu virecanaṃ, preraṇaprasthānādāvivārthavaiparītyādhānāt | yastu ṇijantādīnāmapi 'gatibuddhi'(1.4.52) ityādinā karmasaṃjñārambhaḥ, sa pācayati devadattenetyādau prayojyasya kartuḥ karmasaṃjñā nirvartayanniyamārtho bhaviṣyatīti vibhaktaṃ karma ||
(3. karaṇam)
karaṇamucyate; tatra kriyāṃ pratyupāttavyāpāreṣu karmādiṣu yad‍vyāpārānantaraṃ kriyāsiddhivivakṣā tatkārakaṃ sādhakatamaṃ karaṇamiti | yadāha—
kriyāyāḥ pariniṣpattiḥ yad‍vyāpārādanantaram |
yadā vivakṣyate tasya karaṇatvaṃ tadā smṛtam || 106 ||(vāpa. 3.7.90)
tadapi tredhā bāhyamābhyantaraṃ bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca | teṣu—
(bāhyam—6)
bāhyaṃ kartṛrūpaṃ, kartrāśritaṃ, karmarūpaṃ, karmāśritaṃ, kriyāśritamanāśritaṃ ceti | tatra— kartṛrūpaṃ yathā— edhaiḥ pacati, senayā jayati, aśvena gacchati, nāvā tarati |
kartrāśritaṃ yathā—akṣairdīvyati, dātreṇa lunāti, dhanuṣā vidhyati, paraśunā chinatti |
karmarūpaṃ yathā— pathā gacchati, antikena yāti, payasā bhuṅkte, yavāgvā juhoti |
karmāśritaṃ yathā— payasā odanaṃ bhuṅkte, pathā grāmaṃ gacchati, dvidroṇena dhānyaṃ krīṇāti, pañcakena, paśūn badhnāti |
kriyāśritaṃ yathā— māsenādhīte, krośenādhīte, viśvajitā yajate, vidhinā vidadhāti |
anāśritaṃ yathā— stokena muktaḥ, kṛccheṇa labdhaḥ ālokena paśyati, dīpikayā yāti |
(ābhyantaram—7)
ābhyantaramapi āntaram, avāntaram, ābhyantaram, anantaraṃ, samanantaraṃ, pratyanantaraṃ, bāhyābhyantaramiti | tatra—
āntaraṃ yathā— ātmanā budhyate, svayamupakramate, svataḥ prakāśate, anyonyato jānāti |
avāntaraṃ yathā— jātyā durjanaḥ, prakṛtyā abhirūpaḥ, nisargeṇāryaḥ, svabhāvena subhagaḥ |
ābhyantaraṃ yathā— ahaṅkāreṇa katthate, sattvena sahate, rajasā 'nurajyate, tamasā muhyati |
anantaraṃ yathā— manasā modate, antareṇācarati, pratibhayā paś‍yati, saṃskāreṇa smarati |
samanantaraṃ yathā— prayatnenārabhate, buddhyā jānāti, sukhena śete, duḥkhena paṭhati |
pratyanantaraṃ yathā— dharmeṇa vardhate, adharmeṇa patati, avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tarati, vidyayā 'mṛtaṃ prāpnoti |
bāhyābhyantaraṃ yathā— cakṣuṣā paś‍yati, vācā vadati, iṅgitena kathayati, ākāreṇa jñāpayati |
(bāhyābhyantaram —6)
bāhyābhyantaramapi bahirmukhamantarmukhaṃ, nirmukhaṃ, bahirudrekamantarudrekaṃ, nirudrekaṃ ca | teṣu bahirmukhaṃ yathā— vidyayā 'mṛtamāpnoti |
antarmukhaṃ yathā— ghrāṇena jighrati, jihvayā svādayati, sparśena budhyate, śrotreṇa śrṛṇoti |
nirmukhaṃ yathā— niśśaṅkatvena yātaḥ, nirbhayatvena āyātaḥ, niṣkiñcanatvena muktam(ktaḥ), nirāyudhatvena hataḥ |
bahirudrekaṃ yathā— padbha‍yāṃ ya‍ gacchati, pāṇibhyāṃ spṛśati, saṃjñayā gamayati, pauṃsnena prīṇāti |
antarudrekaṃ yathā— balena varṣati, kauśalena rañjayati, abhiyogenādhīte, abhyāsena dhārayati |
nirudrekaṃ yathā— prāyeṇa yājñikaḥ, gotreṇa gārgyaḥ, abhijanena sauhmaḥ, śākhayā cchandoga iti |
niṣkiñcanatvastokatvādīnāṃ sadabhāvāsattvarūpatvādasādhakatvamiti cet tanna |
yathaiva sannidhau tasya tathaivāsannidhāvapi |
bhāvasya karaṇatvena kriyāsiddhiḥ pratīyate || 107 ||1 (vāpa. 3.7.98)
stokatvasyābhinirvṛtteranirvṛtteś‍ca tasya vā |
prasiddhiṃ karaṇatvasya stokādīnāṃ pracakṣate || 108 || (vāpa. 3.7.99)
na ca karaṇasya vāstavaṃ rūpamasti vivakṣānibandhanatvāt | taduktam—
vastutastadanirdeś‍yaṃ na hi tad vastuni sthitam |
sthālyā pacyata eṣāpi vivakṣā dṛś‍yate yataḥ || 109 ||(vāpa.3.7.91)
na ca bhavati edhāḥ pacanti, dhanurvidhyati, cakṣuḥ paś‍yati, mano jānāti iti || karaṇamuktam |
(4. saṃpradānam)
saṃpradānamucyate; tattrividham— dadātikarmāpyaṃ, karmamātrāpyaṃ kriyāpyaṃ ceti | tatra (dadātikarmāpyam —6)
saṃpradānamiti mahatyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ karaṇāt | samyagasmai pradīyate tad‍gavādinā dadātikarmaṇā prāpyamupādhyāyādikaṃ saṃpradānasaṃjñaṃ bhavati | tat svatvanivṛttau, parasvatvāpattau, ubhayayoge, svopayoge, paropayogo, ubhayopayoge ceti ṣọdhā viprathate |
svatvanivṛttau yathā— śiṣyāya vidyāṃ prayacchati, varāya kanyāṃ viśrāṇayati, āp‍tāyopadeśaṃ dadāti, gurubhya ātmānaṃ nivedayati |
parasvatvāpattau yathā— ripubhyo bhayaṃ dadāti, śatrave prahāraṃ prayacchati, vādine uttaraṃ dadāti, dayitāyai vācaṃ prayacchati |
ubhayayoge yathā— karmakarāya chatramarpayati, mūkāya hitamupadiśati, saṃvāhakāya kāyaṃ vitarati, priyatamāya śarīraṃ dadāti |
1. kārikāyā asyā vāk‍yapadīyasya mūle bhinna eva pāṭhaḥ, pṛ. 86, pūnāsaṃskaraṇam |
svopayoge yathā— vātāya cakṣurdadāti, pṛṣṭhamātapāya sparśayati, gītāya karṇaṃ dadāti, śrutāya ceto vitarati |
paropayoge yathā— putrāyāśiṣaṃ prayacchati, chātrāya capeṭāṃ dadāti, bhītāyābhayaṃ prayacchati, ārtāyauṣadhaṃ dadāti |
ubhayopayoge yathā— nāpitāya kṣuraṃ prayacchati, maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍaṃ dadāti, priyatamāyādharaṃ prayacchati, priyāyā aṅkapālīṃ dadāti |
'karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa saṃpradānam' (1.4.32) iti paribhāṣayā lakṣyamāṇaṃ
(karmamātrāpyam —6)
karmamātrāpyam tadapi ṣọdhā prerakamanumantu, nirākartṛ, anirākartṛ, pratyarpakaṃ, apratigrāhakamiti (vāpa. 3.7.129) | teṣu —
prerakaṃ yathā— yācakāyānnaṃ dadāti, vṛddhimuttamarṇāya prayacchati, dvāḥsthāyopacāraṃ kalpayati, dāyādāya bhāgaṃ nirdiśati |
anumantṛ yathā— gāmupādhyāya nivedayati, sevakāya grāmaṃ nirdiśati, patiṃvarāyai varaṃ darśayati, dāsyai vastramatisṛjati |
anirākartṛ yathā— devāya puṣpaṃ kṣipati, kuberāya balimupaharati, rudrāya paśumālabhate, somāyārghyaṃ dadāti |
nirākartṛ yathā— unmattāyauṣadhaṃ nirdiśati, vādine dūṣaṇaṃ dadāti, ṭaṅkāya daṇḍaṃ karoti, śāk‍yāyāmiṣaṃ preṣayati |
pratyarpakaṃ yathā— sādine 'śvaṃ nirdiśati, sannidhātre kośamarpayati, samāhartre rāṣṭraṃ nivedayati, amātyāya mudrāmupanayati |
apratigrāhakaṃ yathā— devebhya uṣitānnaṃ dadāti, pitṛbhyo bhuktaśeṣaṃ prayacchati, andhāya rūpaṃ darśayati, badhirāya śāstramupadiśati |
(kriyāpyam —6)
karmagrahaṇena kriyāyā api saṅgrahāt kriyayā yadāpyate tadapi saṃpradānaṃ, kriyāvyāpyamiti ca bhavati | karmaṇo 'smāt ko viśeṣa iti cedīpsitatamatvaṃ nāmaṃ tadapi ṣọdhā śeṣaḥ, karmaśeṣaḥ, karma, vyavahitakarma, hetuḥ, nimittaheturiti ca | yadāha— (vāpa. 3.7.130)
hetutve karmasaṃjñāyāṃ śeṣatve vā 'pi kārakam |
rucyarthādiṣu śāstreṇa saṃpradānākhyamucyate || 110 || tatra—
śeṣo yathā— devadattāya rocate, devadattāya svadate, devadattāya tiṣṭhate, devadattāya namate |
karmaśeṣo yathā— devadettāya gāṃ pratiśrṛṇoti, devadattāya grāmaśrṛṇoti, devadattāya śataṃ dhārayati, devadattāya daivamīkṣate |
karma yathā— devattāya rādhyati, puṣpāya spṛhayati, grāmāya gacchati, devebhyo namati |
vyavahitakarma yathā— chātrāya ślāghate, caitrāya śapate, hotre pratigṛṇāti, potre anugṛṇāti |
heturyathā— devadattāya krudhyati, devadattāya druhyati, devadattāyerṣyati, devadattāyāsūyati |
nimittaheturyathā— edhebhyo vrajati, śrāddhāya nigarhate, yuddhāya sannahyati, patye śete iti | etena 'ruccarthānāṃ prīyamāṇaḥ' (1.4.33), 'ślāghahnuṅsthāśapāṃ jñīpsyamānaḥ' (1.4.34), 'dhāreruttamarṇaḥ' (1.4.35) 'spṛherīpsitaḥ' (1.4.36), 'krudhadruherṣyāsūyārthānāṃ yaṃ prati kopaḥ' (1.4.37), 'rādhīkṣyoryasya vipraś‍naḥ' (1.4.38), 'pratyāṅbhyāṃ śruvaḥ pūrvasya kartā' (1.4.40), 'anupratigṛṇaś‍ca' (1.4.41) 'gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyau ceṣṭāyāmanadhvani' (2.2.12) 'kriyārthopapadasya karmaṇi sthāninaḥ' (2.3.14) ityādivacana 'karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa saṃpradānam' (1.4.32) ityādyayogasyaiva prapañcārtham ityuktaṃ bhavatītyavasitaṃ saṃpradānam ||
(5. apādānam)
apādānamucyate, 'dhruvamapāye 'pādānam' (1.4.24); kāyasaṃsargapūrvake buddhisaṃsargapūrvake vā apāye yaddhruvamavadhibhūtaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tasyāpādānamiti saṃjñā | yathocyate—
apāye yadudāsīnaṃ tadrūpaṃ yadi vā calam |
dhruvameva tadāveśāt tadapādānamucyate || 111 || (pama.1.4.24)
tadapi trividhaṃ nirdiṣṭaviṣayamupāttaviṣayamapekṣitakriyaṃ ceti | taduktam—
nirdiṣṭaviṣayaṃ kiñcidupāttaviṣayaṃ tathā |
apekṣitakriyaṃ ceti tridhā 'pādānamucyate || 112 || (vāpa. 3.7.136)
(nirdiṣṭaviṣayam —6)
teṣu yatropāttakriyopādānenāpāyaḥ pratīyate, tannirdiṣṭaviṣayam |
tat ṣọdhā— ujjhitamanujjhitamīpsitaṃ jihāsitaṃ pariṇataṃ nivṛttamiti | tatra— ujjhitaṃ yathā— grāmādāgacchati, vṛkṣāt parṇaṃ patati, meṣāde(nme)ṣo 'pasarpati, dhāvato 'śvāt patitaḥ |
anujjhitaṃ yathā—śrṛṅgāccharo jāyate, himavato gaṅgā prabhavati, vaṭāt praroho lambate, agnerdhūma uccarati |
īpsitaṃ yathā— yavebhyo gāṃ niṣedhati, māṣebhyo mahiṣān ruṇaddhi, kūpādandhaṃ vārayati, agnermāṇavakamapasārayati |
jihāsitaṃ yathā— araṇyānniṣkrāmati, gartāduttarati, parvatādavarohati, ākāśāt patati |
pariṇataṃ yathā— gomayāt vṛś‍ciko jāyate, golomāvilomabhyo dūrvā bhavanti, suvarṇāt kuṇḍalamutpadyate, kāśebhyaḥ kaṭo bhavati |
nivṛttaṃ yathā— prabhāvāddhīyate, prajñāyāḥ prabhraś‍yate, nyāyādapaiti, svarūpāt pracyavate |
kathaṃ prabhāvādīnāṃ dhrauvyamiti cet śabdavyāpārato 'pāyābhiniveśaḥ |
(upāttaviṣayam —6)
audāsīnyād yatropāttakriyāsāmarthyādavagamyamānakriyāpadenāpāyapratītistad upāttaviṣayam | tadapi ṣọdhā— siddharūpaṃ, sādhyarūpaṃ, prāpyarūpamaprāpyarūpaṃ, parihartavyaṃ, nirhartavyamiti | teṣu —
siddharūpaṃ yathā— kūlāt patati, kusūlāt pacati, kāṃsyapātrato bhuṅkte, brāhmaṇācchaṃsati, upādhyāyādadhīte |
sādhyarūpaṃ yathā— adhyayanāt parājayate, dharmāt pramādyati, adharmājugupsate, akṛtyād viramati |
prāpyarūpaṃ yathā— āsanāt prekṣate, prāsādādavalokayati, balāhakād vidyotate, yauvanato vikurute |
aprāpyarūpaṃ yathā— dvayahādannaṃ bhokṣyate, āmṛtyoḥ śriyāmākāṅkṣet, krośāllakṣyaṃ vidhyati, āpāṭaliputrād vṛṣṭo devaḥ | ﻿
parihartavyaṃ yathā— corebhyo bibheti, durjanebhya udvijate, upādhyāyādantardhartta, sahādhyāyibhyo nilīyate |
nirhartavyaṃ yathā— corebhyo guhyaṃ trāyate, rogebhya āturaṃ rakṣati, kākebhyo dadhyavati, asatyādātmānaṃ pāti |
(apekṣitakriyam —6)
yatrārthaprakaraṇādibhyo gamyamānāt kriyāpadādapāyabuddhistadapekṣitakriyam |
tadapi ṣọdhā— sāmānyakriyāpekṣaṃ viśeṣakriyāpekṣaṃ sattvabhūtāpekṣamasattvabhūtāpekṣaṃ niyatarūpāpāyam aniyatarūpāpāyamiti | teṣu—
sāmānyakriyāpekṣaṃ yathā— dānavebhyo devā buddhimantaḥ, surebhyo 'surā yoddhāraḥ, suhyā brahyottarebhya ạ̄dhyatarāḥ, pāṭaliputrebhyaḥ sukumāratarāḥ |
viśeṣakriyāpekṣaṃ yathā— rohaṇād rat‍nam, payo vāridharāt, kuto bhavān? pāṭaliputrāt |
sattvabhūtāpekṣaṃ yathā— anyo devadattāt, itaro devadattāt, pṛthak devadattāt, nānā devadattāt |
asattvabhūtāpekṣaṃ yathā— ṛte devadattāt, vinā devadattāt, ārād devadattāt, dūrād devadattāt |
niyatarūpāpāyaṃ yathā— kaumudyā yakṣarātriḥ pakṣe, kārtikyā āgrahāyaṇī māse, gavīthumataḥ sāṃkāśyaṃ caturṣu yojaneṣu, pāṭaliputrād rājagṛhaṃ sap‍tayojanāni |
aniyatarūpāpāyaṃ yathā— prāggrāmātṛ, dakṣiṇā grāmāt, tata upariṣ‍ṭāt |
anye tu 'dhruvamapāye 'pādānam' (1.4.24) iti nirdiṣ‍ṭaviṣayam; 'bhītrārthānāṃ bhayahetuḥ' (1.4.24), 'parājerasoḍhaḥ' (1.4.26) 'vāraṇārthānāmīpsitaḥ' (1.4.27), 'antardhau yenādarśanamicchati' (1.4.28), 'ākhyātopayoge' (1.4.29), 'janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ' (1.4.30), 'bhuvaḥ prabhavaḥ' (1.4.31), 'lyablope karmaṇa upasaṃkhyānam' (1.4.31, vā), 'sap‍tamīpañcamyau kārakamadhye' (2.3.7), ityādiyogoktamupāttaviṣayam; 'pañcamī vibhattke' (2.3.42), 'anyārāditarartedikśabdāñcūttarapadājāhiyukte' (2.3.29), 'pratiḥpatinidhipratidānayoḥ' (1.4.92), 'pratinidhipratidāne ca yasmāt' (2.3.11) ityādikaṃ tvavadhibhāvādapekṣitakriyamiti tridhā 'pādānaṃ manyante | āhuś‍ca— ﻿
nirdhāraṇe vibhakte yo bhītrādīnāṃ ca yo vidhiḥ |
upāttāpekṣitāpāyaḥ so 'budhapratipattaye || 113 ||(vāpa.3.7.147)
uktamapādānam |
(6. adhikaraṇam)
adhikaraṇamucyate, 'ādhāro 'dhikaraṇam'(1.4.45); karttuḥ karmaṇo vā kriyāśrayasya kriyāṃ prati ya ādhārastadadhikaraṇam (kāśikā 1.4.45) taduktam—
kartṛkarmavyavahitāmasākṣād dhārayat kriyām |
upakurvat kriyāsiddhau śāstre 'dhikaraṇaṃ smṛtam || 114 || (vāpa. 3.7.148)
tat tredhā— vaiṣayikamaupaśleṣikaṃ naimittikaṃ ceti | tattrividhamāpi anekaprakāram |
(vaiṣayikam —3)
visinotīti viṣayo jātiguṇakriyādīnāmāśrayaḥ, viṣaya eva vaiṣayikamiti; 'vinayādibhyaṣ‍ṭhak' (5.4.34) | tat ṣọdhā— jātivaiṣayikaṃ guṇavaiṣayikaṃ kriyāvaiṣayikaṃ dravyavaiṣayikaṃ saṃjñāvaiṣayikaṃ saṃketavaiṣayikamiti | teṣu
jātivaiṣayikaṃ yathā— divi devāḥ, bhuvi manuṣyāḥ, jale matsyāḥ, pātāle pannagāḥ |
guṇavaiṣayikaṃ yathā— āyuktaḥ kaṭakaraṇe kuśalaḥ, kaṭakaraṇe sādhuḥ, mātari nipuṇaḥ, pitari pravīṇaḥ |
kriyāvaiṣayikaṃ yathā— prācyāmāditya udeti, dakṣiṇasyāmagastyo dṛśyate, ākāśe śakuntāḥ patanti, śabdādiṣu śrotrādayo 'bhiniviśante |
dravyavaiṣayikaṃ yathā— goṣu svāmī, goṣu dāyādaḥ, adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ, adhi pañcāleṣu brahmadattaḥ |
saṃjñāvaiṣayikaṃ yathā— brahmaṇi pitāmahaḥ, viṣṇau puruṣottamaḥ, rudre maheśvaraḥ, indre śakraḥ |
saṅketavaiṣayikaṃ yathā— tarjanīmadhye udāttaḥ, kaniṣ‍ṭhikāmadhye 'nudāttaḥ, anāmikāmadhye svaritaḥ, madhyamāmadhye pracaya iti |
(aupaśleṣikam —6)
upaśleṣo 'vaṣ‍ṭambhaḥ tasmai prabhavatyaupaśleṣikam; tadapi ṣọdhā— ekadeśikamabhi— vyāpakaṃ sāmīpyakamaupaśleṣikamaupaśalyakamaupacārikaṃ ceti | teṣu— ﻿
ekadeśikaṃ yathā— gṛhe tiṣ‍ṭhati, sthālyāṃ pacati, paryaṅke śete, śākhāyāṃ lambate |
abhivyāpakaṃ yathā— tileṣu tailam, śaileṣu rāgaḥ, gavi gotvaṃ, tantuṣu paṭaḥ |
sāmīpyakaṃ yathā— gurau vasati, tīrthe vasati, gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ, kūpe gargakulam |
aupaśleṣikaṃ yathā—dva‍yahe bhoktā, kārtikyā āgrahāyaṇī māse, ihastho 'yamiṣvāsaḥ krośe lakṣyaṃ vidhyati, pāṭaliputrād rājagṛhaṃ sap‍tasu yojaneṣu |
aupaśalyakaṃ yathā— upa khāryāṃ droṇaḥ, upa niṣke kārṣāpaṇam, upa vyāme vitastiḥ, upa śate pañcāśat |
aupacārikaṃ yathā— yo yasya priyassa tasya hadaye vasati, yo yasya dveṣyassa tasyākṣṇoḥ prativasati, samaḥ samagro muṣ‍ṭimadhye tiṣ‍ṭhati, aṅgulyagre hastiyūthaśatamāsta iti |
(naimittikam —6)
nimittameva naimittikam; tadapi ṣọdhaiva— deśanaimittikaṃ kālanaimittikaṃ bhāvanaimittikaṃ vastunaimittikaṃ karmanaimittikaṃ karmayoganaimittikamiti | teṣu —
deśanaimittikaṃ yathā—gehe modate, araṇye bibheti, jale majjati, śvabhre patati |
kālanaimittikaṃ yathā—
kāśāḥ puṣpyanti meghānte madhau mādyanti kokilāḥ |
puṣye pāyasamaśnīyānmaghāsu palalodanam || 115 ||
bhāvanaimittikaṃ yathā— darśane prasīdati, virahe viṣīdati, arthalābhe hṛṣyati, arivināśe tuṣyati |
vastunaimittikaṃ yathā— ātape klāmyati, chāyāyāmāśvasiti, doṣeṣūdvijate, guṇeṣu rajyata iti |
karmanaimittikaṃ yathā— iṣ‍ṭī yajñe, parigaṇitī yājñikye, āmnātī chandasi, adhītī vyākaraṇe |
karmayoganaimittikaṃ yathā—
carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti dantayorhanti kuñjaram |
vāleṣu camarīṃ hanti sīmni puṣkalako hataḥ || 116 || (mabhā. 3.2.36) ﻿
nanu ca nimittahetoḥ kārakatvāt kārakasya ca prayojakaparatantratvādiha kathaṃ kārakatvamiti |
ucyate, dvividhaḥ kārakahetuḥ pravṛttaprerakaḥ apravṛttaprerakaś‍ca | tatrādyo ṇijviṣayaḥ, itarastu vidhyādyātmako nimittātmakaś‍ca | tayoś‍ca prathamo liṅloṭtavyādivācyaḥ |
taduktam—
dravyamātrasya tu praiṣe pṛcchyāderloḍ vidhīyate |
sakriyasya prayogastu yadā sa viṣayo ṇicaḥ || 117 ||(vāpa. 3.7.126)
(adhikaraṇam) nimittātmakastu kriyāśrayatvāt sap‍tamīvācyo naimittikamadhikaraṇamiti vibhaktamadhikaraṇam |
nanu ca upa khāryāṃ droṇaḥ, adhi pāñcāleṣu brahmadatta ityādau yadyadhikaraṇa eva sap‍tamī adhikaṃ kimartham ucyate 'yasmādadhikaṃ yasya ceśvaravacanaṃ tatra sap‍tamī' (2.3.9) iti | ucyate 'karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā (2.3.8) mā bādhiṣ‍ṭa' iti |
nanu ca 'upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī' (mabhā. 2.3.4) iti dvitīyā na bhaviṣyati, yathā goḥ svāmī vrajati, devān namaskarotīti |
naivam; neyamupapadavibhaktiḥ, api tvantarbhūtakriyāntarasaṃbandhā karmavibhaktiḥ |
tadyathā śākalyasya saṃhitāmanu prāvarṣat, saṃhitāmanu niśamya ityarthaḥ |
tarhi kimarthaṃ vidhīyate?
kārakāntare 'pi yathā syāt | tena upārjunaṃ yoddhāra ityapādāne 'pi pañcamī bādhate | ata eva 'pañcamyapāṅpari' (2.3.10) ityapādāne 'pyārabhyata iti | etenādhītī vyākaraṇe, edhebhyo vrajatītyādayaḥ kārakavibhaktiviṣaye, goṣu svāmī, prāggrāmādityādayaḥ saṃbandhavibhaktiviṣaye kārakavibhaktisamāveśāt prakāśitā bhavanti |
nanu ca śaktissādhanaṃ, tad‍vaśena dravyasya kriyāsu yogitvāt | kiṃca dravyamapi sādhanam, kalpayitvā sādhanabhedā(n), na punarāśrayitavyāḥ śaktayaḥ | saṃnyastā veti (santyak‍taiveti) śaktiḥ |
satyam, (śak‍ti—)bhedāssādhanamiti kalpitam | na ca tāmāmadhikaraṇaṃ dravyameveti dravyānapekṣasādhanatvam, dravyasyāpi svakarmāyattajanmanastadapekṣayā tulyadoṣatvāt; śaktīnāmeva ca sādhanatve pratyayābhihitāsu śaktiṣu dravyavacanānāmanuprayogo yujyate 'vardhate devadattaḥ, parigatamarthatattvam' iti | dravye tu sādhane tasyābhihitatvādanuprayogo na prāpnoti | śaktīnāmeva ca sādhanatve 'adya bhuktvā devadatto dva‍yahe dva‍yahāda vā bhoktā' ﻿
iti śaktimadhyavartini kāle sap‍tamī vā kārakamadhye (2.3.7) labhyate | dravyasya devadattāderekatvānmadhye dva‍yahādikālo na saṃbhavati | śaktīnāmeva ca sādhanatve 'prāsāde asti' iti ghañādiviṣayamadhikaraṇamabhihitaṃ, na tvāsiviṣayamityanabhihita— viṣayalakṣaṇā sap‍tamī labhyate; dravye satyabhihitatvād iti | śaktīnāmeva sādhanatve yo 'yamekadravyādhikaraṇaḥ sādhanabhedaḥ śrūyate, sa upapanno bhavati, 'vegena patito rūgṇaḥ', 'sphurato dhvanirudita' iti dravye tu tasyaikatvānna saṃbhavati | kriyābhedanibandhano bhaviṣyatīti cet karmādiniyamo bādhyeta; pratītibhedaś‍ca na syāt |
tanna, kriyāyā arthāntaratvāt na hyanyasya bhedaḥ, anyad bhidyate | api ca dravyasyaikatve kutaḥ kriyābhedakāraṇabhedaḥ, kāryasyābhedāt | śaktīnāmeva ca sādhanatve prātipadikād vibhaktayo yujyante | dravyasya tu prātipadikenābhihitatvād anarthakā notpadyeran |
vacanāt svārthikā iti cet, karmādiḥ niyamo bādhyeta, pratītibhedaś‍ca na syāt vṛkṣe vṛkṣeṇeti | asti cāsāvabhinne 'pi prātipadikārthe tasmādarthāntaraṃ prātipadikārthād vibhakta‍yarthaḥ kārakamiti |
naivam; śakta‍yapekṣā tasya sādhanatvaṃ vihanti; śakterapi dravyāpekṣatve tulyadoṣatvāt | na cānyāpekṣā kārakāṇāṃ kārakatvaṃ viruṇaddhi; kāryata evānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kārakatvāvagateḥ | kāryaṃ hi kasyacit saṃbhave 'pyanavāp‍tasattākaḥ punaravāpnuvan sattāntarasya bhāva eva parigṛhītātiśayāntarasya kāraṇatāṃ sūcayati; na tvakāraṇatāmeva | viśeṣaśālini tasminneva punarbhāvāt tadabhāve cābhāvāt | na khalu kusūlādau bījasamavadhāne 'pyalabdhopalabdheraṅkurasya kṣityādisahakārigrāmabījasya samavadhānasadṛśyamānamūrtteranvayakāryaṃ na pratīyate, api tu tadeva bījaṃ samavahita— kṣityādisahakāripratyayamasya janakamitaratheti gamyate |
dravyasyaikatvāt sādhanabhedaḥ kathamiti cet ekadravyādhikaraṇāśśaktayo bhinnarūpāḥ svarūpabhedenāśrayabhedamupadadhatyo 'bhedamadhikaraṇasya darśayanti | ekasyāpi devadattādeḥ śilpabhedāt takṣāyaskārādisasamākhyā arthabhedanibandhanāḥ saṃdṛśyante | śakta‍yastu bhinnarūpā iti śaktisādhaniko 'pi manyate | tāsāṃ ca vaśena tad‍dravyamāhitabhedaṃ dravyasādhanikasyāpi sādhanabhedavyavasthāṃ racayati iti |
yattūktam dravye sādhane pratyayābhihitatvāt tadanuprayogo na syāt, tatra sāmānyamabhihitaṃ, viśeṣo na prayokṣyate iti;
na (tad) vaktavyama; sādhane vidhīyamānapratyayaḥ kathaṃ sādhanaṃ sāmānyama— bhidadhīta ? sāmānyasya viśeṣāśrayatvād viśeṣa eva vā pratyayenaikarūpatvādanu— prayogāpekṣiṇā 'bhidhīyate gośabdenaiva prakaraṇādyapekṣiṇā gavādirartha iti |
nanu cānyāpekṣayā viśeṣamabhidadhataḥ sāmānyasādhanaśaktīnāṃ viśeṣe śabdasyā— bhidhānaśaktipratighāta iti |
naivaṃ, śaktirviśeṣa evocyate | dhātoḥ kriyāviśeṣavacanādeva pratyayotpatteḥ | sa ca kāryaviśeṣāśrayabhedābhyāmavadhāryate | tatra kāryabhedo dhātunaivābhihitaḥ; āśrayabhedaḥ punarapratītaḥ padāntareṇaivocyate caitro maitra iti | tathāpyanyāpekṣā tulyaiva | na cāśritāśrayayossāmānā— dhikaraṇyam | ataś‍caitro vartate iti na syāt, api tu caitro vardhata iti | api ca dhātuḥ kriyāviśeṣavacana eveti kuta etad vardhate, yāvadanena vardhitavyam | idaṃ karma kuryāḥ, 'nāgarakavṛttaṃ' varteta, samān poṣān apuṣyat' ityādau sāmānyasya viśeṣaḥ pratīyate |
yattu devadattāderdravyasyaikatvānmadhye dvyahādiḥ kālo na sambhavatītyuc‍yate, tadapi na samyak; āśritopādhinimittasya bhedasyopapatteḥ | tathā hi vaktāro bhavanti, parud‌bhavān, paṭurāsīt, paṭutaś‍caiṣamaḥ, adyānya evāsi saṃpanna (mabhā. 5.3.57) iti | tadevaṃ sāmarthyabhedādāhitavibhāgamadhikaraṇaṃ bhāgaśo 'vacchidya sādhanabhedaḥ prakalpyamāno madhyamapyupakalpayati |
na ca śaktipakṣe 'pi sākṣānmadhyasambhavaḥ | pūrvaśaktikāle parasyāḥ, parakāle ca pūrvasyā abhāvāt |
athavā dvyahe bhoktetyavadhisap‍tamī dvyahād vā bhoktetyavadhereva pañcamī, sa cāntyamojanenāvacchidyate | yadi tu madhyasiddhaye dravyabhedaḥ śaktibhedaś‍ca kal‍pyate, tadā kartṛbhedād bhuk‍tveti k‍tvāpratyayaḥ 'samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle' (3.4.21) iti na syāt |
upacaritābhedāśrayassa iti ced, madhyaṃ na sidhyati | athaikatvād bhuktikriyāyāṃ kārakaikatvakālabhedāśrayaś‍ca kārakabhedaḥ, s‍nātvā vrajatīti na syāt; s‍nānavrajikriyayoś‍ca bhedāt tannimittayoḥ kartṛśak‍tyorapi bhede samānakartṛkatvābhāvāt | nanu ca yasyāpi dravyamāśritaśaktibhedasaṃpāditanānātvaṃ sādhanaṃ tasyāpyeṣa doṣaḥ | a(nā)pi ca bhinnādhāravartitayā sāmarthyayorabhedamādheyaśaktivādinā śak‍yate vaktuṃ samānaḥ karteti | yasya tu śaktibhedopanītastadādhārasya bhedaḥ, tasya nibandhanamupacaritamapyekatvaṃ na vidyate, apekṣaṇīyaś‍cādhārabheda, kriyābhedasya paurvāparyavataḥ apekṣitatvāt |
atrocyate—dravyasyaikatvena śaktyorekatvamucyate | śaktinānātvena ca dravyasyāpi nānātvaṃ kariṣyate dravyasya tu pāramārthikamapyekatvaṃ na mṛṣyata ityaho kāmacāraḥ | api tu śaktau sādhane paśau kartari hastikavāṭayoḥ kartroḥ iti (pamaḥ nyāsa. 3.2.54) kathaṃ śaktirekādhārāvacchinnā pratipadyate ? pratipadyatām, sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pṛcchāmi; paśau dravye yaḥ karteti cet, upamānāt karturiti na prāp‍noti |
atha śaktibhedopakaraṇāḥ kartrādiśrutayaḥ tadadhikaraṇaṃ kāryayogitayā 'vagamayanti, śulkādaya iva rūpaviśeṣāśrayamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyopapatteḥ | jitaṃ tarhi bhavatā, siddhaśśaktisādhanabhedaḥ, kartrādiśrutibhirāśrayasya śaktimato 'bhidhānāt |
kiñca śaktikārakapakṣe karmaṇa ekatve, karmaṇo dvitve, karmaṇo bahutve vibhaktivacanādi na syāt; na hi guṇasya saṃkhyā saṃbandho 'pi; dravye tu yujyate| yataḥ karmādiśabdāḥ śaktimad‌dravyamaviruddhasaṃkhyāsambandhaṃ bodhayanti |
nanu guṇasyāpi saṃkhyāsambandho dṛś‍yate pañca karmāṇi, catvāro 'bhāvā— strayassaṃyogā dve sāmānye ekassamavāya iti | na cāyamupacāraḥ pratyayāviśeṣāt evaṃ śaktayo 'pi kāryabhedabhinnāssaṅkhyābhedamanubhaviṣyanti |
satyam,asti śaktīnāṃ bhedaḥ, na tu tatrāpi te vacanabhedaḥ, yasmādādityaṃ paś‍yati stautīti darśanādikriyābhedād bhinnāsvapi śaktiṣu na bahavacanaṃ dṛś‍yate | na paryāyoktau śaktayaḥ kriyābhirabhisaṃbadhyanta iti cet, tanna | pratyekasamāp‍tā api kriyābhedāssamasyābhidhāneṣu vacanabhedaṃ prayuñjate | yathā pañca śarānasyati, savyāpasavyābhyāṃ vidhyati, dvayoḥ paryaṅkyośśete iti |
na ca paryāyeṇaiva darśanādayaḥ syuḥ, yaugapadyenāpi bhāvāt | tasmāt sāmarthyā— dhāranibandhano vacanabhedo na śak‍tyāśraya iti | ata eva svātantryād vibhakta‌‍yā 'pi śaktirnābhidhīyate | yadi hi svatantrāṃ śaktiṃ vibhaktirabhidadhyāt tadā tad‌gatāmeva saṃkhyāṃ vibhaktirabhidadhīta, samānaśabdopādānāt; na caitadasti | tasmād yasya saṃkhyāṃ vibhaktirupādatte tadeva śaktimat kārakamiti |
yattu śaktāveva vibhakta‍yarthe vartamānamavyayaṃ samasyate ityucyate tacchaktimatyapi kārake avyayānāmapi sattvavacanāt tanmātrābhidhānamiti kathaṃ sattvabhūtaṃ dravyamasattvārthenāvyayenābhidhīyeta ? yastu prāsāda āsta ityanabhihitalakṣaṇā sap‍tamī na lakṣyata iti tatra yathā ghañādiviṣaye śaktimad‌dravyamabhihitaṃ, na tvāsiviṣayaśaktimaditi,
tatra kena sap‍tamī vāryate ? yadi ca ghañādayaḥ śaktimabhidadhīran tadā śakterasiśabdābhihitāyāḥ śakta‍yantarāyogādāstāṃ, sap‍tamīdvitīyādayo 'pi notpadyeran |
kathaṃ caivamāha adhikaraṇādivacāni prāsādādayaḥ |
te hi saṃjñāśabdā vṛkṣādivadeva keṣucidarthaviśeṣeṣu rụ̄dhāḥ kevalamamīṣāṃ dharmaniyamā vā yathākathañcidutpattiṃ gamayanti | etena ca 'vegena patata' ityādau yeyamekadravyādhikaraṇā sādhanabhedaśrutiḥ sāpi prativihitaiva bhavati |
na caitāvad vācyaṃ, dravye kārake prātipadikādayo notpadyeran | dravyaṃ hi vibhaktiliṅgaśaktisaṃkhyāsvarthaparimāṇavat sāmānyamātrayā prātipadikamātreṇābhidhīyate, śaktisaṃkhyāliṅgavac‍ca vibhaktivacanasaṃskāro labhyata ityataḥ sthitametacchaktimad dravyaṃ kārakamiti |
(4. puruṣaḥ)
ākhyātapratyayābhidheyaḥ kārakaviśeṣaḥ puruṣaḥ |
sa tridhā— prathamo, madhyama uttamaś‍ca | tatra parasmaipadātmanepadayoḥ prathamatrikā— bhidheyaḥ prathamaḥ, madhyamatrikābhidheyo madhyamaḥ, antyatrikābhidheya uttamaḥ | tatra ca—
pratyu/tyaktāparabhāvaś‍cedupādhiḥ/dhī kartṛkarmaṇoḥ |
tayoḥ śrutiviśeṣeṇa vācakau madhyamottamau || 118 ||(vāpa. 3.10.1)
tadāha— yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ, asmadyuttamaḥ, śeṣe prathama (1.4.105, 107, 108) iti | tatra kartari puruṣatrayaprayoge yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.65)
athāha varṇī vidito maheśvarastadarthinī tvaṃ punareva vartase |
amaṅgalābhyāsaratiṃ vicintya taṃ tavābhyanujñā na tu kartumutsahe || 119 ||
karmaṇi yathā—
yadi tvaṃ manyase tena tvayā sa yadi toṣyate |
tat kimasthānakopena dūti! dahyāmahe vayam || 120 ||
athaiṣāṃ k‍vacit prathama eva yathā— bhāvaprayogeṣu yuvābhyāmāsyate, asmābhirgaṇyate iti k‍vacinmadhyama eva yathā kriyāsamābhihāre hisvābhyāṃ samuc‍cayeṣu lunīhi lunīhityevāyaṃ lunāti, alāvīt laviṣyati vā, adhīṣvādhīṣvetyevamadhīyāte, adhyaiṣātāṃ adhīṣyete vā, rāṣṭramaṭa, maṭhamaṭa khadūramaṭetyevāvāmaṭāvaḥ, aṭiṣva aṭiṣyāvo vā, chando 'dhīṣva vyākaraṇamadhīṣva, niruktamadhīṣvetyeva vayamadhīmahe, adhyagīṣmahi adhyeṣyāmahe vā, saktūn piba, dhānāḥ, khādata, odanaṃ bhuṅkṣvaṃ ityevaṃ yūyamabhyavaharatha abhyavāhārṣṭa
abhyavahariṣyatha vā | k‍vaciduttama eva yathā prahāse manyate ehi manye rathena yāsyasi, na hi yāsyasi, yātaste pitā; ehi manye odanaṃ bhokṣyase, na hi bhokṣyase, bhuktasso 'tithibhiriti | manyatestu uttamaviṣaye 'pi madhyama eva;tatra hyayamarthaḥehi manyase rathena yāsyāmi, ehi manyasa odanaṃ bhokṣyatha iti | yugapad‌vacane punaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ paro bhavati yathā sa ca tvaṃ ca pacathaḥ, tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca pacāvaḥ, sa ca tvaṃ cāhaṃ caṃ pacāma iti | yugapadavacanatā caikaśeṣasya dvandvasamānārthatvāc‍ca arthaviṣayaiva gṛhyate; na cārthaviṣayā (vāpa.—3) tena
ahaṃ vā kumbhakarṇo vā tvaṃ vā rākṣasapuṅgava |
indnajid‌‍vā nikumbho vā bhareyurbhāramīdṛśam || 121 ||(rāmā.6.7.6) iti |
śeṣe prathama eva bhavati, yathā tvamahamanyo vā gacchatviti |
evaṃ tarhi cārthe yugapad‌vacanatāyāmabhāvāt vaheyuriti bahuvacanaṃ na prāp‍noti |
naivam; vārtheṣu k‍vacidyugapad‌vacanatā dṛś‍yate, dvau vā trayo vā dvitrā iti | āha ca mahābhāṣyakāraḥ, 'dvau vetyukte trayo veti gamyate, trayo vetyukte dvau veti gamyate | saiṣā pañcadhiṣṭhānā vāk | tatra yuktaṃ bahuvacanam | sāmānyāśrayaṃ vā bahuvacanam, yathā kati bhavataḥ putrāḥ kati bhavato bhāryā iti |
atvaṃ saṃpadyate yasminna tasmin yuṣmadāśrayā |
pravṛttiḥ puruṣasyāsti prakṛtessā vidhīyate || 122 ||(vāpa.3.7.117)
yathā atvaṃ tvaṃ saṃpadyate tvad‌bhavati, ayūyaṃ yūyaṃ saṃpadyate yuṣmadbhavantīti | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | prakṛtivikṛtyāśrayapuruṣasaṃpradhāraṇāyāṃ prakṛtyāśraya eva puruṣo bhavati, na vikṛtyāśraya iti | tena anahamahaṃ saṃpadyate mad‌bhavati, avayaṃ vayaṃ saṃpadyante asmad‌bhavanti, asassa saṃpadyate tad‌bhavati, anahamahaṃ saṃpadyase madbhavasītyādyapi siddhaṃ bhavati | kā punaratropapattiḥ ? abhūtatadbhāve prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ kartṛtvavivakṣāyāṃ kāmacāraḥ | tathā hi—k‍vacid‍‌vikṛteḥ kartṛtvaṃ vivakṣyate, yathā mūtrāya saṃpadyate yavāgūḥ, yathā ca suvarṇapiṇḍaḥ punaraparayā ākṛtyā saṃvṛttaḥ khadirāṅgārasavarṇe kuṇḍale bhavata iti |
tathā hi—
