k‍lṛpi saṃpadyamāne yā caturthī sā vikārataḥ |
suvarṇapiṇḍe prakṛtau vacanaṃ kuṇḍalāśrayam || 123 ||(vāpa.3.7.115)
k‍vacittu prakṛteḥ; yathā saghṅībhavanti brāhmaṇāḥ, mahadbhūtaś‍candramā (mabhā. 6.3.46) iti | atra yadi prakṛteḥ kartṛtvaṃ na vivakṣyate tadā vikṛtessaṅghasyaiva kartṛtvād‌bhavantīti
bahuvacanaṃ na prāp‍noti | mahad‌bhūtaḥ ityatra mahacchabdasya ca mukhyārthatvād 'ānmahatassamānādhikaraṇajātīyayoḥ' (6.3.46) ityātvaṃ syāt | prakṛtirhi kācidupacaritavikārarūpā, yathā indraḥ sthūṇā, upendro grāva iti; kācit pariṇāminī yathā dugdhaṃ dadhi bhavati, hema kuṇḍalībhavati | tatra vipariṇāminīṣu prakṛtiṣu saṅghamahattvādibhirmukhyairapi yoge pūrvasyā avasthāyāḥ pracyutasyottarāmavasthāṃ prāp‍tasya pūrvottarayoravasthayorāśritayosavyāpāratvāt pūrvasyāmavasthāyāṃ kartṛtvavivakṣāyāḥ saṅghamahadādervikāraśabdasya prakṛtyupagrāhiṇo gauṇatvaṃ vijñāyate | taduktam— (vāpa.2.280)
mahattvaṃ saṅghabhāvaṃ ca prakṛtiḥ pratipadyate |
bhede nāpekṣitā sā tu gauṇatvasya prasādhikā || 124 || iti |
yadyevam, atimahatī mahatī saṃpannā mahadbhūtā brāhmaṇīti puṃvadbhāvo na prāp‍noti | arthāśrayaḥ etadevaṃ bhavati (mabhā. 6.3.46); śabdāśrayaś‍ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ; 'goto ṇit' (7.1.90), 'autoṃśasoḥ' iti (6.2.93) vāhīke vartamānasya gośabdasya gaustiṣṭhati gāmanayeti vṛddhirātvaṃ ca bhavati (mabhā. 6.3.46) ||
te 'mī kriyā ca kālaś‍ca kārakaṃ puruṣastathā |
uktāḥ padārthāś‍catvārassvaissvairbhedaissamanvitāḥ || 125 ||
dravyātmā cāpi kālo yaḥ prasaṅgāt so 'pi kīrtitaḥ |
sa hi prāyaḥ prabandheṣu tatra tatropayujyate || 126 ||
kriyāyāṃ kālo 'ntarbhavati puruṣaḥ kārakapade pradhāne sopādhidvayamapi tadetanniviśate |
pradhānaṃ taṃ prāhuryamabhidadhate ghañprabhṛtayaḥ sahopaskārārthorniviśati sa tu prātipadike || 127 ||
iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe kriyādyarthacatuṣṭayaprakāśo nāma || caturthaḥ prakāśaḥ || 4 ||
revāprasādasya sanātanasya prakāśasaṃśodhanakāryametat |
prakāśametaṃ tu turīyamāp‍taṃ prasīdatādatra mahān sa devaḥ ||
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe pañcamaḥ prakāśaḥ
upādhyādyarthacatuṣṭayaprakāśo nāma
(5. upādhiḥ)
(kriyopādhiḥ—12)
prakṛtyarthapratyayārthabhedeṣu kārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyāḥ tāmanupahitāṃ kṛbhvastayo vadanti | teṣāṃ parasparamasaṃbhedasaṃbhedābhyāṃ sāmyotkarṣāpakarṣajanmāno dvādaśa dhātvarthabhedāḥ kriyā bhavanti | tadyathā —
akarmakāḥ antaḥkarmakāḥ, arthāntarakarmakāḥ, avivakṣitakarmakāḥ, prasiddhakarmakāḥ, dvikarmakāḥ, prasiddhakartṛkāḥ, bhāvakartṛkāḥ, karmakartṛkāḥ, kartṛsthakriyāḥ, karmasthakriyāḥ, ubhayasthakriyāś‍ceti |
te cāparispandasaparispandabhedāt pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā caturviṃśatirjāyante |
tatra svabhāvato 'stistu udāsīnakartṛkatvād aparispandaḥ |
karotiḥ prayuñjānakartṛkatvāt saparispandaḥ |
bhavatiḥ vikurvāṇakartṛkatvāt saparispandāparispanda iti sthitam |
(1. akarmakāḥ) ato 'styarthā bhavatyarthāś‍ca nyagbhavatayo nyagatayaś‍cākarmakā bhavanti | teṣu—
pūrve aparispandā yathā— bhidyate, svadate, vartate, prīyata iti |
uttare saparispandā yathā— jāyate, vivardhate, X X X X X X te, sphuratīti |
(2. antaḥ karmakāḥ) ta eva nyakkarotayo 'ntaḥ karmakāḥ; teṣu —
pūrve aparispandā yathā— jīvati, mriyate, putrīyati, prāṇitīti | uttare saparispandā yathā— nṛtyati, śvasiti, bāṣpāyate, roditīti |
(3. arthāntarakarmakāḥ) astikarotyarthāḥ karotibhavatyarthāś‍cārthāntarakarmakāḥ | teṣu —
pūrve aparispandā yathā— tarati kāṣṭhaṃ, tarati vipadaṃ, viparyasyati matiṃ, viparyasyati hastamiti |
uttare saparispandā yathā— vahati nadī, vahati bhāraṃ, patati parṇaṃ, patatyadhvānamiti |
(4. avivakṣitakarmakāḥ) ta evānutkarotayo 'pi avivakṣitakarmakāḥ | teṣu —
pūrve aparispandā yathā— saṃjñā saṃjñinyabhiniviśate, buddhistattvamabhiniviśate, tīrtha upavisati, trirātramupavasatīti |
uttare saparispapandā yathā— caitro hasati, maitraṃ hasati, cakraṃ bhramati, deśān bhramatīti |
(5. prasiddhakarmakāḥ) utkarotayastu ta eva prasiddhakarmakāḥ | teṣu—
pūrve aparispandā yathā— vapatītyukte bījamiti gamyate, prasūta ityukte garbhamiti gamyata iti |
uttare saparispandā yathā— kṛṣatītyukte kṣetramiti gamyate, pariṇayatītyukte kanyāmiti gamyata iti |
(6. dvikarmakāḥ) satyevotkarotitve nyagastayo nyagbhavatayaś‍ca ta eva dvikarmakāḥ | teṣu—
pūrve aparispandā yathā— liṅgaṃ liṅginamavagamayati jñātāraṃ, jayati śatamaśvānaśvasenamiti |
uttare saparispandā yathā— gāṃ dogdhi payaḥ, vṛkṣamapacinoti phalānīti | evamete ṣaṭ dviyogavikalpāḥ | paraṃ triyogavikalpāḥ ṣaḍbhavanti |
(7. prasiddhakartṛtāḥ) tatrodastaya udbhavatayo vā prasiddhakartṛkāḥ | teṣu—
pūrve aparispandā yathā— dahatītyuttke vahniriti gamyate |
uttare saparispandā yathā— kūjatītyukte (pika iti gamyate), (heṣata ityukte) aś‍va iti gamyata iti |
(8. bhāvakartṛkāḥ) nyagbhavatikarotayo nyagastikarotayo vā bhāvakartṛkāḥ | teṣu— pūrve aparispandā yathā —corasya rujati, corasyāmayati, coraṃ jvarayati, coraṃ saṃtāpayatīti |
uttare saparispandā yathā— bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāditi |
(9. karmakartṛkāḥ) udastinyakkarotaya udbhavatinyakkarotayo vā karmakartṛkāḥ | teṣu—
pūrve aparispandā yathā— dugdhe gaussvayameva, pras‍nute gaussvayameva, bhūṣayate kanyā svayameveti |
uttare saparispandā yathā—avakirate hastī svayameva, namate daṇḍaḥ svayameva, ucchrayate daṇḍassvayameva, ārohayate hastī svayameveti |
(10. kartṛsthakriyāḥ) udastikarotayaḥ udbhavatikarotayo vā kartṛsthakriyāḥ | teṣu—
pūrve aparispandā yathā—arhati pūjāṃ, jānāti varṇaṃ, paś‍yati rūpaṃ, śṛṇoti śabdamiti | uttare saparispandā yathā— gacchati, grāmam, ārohayatyaśvam iti |
(11. karmasthakriyāḥ) nyagbhavatyutkarotayo nyagastyutkarotayo vā karmasthakriyāḥ | teṣu—
pūrve aparispandā yathā— dunoti śatruṃ, dhinoti mitraṃ, madayati suhṛdaṃ, sukhayati sakhāyamiti |
uttare saparispandā yathā— pacatyodanaṃ, bhinatti kusūlaṃ, saṃkṣṇute śastraṃ, takṣṇoti yūpamiti |
(12. ubhayasthakriyāḥ) nyagbhavatyudastikarotayo nyagastyudbhavatikarotayo vā ubhayasthakriyāḥ | teṣu—
pūrve aparispandā yathā— labhate pūjāṃ, prāp‍noti dharmam . . . . . . . . . |
uttare saparispandā yathā— bhuṅkta odanam, adhīte svādhyāyaṃ, tapyate tapaḥ, sādhayati svargamiti |
nanu ca bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāditi naitāvastibhavatyarthau, api tu sākṣādastibhavatī | tau cānupahitakriyābhidhāyakāviti nopādhī bhavitumarhataḥ | ucyate— 'asa bhuvi', 'bhū sattāyām' iti dhātupāṭhādanu— prayogavarjamārdhadhātuke 'sterbhūvidhānāt saṅkara eveti vijñāyate | evamapi karotyarthānupraveśo durupapādaḥ | so 'pi kartṛtvānyathānupapatterupapatsyate |
nanu ca bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīdityayaṃ laṭ‌prayoga eva | asti gacchāmo vayamiti ca astiprayogo 'pi bhāvakartṛkeṣu dṛś‍yate |
naivam; nāsmābhirastibhavati bhāvakartṛkāvevocyete, api tu astibhavati— kartāro 'styādayaḥ pacatyādayaś‍ca | te hi rujatyādivadupādhiparā api astau kartāro bhavanti | etāvāṁstu viśeṣaḥ, rujādīnāṃ kartṛtvaṃ tatpareṇaiva lakāreṇocyate, pacādīnāṃ ca bhavatyastipareṇeti |
(kālopādhiḥ—12)
yathā ca dhātvarthaḥ kriyopādhirevaṃ kālo 'pi | yaduktam—
kriyopādhiś‍ca san bhūtabhaviṣyad‌vartamānatāḥ |1
parāparavibhāgārthāssa śaktīḥ pratipadyate || 1 ||
1. vāk‍yapadīye 3.9.37 iti karikāyā pūrvārddham |
sa bhūtādibhedā dvādaśadhā | tadyathā—
bhūtaḥ, bhūtānadyatanaḥ, bhaviṣyat, bhaviṣyadanadyatanaḥ, vartamānaḥ, vartamānānadyatanaḥ, parokṣaḥ, atipannaḥ, avyaktaḥ, saṅkīrṇaḥ, prakīrṇaḥ, viprakīrṇa iti |
(1. bhūtaḥ—6) luṅādiviṣayo 'pyatītamātraṃ bhūtaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā— bhūtaḥ, prakarṣabhūtaḥ, bhūtānadyatanaḥ, abhimānādyatanaḥ, prabandhādyatanaḥ, sāmīpyādyatana iti |
teṣvanirdhāritaviśeṣo bhūtaḥ, yathā— akārṣīt, niṣasāda, uvāsa, śuśrāva, apakta, paktavāniti |
śabdāntarāvagataprakarṣādanavekṣitānadyatanaparokṣādipratyayaḥ prakarṣabhūtaḥ, yathā— avātsuriha purā chātrāḥ |
vivakṣitānyāvadhiḥ bhūtānadyatanaḥ, yathā— agamāna ghoṣāt |
rātriśeṣe jāgaraṇasaṃtatau abhimānānadyatanaḥ, yathā amutrāvātsam, sakalāṃ rātriṃ jāgaritaḥ rātreraprabhātatvādadyatanimaṃ kālaṃ manyate |
avivakṣitakriyāvirāmaḥ prabandhādyatanaḥ, yathā yāvajjīvaṃ bhṛśamannamadāt |
vivakṣitakriyānantaryaḥ sāmīpyādyatanaḥ, yathā— yeyaṃ gatā paurṇamāsī asyāmupādhyāyo 'g‍nīnādhita | atrānantarayoḥ 'nānadyatanavat kriyāprabandha— sāmīpyayoḥ' iti smaryate |
(2. bhūtānadyatanaḥ —6) evaṃ laṅ‌nimittamavidyamānādyatano bhūtānadyatanaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā— sāmānyānadyatanaḥ, viśeṣānadyatanaḥ, abhijñānadyatanaḥ, prasiddha‍yaparokṣaḥ, praś‍nāparokṣaḥ, ha—śaśvadaparokṣa iti | teṣu—
avivakṣitaparokṣatvādiḥ sāmānyānadyatanaḥ yathā— akarot, aśṛṇot, nyaṣīdat, amutrāvasam, 'āsīdidaṃ tamobhūtam' rāmo vanamagacchaditi |
padāntarāvagataparokṣatvādiviśoṣo viśeṣānadyatanaḥ, yathā— avasanniha purā chātrāḥ |
'na yadi' ityabhijñāvacanaṃ lṛṅapavādo 'bhijñānadyatanaḥ, yathā— smarasi devadatta kāśmīreṣu yavadasāma |
lokaprasiddherāropitāparokṣābhimānaḥ prasiddha‍yaparokṣaḥ, yathā—ajayajjayanto hūṇān |
praś‍nopabhuktaparokṣatvaṃ praś‍nāparokṣaḥ, yathā— kimagacchad‌devadattaḥ |
ha—śaśvadarthopakṣīṇaparokṣatvo ha—śaśvadaparokṣaḥ, yathā—iti ha akarot, śaśvadakaroditi |
(3. bhaviṣyat —6) anāgatāmātraṃ lṛḍādiviśeṣo bhaviṣyat |
sa ṣọdhā— sāmānyabhaviṣyat, viśeṣabhaviṣyat, lipsābhaviṣyat, prabandhādyatanaḥ, sāmīpyadyatanaḥ pravibhāgādyatana iti | teṣu —
anirdhāritānadyatanādiḥ sāmānyabhaviṣyat, yathā— kariṣyati, balirindro bhaviṣyati, kadā gamiṣyasi, eṣa gamiṣyāmi, pakṣyan vrajati, pācakā vrajatīti |
nirdhāritādyatvaviśeṣo viśeṣabhaviṣyat, yathā— adya gamiṣyāmīti |
lipsopādhiko lipsābhaviṣyat, yathā— yo me bhikṣāṃ dāsyati sa svargaṃ lokaṃ yāsyatīti |
avivakṣitakriyāvirāmaḥ prabandhādyatanaḥ, yathā— yāvajjīvaṃ bhṛśamannaṃ dāsyatīti |
vivakṣitakriyānantaryassāmīpyādyatanaḥ, yathā— yeyamāgāminī paurṇamāsī asyāmupādhyāyo 'g‍nīnādhāsyatīti |
'bhaviṣyati maryādāvacane 'varasmin', 'kālavibhāge cānahorātrāṇām', 'parasminvibhāṣā' iti pravibhāgānadyatanaḥ, yathā— yo 'yamadhvā gantavya āpāṭaliputrāt tasya yadavaraṃ kauśāmbyāstatrodanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe, yo 'yamāgāmī saṃvatsarastasya yadavaramāgrahā— yaṇyāstatra yuktā adhyeṣyāmahe, evaṃ parasminvibhāṣetyapi draṣṭavyamiti |
(4. bhaviṣyadanadyatanaḥ —6) bhaviṣyannevāvidyamānādyatano luṇṇimittaṃ bhaviṣyadanadyatanaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā— sāmānyānadyatanaḥ, lip‍sānadyatanaḥ, paridevanānadyatanaḥ, parāvaravibhāgīyaḥ, parāpravibhāgīyaḥ, (adhvavibhāṣīya) iti | teṣu—
anirdhāritakriyāprabandhaḥ sāmānyānadyatanaḥ, yathā— kartā kartārau kartāraḥ, kāritā kāritārau kāritāra iti |
śabdāntarāvagataviśoṣo viśoṣānadyatanaḥ, yathā— tvaṃ paktā |
lip‍sopādhiko lipsānadyatano yathā yo me bhikṣāṃ dātā sa svargaṃ lokaṃ gantā |
paridevanopādhikaḥ paridevanānadyatanaḥ, yathā— iyaṃ nu kadā gantā yaivaṃ pādau nidadhāti, ayaṃ tu kadādhyetā ya evamanabhiyuktaḥ |
'kālavibhāge cānahorātrāṇām' ityahorātraviṣayaḥ parāparavibhāgīyaḥ, yathā— yo 'yamāgāmī māsastasya yaḥ paraḥ pañcadaśarātrastatraudanaṃ bhoktāsmahe, yo 'yamāgāmī triṃśadrātrastasya yo 'paraḥ pakṣastatra yuktā adhyetāsmahe | ﻿
parasminvibhāṣetyanahorātrakāladhvamaryādāviṣayaḥ parapravibhāgīyaḥ, yathā— yo 'yamāgāmī saṃvatsarastasya yadavaramāgrahāyaṇyastatra pāṭaliputraṃ gantāsmaḥ |
sa eva adhvavibhāṣāviṣayo 'dhvavibhāṣīyaḥ, yathā— yo 'yamadhvā gantavya āpāṭaliputrāt tasya yatparaṃ kauśāmbyāḥ tatra saktūn pātāsma iti |
(5. vartamānaḥ —6) avāp‍tāpracyutakriyāviṣayo laḍādinimittaṃ vartamānaḥ |
(sa) ṣọdhā— sāmānyavartamānaḥ, viśeṣavartamānaḥ, avirāmavartamānaḥ, pravṛttoparataḥ, vṛttāvirataḥ, nitya(pra)vṛtta iti | teṣu—
anapekṣitavirāmādiviśeṣassāmānyavartamānaḥ, yathā— asti, bhavat, kurvāṇaḥ, pacyamānaḥ, pavamānaḥ, kavacamudvahamāna iti |
parokṣādiviṣayo viśeṣavartamānaḥ, yathā— atra vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati |
vivakṣitakriyāprabandho 'virāmavartamānaḥ, yathā— prāsādaṃ karoti |
vivakṣitapravṛttivirāmaḥ pravṛttoparataḥ, yathā— jīvantaṃ mārayati |
avivakṣitapravṛttivirāmo vṛttāvirataḥ, yathā— iha kumārāḥ krīḍanti |
avicchinnapravṛttisaṃtāno nityapravṛttaḥ, yathā— tiṣ‍ṭhati parvata iti |
(6. vartamānānadyatanaḥ—6) anāgatātikrāntakriyāsvapi padāntaraprayogāpāditavartamānatvāllaṭo nimittamavidyamānānadyatano vartamānānadyatanaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā— lipsāviṣayaḥ, āśaṃsāviṣaya, purāyogīyaḥ, smayogīyaḥ, ubhayayogīyaḥ, anubhayayogīya iti | teṣu—
lipsāviṣayo yathā— yo me bhikṣāṃ dadāti sa svargaṃ lokaṃ yāti, ko me bhikṣāṃ dadāti, kassvargaṃ lokaṃ yāti; evaṃ kataro me bhikṣāṃ dadāti, katamo me bhikṣāṃ dadāti |
āśaṃsāviṣayo yathā— devaś‍ced varṣati saṃpadyante śālayaḥ |
purāyogīyo yathā— vasantīha purā chātrāḥ |
sma—yogīyo yathā— iti smopādhyāyaḥ kathayati |
ubhayayogīyo yathā— naḍena sma purādhīyate |
anubhayayogīyo yathā— bhāṣate rāghavastadeti | ﻿
(7. parokṣaḥ —6) bhūta eva liḍ‌viṣayo 'kṣāṇāṃ paraḥ parokṣaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā— svaparokṣaḥ, paraparokṣaḥ, svaparaparokṣaḥ, manaḥparokṣaḥ, 1pramāṇaparokṣaḥ, nirṇayaparokṣa iti | teṣu—
svāpekṣayā parokṣo yathā— cakāra, cakāra(jahāra), cakāsāñcakāra, ūṣuriha purā chātrā iti |
parāpekṣayā paraparokṣo yathā kaḥ kaliṅgān viveda, ko brāhmaṇān dadarśa, nāhaṃ kaliṅgān jagāmeti |
ubhayāpekṣayā svaparaparokṣo yathā—jaghāna kaṃsaṃ vāsudevaḥ, dadāha tripuraṃ haraḥ, mamātha vṛtraṃ maghaveti |
smaraṇāpekṣayā manaḥparokṣo yathā—iti cakāra, śaśvac‍cakāra, iti ha śaśvac‍cakāreti |2 'praś‍ne cāsannakāla' (3.2.117) iti nirṇayaparokṣo yathā—
kiṃ sā jagāma tatpārś‍vaṃ kimuvāca yathocitam |
sa kiṃ śuśrāva tad‍vākyamiti pṛcchāmi kiṃ sakhi! || 2 || iti |
(8. atipannaḥ —6)
bhaviṣyad‍bhūtavartamānakriyātipattiviṣayo lṛṅ‌nimittama(pra)tipannaḥ (mabhā.3.3.139) | sa ṣọdhā— bhaviṣyad‍bhūtavartamānakriyātipattīnāṃ śuddhamiśrabhedāt |
tatra kenacilliṅgena bhaviṣyantīṃ śuddhāmeva kriyātipattimavagamya prayuṅ‌kte, yathā— api vajrāhatenāpatiṣyat, kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalamayājayiṣyat, dakṣiṇena cedayāsyat na śakaṭaṃ paryābhaviṣyat | yathā ca—
yadi sadbhiḥ pradiṣ‍ṭena pathā samacariṣyatha |
na te samacariṣyanna caraṇānte vibhūtayaḥ || 3 ||
evaṃ miśrāmapi yathā—(mavīca. 1.27)
rāmāya puṇyamahase sadṛśāya sītā dattaiva dāśarathicandramase 'bhaviṣyat |
āropaṇena paṇamapratikāryamāryastraiyambakasya dhanuṣo yadi nā 'kariṣyat || 4 ||
kenacilliṅgenānītāṃ kriyātipattiṃ śuddhāmevāvagamya prayaṅ‌kte, yathā—na śraddadhe yat tatrabhavān vṛṣalamayājayaṣyit, na saṃbhāvayāmi tatra nāmābhokṣyata bhavān | yathā ca— (kirātā. 13.49)
1–2. udāhṛteṣu 'jo. rā. ce.' ityeṃṣu vismṛtāyāsmai pramāṇaparokṣāya 'bhuk‍tā mayā hi giraya' iti (kama.) iti bhairavānandok‍tirūpayujyeta | ﻿
durvacaṃ tadatha mā sma bhūnmṛgastvayyasau yadakariṣyadojasā |
nainamāśu yadi vāhinīpatiḥ pratyapatsyata sitena patriṇā || 5 ||
evaṃ miśrāmapi— (raghu. 7.14)
paraspareṇa spṛhaṇīyaśobhaṃ na cedidaṃ dvandvamayojayiṣyat |
asmin dvaye rūpavidhānayat‍naḥ patyuḥ prajānāṃ vitatho 'bhaviṣyat || 6 ||
kenacit pramāṇena vartamānāmapi kriyātipattiṃ śuddhāmevāvagamya prayuṅkte, yathā utākariṣyat, apyakariṣyat | yathā ca —
gamadhāsyat kathaṃ nāgo mṛṇālamṛdubhiḥ phaṇaiḥ |
ārasātalamūlāt tvamavālambiṣyathā na cet || 7 || (kusaṃ. 6.68)
evaṃ miśrāmapi yathā—
amaṅkṣyad vasudhā toye cyutaśailendrabandhanā |
nārāyaṇa iva śrīmān yadi tvaṃ nādhariṣyathāḥ || 8 || iti |
(9. avyak‍taḥ —6) tirobhūtabhūtabhaviṣyadādiviśeṣo 'vyaktaḥ | ṣọdhā—liṅ‍‌viṣayaḥ, loḍ‌viṣayaḥ, laḍ‌viviṣayaḥ, lṛḍ‌viviṣayaḥ, tavyādiviṣayaḥ, tumunādiviṣayaś‍ceti | teṣu—
liṅ‌viṣayo yathā kaṭaṃ kuryāt, ciraṃ jīvyāt, kathaṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, api śirasā parvataṃ bhindyāt, saṃbhāvayāmi bhuñjīta bhavān, kālo yad‌bhuñjīta bhavāniti |
loḍ‌viṣayo yathā—upādhyāyaś‍cedāgacchati āgantā āgamiṣyati vā atha tvaṃ chando 'dhīṣva | ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtādupādhyāyaś‍cedāgacchet āgacchati āgantā āgamiṣyati vā atha tvaṃ vyākaraṇamadhīṣva, kurū kaṭaṃ prāp‍taste kālaḥ alavīt laviṣyasi veti |
laḍ‌viṣayo yathā— kadā bhuṅkte karhi bhuṅkte, api tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati, jātu tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati, kac‍cijjīvati me mātā, kaṃ vā vibhūtayo na madayantīti |
lṛḍ‍‌viṣayo yathā— andho nāma parvatamārokṣyati, uta daṇḍaḥ patiṣyati, kataro nāma vṛṣalaḥ yaṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati, na marṣayāmi na śraddadhe nāvakalpayāmi yat tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati, kiṃ kila tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati (iti) 'pratyekaṃ viniyuktātmā kathaṃ na jñāsyasi prabho' (kusaṃ.2.31), iti |
tavyādiviṣayo yathā— svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ, brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ, pitaro vandanīyāḥ, guravo mānanīyāḥ, kṛtyaṃ na bhāvayet, kāryaṃ na kuryāditi | ﻿
tumunādiviṣayo yathā—bhoktumaicchat icchati eṣiṣyati vā, bhuktvā avrājīt vrajati vrajiṣyati vā, adhītyās‍nāsīt s‍nāti s‍nāsyati vā, coraṅkāramākrukṣat ākrośati ākrokṣyati vā, pāyaṃpāyamāsiṣ‍ṭa āste āsiṣyate vā, raipoṣamapuṣat puṣyati pokṣyati veti |
(10.saṅkīrṇaḥ—6) kālāntarasampṛktassaṅkīrṇaḥ; saṅkaraś‍cānekākāratvādiyattayā na śakyate nirdeṣṭumiti bhaṅganirvāhārthaṃ tu ṣọdhaivodāhriyate | sa—
bhūtabhūtānadyatanayoḥ yathā— anyebhyo vā abhuṅkṣmahi |
bhaviṣyadbhaviṣyadanadyatanayoḥ yathā— adya śvo vā gamiṣyati |
bhūtabhaviṣyadanadyatanayoḥ yathā— ag‍niṣ‍ṭomayājī asya putro janitā | (3.4.1)
bhūtānadyatanabhaviṣyatoḥ yathā— bhāvikṛtyamāsīt |
vartamānaparokṣayoḥ yathā— (kusaṃ. 3.72)
krodhaṃ prabho saṃhara saṃhareti yāvad‌giraḥ khe marūtāṃ caranti |
tāvat sa vahnirbhavanetrajanmā bhasmāvaśeṣaṃ madanaṃ cakāra || 9 ||
bhaviṣyad‍vartamānaparokṣāṇāṃ yathā— (māgha. 3.74)
sādopamurvīmaniśaṃ nadanto yaiḥ plāvayiṣyanti samantato 'mī |
tānyekadeśānnibhṛtaṃ payodhesso 'mbhāṃsi meghān pibato dadarśa || 10 ||
(11. prakīrṇaḥ) vartamānasya bhaviṣyad‍bhūtayoranuveśe prakīrṇaḥ | sa
bhaviṣyadanupraveśe āśaṃsāyāṃ yathā— upādhyāyaś‍cedāgacchati yuktā vyākaraṇamadhīmahe |
lipsāyāṃ yathā— kopayato bhojayati (kaṃ bhavanto bhojayanti) |
yāvatpurāyoge yathā— yāvad bhuṅkte, purā vrajati |
sāmīpye yathā— kadā grāmaṃ gamiṣyasi, eṣa gacchāmi, gacchantameva māṃ viddhi | evaṃ
bhūtānupraveśe 'pi; bhūtasāmīpye yathā— ayi bhoḥ kaṭamakārṣoḥ, kaṭaṃ devadatta nanu karomi, ayaṃ nu karomīti |
(12. viprakīrṇaḥ) bhaviṣyato bhūtānupraveśe bhūtasya bhaviṣyadanupraveśo viprakīrṇaḥ | sa bhaviṣyato bhūtānupraveśe yathā— smarasi devadatta kāśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, abhijānāsi kaliṅgeṣu vatsyāmaḥ tatraudanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe, smarasiyat kāśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ yat tatraudanaṃ bhokṣyāmaha iti | yathā vā—(māgha. 1.68) ﻿
smaratyado dāśarathirbhavan bhavānamuṃ vanāntād vanitāpahāriṇam |
payodhimābaddhacalajjalāvilaṃ vilaṅghya laṅkāṃ nikaṣā haniṣyati || 11 || iti |
bhūtasya bhaviṣyadanupraveśe yathā— māsma kārṣīḥ, māsma karoḥ (mabhā. 3.3.176), devaś‍ced vṛṣ‍ṭassampannāḥ śālayaḥ iti (mabhā. 3.3.133) |
yathā vā—
apakartā 'hamasmīti mā te manasi bhūd bhayam || 12 || (kāā.2.293)
mā sma sīmantinī kācijjanayet putramīdṛśam || 13 || (rāmā.2.53.21)
jātaś‍cāyaṃ mukhenduste bhrukuṭīpraṇayī punaḥ |
gataṃ ca vasudevasya kulaṃ nāmāvaśeṣatām || 14 ||(hava. rāghavaḥ)iti |
atha kathaṃ nityapravṛttasya vartamānaprāp‍tāvapi tasthuḥ sthāsyanti girayaḥ, mārge kūpo 'bhūt, kūpo bhaviṣyatīti bhūtabhaviṣyatkālaviṣayaḥ prayogo bhavati |
ucyate hehayādivaṃśeṣu ye rājāno babhūvuḥ, teṣāṃ yāḥ kriyāḥ tāsāmatītatvāt tatsambandhavivakṣāyāṃ bhūtakālaviṣayaṃ pratyayaṃ prayuṅkte, hehayarājye 'pi parvatā itthameva tasthuriti | tathā āgāmimanvantareṣu ye rājāno bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ yāḥ kriyāstāsāṃ bhaviṣyatvāt tatsambandhavivakṣāyāṃ bhaviṣyatkālaviṣayaṃ pratyayaṃ prayuṅkte; yadā balirindro bhaviṣyati tadāpītthameva parvatāḥ sthāsyantīti |
evaṃ kūpasyāpi bhūtabhaviṣyaddarśanakriyāsambandhād abhūd bhaviṣyatīti kriyābhisambandho na vikalpyata iti ||
(prakṛtyarthopādhiḥ = upagrahaḥ)
upagraho 'pi prakṛtyarthopādhireva |
kaḥ punarasau ?
parasmaipadātmanepadobhayapadināmātmanepadaparasmaipadayoganimittamarthaviśeṣaḥ | taduktam—
ya ātmanepadād bhedaḥ k‍vacidarthasya gamyate |
parasmaipadato vāpi manyante tamupagraham || 15 || (vāpa. 3.12.1)
yathā— nāthati nāthate, śapati śapate, āhvayati āhvayate, pratijānāti pratijānīta iti | atra 'āśiṣi nāthaḥ' {3.1.21 (7)}, 'śapaḥ śapathe' 'spardhāyāmāṅaḥ' (1.3.30—31), 'sampratibhyāmanādhyāne' hvaḥ (1.3.44, 46) jñaḥ iti ātmanepadam; śeṣe parasmaipadamityarthabhedāḥ | evaṃ —
muṇḍo bhīṣayate, kuñcikayainaṃ bhāyayati, jaṭilo vismāpayate, matyainaṃ vismāpayati | śyeno vartikāmullāpayate, kastvāmullāpayati, saṃpravadante grāgyāḥ, saṃpravadanti śakunaya iti | atra 'bhīsmyorhetubhaye', 'liyaḥ sammānanaśālinī— karaṇayoś‍ca', 'vyaktavācāṃ samuc‍cāraṇe' vadaḥ (iti) ātmanepadam, śeṣe parasmaipadamityarthabhedaḥ | evamanyadapyūhanīyam |
nanu ca 'ya ātmanepadād bhedaḥ k‍vacidarthasya gamyata' iti, atra kavacid‍grahaṇaṃ kimartham ?
ucyate parasmaipadātmanepadobhayapadināmātmanepadaparasmaipadobhayapadayogaḥ ṣaṭ‍prakāro bhavati— 'prakṛtinimittaḥ, prakṛtyarthanimittaḥ, pratyayanimittaḥ, pratyayārthanimittaḥ, upaskāranimittaḥ, upaskārārthanimittaś‍ca | tatrārthanimitteṣu yathāyogamarthāvagatihetutvaṃ vidyate | śeṣeṣu tu na vidyate iti 'k‍vacid—'grahaṇena jñāpayati | tatra—
(ātmanepadayoge)
ātmanepadayogaḥ prakṛtinimitto yathā—'anudāttaṅita ātmanepadam' (1.3.12); 'sanaḥ' 'smṛdṛśibhyām', edhate, cyavate, susmūrṣate, didṛkṣata iti |
prakṛtyarthanimitto yathā— 'prakāśanastheyākhyayoś‍ca' (1.3.23), 'bhujo 'navane' (1.3.66), 'gṛdhivañcyoḥ pralambhane' (1.3.69), 'karmavyatīhāre' (1.3.14) tiṣṭhate, bhuṅkte, gandhayate, vyatilunīta iti |
pratyayanimitto yathā—'śadeśśitaḥ' (1.3.60), 'mriyaterluṅ‍‌liṅoś‍ca' (1.3.61), śīyate, mriyate, amṛta, mṛṣīṣṭeti |
pratyayārthanimitto yathā— 'bhāvakarmaṇorātmanepadam' (1.3.13) karmakartari phalavatkartari ca, āsyate, pacyate, vipacyate, pacata iti |
upaskāranimitto yathā— 'viparābhyāṃ jeḥ' (1.3.19), 'samavapravibhyaḥ sthaḥ' (1.3.22), 'samastṛtīyāyuktāt' (1.3.54), 'mithyopapadāt tkṛño 'bhyāse' (1.3.71), vijayate, parājayate, saṃtiṣṭhate, avatiṣṭhate, pratiṣṭhate, vitiṣṭhate, aśvena sañcarate, padaṃ mithyā kārayate |
upaskārārthanimitto yathā— 'veḥ pādaviharaṇe' (1.3.41), 'āṅo jyotirudgamane', 'upānmantrakaraṇe' (1.3.25), 'dāṇaś‍ca sā cec‍caturthyarthe' (1.3.55), vikramate rājā, ākramante jyotīṣi, sāvitryopatiṣṭhate, dāsyā saṃprayacchata iti |
(parasmaipadayoge)
prakṛtinimittaḥ parasmaipadayoge yathā— 'śeṣātkartari parasmaipadam' (1.3.78) bhavati, vyatihasanti, vyatiharanti parasparasya vyatilunanti |*
pratyayārthanimitto yathā— 'kuṣirajoḥ prācāṃ śyan parasmaipadaṃ ca' (3.1.90) 'śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam' | rajyati vastraṃ svayameva, kuṣyati pādassvayameva, rajati vastram, kuṣṇāti pādamiti |
upaskāranimitto yathā— 'anuparābhyāṃ kṛñaḥ' (1.3.79), 'itaretarānyonyopa— padāc‍ca' (1.3.16), anukaroti, parākaroti, itaretarasya vyatilunanti, anyonyasya vyatilunantīti |
upaskārārthanimitto yathā— 'samo 'kūjane' (1.3.21vā.1) 'āṅo do 'nāsya— viharaṇe' (1.3.20), 'udo 'nūrdhvakarmaṇi' (1.3.24), prāderajādyantarādyujerayajñāpātreṣu, saṃkrīḍanti śakaṭāni, vyāghro mukhaṃ vyādadāti, āsanāduttiṣṭhati, yajñapātrāṇi prayunaktīti |
(ubhayapadaprayoge)
ubhayapadaprayoge prakṛtinimitto yathā— 'vā kyaṣaḥ' (1.3.90), aprādervā, lohitāyati lohitāyate, krāmati kramata iti |
prakṛtyarthanimitto yathā—'vibhāṣākarmakāt' (1.3.85), 'vibhāṣā vipralāpe' (1.3.50), uparamati uparamate, saṃpravadanti mauhūrtāḥ, saṃpravadante mauhūrtā iti |
pratyayanimitto yathā—'dyud‌bhyo luṅi' (1.3.91), 'vṛd‍bhyaḥ syasanoḥ' (1.3.92), adyutat adyotiṣṭa, vartsyati, vartiṣyata iti |
pratyayārthanimitto yathā— rajyati rajyate, kuṣyati kuṣyate, 'kuṣirajoḥ prācāṃ śyan', 'parasmaipadaṃ ca karmakartari' iti |
upaskāranimitto yathā— 'upasargādasyatyūhyorvā' (1.3.29 vā. 3), udasyati udasyate, samūhati samūhata iti |
upaskārārthanimitto yathā 'vā lipsāyām' (1.3.25 vā. 2), 'vibhāṣopapadena pratīyamāne' (1.3.77); bhikṣuko brāhmaṇakulamupatiṣṭhati upatiṣṭhate, brāhmaṇassvaṃ yajñaṃ yajati, yajata iti |
* parasmaipadayoge prakṛtyarthanimittaḥ pratyayanimittaś‍ceti bhedāvimau na spṛṣṭau |
evamanye 'pi hetulakṣaṇābhīkṣṇyabhṛśārthagarhākauṭilyalasākalyapūrvakālatādarthyādayaḥ prakṛtyarthopādhiviśeṣā veditavyāḥ, yathā— adhīyāno vasati, pacannāste, punaḥ punaḥ paṭhati pāpaṭhyate, punaḥ punaḥ pacati pāpacyate, garhitaṃ dahati dandahyate, kuṭilaṃ krāmati caṅkramyate, kanyādarśaṃ varayati, bhuktvā vrajati, bhoktuṃ vrajati iti | evamete dhāturūpāyāḥ prakṛterarthopādhayaḥ ||
(pratyayārthopādhiḥ)
pratyayarūpāyāḥ svapratyayārthopādhaya evopādhayo bhavanti |
prātipadikarūpāyāstu svārthadravyaliṅgasaṅkhyāparimāṇakārakasaṃbandhasaṃbodhanasahārtha— tādarthyahetulakṣaṇādaya upādhayo vidyante | te tu pratyayārthopaskārārthaprātipadikā— rtheṣvanantarameva varṇayiṣyanta iti neha pratanyante |
atha pratyayārthopādhiḥ tatra kārakopādhiṣu puruṣa uktaḥ; saṅkhyā tvagrato 'bhidhāsyate | apare 'pi cāsya vidhinimantraṇāmantraṇādhīṣṭasaṃpraś‍naprārthanapraiṣātisargaprāptakālaśaktyarha— garhādayaḥ upādhayo bhavanti | tadyathā— ag‍nihotraṃ juhuyāt, iha bhavān bhuñjīta, iha bhavānānāsīt, bhavānmāṇavakamadhyāpayet, kiṃ nu khalu vyākaraṇamadhīyīya itaḥ uta chandaḥ, labheyāhaṃ bhikṣām; āśaṃsanamapi prārthanamevaḥ ciraṃ jīvyāḥ, grāmaṃ gaccha, gacchānujñāto 'si, kuru kaṭaṃ prāptaste kālaḥ kaṭakaraṇe, bhavān khalu śatruṃ hanyāt, tatrabhavān khalu bhāraṃ vahet, kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayediti |
evamanye 'pi tacchīlataddharmatatsādhukārihetvānulomyaśaktivayovacanākṛcchrānudyamana— śilpilakṣaṇaliṅgādayo 'vagantavyāḥ | yathā— vaditā janāpavādān, muṇḍayitāraḥ śrāviṣṭhāyanāḥ vadhūmụ̄dhām, kanyāmalaṅkariṣṇuḥ, yaśaskarī vidyā, ājñākarī bhāryā, hastigh‍no bhaṭaḥ, kavacaharaḥ kṣatriyakumāraḥ, dhārayannupaniṣadam, aṃśaharassutaḥ, nartakī veśyā, jāyāgh‍nastilakaḥ, vyāsasya vacanaṃ, pāṇineruktiḥ, kālidāsasya prabandha iti |
athobhayopādhiḥ | so 'pi saṃjñājātiprabhāsaparimāṇadyūtābhreṣabhāṣācchandomantra— brāhmaṇāśīrutkrośādibhedādanantaprakāraḥ | tadyathā 'kticktau ca saṃjñāyām' (3.3.174), bhadrabhūtirdevadatta iti, hastā purọdhā (hastī puruṣaḥ?) iti | 'dvitīyā brāhmaṇe' (2.3.60) gāmasya tadahassabhāyāṃ dīvyeyuḥ, paṣṭhauhīṃ dīvyatīti; āśiṣi vun, jīvatāt jīvakaḥ, nandatāt nandaka iti | 'māṅ‌yākrośe' (3.2.126 vā.6), 'ākrośe nañyaniḥ' (3.3.112),
mā jīvan yaḥ parāvajñāduḥkhadagdho 'pi jīvati |
tasyājananirevāstu jananīkleśakāriṇaḥ || 16 || māgha.2.45 iti |
evamanye 'pyasūyāsaṃmatikoṣakutsanabhartsanābādhaprakārākṛcchraparyāyārhaṇotpatti— prabhṛtayo 'vagantavyāḥ | teṣu —
asūyā yathā— māṇavaka 3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka3 abhirūpaka, riktaṃ te ābhirūpyam |
saṃmatiḥ yathā— māṇavaka 3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka3 abhirūpaka śobhanaḥ khalvasi |
kopo yathā— māṇavaka 3 māṇavaka, avinītaka3 avinītaka idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma |
kutsanaṃ yathā— śaktike 3 śaktike, yaṣṭike 3 yaṣṭike riktā te śaktiḥ |
bhartsanaṃ yathā— cora 3 cora, vṛṣala 3 vṛṣala ghātayiṣyāmi tvām |
ābādho yathā— gatagatā naṣṭanaṣṭā priyāyā gamanādinā |
pīḍyamānaḥ kaś‍cidevaṃ prayuṅkte ||
prakāro yathā— paṭupaṭu, bhītabhīta, paripūrṇaguṇena nyūnaguṇasyopamāne satyevaṃ bhavati |
akṛcchraṃ yathā— sukhasukhena dadāti, priyapriyeṇa dadāti, apīḍyamāno dadātītyarthaḥ |
paryāyādayo yathā— bhavataśśāyikā, arhati bhavānikṣubhakṣikām, ikṣubhakṣikāṃ me dhārayasi, udapādīkṣubhakṣikā iti |
sarvo 'pi cāyamupādhiprapañcastridhaivākhyāyate dharmyupādhiḥ, dharmopādhiḥ, prakīrṇopādhiś‍ca |
tatra kṛñaḥ stambaśakṛd‍bhyāṃ vrīhivatsayorin, stambakarṇayo ramijapoḥ (3.2.13) hastisūcakayorityādi (3.2.13 vā.) dharmyupādhiḥ yathā—
vrīhisstambakariḥ kṣetre gṛhe vatsaśśakṛtkariḥ |
janaḥ karṇejapo rājye mattasstamberamo vane || 17 || (3.2.24)
'prajane sarteḥ' ap (3.3.71), 'samudorajaḥ paśuṣu' (3.3.69) dharmopādhiḥ yathā—
samajassyād gavāṃ gobhirukṣṇāmudaja ukṣabhiḥ |
bhavatyapasare yasyāssaiṣā me gomatallikā || 18 ||
'manyakarmaṇyanādare vibhāṣā 'prāṇiṣu' (2.3.17), 'ṣaṣṭhī cānādare' (2.3.38), adhike bhāvalakṣaṇe iti prakīrṇopādhiḥ yathā—
manyate na tṛṇāyāpi (sarvasa)vaṃ paśyatoharaḥ |
miṣatsu lokapāleṣu haviḥ pibati so 'dhvare || 19 || (hava.)
(6. pradhānam)
tiṅkṛttaddhitābhidheyapratyayārthaḥ pradhānaḥ | sa tridhā— (1) svārthaḥ, (2) sambandhī, (3) kārakaṃ ceti | teṣu —
(1.svārthaḥ)
prakṛtyartha eva svārthaḥ |
sa tridhā (1) dhātvarthaḥ, (2) prātipadikārthaḥ, (3) śeṣaś‍ca | tatra—
(1) dhātvarthastrividhaḥ — bhāvaḥ, kriyā kārakaṃ ca | teṣu— bhāvo dvidhā— sattvabhūto 'sattvabhūtaś‍ca | tayoḥ liṅgasaṅkhyāyogī sattvabhūto yathā—
avacanaṃ vacanaṃ priyasannidhāvanavalokanameva vilokanam |
avayavāvaraṇaṃ ca yadaṃśukavyatikareṇa tadaṅgasamarpaṇam || 20 ||
aliṅgasaṅkhyo 'sattvabhūto yathā—
api prasannena maharṣiṇā tvaṃ samyagvinīyānumato gṛhāya |
kālo hyayaṃ saṃkramituṃ dvitīyaṃ sarvopakārakṣamamāśramaṃ te || 21 ||(raghu.5.10)
kriyā dvidhā— śuddhā saṅkīrṇā ca | tayoḥ— kārakāsaṃpṛktā śuddhā yathā—
pallavopamitisāmyasapakṣaṃ daṣṭavatyadharabimbamabhīṣṭe |
paryakūji sarujeva taruṇyāstāralolavalayena kareṇa || 22 || (māgha.10.53)
kartṛtvāpannasādhyarūpā saṅkīrṇā yathā—
kucadvandve tanvi! dvipakalabhakumbhasthalatulāṃ dadhāne 'smin kasyā na yuvatiṣu cittasya rujati |
tavorvoryugme vā hṛtaruciracāmīkararucau vikarṣatyūṣmāṇaṃ kamiha na yuvānaṃ jvarayati || 23 ||
kārakaṃ dvidhā— niyatadhātuviṣayamaniyatadhātuviṣayaṃ ca |
tayorniyatadhātuviṣayaṃ yathā— (kirātā. 3.66)
tuṣāraleśākulitotpalābhe paryaśruṇī maṅgalabhaṅgabhīruḥ |
agūḍhabhāvāpi vilokane sā na locane mīlayituṃ viṣehe || 24 ||
﻿
aniyatadhātuviṣayaṃ yathā— (śāku. 2.12)
abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtamīkṣitaṃ hasitamanyanimittakṛtodayam |
vinayavāritavṛttiratastayā na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ || 25 ||
(2) prātipadikarthaḥ trividhaḥ vyakto 'vyaktassaṃdigdhaś‍ca | teṣu —
pratyayotpādānutpādayoraviśiṣ‍ṭo vyaktaḥ | sa dvidhā talliṅgo 'nyaliṅgaś‍ca | tayoḥ—
talliṅgo yathā— mana eva mānasam, bandhureva bāndhavaḥ, yava eva yāvaka iti |
anyaliṅgo yathā— upāya eva aupayikam, deva eva devatā, devataiva daivatamiti |
avyakto dvidhā— ujjhitasvarūpo 'nujjhisvarūpaś‍ca | tatra
ujjhitasvarūpo yathā—'veśśālacchaṅkaṭacau' (5.2.28), 'saṃprodaś‍ca kaṭac' (5.2.29), 'upādhibhyāṃ tyakannāsannārūḍhayoḥ' (5.2.34) iti yathā— viśālaṃ, viśaṅkaṭaṃ, prakaṭaṃ, vikaṭam, upatyakā, adhityakā iti | atropasargeraśṛṅgatvādisvarūpamujjhitam |
anujjhitasvarūpo yathā— 'vatsokṣaśvarṣabhebhyaś‍ca tanutve' (5.3.19), 'kāsūgoṇībhyāṃ ṣ‍ṭarac' (5.3.90), 'kimettiṅavyayaghādāmvadravyaprakarṣe' (5.4.11) | 'vinañbhyāṃ nānāñau nasaha' (5.2.27) | yathā— vatsataraḥ, ukṣataraḥ, nitarām, atīvatarāṃ, vinā, nāneti |
upacaritārthavṛttiḥ sandigdhaḥ | sa dvidhā— saṅkhyāvānasaṅkhyataś‍ca | tayoḥ—
tiṅantārtho yathā— pacatitarāṃ, pacatakīti (5.3.74,75) |
subantārtho yathā— tvayakā, uc‍cakaiḥ (5.3.74) iti |
(3) uk‍tādanyaḥ śeṣaḥ sa dvidhā pratyayārthaḥ samāsārthaś‍ca |
pratyayārtho dvidhā, kṛdarthastaddhitārthaś‍ca | tayoḥ
kṛdartho yathā— vyāvakrośī, sāṃrāviṇamiti |
taddhitārtho yathā— ābhijityaḥ(5.3.118), kauñjāyanyaḥ(5.3.113) iti |
samāsārtho dvidhā— samāsanimittam, samāsanimittaś‍ca | tatra
yamāśritya 'taddhitārtha' iti samāso bhavati (sa) samāsanimittam | yathā— dvaimāturaḥ, pañcakapāla iti |
sambandhī yasya tu samāsanta iti samāso nimittaṃ sa samāsanimittaḥ | yathā—devarājaḥ, pratyurasamiti | ﻿
(2. sambandhī)
sambandhī nnidhā— (1) kriyā, (2) dravyaṃ (3) guṇaś‍ca | teṣu —
(1) kriyā nnidhā— kriyāsambandhinī, kārakasambandhinī ubhayasambandhinī ca | tāsu— kriyāsambandhinī dvidhā— bhinnarūpā 'bhinnarūpā ca |
bhinnarūpā yathā— kartumicchati cikīrṣati, jugupsicchati jugupsiṣata' iti |
abhinnarūpā yathā— atyarthaṃ pacati pāpacyate, punaḥ punaḥ paṭhati pāpaṭhyata iti |
kārakasambandhinyapi dvidhā, sākāṅkṣā nirākāṅkṣā ca |
sākāṅkṣā yathā— paṭamivācarati paṭīyati kambalam, prāsāda ivācarati prāsādīyati kuṭī |
nirākāṅkṣā yathā—putramicchati putrīyati, pucchamudasyatyutpucchayata iti |
ubhayasambandhinī dvidhā— kriyākārakasambandhinī kārakakriyāsambandhinī ca | tayoḥ
prathamā yathā— pacantaṃ prayuṅkte pācayati devadattaḥ, adhīyānaṃ prayuṅkte adhyāpayati kārīṣo 'g‍niḥ |
dvitīyā yathā— kaṃsavadhamācaṣ‍ṭe kasaṃ ghatayati, ārātri vivāsamācaṣ‍ṭe rātriṃ vivāsayati |
(2) dravyamapi tridhā— viśeṣyaṃ, viśeṣaṇaṃ, vyavahitaṃ ca | teṣu—
viśeṣyaṃ dvidhā— sāpekṣamanapekṣaṃ ca |
sāpekṣaṃ yathā— yuṣmākamayaṃ yauṣmāko gauḥ, vatsebhyo hito vatsīyo godhuk |
anapekṣaṃ yathā— vasiṣṭhasyāpatyaṃ vāsiṣ‍ṭhaḥ, pṛthivyā īśvaraḥ pārthivaḥ |
viśeṣaṇaṃ dvidhā— dharminiṣ‍ṭhaṃ dharmaniṣ‍ṭhaṃ ca |
dharminiṣ‍ṭhaṃ yathā—gāvo 'sya santīti gomān, prāsādo 'sya syāt prāsādīyaṃ dārū |
dharmaniṣ‍ṭhaṃ yathā— astīti matirasyāstikaḥ, nāstīti matirasya nāstika iti |
vyavahitaṃ dvidhā, viśeṣyarūpaṃ viśeṣaṇarūpaṃ ca |
viśeṣyarūpaṃ yathā— dvimayamudaśvid yavānām, dvimayā yavā udaśvitaḥ (kāśikā 5.2.47) |
viśeṣaṇarūpaṃ yathā— 'pañcamo māso 'sya jātasya pañcamī bālakaḥ (kāśikā 5.2.1.30), ṣaṣ‍ṭhaṃ rūpagranthagrahaṇamasya ṣaṭ‌ko vaṭuḥ |
(3) guṇo 'pi tridhā— āśritaḥ pravṛttinimittamupādhiś‍ca | teṣu—
āśrito dvidhā— abhinnarūpo bhinnarūpaś‍ca | tayoḥ
abhinnarūpo yathā—bhikṣāṇāṃ samūho bhaikṣam, kākolūkasya vairaṃ kākolūkikā | ﻿
bhinnarūpo yathā— ṛtvijāṃ karmārtvijyam, pīlūnāṃ pākaḥ pīlukaṇa iti |
pravṛttinimittaṃ dvidhā— anurañjakamananurañjakaṃ ca | tatra
anurañjakaṃ jātyādi, yathā—brāhmaṇasya bhāvaḥ brāhmaṇyam, ṛjorbhāva ārjavamiti |
ananurañjakaṃ sambandhādi, yathā—daṇḍino bhāvo daṇḍitvam, pācakasya bhāvaḥ pācakateti |
prakṛtyarthapratyayārthayorviśeṣaṇam upādhiḥ | sa dvidhā— vyastassamastaś‍ca |
vyastaḥ prakṛtyarthe yathā— śivo devatā 'syeti śaivaṃ, lavaṇaṃ paṇyamasyeti lāvaṇikaḥ |
pratyayārthe yathā— gārgikayā ślāghate, kāṭhikayā 'dhikṣipati | atra devatāpaṇyaślāghādhikṣepā upādhayaḥ |
samasto yathā— daṇḍaḥ praharaṇamasyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ dāṇḍā | atra daṇḍaśabdāt 'tadasyām' (4.2.57) ityadhikaraṇe pratyayo vihito daṇḍasthaṃ praharaṇatvam, adhikaraṇatvaṃ ca krīḍātvaṃ pratyāyayati | evaṃ hyogodohasya vikāro haiyaṅgavīnaṃ navanītam | atra hyogośabdādvikāre pratyayo vihitaḥ, prakṛtyarthopādhiṃ dohaṃ pratyayārtho ca saṃjñāṃ pratyāyayamiti |
(3. kārakam)
kārakaṃ tridhā (1)sakriyaṃ, (2) bhinnākriyam (3) abhinnakriyaṃ ca | teṣu—
(1) sakriyaṃ tridhā— kartṛrūpaṃ, karmarūpam anusyūtaṃ ca |
kartṛrūpaṃ dvidhā, kriyāviśeṣasthaṃ kārakaviśeṣasthaṃ ca | tayoḥ —
kriyāviśeṣasthaṃ sus‍nātaṃ pṛcchati saus‍nātikaḥ, evaṃ saukhaśāyanikaḥ; prabhūtamāha prābhūtikaḥ; evaṃ māśabdikaḥ, pratīpaṃ vartate prātīpikaḥ, pratikūlaṃ carati prātikūlika iti |
kārakaviśeṣasthaṃ yathā— vyākaraṇaṃ vettyadhīte vā vaiyākaraṇaḥ, samāṃ samāṃ vijāyate samāṃsamīnā, akṣairdīvyatyākṣikaḥ, saṃtāpāya prabhavati sāntāpikaḥ, piturāgataṃ pitryam, samānodare śayitaḥ sodarya iti |
karmarupa dvidhā, sajātīyasthamasajātīyasthaṃ ca |
sajātīyasthaṃ yathā— ayānayaṃ neyaḥ ayānayīnaḥ śāraḥ, māsaṃ bhṛto māsiko bhṛtyaḥ, varṣamadhīṣ‍ṭo vārṣika upādhyāyaḥ, pakṣaṃ lakṣaḥ(?) pākṣiko nibandhaḥ, ṣaṇmāsaṃ krītaḥ ṣāṇmāsiko dāsaḥ, saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtassāṃvatsariko 'bhyāsa iti | ﻿
asajātīyasthaṃ yathā— vāmadevena dṛṣ‍ṭaṃ vāmadevyaṃ sāma, lākṣayā raktaṃ vas‍traṃ lākṣikaṃ, devāya deyaṃ daivyaṃ haviḥ, tantrādacirāpahṛtaḥ tantrakaḥ paṭaḥ, dvāre niyukto dauvārikaḥ pumān, caturdaśyāṃ dṛśyate cāturdaśyaṃ rakṣa iti |
arthāntaranubandhamanusyūtam | tadidvadhā— kriyānusyūtaṃ kārakānusyūtaṃ ca | tayoḥ—
kriyānusyūtaṃ yathā— sītānveṣaṇamadhikṛtya kṛto granthaḥ 'sītānveṣaṇīyaḥ', evaṃ 'kirātārjunīyaḥ', 'vākyapadīyaḥ', pauṣī paurṇamāsī asmin māse bhavati pauṣaḥ, evamāgrahāyaṇikaḥ, āśvatthika iti |
kārakānusyūtaṃ yathā— tittiriṇā proktaṃ vedaṃ vidantyadhīyate vā taittirīyāśchātrāḥ, evaṃ vāratantavīyāḥ, chāgaleyinaḥ, aitareyiṇaḥ, tathā pārāśariṇo bhikṣavaḥ, śailālino naṭāḥ |
(2) bhinnakriyaṃ tridhā lakṣitakriyamapekṣitakriyamanuṣaktakriyaṃ ca | teṣu—
lakṣitakriyaṃ dvidhā— kartṛsthaṃ karmasthaṃ ca | tayoḥ
kartṛsthaṃ yathā— mud‌gā bhavantyasmānmaudgīnaṃ kṣetram, daṇḍinaḥ santyasyāṃ daṇḍimatī śālā, varaṇāḥ santi asmin varaṇā nagaramiti |
karmasthaṃ yathā—śrāddhamanenādya bhuktaṃ śrāddhikaḥ, agrabhojanamasmai dīyate āgrabhojanikaḥ, padamasmin dṛśyaṃ padyaḥ kardama iti |
apekṣitakriyaṃ dvidhā, vyavahitamavyavahitaṃ ca | tayoḥ
vyavahitaṃ yathā— grāmādāgacchati, brāhmaṇāya dadāti, paryaṅke śeta iti |
avyavahitaṃ yathā— kaṭaṃ karoti, dātreṇa lunāti, devadattenāsyata iti |
anuṣaktakriyaṃ dvidhā, tulyādhikaraṇamatulyādhikaraṇaṃ ca | tayoḥ
tulyādhikaraṇaṃ yathā— śuklībhavati, unmanī syāt, bhasmasāt saṃpadyata iti |
atulyādhikaraṇaṃ yathā— paṭapaṭākaroti, devatrāgacchati, manuṣyatrāvasati iti |
(3) abhinnakriyaṃ tridhā, tiṅabhidheyaṃ, kṛdabhidheyaṃ taddhitābhidheyaṃ ca | tatra—
tiṅabhidheyaṃ dvidhā kartṛrūpaṃ karmarūpaṃ ca | tayoḥ
kartṛrūpaṃ yathā— pacati devadattaḥ, dugdhe gauḥ, corasya rūjati roga iti |
karmarūpaṃ yathā— pacyate odanaḥ, bhidyate kusūlaḥ, uṣ‍ṭrāsikā āsyanta iti |
kṛdabhidheyaṃ dvidhā, viśeṣyaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ ca | tayoḥ
viśeṣyaṃ yathā— dātraṃ, prāsādaḥ, kumbhakāra iti | ﻿
viśeṣaṇaṃ yathā—kartavyaṃ, pācakaḥ, subodhamiti |
taddhitābhidheyaṃ dvidhā— sāpekṣakriyamanapekṣitakriyaṃ ca | tayoḥ
sāpekṣakriyaṃ yathā— iṣ‍ṭī yajñe, parigaṇitī yājñikye, ām‍nātī chandasi, adhītī vyākaraṇe, kṛtapūrvī kaṭamiti |
anapekṣakriyaṃ yathā— pākena nirvṛttaṃ pākimaṃ, sekena nirvṛttaṃ sekimaṃ, kuṭṭena kuṭṭimaṃ, karaṇena kṛtrimaṃ, śyenapāto 'syāṃ kriyāyāṃ tilapāto 'syāṃ kriyāyāṃ śyainaṃpātā tailaṃpāteti |
(7. upaskārārthaḥ)
prakṛtipratyayobhayadvārakaṃ padārthaviśeṣaṇamupaskārārthaḥ |
sa tridhā— (1) prakṛtidvārakaḥ, (2) pratyayadvārakaḥ, (3) ubhayadvārakaś‍ca | teṣu—
(1) prakṛtidvārakaḥ ṣọdhā— lopāgamavarṇavikārādeśapratyāpattyupapadopaskārabhedāt | teṣu — (lopaḥ)'rañjerṇau mṛgaramaṇe' nalopa ityādirlopopaskārārtho yathā— (kirātā. 6.24)
dhṛtahetirapyadhṛtajihmamatiś‍caritairmunīnadharayan gurūbhiḥ |
rajayāñcakāra virajāḥ sa mṛgān kimiveśate ramayituṃ na guṇāḥ || 26 ||
(āgamaḥ) 'aśvavṛṣayormaithunecchāyām' ityādirāgamopaskārārthaḥ, yathā—
anekayugajīvinyāstretā yasyāstrayodaśī |
sā kṣīrakaṇṭhakaṃ vatsaṃ vṛṣasyantī na lajjitā || 27 ||
(varṇavikāraḥ) 'veś‍ca svano bhojane' mūrdhanya ityādirvarṇavikāropaskārārthaḥ yathā—
glānicche(dī) kṣutprabodhāya pītvā raktāriṣ‍ṭaṃ jhāritājīrṇaśeṣaḥ |
svāduṅkāraṃ kālakhaṇḍopadaṃśaṃ kroṣ‍ṭā ḍimbaṃ vyaṣvaṇad vyasvanac‍ca || 28 ||
(ādeśaḥ) 'māturmātacputre ślāghya' ityādirādeśopaskārārthaḥ, yathā—
gaurīmātasya tasyaitāḥ kārttikeyasya kīrttayaḥ |
kīrttitāsu na kīrttyante yāsu kasyāpi kīrttayaḥ || 29 ||
(pratyāpattiḥ) 'ākhyānātkṛtastadācaṣ‍ṭe kṛlluka‍prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivac‍ca kārakam' ityādiḥ | pratyāpattyupaskārārthaḥ, yathā—
śailairbandhayati sma vānarahṛtairvālmīkirambhonidhiṃ
vyāsaḥ pārthaśaraistathāpi na tayoratyuktirūda‍bhāvyate || 30 || iti |
(upapadaḥ) 'apādāne parīpsāyāṃ' ṇamulityādirupapadopaskārārthaḥ, yathā—
kiñciccheṣaniśātuṣāramadhurasparśaṃ gṛhaprāṅgaṇe
śayyotthāyamihaṃ vrajanti halināṃ bālāḥ kukūlānalam || 31 || iti |
(2) pratyayadvārako 'pi ṣọdhā— lopāgamavarṇavikāravikaraṇādeśopagrahabhedāt | teṣu— lopārthaḥ 'phalakusumayorluk' (4.3.166) yathā—
varṇaprakarṣe sati karṇikāraṃ dunoti nirgandhatayā sma cetaḥ || 32 ||(kusaṃ.3.28)
āgamārtho 'hṛṣerlomasu' (7.2.29) iṭ, yathā—
ānanairvicakase (hṛṣitābhiḥ) vallabhānabhi tanūbhirabhāvi || 33 || (māgha.10.36)
varṇavikārārthaḥ 'divo 'vijigīṣāyāṃ' (8.2.49) niṣṭhānatvam, yathā—
ādyūnassad‍gṛhiṇyeva prāyo yaṣṭyāvalambitaḥ || 34 || (kirātā. 11.5)
vikaraṇārthaḥ, 'śliṣa āliṅgane' (3.1.46) vasaḥ, yathā—
āślikṣad bhayacapalekṣaṇā navọdhā
bhartāraṃ vipadi na dūṣitātibhūmiḥ || 35 || (māgha. 8.20)
ādeśārtha 'āśiṣi tuhyostātaṅ' (7.1.35) yathā—
bhavatād bhavato matiśśubhā jayatājjīva bhavāvanīśvaraḥ || 36 ||
upagrahārthaḥ 'adheḥ prasahane' (1.3.33) kṛteḥ ātmanepadam, yathā—
bhavādṛśāś‍cedadhikurvate ratiṃ
nirāśrayā hanta hatā manasvitā || 37 || (kirātā 1.43) iti |
(3) ubhayadvārakaḥ tu dvādaśadhā— avadhi—sambodhana—kriyāviśeṣaṇa—kārakaviśeṣaṇa— śeṣa—pariśeṣa—sahārtha—tādarthya—hetu—lakṣaṇopapada—prakīrṇabhedāt | tatra—
(1. avadhiḥ —6) kriyādīnāṃ mitho maryādāvadhiḥ;
sa pūrvakālavyatihāraparāparayogakālādhvādibhedādanekaprakāraḥ | teṣu— pūrvakālo yathā—(kirātā. 4.6)
kṛtormilekhaṃ śithilatvamāyatā śanaiśśanaiśśāntarayeṇa vāriṇā |
nirīkṣya reme sa samudrayoṣitāṃ taraṅgitakṣaumavipāṇḍu saikatam ||38||
vyatihāro yathā—
stanopapīḍaṃ parirabhya cumbatoḥ prajalpatorapyanavasthitaṃ muhuḥ |
srajaś‍ca yūnorapamitya yācatoranidrayoreva jagāma śarvarī || 39 ||
parayogo yathā—
prāleyādrerupataṭamatikramya tāṁstān viśeṣān haṃsadvāraṃ bhṛgupatiyaśovartma yat krauñcarandhram |
tenodīcīṃ diśamanusarestiryagāyāmaśobhī śyāmaḥ pādo balivimathanābhyutthitasyeva viṣṇoḥ || 40 || (megha. 57)
aparayogo yathā—
aprāpya parvatamimāni purovilīnanīrandhralodhravakulāni vanasthalāni |
āseduṣastava hariṣyati yeṣvaghaughamadhvaklamaṃ ca surasindhutaraṅgavātaḥ || 41 ||
kālayogo yathā—
evamindriyasukhasya vartmanassevanādanugṛhītamanmathaḥ |
śailarājabhavane sahomayā māsamekamavasad vṛṣadhvajaḥ || 42 || (kusaṃ. 8.20)
adhvayogo yathā—
udanvacchinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhirapāṃ yojanaśataṃ sadā pānthaḥ pūṣā gaganaparimāṇaṃ gaṇayati |
iti prāyo bhāvāssphuradupadhimudrāmukulitāḥ satāṃ prajñonmeṣā punarayamasīmā vijayate || 43 || (bārā. 1.8)
(2. sambodhanam —6) siddhasya kriyārthamabhimukhīkaraṇaṃ sambodhanam |
tat ṣọdhā niyoganiṣedhānumatyupālambhapraś‍nākhyānārthabhedāt | teṣu— niyogārthaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.3)
ājñāpaya jñātaviśeṣa! puṃsāṃ lokeṣu yat te karaṇīyamasti |
anugrahaṃ saṃsmaraṇapravṛddhamicchāmi saṃvardhitumājñayā te || 44 ||
niṣedhārthaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.76)
ārdrakesarasugandhi te mukhaṃ mattamattanayanaṃ svabhāvataḥ |
atra labdhavasatirguṇāntaraṃ kiṃ vilāsini! madaḥ kariṣyati || 45 ||
anumatyarthaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.12)
sarvaṃ sakhe! tvayyupapannametadubhe mamāstre kuliśaṃ bhavāṁś‍ca |
pūrvaṃ tapovīryamahatsu kuṇṭhaṃ tvaṃ sarvatogāmi ca sādhakaṃ ca || 46 ||
upālambhārthaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.66)
avastunirbandhapare! kathaṃ nu te karo 'yamāmuktavivāhakautukaḥ |
kareṇa śambhorvalayīkṛtāhinā sahiṣyate tatprathamāvalambanam || 47 ||
praś‍nārthaṃ yathā—(raghu. 16.8)
kā tvaṃ śubhe! kasya parigraho vā kiṃ vā madabhyāgamakāraṇaṃ te |
ācakṣva matvā vaśināṃ raghūṇāṃ manaḥ paras‍trīvimukhapravṛtti ||
ākhyānārthaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.58)
nūnamunnamati yajvanāṃ patiśśārvarasya tamaso niṣiddhaye |
puṇḍarīkamukhi! diṅ‍mukhaṃ yataḥ kaitakairiva rajobhirāhatam || 49 ||
(3. kriyāviśeṣaṇam—6)
prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya prakṛtyarthabhāgamukhena bhedakaṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇam; bhāvotpanne hi pratyaye kadācit samudāyaḥ pratyayamukhena viśeṣyate, kadācit prakṛtimukhena | tīvraḥ pākaḥ, tīvraṃ pāka iti | tat ṣọdhā— nāmarūpam, avyayarūpaṃ, kṛdrūpaṃ, taddhitarūpaṃ, samāsarūpam, upasargādirūpamiti | teṣu—
nāmarūpaṃ yathā—
mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś‍cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ vāmaś‍cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakaste sagandhaḥ |
garbhādhāna—kṣaṇa—paricayānnūnamābaddhamālā— sseviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ valākāḥ || 50 || (megha.9)
avyayarūpaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 8.28)
praśāntadharmābhibhavaśśanairvivān vilāsinībhyaḥ parimṛṣṭapaṅkajaḥ |
dadau bhujālambamivāttaśīkarastaraṅgamālāntagocaro 'nilaḥ || 51 ||
kṛdrūpaṃ yathā—
śayyante hataśāyikāḥ pathi tarucchāyāniṣaṇṇādhvagaiḥ śrīkaṇṭhāyataneṣu dhārmikajanairāsyanta uṣṭrāsikāḥ |
śūnye tatra nikuñjaśākhini sakhi! grīṣmasya madhyandine sajjānāṃ dayitābhisāraṇavidhau ramyaḥ kṣaṇo vartate || 52 ||
taddhitarūpaṃ yathā—
śataṃ vārānuktaḥ priyasakhi! vacobhissuparuṣai— ssahasraṃ nirdhūtaḥ padanipatitaḥ pārṣṇihatibhiḥ |
kiyatkṛtvo baddhāḥ punarapi na vedmi bhrukuṭaya— stathāpi kliś‍nanmāṃ kṣaṇamapi na dhṛṣṭo viramati || 53 ||
samāsarūpaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.51)
iti praviś‍yābhihitā dvijanmanā manogataṃ sā na śaśāka śaṃsitum |
atho vayasyāṃ paripārśvavartinīṃ vivartitānañjananetramaikṣata || 54 ||
upasargādirūpaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.9)
prasīda viśrāmyatu vīra! vajraṃ śarairmadīyaiḥ katamastavāriḥ |
bibhetu moghīkṛtabāhuvīryaḥ strībhyo 'pi kopasphuritādharābhyaḥ || 55 ||
(4. kārakaviśeṣaṇam—6)
kartrādīnāṃ svebhyaḥ paraṃ kārakaviśeṣaṇam | tadapi ṣọdhā—
kartṛviśeṣaṇaṃ karmaviśeṣaṇaṃ karaṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ saṃpradānaviśeṣaṇamapādānaviśeṣaṇama— dhikaraṇaviśeṣaṇamiti | teṣu —
kartṛviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.11)
sā maṅgalas‍nānaviśuddhagātrī gṛhītavatyudgamanīyavastram |
nivṛttaparjanyajalābhiṣekā praphullakāśā vasudheva reje || 56 ||
karmaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.53)
aśokanirbhartsitapadmarāgamākṛṣṭahemadyutikarṇikāram |
muktākalāpīkṛtasindhuvāraṃ vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī || 57 ||
karaṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.27)
mukhena sā padmasugandhinā niśi pravepamānādharapatraśobhinā |
tuṣāravṛṣṭikṣatapadmasampadāṃ sarojasantānamivākarodapām || 58 ||
saṃpradānaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.16)
tasmai himādreḥ prayatāṃ tanūjāṃ yatātmane rocayituṃ yatasva |
yoṣitsu tad‍vīryaniṣekabhūmissaiva kṣametyātmabhuvopadiṣṭam || 59 ||
apādānaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.11)
visṛṣṭarāgādadharānnivartitasstanāṅgārāgāruṇitāc‍ca kandukāt |
kuśāṅkurādānaparikṣatāṅguliḥ kṛto 'kṣasūtrapraṇayī tayā karaḥ || 60 ||
adhikaraṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.27)
sadyaḥ pravālod‍gamacārupatre nīte samāp‍tiṃ navacūtabāṇe |
niveśayāmāsa madhurdvirephān nāmākṣarāṇīva manobhavasya || 61 ||
(5. śeṣaḥ —6)
anuprayogārthaśśeṣaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā— liḍanuprayogārthaḥ, loḍanuprayogārthaḥ, kṛdanuprayogārthaḥ, yathāvi— dhyanuprayogārthaḥ, taddhitānuprayogārthaḥ, dvirvacanānuprayogārtha iti |
liḍanuprayogārtho yathā—(māgha. 3.28)
na laṅghayāmāsa mahājanānāṃ śirāṃsi naivoddhatimājagāma |
aceṣṭatāṣṭāpadabhūmireṇuḥ khurāhato yat sadṛśaṃ garimṇaḥ || 62 ||
loḍanuprayogārtho yathā—(māgha. 1.51)
purīmavaskanda lunīhi nandanaṃ muṣāṇa rat‍nāni harāmarāṅganāḥ |
nigṛhya cakre namucidviṣo balī ya itthamasvāsthyamaharniśaṃ divaḥ || 63 ||
kṛdanuprayogārtho yathā—(kirātā 8.16)
salīlamāsaktalatāntabhūṣaṇaṃ samāsajantyā kusumāvataṃsakam |
stanopapīḍaṃ nunude nitambinā ghanena kaś‍cijjaghanena kāntayā || 64 ||
yathāvidhyanuprayogārtho yathā—(kirātā. 8.16)
sa te priyaś‍cet subhago 'parādhairvicintitairasya phalaṃ na kiñcit |
priyāparādho hi vicintyamānassamūlakāṣaṃ kaṣatīva cetaḥ || 65 ||
taddhitānuprayogārtho yathā—(kirātā. 16.11)
parikṣate vakṣasi dantidantaiḥ priyāṅkaśītā nabhasaḥ patantī |
neha pramohaṃ priyasāhasānāṃ mandāramālā viralīkaroti || 66 ||
dvirvacanānuprayogārtho yathā—
vadata vadata satyaṃ rūpamīdṛk kadācid yadi punarabalāyā dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ mukhādi |
jagati jitasamastārātivarge(rgairbhramadbhirbata ki-)miva na dṛṣṭaṃ matprasādād bhavadbhiḥ ||
(6. pariśeṣaḥ —6)
cādinipātadyotyaḥ samuccayādiḥ padārthadharmaḥ pariśeṣaḥ |
so 'nantaprakāro 'pi ṣaḍ‌vidha ihodāhriyate — samuccayaḥ, vikalpaḥ, upamā, niyogaḥ, vinigrahaḥ, pratiṣedhaḥ | teṣu—
samuccayo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.84)
ito gamiṣyāmyathaveti vādinī cacāla bālā stanabhinnavalkalā |
svarūpamāsthāya ca tāṃ kṛtasmitassamālalambe vṛṣarājaketanaḥ || 68 ||
vikalpo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.78)
vibhūṣaṇodbhāsi pinaddhabhogi vā gajājinālambi dukūladhāri vā |
kapāli vā syādathavenduśekharaṃ na viśvamūrteravadhāryata vapuḥ || 69 ||
upamā yathā—(raghu. 7.21)
hastena hastaṃ parigṛhya vadhvāssa rājasūnussutarāṃ babhāse |
anantarāśokalatāpravālaṃ prāpyeva cūtaḥ pratipallavena || 70 ||
niyogo yathā—(raghu. 5.37)
rūpaṃ tadojasvi tadunnatatvaṃ tadeva naisargikamasya tejaḥ |
na kāraṇāt svād vibhide kumāraḥ pravartito dīpa iva pradīpāt || 71 ||
vinigraho yathā—
tvamahanīha nibarhaya māninīḥ virahiṇaḥ ku (ta—utsavinī dhṛ—) tiḥ |
iti niveśayati sma kalāpināmanugiraṃ nu giraṃ jaladāgamaḥ || 72 ||
niṣedho yathā—(kirātā. 9.25)
na prasādamucitaṃ gamitā dyauḥ noddha‍ṛtaṃ timiramadrivanebhyaḥ |
diṅ‍mukheṣu na ca dhāma vikīrṇaṃ bhūṣitā ca rajanī himabhāsā || 73 ||
(7. sahārthaḥ —6)
yadyutpattau sahakārilābhaḥ tadā sahārthastridhā abhidhīyamānaḥ, pratīyamānaḥ, vyavadhīyamānaś‍ca | teṣu—
abhidhīyamāno dvidhā, sahena paryāyeṇa ca |
tayorādyo yathā—(raghu. 6.35)
anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru! kaccinmanaso ruciste |
śiprātaraṅgānilakampitāsu vihartumudyānaparamparāsu || 74 ||
dvitīyo yathā—(raghu. 6.57)
anena sārdhaṃ viharāmburāśestīreṣu tālīvanamarmareṣu |
dvīpāntarānītalavaṅgapuṣpairapākṛtasvedalavā marudbhiḥ || 75 ||
pratīyamāno 'pi dvidhā, vibhaktito nipātācca |
tayorādyo yathā—(raghu. 14.24)
sa paurakāryāṇi vicintya kāle reme videhādhipaterduhitrā |
upasthitaṃ cāru vapustadīyaṃ kṛtvopabhogotsukayeva lakṣmyā || 76 ||
dvitīyo yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.43)
tamanvagacchat prathamo vidhātā śrīvatsalakṣmā puruṣaś‍ca sākṣāt |
jayeti vācā mahimānamasya saṃvardhayantau haviṣeva vahnim || 77 ||
vyavadhīyamāno 'pi dvidhā vīpsayā bhāgena ca | sahakṛtā eva hi kriyā guṇadravyaiḥ prayoktrā yugapad‍vyāp‍tumiṣyante, sahakṛtā eva ca vibhajyante | arthaśabdastu nivṛttivacano 'pi vidyate, yathā maśakārtho dhūma iti | tatra—
vīpsayā yathā—
sugandhiniśvāsavivṛddhatṛṣṇaṃ bimbādharāsannacaraṃ dvirepham |
pratikṣaṇaṃ sambhramaloladṛṣṭirlīlāravindena nivārayantī || 78 || (kusaṃ. 3.56)
bhāgena yathā—
alaṅkṛtāpyanvayarūpabhūṣaṇairna śobhate māṃ prati tāvadaṅganā |
bibharti yāvat pramadāsamāgame na śūrabhāryādṛtagarvitaṃ śiraḥ || 79 ||
(8. tādarthyam—6)
kāryasya kāryiṇo vā kāraṇaṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ tādarthyam |
tat ṣọdhā— kriyātādarthyaṃ, dravyatādarthyaṃ, kriyādravyatādarthyaṃ, dravyakriyātādarthyaṃ, prakṛtivikāratādarthyaṃ, kriyākārakatādarthyamiti | tatra—
kriyātādarthyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.13)
punargrahītuṃ niyamasthayā tayā dvayīṣu nikṣepa ivārpitaṃ dvayam |
latāsu tanvīṣu vilāsaceṣṭitaṃ viloladṛṣṭaṃ hariṇāṅganāsu ca || 80 ||
dravyatādarthyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.23)
prasannadikpāṃsuviviktavātaṃ śaṅkhasvanānantarapuṣpavṛṣṭi |
śarīriṇāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ sukhāya tajjanmadinaṃ babhūva || 81 ||
kriyādravyatādarthyaṃ yathā—(raghu. 6.44)
tasyāḥ prakāmaṃ priyadarśano 'pi na sa kṣitīśo rucaye babhūva |
śaratpramṛṣṭāmbudharoparodhaśśaśīva paryāp‍takalo nalinyāḥ || 82 ||
dravyakriyātādarthyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.43)
alabhyaśokābhibhaveyamākṛtirvimānanā subhru! kutaḥ piturgṛhe |
parābhimarśo na tavāsti kaḥ karaṃ prasārayet pannagarat‍nasūcaye || 83 ||
prakṛtivikāratādarthyaṃ yathā—(raghu. 14.77)
puṣpaṃ phalaṃ cārtavamāharantyo bījaṃ ca bāleyamakṛṣṭarohi |
vinodayiṣyanti navābhiṣaṅgāmudāravāco munikanyakāstvām || 84 ||
kriyākārakatādarthyaṃ yathā—
gehād yātā saritamudakaṃ hārikā nājigīṣe
maṅkṣyāmīti śrayasi yamunātīravīrud‍gṛhāṇi |
gosandāyī viśasi vipinānyeva govardhanādreḥ
kiṃ tvaṃ rādhe! dṛśi nipatitā devakīnandanasya || 85 ||
(9. kārako hetuḥ —6)
hetuviśeṣeṣu prayojakaḥ kārakaś‍ca kāraka eva; akārakastu prapañcyate | tatra— kāryaprasavayogyaḥ kārakastu ṣọdhā— liṅādivācyaḥ, sad‍vācyaḥ, nipātādivācyaḥ, tṛtīyāvācyaḥ pañcamīvācyaḥ, prathamādivācya iti | teṣu—
liṅādivācyo yathā—
puṣpaṃ pravālopahitaṃ yadi syānmuktāphalaṃ vā sphuṭavidrumastham |
tato 'nukuryād viśadasya tasyāstāmroṣṭhaparyastarucismitasya || 86 || (kusaṃ.1.44)
sadvācyo yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.21)
sā saṃbhavadbhiḥ kusumairlateva jyotirbhirudyadbhiriva triyāmā |
sarid vihaṅgairiva līyamānairāmucyamānābharaṇā cakāśe || 87 ||
nipātādivācyo yathā—(jāha. 1.28)
līlā gatestatra nisargasiddhā matto na hastī muṣito na haṃsaḥ |
itīva jaṅghāyugalaṃ tadīyaṃ cakre tulākoṭyadhirohaṇāni || 88 ||
tṛtīyāvācyo yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.24)
tayā duhitrā sutarāṃ savitrī sphuratprabhāmaṇḍalayā cakāśe |
vidūrabhūmirnavameghaśabdādudbhinnayā rat‍naśalākayeva || 89 ||
pañcamīvācyo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.40)
ato 'tra kiñcid bhavatīṃ bahukṣamāṃ dvijātibhāvādupapannacāpalaḥ |
ayaṃ janaḥ praṣṭumanāstapodhane ! na ced rahasyaṃ prativak‍tumarhasi || 90 ||
prathamādivācyo yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.11)
udvejayatyaṅgulipārṣṇibhāgān mārge śilībhūtahime 'pi yatra |
na durvahaśroṇipayodharārtā bhindanti mandāṃ gatimaśvamukhyaḥ || 91 ||
(10. lakṣaṇam —6)
hetureva jñāpako lakṣaṇam |
tat ṣọdhā — dravyalakṣaṇaṃ, itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇaṃ, vikāralakṣaṇaṃ, utpātalakṣaṇaṃ, bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ, kriyālakṣaṇamiti | teṣu—
dravyalakṣaṇaṃ yathā—(raghu. 6.12)
tāṃ pratyabhivyaktamanorathānāṃ mahīpatīnāṃ praṇayāgradūtyaḥ |
pravālaśobhā iva pādapānāṃ śrṛṅgāraceṣṭā vividhā babhūvuḥ || 92 ||
itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.10)
kalakvaṇitagarbheṇa kaṇṭhenāghūrṇitekṣaṇaḥ |
pārāvataḥ parikramya riraṃsuś‍cumbati priyām || 93 ||
vikāralakṣaṇaṃ yathā—(māgha. 1.70)
sa bāla āsīd vapuṣā caturbhujo mukhena pūrṇendunibhastrilocanaḥ |
yuvā karākrāntamahībhṛduccakairasaṃśayaṃ saṃprati tejasā raviḥ || 94 ||
utpātalakṣaṇaṃ yathā—(visā. 1.3)
gonāsāya niyojitāgadarajāssarpāya baddhauṣadhiḥ
kaṇṭhasthāya viṣāya vīryamahataḥ pāṇau maṇīnbibhratī |
bharturbhūtagaṇāya gotrajaratīnirdiṣṭamantrākṣarā
rakṣatvadrisutā vivāhasamaye hrītā ca bhītā ca yā || 95 ||
bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ yathā—(raghu. 6.82)
tathāgatāyāṃ parihāsapūrvaṃ sakhyāṃ sakhī vetrabhṛdābabhāṣe |
ārye vrajāmo 'nyata ityathaināṃ vadhūrasūyākuṭilaṃ dadarśa || 96 ||
kriyālakṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.11)
badh‍nannaṅgeṣu romāñcaṃ kurvanmanasi nirvṛtim |
netre cāmīlayanneṣa priyāsparśaḥ pravartate || 97 ||
(11. upapadam —6)
upapadaṃ ṣọdhā— kriyārūpaṃ, nāmarūpaṃ, nāmārtharūpaṃ, pratyayarūpaṃ, nipātarūpaṃ, karmapravacanīyarūpamiti | teṣu—
kriyārūpaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.59)
bhavatsambhāvanotthāya paritoṣāya mūrcchate |
api vyāp‍tadigantāni nāṅgāni prabhavanti me || 98 ||
nāmarūpaṃ yathā—
sukhāstebhyo vibhāvaryastebhyo hitamahassadā |
yeṣāmakṛtrimapremā priyā pārśvaṃ na muñcati || 99 ||
nāmārtharūpaṃ yathā—(raghu. 9.40)
hutahutāśanadīp‍ti vanaśriyaḥ pratinidhiḥ kanakābharaṇasya yat |
yuvatayaḥ kusumaṃ dadhurāhitaṃ tadalake dalakesarapeśalam || 100 ||
pratyayarūpaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 10.44)
nṛpasutamabhitassamanmathāyāḥ parijanagātratirohitāṅgayaṣṭeḥ |
sphuṭamabhilaṣitaṃ babhūva badhvā vadati hi saṃvṛtireva kāmitāni || 101 ||
nipātarūpaṃ yathā—
yo hi dīrghāsitākṣasya vilāsavalitabhruvaḥ |
kāntāmukhasyāvaśagaḥ tasmai nṛpaśave namaḥ || 102 ||
karmapravacanīyarūpaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.84)
ā locanāntācchravaṇe vivṛtya pītaṃ gurostad vacanaṃ bhavānyā |
nidāghakālolbaṇatāpayeva māhendramambhaḥ prathamaṃ pṛthivyā || 103 ||
(12. prakīrṇam—)
śabdāntarasāhacaryavirodhaliṅgasvarābhinayādayaḥ prakīrṇam | tatra— śabdāntaraṃ yathā—
bhavatu samadanā rataye tilakavatī cārucampakacchāyā |
ghanacandanadhavalakucākrāntā tava vidviṣāmaṭavī || 104 ||
sāhacaryaṃ yathā—
lakṣmaṇānugato bhāti śaśī rāma ivāparaḥ |
kausalyeva bibharti dyaurabhiṣekojjvalāṃ śriyam || 105 || (?)
virodho yathā—
haribāṇāvimau roṣādubhāvapi dhṛtāyudhau |
prahartumudyatau vīrau raṇe rāmārjunāviva || 106 || (?)
liṅgaṃ yathā—
āpyāyayati mitro yaṃ yasya mitraṃ payonidhiḥ |
so 'pyamitraśśaśī jātastadamaitryā 'dya me sakhi ! || 107 || (?)
svaro yathā—
yadi me vallabhā dūtī tadāhamapi vallabhā |
yadi tasyāṃ priyā vācastanmamāpi priya priyāḥ || 108 ||
abhinayo yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.63)
ete vayamamī dārāḥ kanyeyaṃ kulajīvitam |
brūta yenātra vaḥ kāryamanāsthā bāhyavastuṣu || 109 ||
(8. prātipadikārthaḥ)
prātipadikārthastridhā 1. svārthaḥ, 2. dravyaṃ 3. liṅgaṃ ca | teṣu—
(1. svārthaḥ)
śabdātmaiva svārthaḥ | sa dvidhā— svarūpamanukāryaś‍ca | tayoḥ—
svarūpaṃ dvidhā— sattvavacanārhamasattvavacanārhaṃ ca |
tatrādyaṃ yathā—
cūḍāmaṇiśśirorat‍ne taralo hāramadhyage |
paryaṅkaśśayane prokta āveśaś‍cāpi veśmani || 110 ||
dvitīyaṃ yathā— (kāvyāda. 2.234)
manye śaṅke dhruvaṃ prāyo nūnamityevamādibhiḥ |
utprekṣā vyajyate śabdairivaśabdo 'pi tādṛśaḥ || 111 || iti |
anukāryo dvidhā— arthavānanarthaś‍ca |
tayorarthavān yathā—
unnamayya sakacagrahamāsyaṃ cumbati priyatame haṭhavṛttyā |
huṃhu muñca mamameti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānavatīnām || 112 ||
nirarthako yathā—
agraśālamadhiruhya nagasya sphārakaṇṭhakuharo madamattaḥ |
hrasvadīrghasavisargaghukārāna ghoṣayatyuṣasi pāṇḍukapotaḥ || 113 ||
(2. dravyam)
upāttanimittenānupāttanimittena vā yat śrūyate gamyate pratīyate 'bhidhīyate tad dravyam | tadidvadhā— āśrayarūpamanāśrayarūpaṃ ca |
tatra jātyādibhiḥ pravṛttinimittairyadāśrīyate tadāśrayarūpam; yathā gauḥ, aśvaḥ, śuklaḥ, ekaḥ, prasthaṃ, palam, ṛjuḥ, pūrvaḥ, pācakaḥ, daṇḍī, rājapuruṣaḥ, caitra iti |
tad‍‌viparītam anāśrayarūpaṃ nipātāvyayopasargagatikarmapravacanīyādīnāmarthaḥ, yathā 'ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan', 'ṛte dharmaṃ kutaḥ sukham', '(lauhagha)nassumanāyate1' 'kastvāmūrīkariṣyati', 'kastaṃ prati na yāsyati', 'svayaṃ paryetumicchati' |
(3. liṅgam)
liṅgaṃ dvidhā, śabdaliṅgamarthaliṅgaṃ ca |
tayoriyamayamidamityarthavyapadeśanimittaṃ śabdasaṃskāraheturayamityarthavyapadeśakāraṇaṃ pumān, 'napuṃsakasya jhalacaḥ' (7.1.72) iti x x x x x x
upaskāraheturidamityarthavyapadeśakāraṇaṃ napuṃsakamiti |
tadetacchuddhamiśrādibhedāt ṣọdhā viprathate— śuddhaṃ, miśraṃ, saṅkīrṇam, upasarjanam, āviṣ‍ṭaṃ avyaktaṃ ca |
teṣvekasaṃskārahetuśśuddham, khaṭvā, vṛkṣaḥ, kuṇḍaṃ, strī, pumān, napuṃsakamiti |
saṃskāradvayopagrāhi miśram, marīciḥ, ūrmiḥ, arci, chardiḥ, kaṣāyaḥ, kavāṭamiti |

saṃskāratrayayogi saṅkīrṇam, taṭī taṭaḥ taṭaṃ, śrṛṅkhalā, śrṛṅkhalaḥ, śrṛṅkhalamiti | viśeṣyaśabdanigh‍naviśeṣaṇarūpamupasarjanam, śuklā śuklaḥ śuklaṃ, paṭvī paṭuḥ paṭivati |
