( bhāva)
viśeṣyate avacchidyate dravyaṃ yena tacchabdasyārthe pravṛttinimittamarthadharmo viśeṣaṇaṃ guṇo bhāva iti cākhyāyate | x x x x
tat tridhā— guṇaḥ, parimāṇaṃ, sambandha iti | tatra—
dravye svādyukte pratyayajanako guṇaḥ, jātiḥ, guṇaḥ, saṅkhyā, saṃsthānamavasthānamityādiḥ, yathā— gauḥ, brāhmaṇaḥ, paṭuḥ, gauraḥ, ekaḥ, anekaḥ, hanumān, vāsudevaḥ, yuvā, vṛddhaḥ, ṛjuḥ, pūrva iti |
ananurañjakamā x x x x bhidheyamavacchedakaṃ parimāṇaṃ, tadadhvagauravamūlya— saṅkhyāsaṅghātakṣetrādibhedādanekadhā | yathā yojanaṃ parvataḥ, palaṃ suvarṇaḥ, purāṇaḥ kapardakāḥ, akṣauhiṇī balam, khārī vrīhayaḥ, nivartanaṃ bhūmiriti |
kṛt‍taddhitasamāsaprātipadikaviśeṣāṇāmarthaṣu pravṛttinimittaṃ sambandhaḥ |
sa tridhā— kriyāsambandho, dravyasambandhaḥ, kriyādravyasambandhaś‍ca | tatra—
kriyāsambandho yathā— pācaka iti |
dravyasambandho yathā— daṇḍī, rājapuruṣa iti |
kriyādravyasambandho yathā— ākṣikaḥ, niṣkauśāmbiriti |
yadā punaḥ jātiguṇaparimāṇādayaśśabdāḥ prādhānyenābhidhīyante bhāvapratyayairvā pratipādyante tadaiteṣāṃ dravyatvameva, na liṅgatvam | bhāvapratyayo hi — (5.1.119)
jātiguṇājjātiguṇe samāsakṛt‍taddhitāt tu sambandhe |
ḍitthādeḥ sve rūpe dhavakhadirājjātisaṅghate || 114 || iti ||
(nipātānāṃ vācakatvaṃ dyotakatvaṃ vā)
anye tu svārtho viśeṣaṇaṃ, dravyaṃ viśeṣyaṃ, liṅgaṃ strīnapuṃsakamityācakṣate | tacca nipātagatyupasargakarmapravacanīyādiprātipadikārthā x x x x te | na hi nipātā
jātyādikaṃ pravṛttinimittamupādāyedaṃ tadi'—ti vyapadeśayogyeṣu sattvabhūteṣvartheṣu vartante, api tu pravṛttinimittānupagraheṇaivāsattvabhūtaṃ samuccayādikamarthamabhiniviśante | tadāha—
teṣāmuccāvacārthatvāt sarvasaṃbandhadarśanāt |
anyatantratayod‍bhūterasattvārthatvamucyate || 115 ||
atha kimamī vācakā uta dyotakā iti | tatraike varṇayanti—
tatprayogāvaseyatvād vācyasteṣāṃ sa gamyate |
samuccayādirarthātmā yathānyeṣāṃ gavādikaḥ || 116 ||
anvayavyatirekanibandhanā hi śabdānāmabhidheyavyavasthā | tataś‍ca anādiprayogā— davasīyamānaḥ samuccayavicāraṇādirarthātmā kathamamīṣāṃ vācyo na bhavet? pratīyate (ca) ca—śabdāt samuccayaḥ; 'ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan' (ṛve) iti; vicāraṇā vā—śabdāt, 'hantāhaṃ pṛthivīmimāṃ nidadhānīha veha vā' (ṛve.) iti | evamivādibhya upamānādayo gamyanta iti tadvācyāste bhavanti |
anye tvāhuḥ—
ṣaṣ‍ṭhyabhāvādasattvokterekānukteḥ parasthiteḥ |
guṇabhāvāt smṛteś‍caiṣāṃ dyotakatvaṃ suniś‍citam || 117 ||
tathā hi— plakṣanyagrodhayoḥ samuccaya iti vācakapadaprayoge ṣaṣ‍ṭhī nirdiśyate, naivaṃ plakṣanyagrodhayoś‍ca iti | yathā ca vrīhiyavayorvikalpaḥ pravartatāmiti vācakaśabdaprayoge 'sattvabhūto vikalpaśabdārthaḥ kriyayā sambadhyate, naivaṃ vrīhiyavayorvā iti | yathā ca vṛkṣa ityekenāpi vācakena śākhādimānarthaḥ pratīyate, naivaṃ samuccayo vikalpo vā | yathā ca bhikṣāṃ dehi dehi bhikṣāmiti vācakapadānāṃ paurvāparyaprayoge kāmacāraḥ, naivaṃ vṛkṣaḥ ca—vṛkṣa iti | yathā ca vṛkṣaśśobhana iti vācakasya viśeṣaṇayogo dṛśyate, naivaṃ ca— śobhana iti | tadevaṃ vācakaśabdavaidharmyād dyotakāś‍cādaya iti niś‍cīyate | smarati sūtrakāraḥ 'cādayo 'sattve' (1.4.57) iti | niruktakāro 'pyāha 'bhāvapradhānamākhyātaṃ, sattvapradhānāni (nāmāni) (1.1.9), (nirbaddhāḥ) upasargā arthānnirāhuḥ (1.3.3.), uccāvaceṣvartheṣu nipatantīti nipātāḥ' (1.4.2) iti | sa caiṣāmuccāvaco 'nekaprakāro 'rthaḥ svato 'navagamyamānātmā padāntarasaṃbandhopahita— prakaraṇādyanuvidhānenāvasīyate | tataḥ svarūpamātreṇāpyarthānavagatauitaraprayogapekṣatvād dyotakā evaite, na vācakā iti |
etattu sarvaṃ savyabhicāramiti kecit | tathā hi— 'vācakenāpyākhyātena dyotitaṃ sattvabhūtārtham, api ca vācakamākhyātam, āsyate bhavad‍‌bhiriti | vācakāvapi prakṛtipratyayau naiva kevalau prayujyete, juhotīti | vācakamapi vartipadaṃ paurvāparyaniyamenāvatiṣ‍ṭhate, rājapuruṣa iti | vācakānāmāpi copasarjanapadānāṃ viśeṣaṇayogo na dṛśyate, na hi bhavati ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa iti | smṛteś‍ceti yaducyate tadapyayuktam; na hi vyākaraṇe 'rthā ādiśyante | niruktakāro vācakatāṃ manyate, na tu dyotakatām; ato vyabhicāradarśanāt kathamivaitadupapannaṃ bhavati? ucyate— vācakatvādākhyātaprayoge śeṣavivakṣāyāṃ ṣaṣ‍ṭhyapi dṛśyate, na māṣāṇāmaśnīyāditi | cādiprayoge tu ṣaṣ‍ṭhī naiva bhavati | na cākhyātamasattvārthavāci? kiṃ tarhi pūrvāparībhūtasādhyārthavacanam; tadāha— 'pūrvāparībhūtaṃ bhāvamākhyātenācaṣ‍ṭe' | na ca svabhāvasyāsattvarūpatā sama/?/(bhavati kṛdabhihito bhāvo) dravyavat prakāśate | cādayaḥ punaryadatyantamasvatantraṃ, yasya na śakyate padāntarasambandhād ṛte rūpamavagantuṃ, tadevāsattvabhūtamarthamātramavagamayanti | prakṛtipratyayābhyāṃ ca kevalābhyāmapyartho 'bhidhīyate, dadhi madhu iyānadhuneti | cādayastu naiva kevalāstamabhidadhate |
athaivamucyate śabdāntarāṇyevaitāni dadhyādīni prayogasamavāyīni (iti atra brūmaḥ) he prakṛtipratyayāvapi na staḥ | kathamabhidhīyate prakṛtipratyayāvapi kevalau nārthaṃ brūta iti | vartipadānāṃ punaraniyataprayogatvamapi dṛśyate, āhitāg‍niragnyāhita iti | na caivaṃ prakāratāvādināṃ śabdāntarameva vā samāsaḥ | yaduktam— 'vāvacanānarthyaṃ ca svabhāvasiddhatvād' iti | yadi vartipadānāṃ 'upasarjanaṃ pūrvam' (2.2.30) ityādinā prakṛtipratyayayorapi paraś‍ceti(3.1.1,2) vacane gatyupasargāṇāṃ 'te prāgdhātoḥ' (1.4.80) ityanena prayoganiyamaḥ, prayoganiyamānāmapi prayoganiyamo dṛśyate, tasmād vyabhicāra iti | upasarjanānāmapi ca viśeṣaṇayogo dṛśyate, devadattasya gurukulamiti | cādīnāṃ tu naitat kadācidapyasti | vyākaraṇe cārthāḥ kathaṃ nādiśyanta iti, yadāha—'śālīnakaupīne adhṛṣ‍ṭākāryayoḥ' (5.2. 20), 'agāraikadeśe praghaṇaḥ praghāṇaś‍ca' (3.3.79) iti | nirukte 'pyuccāvacasyārthasya kevalānnipātādanupalabdheḥ padāntaro— pādānāttu tadarthābhivyakternipāta xxxx | ato dyotakā eva na vācakāś‍cādaya iti |
(karmapravacanīyānāṃ sambandhasaṅgatiḥ)
atha gatyupasargakarmapravacanīyānāṃ kā vārtā ?
ucyate | gatīnāṃ tāvat sadasadādīnāmādarādivācyanirdeśenaiva gatisaṃjñā— vidhānādanirdiṣṭavācyānāmapyūryādīnāṃ vācakatvameva gamyate | upasargāstu vācakāḥ dyotakāḥ viśeṣakāssahābhidhāyakāḥ kāryārthā nirarthakāś‍ca bhavanti | karmapravacanīyāḥ punarnipātavad dyotakā eva | tadāha—
kriyāviśeṣajanyānāṃ sambandhānāṃ prakāśane |
karmapravacanīyāḥ syurnimittamavadhāritāḥ || 118 ||
katham ? iha khalu sambandhāḥ kriyāpūrvakatvāt karaṇānuvidhāyitayā kriyopadarśitaviśeṣaṃ kārakamāśrayanti | tatra ca bhinnajātīyasya yugapadekayā vibhak‍tyā vaktuṃ śak‍yatvāt śeṣasambandhābhidhānavelāyāmaśabdopādānaḥ kriyākārakasambandhaśśabda— vatā śeṣasaṃbandhenānumīyamānasannidhiravatiṣṭhate | tac‍cānumānaṃ śeṣasambandhasya svarūpasāmarthyānniyatakriyāviṣayamaniyatakriyāviṣayaṃ ca |
niyatakriyāviṣayaṃ yathā— X X X X nā janā (janiḥ) kartaryapekṣitakarmaviśeṣe śeṣalakṣaṇaṃ pitāputrasambandhamutpādayatīti | seva tasmādanumīyate | tathā vṛkṣasya śākhetyādhārādheyanibandhanā sthitirapekṣitakartṛviśeṣe 'dhikaraṇe 'vayavāvayavilakṣaṇaṃ śeṣasambandhaṃ nibadh‍nātīti saiva pratīyate |
aniyatakriyāviṣayaṃ yathā— rājñaḥ puruṣa iti svasvāmibhāvasādhano bharaṇakrayaṇāpajayādiḥ aniyatānekakriyaḥ kartā X X X X śeṣasaṃjñakaṃ svasvāmisambandhaṃ saṃniveśayati | sa cāniyatānekakriyāparvakatvādaparyāp‍taḥ kriyāviśeṣamanumāpayitumiti svanimittakriyāsāmānyamevānumāpayati | evaṃvidhe viṣaye kriyāviśeṣaprakāśanāya karmapravacanīyāḥ prayujyante | yathā śākalyasya saṃhitāmanu prāvarṣaditi saṃhitāpravarṣaṇayorhetu— phalabhāvo niśamayatikriyāpūrvakaḥ X X X X ityetadanunā prakāś‍yate | yaḥ kriyāviśeṣa— prakāśanaṃ vibhakteraśak‍yaṃ kalpayitum, kriyāviśeṣa prakāśanamapi kriyāpadasannidhānāyattam asati kriyāpade na yuktam | sambandho 'pi nāsyābhidheyaḥ, tasya vibhaktipratyayanibandhanatvāt | yadi ca karmapravacanīyastamabhidadhīta, prātipadikārthasya vyatirekopajano na syāt, yathā rajasvāmīti | pratīyate ca loke karmapravacanīyayoge sambandhasya nimittaviśeṣāvacchedaḥ | tasmāt sa tasya prayojaka ityavasīyate | taduktam— (vāpa.2.204)
kriyāyā dyotako nāyaṃ na sambandhasya vācakaḥ |
nāpi kriyāpadākṣepī sambandhasya tu bhedakaḥ || 119 || iti |
nanu ca nāpratītāyāṃ niśamayati—kriyāyāṃ tayā sambandhasyāvacchedaśśak‍yate kartum | tadayamanuḥ kriyāmapratyāyayan sambandhamavacchinattīti na yujyate | athāsya kriyāprakāśanamanyatrādarśanānna kalpyate | sambandhāvacchedo 'pi mā prakalpi, anyatrādarśanādeva |
ucyate— kriyābhedasamadhigatamātmātiśayaṃ sambandhasyāvagamayannarthasāmarthyāt kriyāviśeṣapratyayanimittamanuḥ | ato 'sya kriyāvacanatvamanyataḥ kriyāpratīterna kalpyate |
yadi vā nimittabhedopādheyaviśeṣāparāmarśena rūpabhedaṃ sambandhasyāvagamayanti karmapravacanīyāḥ | yathā adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ, abhimanyuḥ arjunataḥ prati iti svasvāmibhāvassādṛś‍yaṃ ca karmapravacanīyāt pratīyate | viśiṣṭādhikaraṇavyavacchedāstu sambandhāssvarūpātiśayena kriyābhedamadhigamayanti | yathā pañcālānāṃ paripālana— karādānādayaḥ kāryā brahmadattena, abhimanyoḥ adhyavasāyasaṃpraharaṇādayassadṛśā arjunena prakrāntasambandhavaśād abhipreyante | tadayamapyanuḥ saṃhitāpravarṣaṇayossambandhaṃ hetuphalabhāvenāvacchinatti, adhyayanaviśeṣarūpatvāttu saṃhitāyāḥ | tasya ca śabdātiśayaprakāśasāmarthyānniśamanamatrārthagṛhītaṃ na karmapravacanīyādhigamyamiti |
tasya tu (anyattu) darśanam— anuḥ paś‍cādbhāvābhidhāne pratītasāmarthyo yathā anurathaṃ pādātam iti | sa ihāpi tadartha eva bhavitumarhatīti tasya hetau vidhīyamānā karmapravacanīyasaṃjñā na prāp‍noti | sambandhāvacchede 'pyetat tulyam |
atha viṣayavaśāddhetau vṛttiḥ kalpyate, paś‍cādbhāve 'pi avirodhaḥ, yataḥ paurvāparyamiha hetuphalaviṣayam | ayameva tarhi sambandhāvacchedaḥ yadaniyatādhikaraṇaṃ paurvāparyamiha hetuphalaviṣayatayāvacchidyate | etadeva ca sambandhāvacchedahetutvaṃ pṛthakkaraṇanimittaṃ nipātebhyaḥ karmapravacanīyasaṃjñānām |
kathaṃ tarhi 'adhiparī anarthakau' (1.4.13), 'suḥ pūjāyām' (1.4.94), 'atiratikrameṇa ca' (1.4.95), 'apiḥ padārthasambhāvanānvavasargagarhāsamuc‍cayeṣu' (1.4.96) ityamīṣāṃ karmapravacanīyātvam ? kaś‍cidebhissambandho 'vacchidyate |
satyametat | kintu kāryārthameṣāṃ ataddharmāṇāmapi śāstre vācanika— karmapravacanīyatvamabhihitamiti |
(sāmānyavicāraḥ)
nanu ca jātyādipravṛttinimittopagrāhiṇo vṛkṣādayaḥ sattvavacanāḥ, tadviparītāś‍cādayo asattvavacanā ityucyate | na ca jātirnāma pratyakṣādisamadhigamyaṃ kiñcit prameyamasti | tathā hi — asau na pratyakṣā, pratyakṣasya pūrvāparānanusyūtasvalakṣaṇatvāt, jāteś‍ca pūrvāparānusyūtarūpatvāt tadāha—
samānavṛttitā nāma sāmānyasya nijaṃ vapuḥ |
kathaṃ spṛśati sāpekṣamanapekṣākṣajāmiti || 120 ||
tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinastu vikalpā svabhāvenāvastuviṣayatvānna sāmānyasiddha‍yai prabhavanti | nāpyanumānaṃ śabdo vā sāmānyamavasthāpayati | tayorapi vikalpaviṣayatvena vastuvyayavasthāpaka— tvāyogāt | vastuprāp‍tistu bhedānadhyavasāyanimittavastvadhyavasāyād bhaviṣyati |
itaś‍ca na vyaktivyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ kuvalayāmalakabilvādivad bhedenānupalambhād, ghaṭapaṭādivac‍ca deśabhedāgrahaṇād, vyak‍tyagrahe ghaṭapaṭādivadeva tadanupalabdheḥ | vyaktivṛttitvāt sāmānyasya tadagrahe tadanupalabdhiriti cenna, vṛttinupapatteḥ | kiṃ pratipiṇḍaṃ kārts‍nyena vartate jātirutaikadeśena ?
piṇḍe sāmānyamekatra yadi kārts‍nyena vartate |
tatraivāsya padārthatvaṃ na syāt piṇḍāntare grahaḥ || 121 ||
ekadeśena vṛttau tu gotvajātirna kutracit |
samagrā 'stīti gobuddhiḥ pratipiṇḍaṃ kathaṃ bhavet || 122 || (nyāyama.)
na cāsya niravayavatvādekadeśā vidyante | na caikapiṇḍe samāp‍tyā vartamānā piṇḍāntare 'pi samāp‍tyaiva vartitumarhati | samāp‍tasya na punarutpattiṃ vinā samāp‍tyantarānupapatteḥ | na ca tathābhūtā kācid vṛttirupalabhyate | na ca samavāyātmikā vṛttiḥ | sa hyayutasidghānāṃ bhavati | ayutasiddhissambandhaś‍ceti vipratiṣiddham | dravyaguṇayoḥ apṛthak‍siddhayorapi sambandhadarśanānnaivamiti cenna | tatrāpi guṇavyatiriktasya guṇino bhedenāsiddheḥ | avayavāvayavinorapi pṛthak‍siddherabhāvānna sambandhaḥ | nāpi rūparūpilakṣaṇassambandho bhaviṣyatīti vaktavyam, rūpārthasya nirūpayitumaśak‍yatvāt | kimayaṃ rūpaśabdaśśuk‍lādiguṇavacanaḥ svabhāvavacano vā | śuk‍lādivacanatve nīrūpāṇāṃ pavanamanaḥ— prabhṛtīnāṃ dravyāṇāṃ sāmānyaśūnyatā syāt | ākāravacanatve 'pyavayavasanniveśarahitānāṃ teṣāmeva sāmānyavattā na prāp‍noti | svabhāvavacanatve tu jātijātimatoravyatireka eva bhavet |
avabhāti hi bhedena svabhāvo na svabhāvinaḥ |
śabdātiriktataiveyaṃ na tu vastvatiriktatā || 123 ||
api ceyaṃ jātiḥ—
sarvasarvagatāpi (tā vā) syāt piṇḍasarvagatāpi vā |
sarvasarvagatatve 'syāḥ karkādāvapi gomatiḥ || 124 ||
aśvadhīśśābaleyādāvuṣṭrabuddhirgajādiṣu |
padārthasaṅkaraś‍caivamatyantāya prasajyate || 125 ||
athāpi vyaktisāmarthyaniyamānnaiṣa saṅkaraḥ |
na hi karkādipiṇḍānāṃ gotvādivyaktikauśalam || 126 ||
maivaṃ khaṇḍādyabhivyaktamapi gotvamanaṃśakam |
sarvatraiva pratīyeta na vā sarvagataṃ bhavet || 127 ||
tadaṃśagrahaṇe tasya na hi kaś‍cinniyāmakaḥ |
dīpavad vyañjaka; piṇḍo na tu tatpiṇḍavṛtti tat || 128 ||
sarvatrāgṛhyamāṇatve sarvatrāstīti ko vadet |
sarvasarvagataṃ tasmāt na gotvamupapadyate || 129 ||
piṇḍasarvagatatve tu kāmametadadūṣaṇam |
kintu naivādya jātāyāṃ gavi gopratyayo bhavet || 130 ||
piṇḍe nāsīdasañjāte jātirjāte ca vidyate |
saṃkrāmati na cānyasmātpiṇḍādanyatra niṣkriyā || 131 ||
āyāntyapi na tatpiṇḍamapojjhati purātanam |
na cāṃśairvartate ceti keyaṃ vyasanasantatiḥ || 132 ||
tasmādapoharūpamalīkameva sāmānyaṃ, na paramārthasaditi | tataś‍ca tadabhāvāt tad‌vato 'nupapattiriti |
atrocyate—kiṃ jātyāderbāhyasya śabdārthasyābhāvādapohe pakṣapātaḥ, uta pratītibaleneti |
na tāvatpratītibalena, pratīteranugatākāraviṣayatvenāpohaparipanthitvāt | nāpi jāterasattvaṃ, pratyakṣeṇa, svalakṣaṇavadāveditasvarūpatvāt |
ādyameva hi vijñānamarthasaṃsparśi cākṣuṣam |
na taduttarabhāvīti kimidaṃ rājaśāsanam || 133 ||
tadevāstu pramāṇaṃ vā tenāpi tvadhigamyate |
vyāvṛttaṃ vastuno rūpaṃ nānugāmīti kā pramā || 134 ||
bhaved yadi viśeṣaikaviṣayaṃ nirvikalpakam |
sāmānyādhvavasāyo 'yamakasmāt kathamudbhavet || 135 ||
na caitacchābdarūpam | yataḥ
paś‍yatyanugataṃ rūpamavijñāte 'pi vācake |
dākṣiṇātya ivākasmāt paś‍yannuṣṭraparamparām || 136| |
api ca śabaleyapiṇḍamavalokitavataḥ kālāntare bāhuleyapiṇḍaṃ paś‍yataśśābaleya— piṇḍasmaraṇamutpadyate | tatsāmānyābhāve na ghaṭate | na hyanyasmindṛṣṭe 'nyasmaraṇanimittaṃ kiñcidasti | tayoranugatarūpābhyupagame tadupapadyate nānyatheti | kiṃca vyak‍tyantaradarśane 'pi sa evāyaṃ gauriti pratyabhijñāyate, tadap‍yanugatarūpāgrahaṇe na yujyate | na ca vyaktireva pratyabhijñāyate, vyaktibhedasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāt | yatra ca laghutaparimāṇatilamudgādipracayasannidhāne 'vacchinnasvalakṣaṇe grahaṇaṃ nāsti, tatrānuvṛttameva rūpamindriyeṇa gṛhyate | tasmād viśeṣavat sāmānyāpahnavo na yuktaḥ |
tasmāt pūrvākṣasampāte tulyatvamabhigamyate |
nānātvaṃ ceti sāmānyabhedau dvāvapi vāstavau || 137 ||
sāmānyamidamityevamatha tatrānupagrahaḥ |
vyāvṛttamidamityevaṃ kiṃ vā buddhissvalakṣaṇā || 138 ||
samānavṛttisāpekṣaṃ na ca sāmānyavedanam |
tatra sannihitatvāt tu vyaktivannānupagrahaḥ || 139 ||
samānavṛttyapekṣatvāt sāmānyasyānupagrahe |
viśeṣo 'pi ca mā grāhi vyāvṛttiṃ sa hyapekṣate || 140 ||
anuvṛttirhi yeṣvasya kā teṣāṃ grahaṇe gatiḥ |
vyāvṛttirapi yebhyo 'sya kā teṣāṃ grahaṇe gatiḥ || 141 ||
athānuvṛttivyāvṛttinairapekṣyeṇa kevalam |
vastveva gṛhyate kāmaṃ kīdṛk‍taditi kathyatām || 142 ||
nirvikalpakavelāyāṃ nirdeṣṭuṃ tanna śakyate |
tadutthāstūbhayatrāpi sākṣyaṃ dadati niś‍cayāḥ || 143 ||
yac‍ca vṛttivikalpādidūṣaṇaṃ tatra varṇitam |
tat pratyakṣamahim‍naiva sarvaṃ pratihataṃ bhavet || 144 ||
yattāvaduktaṃ kuvalayāmalakādivadanavabhāsāditi tatra pratītibhedo darśita eva | yattu deśabhedenāgrahaṇāt, tadagrahe tad‍buddha‍yabhāvāditi tatra jātestadāśritatvaṃ, nāsattvam | yadapyuktaṃ vṛttyanupapatteriti tatrāpyucyate, pratipiṇḍaṃ kārts‍nyenaiva jātirvartata iti piṇḍāntare tadupalambho 'styeva | ekadeśāstu jāterna santyeva |
k‍vedamanyatra dṛṣṭaṃ cedaho nipuṇatā tava |
dṛṣṭāntaṃ yācase yastvaṃ pratyakṣe 'pyanumānavat || 145 ||
kiṃnāmadheyā vṛttiriyamiti cenna nāmadheyamasyāḥ jānīmaḥ, piṇḍasamavetā jātirityeva pracakṣmahe |
(samavāyavicāraḥ)
nanvayutasiddhayossambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ, sa vipratiṣedhādeva nirastaḥ ? na śakyate nirasitum |
pratītibhedād bhedo 'stu deśabhedastu neṣyate |
tenāvakalpate vṛttissamavāyassa tūcyate || 146 ||
avayavāyavinorguṇaguṇinoś‍ceyameva vṛttiḥ | arthāntaratvaṃ caitayorjātitulyanyāyatayā siddhameva | deśabhedaś‍ca tayornāstīti vispaṣṭamayutasiddhatvam | yadapyucyate—
nāniṣpannasya sambandho niṣpattau yutasiddhatā || 147 ||
iti tadapi parihṛtamācāryaiḥ 'jātaṃ sambaddhaṃ cetyekaḥ kāla' iti vadadbhiḥ |
yā ceha vṛttiḥ srak‌sūtrabhūtakaṇṭhaguṇādiṣu |
jātyādīnāmanaṅgatvāt tābhyāṃ vṛttirvilakṣaṇā || 148 ||
tasmād‍vṛttyanupapatterityadūṣaṇam |
yadapi sarvasarvagatatvaṃ piṇḍasarvagatvaṃ ca vikalpya dūṣitaṃ tadapi yatkiñcit; yathāpratīti tadabhyupagamāt |
sarvasarvagatā jātiriti tāvadupeyate |
sarvatra grahaṇaṃ tasyā vyañjakavyaktisannidheḥ || 149 ||
vyaktirvyañjakatāmeti jāterdṛṣṭaiva nānyathā |
dṛṣṭiryatra yadā tvasyāstadā tatraiva tanmatiḥ || 150 ||
sarvatra vidyate jātirna tu sarvatra dṛśyate |
tadabhivyañjikā yatra vyaktistatraiva dṛśyate || 151 ||
vyakteranyatra sattve 'syāḥ kiṃ pramāṇaṃ taducyate |
ihāpyānīyamānāyāṃ gavi gotvopalambhanam || 152 ||
gopiṇḍena sahaitasyā na cāgamanasambhavaḥ |
dehenevātmanastasmādihāpyastitvamiṣyatām || 153 ||
abhivyaktistu tatkālā yatkālaṃ vyaktidarśanam |
tasmāt sakṛdabhivyaktā nānyadāpi pratīyate || 154 ||
abhivyaktiś‍ca taddeśā yaddeśā vyaktirīkṣyate |
tasmādasminnabhivyaktā na deśe 'nyatra dṛś‍yate || 155 ||
piṇḍasarvagatatve 'pi svayūthyaiḥ kaiś‍cidāśrite |
bhaviṣyatyanyajātāyāṃ gavi godhīstathāgrahāt || 156 ||
jāyamānaiva hi vyaktirjāyate jātiyoginī |
eka eva hi kālo 'syā jātisambandhajanmanoḥ || 157 ||
neha jāteḥ purāstitvaṃ na ca saṃkrāntiranyataḥ |
kiṃ tu svahetossā vyaktistādṛśaivopajāyate || 158 ||
kathametaditīdaṃ tu yena paryanuyujyate |
idamapyaparaṃ hanta tena paryanuyujyatām || 159 ||
vṛṣaḥ piśaṅgo gauḥ kṛṣṇā sā ca nīlatṛṇāśinī |
tābhyāmutpādito vatsaḥ kathaṃ bhavati pāṇḍuraḥ || 160 ||
yathā rūpādisambaddhā sā vyaktirupalabhyate |
tathaiva jātiyukteti kā te vyasanasantatiḥ || 161 ||
agovyāvṛttatāyāṃ ca naiṣa praś‍no nivartate |
tasmādagonivṛttaṃ tadanyajātaṃ svalakṣaṇam || 162 ||
tasmād vastusvabhāvasya viditvā 'nanuyojyatām |
codyacuñcutvamutsṛjya pratipattirnirūpyatām || 163 ||
pratipattiś‍ca viśeṣeṣviva sāmānye 'pi nirapavādā darśitaiva | tasmād viśeṣavadapratyākhyeyaṃ sāmānyam iti |
upādhirevaṃ trividhaḥ pradhānamapi ca tridhā |
tridhopaskāravān prātipadikārthaś‍ca varṇitaḥ || 164 ||
vācakatvaṃ nipātānāṃ dyotakatvaṃ ca niś‍citam |
karmapravacanīyānāmuktā sambandhasaṅgatiḥ || 165 ||
atho vibhaktyarthavidhistridhocyate tridhaiva vṛttyarthapadārthanirṇayaḥ |
kriyādivākyārthanivartanāt tatastridhaiva vākyārthagatiḥ prapañcyate || 166 ||
iti mahārājādhirāja—śrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe upādhyādyarthacatuṣṭayaprakāśo nāma || pañcamaḥ prakāśaḥ || 5 ||
prakāśa eṣo 'stu ratipriyasya śaraḥ paraḥ pañcama eva yasmin |
lag‍ne smārerapi hṛṣyati svaṃ vaśaṃvadaṃ phālagataṃ ca cakṣuḥ ||
sanātanaḥ kaś‍cana bhojarājaṃ jīrṇañca śīrṇañca vibhāvya tasmai |
yaṣṭoyati svaṃ pratibhābhidhānaṃ lalāṭacakṣuḥ pratisaṃśrayāṇaḥ ||
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe ṣaṣṭhaḥ prakāśaḥ
vibhaktyarthādicatuṣṭayaprakāśo nāma
(9. vibhaktyarthaḥ)
vibhaktyarthastridhā 1. saṅkhayā, 2. kārakaṃ, 3. śeṣaś‍ca | teṣu— (1. saṅ‌khyā) kārakasambandhigataikatvadvitvabahutvāni saṅ‌khyā |
sā ṣọdhā— ābhidhānikī, vaivakṣikī, naimittikī, pāribhāṣikī, vaibhāṣikī pāriśeṣikī ca | tāsu—
ābhidhānikī yathā— āpaḥ, dārāḥ, lājāḥ, dvayam, anekaṃ, niyutamiti | atrābhidhānato bahuvacanaikavacane evetyābhidhānikī |
vaivakṣikī yathā— rodasī rodasyau, kabarī kabaryaḥ, stanau stanāḥ, viśākhā viśākhe viśākhāḥ, dṛk dṛśau dṛśaḥ, jagat jagatī jaganti | atra vivakṣayaikatvadvitvabahutvānīti vaivakṣikī |
naimittikī yathā— vṛkṣaḥ, śobhanaḥ, dampatī, pitarau, akṣāḥ, gabhastaya iti | atra vastuno nimittasya sadbhāvānnaimittikī |
pāribhāṣikī yathā— mārdaṅgikapāṇavikaṃ puruṣau (kāśikā 2.4.2), khalatikaṃ vanāni (kāśikā 1.2.51), godau grāmaḥ (kāśikā 1.2.51), tiṣyapunarvasū tārakāḥ (kāśikā 1.2.63), pañcālā janapadaḥ (kāśikā 1.2.52), sa cāhaṃ ca pacāva iti | atra dvitvabahutvādiṣu ekatvādiparibhāṣaṇamiti pāribhāṣikī |
vaibhāṣikī yathā— aśvabaḍabam aśvabaḍabau (kāśikā 2.4.12), lakṣanyagrodhaṃ plakṣanyagrodhāḥ (kāśikā 2.4.12), pūrve phalgunyau pūrvāḥ phalgunya (kāśikā 1.2.60) iti | atra vibhāṣayaikatvadvitvabahutvānīti vaibhāṣikī |
pāriśeṣikī yathā—ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ, ubhau dvitrāḥ, ardhatṛtīyā iti |
atraikādyuktasaṅkhyāpariśeṣe svādaya iti pāriśeṣikī | taduktam—
nimittamekamityatra vibhakta‍yā nābhidhīyate |
tadvatastu yadekatvaṃ vibhaktistatra vartate || 1 || (vāpa. 3.11.27)
(2. kārakam)
kārakaṃ ṣaḍivadhamabhihitaṃ purastāt (pu. 221–245) | tad dvitīyādivācyatvena pṛthakpṛthak ṣaṭprakāraṃ prathate | tatra—
karma dvitīyāvācyaṃ, kaṭaṃ karoti; tṛtīyāvācyaṃ, mātrā sañjānīte; caturthīvācyaṃ, na tvā śune manye; pañcamīvācyaṃ, pari trigartebhyo vṛṣṭo devaḥ; ṣaṣṭhīvācyaṃ, mātuḥ smarati; sap‍tamīvācyam, adhītī vyākaraṇe |
kartā dvitīyāvācyaḥ, gamayati grāmaṃ devadattam; tṛtīyāvācyaḥ, caitreṇa kṛtam; caturthīvācyaḥ, mūtrāya kalpate yavāgūḥ; pañcamīvācyaḥ, upādhyāyādadhīte; ṣaṣṭhīvācyaḥ, vyāsasya kṛtiḥ; sap‍tamīvācyaḥ, brāhmaṇeṣu bhuñjāneṣu vṛṣalā āsate |
karaṇaṃ dvitīyāvācyam, akṣān dīvyati; tṛtīyāvācyaṃ, dātreṇa lunāti; caturthīvācyaṃ, śatāya parikrītaḥ; pañcamīvācyaṃ, stokānmuktaḥ; ṣaṣṭhīvācyaṃ, sarpiṣo jānīte; sap‍tamīvācyam akṣeṣu dīvyati |
sampradānaṃ dvitīyāvācyaṃ, devadattamabhyasūyati; tṛtīyāvācyaṃ, dāsyā samprayacchate; caturthīvācyaṃ, devāya dadāti; pañcamīvācyaṃ, gurorābhya(?) gāḥ prayacchati; ṣaṣṭhīvācyaṃ, gh‍nataḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ dadāti; sap‍tamīvācyaṃ puṣpeṣu spṛhayati |
apādānaṃ dvitīyāvācyaṃ, arjunaṃ yoddhāraḥ, tṛtīyāvācyaṃ, dhanuṣā vidhyati; caturthīvācyaṃ, śrāddhāya nigṛhaṇate; pañcamīvācyaṃ, grāmādāgacchati; ṣaṣṭhīvācyaṃ kṛṣṇā gavāṃ sampannakṣīratamā; sap‍tamīvācyaṃ, bhukta odanaḥ kaṃsapātryām |
adhikaraṇaṃ dvitīyāvācyaṃ, grāmamadhivasati; tṛtīyāvācyaṃ, samena dhāvati; caturthīvācyaṃ, yuddhāya sannahyati; pañcamīvācyaṃ, krośād‌vidhyati; ṣaṣṭhīvācyaṃ, gavāmīśvaraḥ; sap‍tamīvācyaṃ, tīrthaṃ upavasatīti |
(3. śeṣaḥ) kārakātirekī kriyākārakapūrvakaḥ sambandhaviśeṣaḥ śeṣaḥ |
sa tridhā uktādanyaḥ, kārakebhyo 'nyaḥ, kārakāṇāmavivakṣā ca | teṣu— uktādanyatve bhinnasambandhyapekṣaḥ, abhinnasambandhyapekṣaś‍ca | tayorādyo rājñaḥ puruṣa iti yathā— (kusaṃ. 7.19)
patyuśśiraś‍candrakalāmanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam |
sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna || 2 ||
dvitīyo rāhośśira iti yathā—
śikhicchadacchatrapatatramaṇḍalībharoparūddhaṃ mukhameṇacakṣuṣaḥ |
mukhena rāhorabhiyok‍tumudyataṃ kalāvato bimbamiva vyarājata || 3 ||
kārakebhyo 'nyatve upāttakriyo 'nupāttakriyaś‍ca |
tayorādyo 'nnasya hetorvasatīti yathā— (raghu.2.47)
ekātapatraṃ jagataḥ prabhutvaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ kāntamidaṃ vapuś‍ca |
alpasya hetorbahu hātumicchanvicāramūḍhaḥ pratibhāsi me tvam || 4 ||
dvitīyo brāhmaṇasya tulya iti yathā— (raghu. 6.79)
kulena kāntyā vayasā navena guṇaiś‍ca taistairvinayapradhānaiḥ |
tvamātmanastulyamamuṃ vṛṇīṣva rat‍naṃ samāgacchatu kāñcanena || 5 ||
kārakavivakṣāyāṃ dravyāpekṣaḥ kriyāpekṣaś‍ca |
tayorādyaḥ sādhoḥ svaṃ dhanaṃ rocata iti yathā— (māgha.10.23)
dattamāttamadanaṃ dayitena vyāp‍tamātiśayikena rasena |
sasvade mukhasuraṃ pramadānāṃ nāma rūḍhamapi ca vyudapādi || 6 ||
dvitīyo na māṣāṇāmaś‍nīyāditi yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.83)
nivāryatāmāli! kimapyasau vaṭuḥ punarvivakṣuḥ saphuritottarādharaḥ |
na kevalaṃ yo mahato 'pabhāṣate śṛṇoti tasmādapi yassa pāpabhāk || 7 ||
sahārthatādarthyahetulakṣaṇopapadasambodhanādayastu sambandhaviśeṣā upaskārādhikāre '— bhihitā (dra.pṛ.265) iti neha pratanyate | nanu ca sambandhasya kriyākārakapūrvakatvāt kārakeṣveva śeṣasambandhasyāpyantarbhāva iti saṅkhyā śaktiś‍ca vibhak‍tyarthaḥ |
tatra jātau padārthe jātyabhidhāyinaḥ prātipadikasya saṅkhyākārakābhidhāyinyā vibhak‍tyā sambandho na ghaṭate | na hi jāteḥ saṅkhyāśaktiyogassaṃbhavati |
ucyate, jātyavinābhāvena lakṣitāyā vyakteḥ saṅkhyāśaktiyogādekārthasamavāya— lakṣaṇassambandho bhaviṣyati |
naivam; yathānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ bhedavatīṃ vyaktimaśaktāḥ prakṛtayo 'bhidhātumitya— bhinnāmavyabhicāriṇīṃ ca jātimācakṣate, tathādhārabhedād‌bhinnamānantyabhicārābhyāmaśaktā vibhaktayaḥ śaktiṃ saṅkhyāṃ cākhyātum atastadādhāraṃ śaktisaṅkhyājātimācakṣate | tataś‍ca prakṛtyarthasambandhāyā api vyaktervibhaktyarthena śaktisaṅkhyāsāmānyenāsambandhādanupapanna eva prakṛtipratyayayoḥ samabhivyāhāraḥ |
nānupapannaḥ, ekārthasamavetasamavāyena tadupapatteḥ |
kathaṃ punassāmānyābhidhānenābhidhīyamānayossaṅkhyādravyayoḥ paraspareṇa sambandhaḥ? yathābhidhīyamānayoḥ | yathā śabdenābhihitāvarthau buddhau viparivartamānau mithassambadhyete tathā śabdenābhihitādarthāt pratīyamānāvapi paraspareṇa sambandhamanubhaviṣyata iti |
kiṃ punariyaṃ saṅkhyā śaktirvā niyogato jātimavacchinatti ?
netyāha | na hi grahaṃ samārṣṭīti śrūyamāṇamekavacanamekatvasaṅkhyāṃ kriyāṅgabhāvena pratipādayati | nāpi saktūn juhotīti dvitīyā śrutiḥ saktūnāṃ homakriyāyāṃ karmaśaktimabhidhatte | api tvakṣāndīvyatītivat saṃbandhasāmānyatirohitakarmarūpān saktūn sādhakatamatvena homakarmaṇi niyuṅkte | k‍vacittu tadrūpayaiva vibhaktiśrutyā saṃkhyākarmādiśaktīnāṃ kriyāsvaṅgabhāvo 'vabodhyate, yathā paśumālabheta vrīhīnahantīti |
kutaḥ punaridaṃ śrutyupātte api k‍vacideva saṅkhyāśaktī vivakṣyate ?
tatra tāvat saṅkhyāṃ prati śrūyate— 1sattvabhūtam idaṃtaditi vyapadeśayogyaṃ vastu na śakyate saṅkhyāntareṇa śabdairabhidhātum2, sasaṃkhyānāmeva śabdānāṃ sattvābhidhāyakatvāt; ato nāntarīyakamupādānaṃ saṃkhyāyā iti |
sattvanirdeśe saṃkhyā na vivakṣyate, yathā brāhmaṇo na hantavya iti3 | evaṃ ca jātyāpi vinā vastumātrasya saṃpramugdhatvād vivekenābhidhānamaśakyam | ato nāntarīyakaṃ jātyupādānamiti jātāvapyavivakṣā prāp‍noti |
apara4 āha— yatra saṃkhyāpadairekādibhissaṃkhyā abhidhīyate, tatra niyogataḥ karmāṅgabhāvena vivakṣyate, yathā ekāṃ gāṃ dadāti, dvābhyāṃ khanati (taisaṃ. 5.1.41), trīn paśūnālabhata iti | ekādiśabdarūpād‌dhi sā pratīyamānā na śakyamavivakṣitum | anyatra tu śabdasaṃskāramātrāparatvādekavacanāderavivakṣā, yathā gauḥ padā na spraṣ‍ṭavyā (nyāyavā. 2.2.67) | etadapi nāsti 'yasyobhayaṃ havirārtimārched' ityevamādāvubhayādi— śabdopādānādapyavivakṣādarśanāt (nyāyamaṃ.) |
anye manyante 'jātyākhyāyāmekasmin bahuvacanamanyatarasyām' (1.2.53) iti jñāpakādekavacanaṃ, ca na vivakṣyate | vivakṣyate | dvivacanaṃ vivakṣyate, yathā 'sārasvatau bhavataḥ' (taisaṃ. 2.4.6.1) iti |

tadapyayuktaṃ, dvivacanasyāpi avivakṣādarśanāt | yathā— (vāpa jāti 3.1.53)
yadyetau vyādhitau syātāṃ deyaṃ syādidamauṣadham || 8 ||
yatastadauṣadhamekasyāpi dīyamānaṃ vātādivikāraṃ śamayituṃ śak‍noti | evaṃ tarhi yatra parāṅgatayā jātirvidhīyate, tatra saṃkhyā vivakṣyate, yatra tu svasaṃskārapratipattaye 'nūdyate tatra na vivakṣyate | yathā paśunā yajeta, grahaṃ saṃmārṣ‍ṭīti | tadetadubhayamapi udāharaṇamātreṇāśakyaṃ pratipattumiti yuktirabhidhātavyā | seyamucyate—paśunā yajeteti yāgasya phalavattayā prādhānyaṃ, tadaṅgaṃ paśuḥ, aṅgaṃ ca yatpradhānasyopakaroti | ekenaiva paśunā kṛtaḥ pradhānasyopakāra iti dvitīyo nopādīyate | yadi hi yasya yāvantaḥ paśavassanti sa tāvata upādatta ityāśrīyate, prakṛtasya yāgasyaikena paśunā, samāpitatvāditaravaiyarthyaṃ mā bhūditi yāgāntarāṇi kriyante | guṇena dravyeṇa pradhānaṃ yāgaḥ prayuktassyāt | na caiṣa nyāyo yad‍guṇaḥ pradhānaṃ prayuṅkte | kiṃca paśumālabheta, paśunā yajetetyādau kriyāṅgabhāvenāprajñātasya paśossādhanabhāvaprakhyāpanāyedamutpattivākyam | tatra śabdadarśanāvaseyatvādarthasya yathābhūtaṃ śabda āha tathābhūtasso 'rtho 'nugatatayā samāśrīyate | śabde 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ prakṛterjātiriva vibhaktassaṃkhyābhidheyatvenāvadhāryate | yadi ca dvitīyasya paśorūpādānamantareṇa śabdārtho na samāpyeta, kriyā vā na nivartyeta, tadopadīyetāpi dvitīyaḥ | paśutvajāteś‍ca prativyaktyavikalpātmanaḥ samāp‍tatvādekapaśvadānaiś‍ca yāgakriyābhinirvṛtterdvitīyo nopādīyate |
na ca paśunā yajetetyasyāssaṃkhyāyā virodhinī saṃkhyā utpāttivākyagatā kācid‌vidyate yadanurodhādiyaṃ tyajyeta, yasmādidameva paśorūtpattivākyam, ataśśabdavattvāt saṅkhyāntareṇa cāvirodhāt | paśunā yajetetyādau saṅkhyā vivakṣyate, grahaṃ saṃmārṣ‍ṭītyatra tu na vivakṣyate | yasmāt prājāpatyā nava grahā bhavantītyādau grahāṇāmutpattivākye yā anekatvasaṅkhyā sā pradhānaviṣayā, tatra grahāṇāṃ viṃdhīyamānatvāt | grahaṃ saṃmārṣ‍ṭītyatra tu yā ekatvasaṃkhyā sā śeṣaviṣayā, sammārgasyaṃ vidhīyamānatvāt, tadadhikaraṇasaṃpadanārthatvād grahaśabdasya |
na ca yuktaṃ yatpradhānasambandhinī saṃkhyā śeṣasaṃkhyayā bādhyate |
nanu cotpattivākyavaśenāneka eva graho gṛhyeta | grahamityetasmāc‍caika— vacanādekassammṛjyeta | kimatra bādhitaṃ syāt ? evaṃ tarhi vidhānavākye pūrvameva prajñātāṅgabhāvāḥ sammārgamapūrvaṃ vidhātuṃ kevalaṃ grahamityanena smṛtau saṃniveśyante |
grahasmṛtiś‍cānubhavasāmarthyādud‍bhavantī yathānubhūtānevārthān darśayatīti naiko grahassaṃmṛjyate |
nanu ca yathā pūrvānubhūtacamasādyanekapadārthasannidhau saṃmārgavidhānāya grahaśruti— rgrahāṇāmeva smārayati na camasādīnāṃ tathaivānekagrahasaṃnnidhāvekavacanamekasyaiva smārayet | yena hi bahavo 'nubhūtāstenaiko 'pyanubhūta eva |
satyametat, kintu pratīyamāno 'pyasau saṃkhyābhedaḥ kriyāṃ pratyavidhīya— mānatvādasamarthaḥ kriyāmekasminnavasthāpayitum | avidhīyamānaś‍ca saṃkhyābhedaḥ, yato 'traśrutyā grahasya saṃmārgo vidhīyate | tadetāvati paryavasitaṃ vākyam | na cāparaśśabdo 'sti, yenaikasya sa vidhīyeta | na caikaśśabda ubhayaṃ śak‍noti vidhātum aprajñātaṃ saṃmārgaṃ prajñātasya caikatvena saṃbandhamiti, pravṛttibhedāt |
atha grahaikatvābhyāṃ viśiṣ‍ṭassaṃmārgo vidhīyate, na bhidyeta pravṛttiḥ; arthastu naivaṃ, yato grahārthaḥ saṃmārgastasya prayojanavattvāt |
vibhaktiviśeṣaś‍ca prādhānyaṃ grahasya darśayati | ato na vidhīyate saṅkhyā |
iha tarhi kathaṃ citragavīṃ vadh‍natīti citro guṇo vidhīyate, yato 'trāpi gorasvatantrīkārastasyāś‍ca citrāyā iti bhidyate pravṛttiḥ; guṇadravyayogasya śrutyaivābhi— dhīyamānatvāt, tad‍‌viṣayatvāc‍ca kriyāyā nātrāparādha iti ced, grahamityapi śrutireva saṅkhyāyāstadadhikaraṇasya ca dravyasya kriyāṅgabhāvamabhidhatte | tathā śoṇaṃ yojayeditye— kaśabdopādānayorjātiguṇayoraṅgīkaraṇam | evaṃ tarhi svārthāyāṃ pravṛttau saṅkhyābhedasya vidhātumaśakyatvādavivakṣitā saṅkhyā, yathā grahaṃ saṃmārṣ‍ṭīti | atra grahārthatvāt saṃmārgasya pradhānaṃ grahāḥ, tadaṅgaṃ saṃmārgaḥ (pama. 1.2.64) | paśunā yajeta, śoṇaṃ yojayet, citragavīṃ badh‌nātītyādau tu yāgādikarmārthatvāt paśvādīnāmapradhānānāṃ sasaṅkhyānāṃ saguṇānāṃ ca viśiṣ‍ṭānāmeva vidhānamiti vivakṣyate saṅkhyā guṇaś‍ceti | ācāryapravṛttirapyetadeva jñāpayati 'pradhāne saṃkhyā na vivakṣyate, guṇe tu vivakṣyata' (pama. 1.2.64) iti | tathā hi— 'sarūpāṇāmekaśeṣa' iti karmasādhane śeṣaśabde śeṣaśabdābhidheyasya dravyasya sādhutvād vyākhyānenābhidhīyamānasaṃskāratvāt prādhānyam | ataḥ svārthe pravartamānasyāvivakṣita— saṅkhyātvādekaśabdopādānaṃ kṛtamekaśśiṣyata iti | tadeta liṅgaṃ pradhānasyāvivakṣitā saṃkhyeti | evaṃ subantaṃ subantena samasyata iti saṃkhyāyā aṅgīkaraṇād bahūnāṃ samāso na bhavati, yathā mahatkaṣ‍ṭaṃ śrita (mabhā. 2.1.1) iti | atra hyevaṃprakārāvayava—
sanniveśāvacchinnassamudāyassādhurityanvākhyāyate | ato 'vayavaparāmarśopāyena samudāyasya saṃskārādhānaprakrame pradhānaṃ samudāyastamuddiśya pravartamānā avayavā upāttasaṅkhyāviśeṣāṅgī— karaṇena pravartante | yatra tu yat‍nāntaramārabhate tatra bahūnāmapi bhavati, yathā 'kālāḥ parimāṇinā' (2.2.5) iti; bahuvacanād dva‍yahnajātaḥ (pama. 2.2.5) iti | yathā ca bahuvrīhidvandvavidhāvanekagrahaṇānmattabahumātaṅgaṃ vanaṃ, dhavakhadirapalāśā iti | k‍vacit punarguṇe 'pi saṅkhyā na vivakṣyate, yatra tadavivakṣayā pradhānāntarasya siddhirbhavita, yathā 'karturīpsitatamaṃ karma' (1.4.49) iti | atra hīpsitatamasya karmasaṃjñāyāṃ vidhīyamānāyām īpsayā avacchedāyopādīyamānaḥ kartā yadyāśritaikatvasaṃkhyaḥ pratīyeta, anekasyepsitaṃ vastu karmasaṃjñāsaṃbandhādapeyāt | ataḥ pradhānasaṃskāroparodhatiraskārāya kartānapekṣitasaṃkhyā— viśeṣassamāśrīyate |
nanu ca prayojanamidaṃ pradhānāntarasiddhiḥ | tasmādavivakṣāyāmupapattirvaktavyā |
iyamucyate sāmānyanibandhanatvādīpsitatamaśabdasya saṃbandhināmaviśeṣeṇa prasaktau sādhanāntarocchittaye kartṛgrahaṇaṃ kriyate | tadupāttaviparītapratiṣedhamātropakṣayamasamarthaṃ saṃkhyābhedamaṅgīkartumiti |
śaktiḥ punarapradhāne pradhāne vā saṃkhyāvati vibhaktyā vidhīyamānā vivakṣāmevānurūdhyate | evaṃ ca yathā paśvādīnāṃ sasaṃkhyānāṃ tathā grahādīnāmasaṃkhyānāmeva kriyāsu sādhanabhāvo bhavati | kathaṃ punaḥ paśvādigatā saṃkhyā sādhanatvenāvagamyate, yāvatā prātipadikārthasya sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā saṃbandhisādhanatvaṃ saṃkhyā ca vibhaktyā vidhīyate | na tu saṃkhyāsādhanatvayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandho 'sti | evaṃ tarhi prathamataraṃ vyaktissaṃkhyayā saṃbadhyate | saṃkhyā saṃsargaprāp‍tātiśayā tu sādhanabhāvena | so 'yaṃ sādhanabhāvo viśiṣ‍ṭe nipātād viśeṣaṇamapi sādhanamityāvedayati | yathā sāyudhena jitamiti |
kutaḥ punarayaṃ saṃkhyāsādhanatvayorekaśabdopanibandhanayorasa1nibandhakārikālabhedena saṃbandhaḥ ?
na hyetadasti | saṃkhyayā saṃsargamanavāpya na śak‍noti sādhanabhāvamāsādayitumiti | evaṃ tarhi saṃkhyāsādhanabhāvābhyāṃ vyaktissaṃbadhyate | tābhyāmutpāditātmātiśayāmākhyāta— vibhaktistāṃ kriyāsu viniyuṅkte | sā viśiṣ‍ṭā kriyāsaṃbandhamanubhavatīti viśeṣaṇamapi kriyāsaṃbaddhaṃ pratīyate |
1. 'asanibandha; saha nibandhaḥ sanibandhaḥ; sa na bhavatīti asanibandhaḥ' iti rāghavācāryaḥ |
nanu ca karmakaraṇādikārakaṃ vibhak‍tyarthaḥ, tac‍ca kriyāsiddhāvupāttavyāpāra— tvācchaktimad‌dravyameva tasmiṃś‍ca prātipadikenaivokte kiṃ vibhak‍tyocyate ?
(śaktitattvam)
śaktiriti brumaḥ |
dvidhā hi dravyaṃ sattvabhūtamasattvabhūtaṃ ca | tayośśaktisaṅkhyāśrayassattvabhūtaṃ vṛkṣādyarthaḥ | tadanāṃśrayo 'sattvabhūtamavyayādyarthaḥ | tadubhayamapi nirupādhyeva prātipadi— kenocyate | tadāśritāstu saśaktisaṅkhyāsaṃbandhopādhayo vibhak‍tyeti | nanu ca
svarūpādud‌bhavat kāryaṃ sahakāryupabṛṃhitam |
naiva kalpayituṃ śaktaṃ śaktimanyāmatīndriyām || 9 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
śaktirhi kalpyamānā padārthasvarūpavannityā vā syāt kāryā vā ? tatra nityatve nityameva kāryotpādaprasaṅgaḥ | sahakāryapekṣā tu svarūpasyaivāstu kiṃ śak‍tyā ? kāryatve tu padārthasvarūpamātrakāryatāyāṃ sadā śakterutpādāt sadaiva kāryotpādaḥ | sāmagrīkāryaṃ tu kāryamevāstu, kimantarāle śaktyā ? aśaktāt kārakāt kāryāniṣpattiriti cecchaktirapi kāryaṃ, tadutpattau śak‍tyantarakalpanādanavasthā; anyathā 'bhyupagamavyāghātaḥ |
āha, dṛṣṭasiddhaye hyadṛṣṭaṃ kalpyate | śak‍tyantarakalpanāyāḥ śaktiśreṇanirmāṇa eva kṣīṇatvāt kārakāṇāṃ mā bhūt kāryavyāghāta ityekaiva śaktiḥ kal‍pyate, tatkuto 'navasthā ?
naivam, anyathāpi tadupapatteḥ | yadi hyarthavyaktiḥ kriyāsu pratihanyeta tadā tadatiriktaśaktikalpanā yukteti | apratihatāś‍ca sahakārilābhādapi kāryopajanāś‍cārtha— vyaktayaḥ | tatkiṃ vṛthā śaktikalpanayeti |
nanu śaktimantareṇa kārakaṃ kārakameva na bhavet, bhāvatattvasya kriyāsu pratighātāt | rūpameva hi dṛś‍yate na rasādi, darśanāyatanaṃ paś‍yati na rasanādi, rasa eva rasyate na rūpādi, rasanameva rasayati na cakṣurādi, āpa eva pipāsāmapanayanti na tvag‍ni, ag‍nireva śītaṃ śamayati na tvāpa iti | apratighāte hi vastusvarūpāviśeṣāt sarvasmāt‌sarvakāryodayaprasaṅgaḥ | tataś‍cakṣuriva rasanamapi paś‍yet, rūpamiva raso 'pi dṛś‍yeta, rasanamiva cakṣurapi rasayet, rasa iva rūpamapi rasyeta, āpa ivāg‍nirapi pipāsāmapanayet, ag‍nirivāpo 'pi śītaṃ śamayeyuḥ | yathā ca tailārthinā tilā upādīyante tathā sikatā apyupādīyeran | yathā vā pādapaṃ chettumanasā
paraśurudyamyate tathā pādukādyapyudyamyeta | api ca viṣadahanayormāraṇe dāhe ca śaktāvaniṣyamāṇāyāṃ mantrapratibaddhāyāṃ yattayossvakāryaudāsīnyaṃ tatra kā yuktiḥ ?
cakṣuḥ śrotrayorvā darśane śravaṇe ca rogādinā yat svakāryākaraṇaṃ tatra kopapattiḥ ? na hi mantrādinā rogādinā vā tatsvarūpāṇi sahakāriṇo vā pratibadhyante, tadrūpeṇaiva teṣāmupalambhāt | śaktayastu pratibadhyanta iti satsvapi svarūpasahakāriṣu kāryānutpādo yuktaḥ | tasmād yathā sukhādikāryānumitamadṛṣṭaṃ, sātiśayabuddhinibandhana— smṛtipratyayahetussaṃkāraḥ, kriyāviśeṣajanitaḥ kriyāntaraprasavopayogī vega ityādya— paramatīndriyameva kal‍pyate bhavadbhiḥ, tathā śaktirapi kāryātiśayakāraṇamatīndriyā kal‍pyatāmiti |
tadanupapannam; śaktimantareṇāpi kriyāpratighātādīnāmupapatteḥ | svakāraṇaparamparā— yātaniyatasvabhāvatayaiva bhinnasvabhāvā rasādayo rūpādibhyaste kathaṃ rūpādisādhyā— marthakriyāmatathābhūtāssādhayeyuḥ ? niyogataś‍cetadaṅgīkarttavyam; śaktikalpanāyāmapi tulyānuyogitvāt | kathametāśśaktayo niyatādhārā na punaravayavena śaktīrvyāp‍nuvantīti | padārthasvarūpātiśayāditi cetkāryabhedo 'pi tata eva setsyati | api cāśrayasya bhede kathaṃ śaktibhedaḥ ? yato vā śaktayaḥ prāp‍tarūpabhedāstata evāśrayarūpabhedena kāryabhedasiddheḥ kiṃ śaktibhedakalpanena ? yāstarhi tulyarūpā vyaktayaḥ kāryamatulyaṃ sādhayanti tāsu katham ? yathā galvartāś‍candrakāntibhiḥ syandante na sūryagrāvaṇaḥ, karakā arkāṃśubhirvilīyante, na muktāmaṇayaḥ, āntaraṃ tejaḥ paś‍yati na bāhyam, prāṇo vāyuḥ prāṇiti na vyānaḥ, śrotrākāśaśśṛṇoti na vaktrākāśaḥ, vidvān kriyāsvadhikriyate nāvidvāniti tulyajātīyatve 'pi teṣāmadṛṣṭapratiniyamo dravyāntarasaṃparkabhedaś‍ca kāryabhedaṃ vyavasthāpayati | yāstarhyabhinnā bhinnamarthavyaktayaḥ kāryaṃ sādhayanti tāsu katham ? yathā— tadeva tejo dahati prakāśayati śītaṃ cāpanudati, tā evāpaḥ plāvayanti, k‍lamaṃ cāpanayanti, tādṛśaḥ sa tejasaḥ payaso vā rūpātiśayaḥ karmaṇa iva saṃyogāvibhāgavegānukūlatā, dharmasyeva sukhajñānāpavargakāraṇatvamiti | upādānaniyame tu na vayamanyaṃ kaṃcidabhinavaṃ bhāvānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvamutpādayāmaḥ, kiṃtu yathā prāp‍tamanusaranto vyavahārāmaḥ (nyāyamaṃ.) | tatra tailotpādapādapacchedādāvanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vṛddhavyavahārādvā tilaparaśvadhādereva kāraṇatvamavagacchāma iti tadeva tadarthina upādadmahe, na sikatāpādukādīti | na ca tilādeḥ
paraśvādhādervā svarūpe satyapi sadā kāryodayaḥ | svarūpavat sahakārisannidherapyapekṣaṇīyasya sarvadānupapatteḥ | sahakārivarge ca dharmādikamapi nipatati; tadapekṣe ca kāryotpāde kathaṃ sarvasmāt sarvasambhavaḥ ? dharmādīnāṃ tu jagad‌vaicitryādikāryabalena kalpanamaparihāryam | yadyapi viṣadahanayoḥ sannidhāne satyapi mantropayogāt‌tatkāryājananaṃ tadapi na śaktipratibandhanibandhanam | api tu sāmagryantarānupreveśahetukam |
nanu mantreṇānupraviśatā kiṃ kṛtam ?
na kiñcitkṛtam | sāmagryantaraṃ tu sampāditam | kāciddhi sāmagrī kasyacitkāryasya hetuḥ svarūpaṃ tadavasthameveti cedabhakṣitamapi viṣaṃ kathaṃ na hanyāt ? tatrāsyasaṃyogādyapekṣaṇīyamasti | mantrābhāvo 'pyapekṣyatām | divyakāle dharma iva mantro 'pyanupraviṣṭaḥ kāryaṃ pratihanti | śaktipakṣe 'pi vā mantrasya ko vyāpāraḥ ? mantreṇa hi śakternāśo vā kriyate pratibandho vā ? na tāvannāśaḥ, mantrāpagame punaḥ kāryadarśanāt | pratibandhastu svarūpasyaivāstu |
nanu svarūpasya ki jātam ?
śakterapi kiṃ jātam ?
kāryaudāsīnyamiti cettaditaratrāpi samānaṃ svarūpamastyeva, dṛś‍yamānatvāt | śaktirapyasti punaḥ kāryadarśanānumeyatvāt | etena cakṣuḥśrotrayorapi rogādinā darśanaśravaṇaśakternāśapratibandhavikalpo vyākhyātaḥ | api ca vyāpāro 'pi atīndriya— śaktivadiṣyate bhavad‍‌bhiḥ; anyatarakalpanayaiva ca kāryopapatteḥ kimubhayakalpanāgauraveṇa ?
śaktamapyavyāpriyamāṇaṃ na kārakamiti cet śaktamiti kathaṃ jñāyeta ?
kāryadarśanāditi ced vyāpārādeva kāryaṃ setsyati | pādukādervyāpriyamāṇādapi na pādapacchedaṃ paś‍yāmi | pratyakṣastarhi vyāpāro nātīndriyaḥ yataḥ kāryadarśanāt pūrvamapi vyāpriyamāṇatvaṃ jānāsi | kāryānumeyo hi vyāpāraḥ kāryād vinā na jñāyetaiva | kāryaṃ tvanyatarasmādapi ghaṭamānaṃ nobhayaṃ kalpayituṃ prabhavatītyasambhavaḥ | śakteriti cedatrocyate svarūpaṃ svarūpamiti yadabrūṣe tatra kimidaṃ svarūpaṃ nāma ? na tāvad‌dravyaṃ; dravyasya svarūpamiti bhedenābhidhānāt | kiṃ punastat ? sajātīyebhyo vijātīyebhyaś‍ca bhedako dharma iti nastarkaḥ | taṃ hi bhavanto 'pi arthatattvaṃ bhāvatattvamiti bhāvapratyayena bhāṣante | sa ca yasya guṇasya
bhāvād‌dravye śabdaniveśastadabhidhāne tvatalau (5.1.119) iti guṇābhidhāne smaryate | guṇo dharmaḥ sāmarthyamarthakriyākāritvamatiśayaśśaktiriti cauko 'rthaḥ |
sa tu dravyād vibhinno vā dravyasyātmaiva vā tathā |
vyatirekamupāśritya sādhanatvāya kalpate || 10 || (vāpa.3.7.15)
parasparato hi vyāvartamānaśarīrāḥ karaṇādayassādhanabhedāḥ kathamekadravyātmatā— mupayanto na saṅkīryeran ? asaṅkare vā kathamamīṣāmekadravyātmatā yujyate ? tasmādekadravyādhi karaṇā karaṇādipratītirevāsyā dravyād bhedamāpādayati | kiñca
vibhak‍tyarthe 'vyayībhāvavacanādavasīyatām |
anyo dravyād vibhak‍tyarthasso 'vyayenābhidhīyate || 11 || (vāpa. 3.7.165)
tathā hi— vibhak‍tyarthe vartamānamavyayamuttarapadena samasyate | yadi ca vibhak‍tyartha ityanena śak‍tyāśrayassattvabhūtaṃ dravyamucyate, tadasattvavācināvyayena nābhidhīyeta | tasya cārthasya prātipadikenaivoktatvāt tadabhidhāyyavyayamaprayohagārhameva syāt | evaṃ ca adhistri, adhikumārīti na sidhyet | yatra hi padadvayaṃ saṅgatārthaṃ prayujyate sa viṣayassamāsasaṃjñāyāḥ | tasmādanabhihitāmadhikaraṇaśaktimavyayamabhidadhatturapadena samāsamanubhavati | tena cāvadhāryate dravyātiriktāṃ śaktimamabhidhatte vibhaktiriti | bhavato 'pi yuktamevocyate | svarūpādud‌bhavat kāryaṃ tato 'nyāṃ śaktimaśaktaṃ kalpayitumiti | yataḥ śaktivādino 'pi guṇādiśabdavācyāt kārakatvāderdravyasya svarūpānna śaktimanyāṃ manyante | kintu kāryopajanāyārthavyaktayaḥ kṣamā iti na kṣamante; sarvasmādapi kāryodayaprasaṅgāt | svakāraṇaparamparāyātaniyatasvabhāvatāṃ tu na vidmaḥ | kāraṇaguṇotthaḥ padārthātiśaya iti cet saiva śaktiḥ | tasyāstu nityatvānityatvavikalpo nopayuktaḥ; yāvad‌dravyabhāvitve na dravyavadeva nityānityatvāt sarvadā kāryotpādaḥ, kriyākāla eva śakterunmeṣāt | adṛṣṭapratiniyatasahakāryādayastu śak‍tyunmeṣahetavo nāsmābhirapi nirākriyante | yena tūpādānaniyame anvayavyatirekau vṛddhavyavahārādṛte 'pi kāryadarśanāvaseyaśaktimūlāveva; vṛddhairapyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tathaiva kāraṇatvāvagamāt | nāśaḥ śakteḥ pratibandho vā mantrādinetyādivikalpastu svarūpasya śaktitvasiddhau niṣiddha eva bhavati | vyāpārastu dhātuvācya evātīndriyo na vāstavaḥ | tena kāryadarśanānyathānupapattikalpitā śaktiratīndriyopapannataraiveti |
(10. vṛttyarthaḥ)
vṛttyarthāsridhā — 1. apadārthaḥ, 2. ekapadārthaḥ, 3. anekapadārthaś‍ca |
(1. apadārthaḥ)
tatrā 'padārthastridhā— dhātupratyayārthīyaḥ, pratyayapratyayārthīyaḥ, prātipadikapratyayārthīyaś‍ca | teṣu —
dhātupratyayārthīyo dvidhā— kriyārūpaḥ, kārakarūpaś‍ca | tayoḥ—
kriyārūpo yathā kartumicchati cikīrṣati, kurvantaṃ prayuṅkte kārayati, atyarthaṃ punaḥ punaḥ pacati pāpacyate |
kārakarūpo yathā pākaṃ karoti pacati, pākena kriyate pacyate, pācakaḥ paktavyamiti |
pratyayapratyayārthīyo dvidhā— nityo vaivakṣikaś‍ca | tayoḥ—
nityo yathā kṛtrimaṃ, sāṃrāviṇam, vyāpakrośī, bhidā, ābhijityaḥ kauñjāyanya iti |
vaivakṣiko yathā cikīrṣuḥ, kāraṇā, gārgyāyaṇaḥ, kālyāṇineyaḥ, mālāyāḥ, kumāryā iti |
prātipadikapratyayārthīyo dvidhā— vyaktirūpaḥ, śaktirūpaś‍ca | tayo—
vyaktirūpo yathā ajā, kumārī, brahmabandhuḥ, vṛkṣaḥ vṛkṣau vṛkṣā iti |
śaktirūpo yathā vṛkṣaṃ, vṛkṣeṇa, vṛkṣāya, vṛkṣāt, vṛkṣe, vṛkṣasyeti |
(2. ekapadārthaḥ)
ekapadārthastridhā— vasturūpaḥ, avasturūpaḥ, kriyārūpaś‍ca | teṣu—
vasturūpo dvidhā— sattvabhūto 'rthaḥ, asattvabhūto 'rthaś‍ca | tayo—
sattvabhūto 'rtho yathā aupagavaḥ, chāndasaḥ, lākṣikaṃ, yauṣmāka iti |
asattvabhūto 'rtho yathā āstikaḥ, upatyakā, prakaṭaṃ, tatratyam iti |
avasturūpo 'pi pūrvavadeva dvidhā | tayoḥ—
sattvabhūto 'rtho yathā ag‍nivat, pañcavat, pañcakṛtvaḥ, sarvadā, bahuśa iti |
asattvabhūto 'rtho yathā natarāṃ, prāhatarāṃ, pacatitarāṃ, pacatirūpamiti |
kriyārūpo 'pi dvidhā— saṃkṣip‍to, vikṣip‍taś‍ca | tayoḥ—
saṃkṣip‍to yathā ātmanaḥ putramicchati putrīyati, ś‍yena ivācarati ś‍yenāyate,
abhṛśo bhṛśo bhavati bhṛśāyate, senayā abhiyāti abhiṣeṇayatīti |
vikṣip‍to yathā kaṃsavadhamācaṣṭe kaṃsaṃ ghātayati, ārātri vivāsamācaṣṭe rātriṃ vivāsayati, puṣyacandrayogaṃ jānāti puṣyeṇa candraṃ yojayati, ujjayinyāḥ prasthito māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryodgamaṃ prāpnoti māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryamudgamayatīti |
(3. anekapadārthaḥ)
anekapadārthastridhā—ekapadārthāśrayaḥ, ubhayapadārthāśrayaḥ, anyapadārthāśrayaś‍ca | tatra ekapadārthāśrayo dvidhā— pūrvapadārthāśrayaḥ, uttarapadārthāśrayaś‍ca | tayoḥ—
pūrvapadārthāśrayo yathā upakumbhaṃ, puruṣavyāghraḥ, gomatallikā, pūrvakāyaḥ, rājadantaḥ, prāptajīvika iti |
uttarapadārthāśrayo yathā rājapuruṣaḥ, yūpadāruḥ, kaṣṭaśritaḥ, śvalehyaḥ (kāśikā 2.1.33) dva‍yahnajātaḥ aneka iti |
ubhayapadārthāśrayo dvidhā— ekādhikaraṇo bhinnādhikaraṇaś‍ca | tayoḥ
ekādhikaraṇo yathā nīlotpalam, agnistokaḥ (kāśikā 2.1.65), puruṣottamaḥ, sarvaśvetaḥ (kāśikā 2.2.9), sap‍tarṣayaḥ, khañjakubja iti |
bhinnādhikaraṇo yathā dhavakhadirau, aśvabaḍabau, dadhipayasī, dhavakhadirapalāśāḥ, kākolūkaṃ, gavāśvamiti |
anyapadārthāśrayo dvidhā— satad‍guṇo 'tad‍guṇaś‍ca | tayoḥ
satad‍guṇo yathā unmattagaṅgaṃ, śastrīś‍yāmā, sahastrākṣaḥ, śūlapāṇiḥ, dvitrāḥ, ardhatṛtīyā iti |
atad‍guṇo yathā ūḍharathaḥ, citraguḥ, dakṣiṇapūrvā, uṣṭramukhaḥ guḍapriyaḥ, priyaguḍa iti (mabhā. 2.2.35) |
(vṛttiḥ— jahatsvārthā ajahatsvārthā vā)
atha ye vṛttiṃ vartayanti kiṃ ta āhuḥ?
parārthābhidhānaṃ vṛttiriti |
kaḥ punarasyārthaḥ?
kiṃ parārthasyābhidhānamāhosvitparārthamabhidhānamiti ?
ubhayathāpi na doṣaḥ |
yadā tāvadetāvaddarśanamanekamapyarthameka eva śabdaḥ pratyāyayati, tadā vāk‍yāvasthāyāṃ
śabdāntarābhidheyatayā pratītamarthātmānaṃ vṛttiviṣaye tadupasarjanapadamabhidheyabhāvenopādatte | tadetadvibhaktapadāvasthāyāmabhidhānaśaktipratighātādvṛttau parārthasyābhidhānaṃ parārthābhidhāna— mucyate | yadā punareṣa pakṣaḥ ekaśśabdo 'nekamarthaṃ na pratyāyayati tadā puropāttamevārthaṃ vṛttiviṣaye tānyupasarjanapadāni parārthamupādadate | vyaktamevāsmindarśane parārthābhidhānam | tatra dvayī gatiḥ— vihāya vā prasiddhamarthasambandhamupasarjanapadānyarthāntaramupādadīran, avasthita eva vā pracyerthe 'rthāntaramabhidadhīran (vāpa. 94) | dvayamapi hīdamanyatra dṛś‍yate; tadyathā dadhikalaśe dadhyapanīya kṣīraṃ nidhīyate, jalaṃ tu sikatākumbhe sahaivāvatiṣṭhate sikatādibhiḥ | tadāha— teṣāṃ parārthābhidhānaṃ vṛttiriti bruvatāṃ kiṃ jahatsvārthā vṛttirāhosvidajahatsvārtheti ? (mabhā. 2.1.1)
kiñcātaḥ?
yadi jahatsvārthā, rājapuruṣa ānīyatāmityukte puruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ prāpnoti, aupagavamānayeti cāpatyamātrasya |
athājahatsvārthā? ubhayorvidyamānasvārthayordvayordvivacanamiti dvivacanaṃ prāpnoti | tadevamubhayatrāpi doṣadarśanādubhayā pratipattiḥ |
tatraikeṣāṃ darśanam— 'upāttārthaparityāgenārthāntaraniveśīnyupasarjanapadāni'; yato 'rthāntaraparādhīnasya śabdasya prācyamevārthamanuvidhīyamānasyārthāntarābhidhānamaśak‍yam | tasmādarthāntaramabhidadhatā parityājyamanenopāttamarthavastu | tadāha— kā punarvṛttirnyāyyā, jahatsvārtheti | yuktaṃ punaryajjahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt? bāḍhaṃ yuktam | evaṃ hi dṛś‍yate loke— puruṣo 'yaṃ parakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svaṃ karma jahāti | tadyathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svaṃ karma jahāti | evaṃ yuktaṃ yad‍rājā puruṣārthe upaguś‍cāpatyārthe vartamānaḥ svamarthaṃ jahyāt |
nanu ca yathā takṣā kośasamāharaṇasannidhāpanādau rājakarmaṇi vyāpriyamāṇaḥ svavyāpārāparityāgena rājakarmaṇo 'nuṣṭhātumaśak‍yatvāt svaṃ dārucchedacaturaśrīkaraṇādi— vyāpāraṃ jahāti, tathā yadyupasarjanamapyarthāntarapratyāyanādau parārthe vyāpriyamāṇaṃ svārthāparityāgena parārthābhidhānaṃ kartumaśakyamiti pūrvopāttamarthaṃ viśeṣaṇatvādi jahyāt | taduktodāharaṇayoḥ puruṣamātrasyāpatyamātrasya cānayanaṃ prāpnoti |
naiṣa doṣaḥ | yadyapi svārthopasargeṇa arthāntaramupasarjanapadānyabhiniviśante, tathāpyādhāya prādhāne rūpabhedamupagṛhītārthātiśayanibandhanamuttarakālaṃ svārthamujjhati |
atastadāhitarūpabhedānugataḥ puruṣārtho nivṛtte 'pyupasarjanapadārthe viśiṣṭa eva pratīyate | na hyatiśayādhāyinimittasannidhānakālamātrānuvartinastadāhitaviśeṣāḥ, api tu nimitta— vyavāye 'pyanuvartante | tatra yathā śaradarkaraś‍misaṃtāpodbhūtenāntaśśarīratejasā jvarassa— mudīryamāṇo nātapasparśaparivarjanamātreṇa pratikriyate | yathā vā pradīp‍tatejassaṃyogaprati— labdhajanmāno rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāḥ dūrotsārite 'pi tejasi yāvadādhāramavatiṣṭhante, tathopasarjanapadārthopahitaḥ pradhānarūpātiśayaḥ tadarthāstamaye 'pi pradhānasya viśeṣā— vacchedanimittaṃ bhavati | yadi vopasarjanaśrutimarthaviśeṣābhidhānasāmarthyavatīmavadhṛtavataḥ tadavasāyopahitasaṃskāravṛttilābhaprāpitajanmā tadarthaparicchedaḥ parityaktārthāyāmapi śrutau rūpasāmānyādapahṛtabuddheranavagatārthaparityāgasya pravartate | tatastadupahitaviśeṣaṃ pradhānamavaiti |
nanu ca yadi tasyā eva śruteḥ prayogadarśanābhyāsasāmarthyāt tamevārthaṃ pratipadyate, kaḥ svārthaparityāgaḥ?
na hi śrutau tasyāṃ bhastrāyāmivopakaraṇaviśeṣāḥ kṛtasanniveśāḥ padārthāḥ |
kiṃ tarhi? te śabdarūpadarśanānumeyāḥ |
tadihāpi tathaiveti kimavahīyate svārthasya?
naivam; nivṛtte 'pi svārthe 'nvayād arthāḥ pratīyante, tadyathā ghṛtaghaṭastailaghaṭa iti | niṣikte 'pi ghṛte taile vā anvayād ghṛtaṃ tailaṃ vā ghaṭaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati ayaṃ ghṛtaghaṭo 'yaṃ tailaghaṭa iti (mabhā. 2.1.1) |
viṣama upanyāsaḥ; bhavati tatra yā ca yāvatī cārthamātrā | aṅgaṃ hi bhavānagnau niṣṭapya tṛṇakūrcena prakṣālayatu, na gamyate sa viśeṣaḥ; yathā tarhi mallikāpuṭaś‍campakapuṭa iti; niṣkīrṇāsvapi sumanassu tatsamparkopahitagandhaviśeṣādyanuvṛtteḥ pratīyate vyapadeśaḥ ayaṃ mallikāpuṭo 'yaṃ campakapuṭa iti, tathehāpyanvayādupasarjanārthaḥ parityakto 'pi viśeṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
athavā jahadapyasau svārthaṃ rājaśabdo nātyantāya jahāti | kaś‍cideva bhāgaḥ svārthasyāpi hīyate |
katham? virodhādeṣa svārthamavajahāti | tato yāvatāsya pradhānārthopayoga— virodhastāvantamevārthaṃ jahyāt | tadāha — yaḥ parārthavirodhī svārthaḥ taṃ jahāti | na hi pradhānārthopayoginaḥ svārthasya atyāge nidarśanamasti? asti, rājakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ takṣā rājā takṣakarmaiva jahāti, na hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni | na cāyamarthaḥ parārthavirodhi— viśeṣaṇatvaṃ nāma tasmānna hāsyati |
nanu copasarjanapadāni pradhānārthāvacchedavyāpārāveśavanti pradhānopakāriṇaṃ viśeṣaṇabhāvaṃ na jahatītyucyate | ayameva copasarjanapadānāmartho yat pradhānamavāp‍tarūpabhedamavagamayanti | tathā hi rājñaḥ puruṣa iti svāmiviśeṣa— sambandhopahitabhedaḥ puruṣārtho 'vagamyate rājapuruṣa iti | na cāpadārtharūpabhedaṃ pradhāna— syādhātuṃ tadanavahīyamānasvārthamevopasarjanapadamiti kimucyate jahatsvārthā vṛttiriti?
evaṃ manyate — 'padasya svātiśayapatipattau svādhīnatvaṃ, tasya tyāgāt svārthāpahānam | yadi copasarjanapadaṃ na svārthena pradhānasyopakuryāt, svarūpamevāsya hīyeta | yataḥ paropakāritākāraṇamevopasarjanatvaṃ, prayogavaiyarthyaṃ copasarjanasya prasajyate | pradhānasyottarapadenaiva pratītatvāt | na cānarthakāṇāṃ pareṇa sambandho ghaṭate, sāmarthyanibandhanā samāsasaṃjñā ca nopapadyate | tasmānna sakalārthaparityāgaḥ | kiṃ tarhi? viśeṣaṇatayā svapadopadhīyamānarūpātiśayapratipattiyogyatāmātramasyāpahīyate |
nanu ca parityaktāśeṣārthamapi upasarjanapadamarthaviśeṣābhidhāyinassamudāyasya varṇavadaṅgabhāvamāpatsyate (vāpa. 3 vṛ.)?
naivam; evaṃ hi pratīyamānaḥ pradhānārthopayogī padārthaḥ parityakto bhāvī | na ca parityaktasvārthebhya upasarjanapadebhyaḥ pradhānaviśeṣo viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāvacchinnaḥ samudāyo vā pratīyate | na cāpratīyamānaśśabdārtho nyāyyaḥ kalpayitumiti yatkiṃcidetat | yadyapi cāyaṃ samudāyaḥ evāvyapadeś‍yapūrvāparabhāgo bhāgabhedānuyāta ivāvasīyamānaḥ saṃbandhī padārthadvayopahitabhedaṃ hyarthamabhidhatte | tathāpi tadadhigamopāyaḥ pūrvottaravibhāgadarśanam | tatra ca vṛttau samarthādhikāraḥ kriyate | sāmarthyaṃ nāma bhedassaṃsargo vā (mabhā. 2.1.1) |
apara āha — bhedasaṃsargau vā sāmarthyamiti |
kaḥ punaḥ bhedassaṃsargo vā? iha rājña ityukte sarvaṃ svaṃ prasaktam | puruṣa ityukte sarvaḥ svāmī prasaktaḥ | ihedānīṃ rājapuruṣamānayetyukte rājā puruṣaṃ nivartayati anyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ | puruṣo 'pi rājānamanyebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ | evametasminnubhayato 'vacchinne yadi jahāti kāmaṃ jahātu | na jātucit puruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ bhaviṣyati |
nanu ca puruṣa ityukte na strītyetāvatā saṃpratyayena bhavitavyam |
satyamevaitat | yadā tu puruṣa ākāraviśeṣād dravyāntarasambandhād‍vā svātantryeṇa nirjñāta upalabdhaḥ taṃ pratyetaducyate | rājño hi anirjñātārthatvāt parārthāyāṃ pravṛttau sāmānyasaṃsargaviṣayaḥ prātipadikārthavyatireka upajāyate | puruṣastu nirjñātārthāt
svāmiviśeṣasaṃbandhādavasīyamānaḥ pūrvamavyatiriktaprātipadikārthaḥ prathamāntaḥ svāmi— viśeṣasthaṃ sambandhamanubhavati | tasmin pratilabdhavibhaktau ya uttaro vyatireka upajāyate vāk‍yārthaḥ sa bhavati | ihedānīṃ rājā puruṣaṃ nivartayati anyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ | tatra yo 'sau bhedastatsāmarthyaṃ tannimittā ca vṛttiḥ; bhedanimittāyāṃ ca vṛttau satyāṃ vṛttyabhimukhasya bhedamupajanasya svārtho nivartate | yasyāpi na nivartate puruṣasya so 'pi svāminaṃ bhinatti | evametayordvayoranyonyak‍lṛp‍tau satyāmubhayato vyavacchedena nirjñāte puruṣaviṣeśe samudāyārthe cānyasmin prādurbhūte yadi rājārtho nivartate kāmaṃ nivartatām | prāk tu vṛtterakṛtārthasya nivṛttau vṛttireva na syāt | vṛttinimittā ca nivṛttiḥ | tasmādadoṣaḥ |
apara āha — puruṣa eva hi rājapuruṣo brāhmaṇādipuruṣaś‍ca | tatra rājā svāmyantaranivṛttimātraṃ karoti, na tvasau rājārthameva nivarttayati | svāmyantaranivṛttau tu kṛtāyāṃ puruṣa eva rājapuruṣārthamāheti |
athānyanmatam — nāvasthitārthaparityāgena śabdo 'rthāntaram upādatte | na hyapauruṣeyasaṃbandhopahitaniveśamarthātmānaṃ rūpadarśanāvasīyamānaṃ śarīraṃ śabdāḥ parityaktumutsahante | yathā hi te svarūpamasamarthāstyaktuṃ tathārthamapi naiva yogakṣemamapahātuṃ kṣamante | na hi jalamanalasaṃsparśopacīyamānasparśātiśayamapyātmīyaṃ sneha jahāti | nimittaviśeṣasannidhāno papādite punareṣāmarthāntarābhidhānasāmarthye kāmacāraḥ | tasmādabhyuccaya evārthāntarasya vṛttāvupasarjanapadānāṃ pradhānopakārātiśayaḥ | pradhānopakārastu svāmiviśeṣāvacchedaḥ puruṣārthasya | sa cāparityāgenaiva svārthasya kartuṃ śak‍yate | na hyatyantamapākīrṇasvārthaṃ śabdaḥ rūpātiśayamarthāntare niveśāyituṃ śak‍noti | rūpātiśayaniveśanāyāṃ padārthanibandhanatvādanaṅgīkṛtasvārthāni ca yānyupasarjanapadāni pradhānārthaniveśīni tamevārthaṃ śabdāntareṇa pratipādayanti | na tairatiśayaḥ pradhānasya pratipādito bhavati | tataś‍ca rājapuruṣamānayetyukte puruṣamātrasyānayanaṃ prāp‍noti, aupagavamānayeti cāpatyamātrasyeti | tadavadhāryāha — athavā punarastvajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ | yuktaṃ punaḥ yadajahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt? bāḍhaṃ yuktaṃ; evaṃ hi dṛś‍yate loka bhikṣuko 'yaṃ dvitīyāṃ bhikṣāmāsādya pūrvāṃ bhikṣāṃ na jahāti, sañcayāyaiva yatate |
nanu coktamubhayorvidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayordvivacanamiti dvivacanaṃ prāp‍noti |
kasyāḥ punardvivacanaṃ prāp‍noti ?
prathamāyāḥ | na prathamāsamartho rājā | ṣaṣṭhyāstarhi prāp‍noti | na ṣaṣṭhīsamarthaḥ puruṣaḥ |
prathamāyā eva tarhi prāp‍noti |
nanu coktaṃ na prathamāsamartho rājābhihitaḥ, so 'rtho 'ntarbhūtaḥ prātipadi— kārthassaṃpannaḥ | tatra prātipadikārthe prathameti prathamāyā eva dvivacanaṃ prāp‍noti | tatra yathā dhavakhadirāviti padārthāntaropacaye saṅkhyābhedopajanakānekavacanaṃ pravartate tadvadihāpi rājapuruṣaḥ, iti puruṣaśabdād dvivacanaṃ prāp‍noti |
naivam; dhavakhadirāvityavayavārtha samavetassaṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ, tato 'vayavāt parasyā vibhakteḥ kāraṇam | iha tu eka eva puruṣārthaḥ tadekavacanameva puruṣaśabde nyāyyaḥ | na hi rājaśabdenāsambadhyamānā vibhaktistadarthasamavetāṃ saṅkhyāmabhidheyatvena apekṣate | dvandvapadānāṃ tu pratyavayavamanekārthābhidhānasāmarthyādanekavacanaṃ na virudhyate | anuttara— padeṣvapi tarhi tat prāp‍noti?
prāp‍notu | 'supo dhātuprātipadikayoḥ' (2.4.71) iti lopo bhaviṣyati |
athāyamabhiprāyaḥ — samudāyāt parā vibhaktiḥ, atassamudāyārthasamavāyinīṃ saṅkhyāmabhidhatte | samudāyassa cāvayavātmakatvādavayavabhedanibandhanassaṅkhyābhedaḥ nimittamanekavacanasyeti | tadetat k‍va yujyate?
yatra padasamudāyenārthasamudāyaḥ pratyāyyate, yathā dvandvapade | yatra tu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāvacchinnamarthāntaramevābhidheyamavayavaiḥ samudāyenopādīyate, yathā bahuvrīhipade 'lohitavasanaḥ', 'citraveṣṭana' iti, tatrāvayavārthāhitabhedasya padārthasya samudāyenābhidhīyamānatvāt tataḥ parā vibhaktissamudāyārthaniveśinīṃ saṅkhyāmupādatte | tadāha 'saṅghātasyaikārthyānnāvayavasaṅkhyātassubutpattiḥ' (2.1.2. vā. 3) | atra hi samudāyād rājapuruṣa ityetasmād vibhak‍tyotpattavyam | tena samudāyenaivaikārtha— piṇḍo 'vayavārthaśak‍tyanugṛhītaḥ pṛthagavyapadeś‍yo 'vayavaśaktirabhidhīyate | tasmiṃś‍ca saṅghātārthe svāmiviśeṣaparicchinne nivṛttasvāmyantarasaṃbandhe ekatvaṃ samavetaṃ, tena vidyamānāyāmapyavayavasaṅkhyāyāṃ tadāśrayā subutpattirna bhaviṣyati | tadevamajahatsvārthāyāṃ vṛttau tadupasarjanapadaṃ svārthātiśayāvacchinnaṃ pradhānārthamabhidadhāti | tato viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhūtārthadvayābhidhānamupasarjanasya vṛttau bhavati | yattu pradhānārthasambhavaviśeṣaṇaṃ pāṭaliputrakādi, tadasya nivartate, ato vṛttiviṣaye rājārthaḥ tairviśeṣaṇairnāvacchidyate | yadā tu vāk‍yāvasthāyāmupasarjanaṃ padārthaḥ pradhānasaṃsparśavibhaktaḥ kevala eva bhavati, tadā
yuktameva yad‍‌viśeṣaṇabhāvamanubhavati, yathā rājñaḥ pāṭaliputrakasya puruṣa iti; yadi vā—
upāyamātrānnānātvaṃ samūhastveka eva saḥ |
vikalpābhyuccayābhyāṃ tu bhedasaṃsargakalpanā || 12 || (vāpa. 3.14.98)
tatrātyantajahatsvārthāyāṃ vṛttau puruṣaśabde puruṣārthābhidhāyini sarvaśabdeṣu ca pratiniyatārthābhiniveśiṣu bheda eva sāmarthyam | ajahatsvārthāyāṃ tu vṛttau puruṣaśabde puruṣamātrābhidhāyini sarvaśabdeṣu ca pratiniyatārthābhiniveśiṣu saṃsarga eva sāmarthyam | nātyantamajahatsvārthāyāṃ vṛttau puruṣādiṣu sambandhiśabdeṣu sarvaśabdānāṃ cāsamarthayonitvābhyupagame samāptau bhedasaṃsargau sāmarthyamityākhyāyate— (vāpa. 3.14.99)
vṛttiṃ vartayatāmevamabudhapratipattaye |
bhinnāḥ sambodhanopāyāḥ puruṣeṣvanavasthitāḥ || 13 ||
na hi paramārthataḥ parākṛtapūrvottaravibhāgasaṃsparśena saṅghātenātiśayavatyarthe '— bhidhīyamāne bhedasaṃsargadarśanāvakāśaḥ kaś‍cidasti | tasmādasatyena bhedasaṃsargadarśanena satyassamudāyārtho nirūpyata iti ||
(11. padārthanirūpaṇam)
padārthastridhā— 1. jātiḥ, 2. vyaktiḥ, 3. ākṛtiś‍ca | tatra—
(1. jātiḥ)
bhinnaṣvabhinnapratyayanimittaṃ jātiḥ |
sā tridhā dravyajātiḥ, guṇajātiḥ, kriyājātiś‍ca | tāsu—
dravyajātirdvidhā— saṃsthādi(na)vyaṅgyā upadeśavyaṅgyā ca | tayoḥ—
ādyā yathā gauḥ padā na spraṣṭavyā, sampanno vrīhiḥ subhikṣaṃ karotīti |
dvitīyā yathā brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ,kaṭhaḥ pravaktā bhavatīti |
guṇajātiḥ dvidhā— pratyakṣā anumeyā ca | tayoḥ
ādyā yathā śvetaṃ chāgamālabheta, amlo rasaḥ pācano dīpana iti |
dvitīyā yathā dakṣaḥ śriyamadhigacchati, kāmī maṇḍanapriyo bhavatīti |
kriyājātiḥ dvidhā— sāmānyarūpā viśeṣarūpā ca | tayoḥ—
ādyā yathā raipoṣaṃ puṣyati, nāgarakavṛttaṃ varteteti |
dvitīyā yathā aṣṭakā kartavyā, viśvajitā yajeteti |
(2. vyaktiḥ)
jātyādhāro vyaktiḥ |
sā tridhā— dravyavyaktiḥ, guṇavyakti, kriyāvyaktiś‍ca | tāsu— dravyavyaktiḥ dvidhā— śuddhā miśrā ca | tayoḥ —
ādyā yathā gāṃ badhāna, gāṃ dogdhi, tvaṃ pacasi, ahaṃ pacāmīti |
dvitīyā yathā—
magadheṣu stanau pīnau kaliṅgeṣvakṣiṇī śubhe |
bāhū pralambāvaṅgeṣu vaṅgeṣu caraṇau mṛdu || 14 || iti |
guṇavyaktiḥ dvidhā— mukhyā gauṇī ca | tayauḥ—
ādyā yathā śvetaṃ rūpaṃ paś‍yāmi, madhuraṃ rasamāsvādayāmi, sugandhiṃ gandhamājighrāmi, śītaṃ sparśamanubhavāmīti |
dvitīyā yathā— 'tīvraḥ pratāpo madhuraṃ vacaste yaśo 'vadātaṃ surabhiḥ svabhāvaḥ |' iti |
kriyāvyaktiḥ dvidhā— kartrāśritā, karmāśritā ca | tayoḥ—
ādyā yathā āste devadattaḥ, pras‍nute gauḥ svayameveti |
dvitīyā yathā pacyate odanaḥ, lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti |
(3. ākṛtiḥ)
vyaktipratirūpamākṛtiḥ |
sā tridhā— dravyākṛtiḥ, guṇākṛtiḥ, kriyākṛtiś‍ca | tāsu— dravyākṛtiḥ dvidhā— śrutadaśā, dṛṣṭadaśā ca | tayoḥ
ādyā yathā asyāṃ dṛṣadi vāsudevaḥ kriyatām, asyāṃ bhittau kāmadevo likhyatām, atra dhvaje hanūmān badhyatāmiti |
dvitīyā yathā amī piṣṭapiṇḍāḥ siṃhāḥ kriyantām (nyāyavā. 2.2.67), ayaṃ kūpe candramāḥ, ayamākāśe devapatha iti |
guṇākṛtiḥ dvidhā— pratyakṣāśrayā, anumānāśrayā ca | tayo—
ādyā yathā vadhrikā darśanīyo manuṣyaḥ, cañcā ramaṇīyaḥ (mabhā. 1.2.52),
tadetadghuṇākṣaraṃ rūpamiti |
dvitīyā yathā aho mugdhaṃ rūpamālekhyasya, vidagdha ākāraś‍citrasya, saumyā mūrtiḥ pratimāyā iti |
kriyākṛtiḥ dvidhā— kāyakriyādhārā, manaḥkriyādhārā ca | tayoḥ
ādyā yathā ṛjvāga(ya)taṃ tamālekhyam (līnam), sācimukhavartakaḥ parāvartakaṃ sthānamiti |
dvitīyā yathā bhītā dṛṣṭiḥ, trasta ākāraḥ, savikāraṃ rūpamiti |
nanu ca jātireva śabdārtha iti jaiminīyāḥ | jaiminirhi—
jātimevākṛtiṃ prāha vyaktirākṣipyate payā |
sāmānyaṃ tacca piṇḍānāmekabuddhinibandhanam || 15 || (ś‍lovā.)
nanu ca sās‍nādīnāṃ sanniveśa ākṛtiḥ | na cāsau jauminimate 'pi na pṛthagasti | yadāha bhāṣyakāraḥ — atha gaurityatra kaśśabdārthaḥ sās‍nādiviśiṣṭā ākṛtiriti | tataś‍ca saiva śabdārtho bhavati | naivam; evaṃ sati saṃsthānasya prativyaktibhinnatvāt, ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ sambandhasya grahītumaśak‍yatvāt | na ca vidyamānāyāmapyākṛtau gāmānayetyuktaś‍citrapustamayīṃ kaś‍cid gāmānayati nanu jātipakṣe 'pi jātessarvagata— tvamiti mṛdgavakānayanaṃ (nyā.sū. 2.2.63) na bhavati; sās‍nādimataḥ prāṇina eva gotvābhivyañjakatvāt | ato nākṛtirjāteḥ pṛthakchabdārtha iti |
vyaktirapi na śabdārthaḥ, sā hi vyaktimātraṃ vā syād viśiṣṭā vā | na tāvad‍vyaktimātraṃ, aśvādivyaktāvapi gauriti jñānābhidhānayoḥ prasaṅgāt | atha gotvaviśiṣṭā?
tadgotvamavagatamanavagataṃ vā viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati ?
nānavagatamatiprasaṅgāt; avagamastu śabdāt pramāṇāntarato vā; na pramāṇāntarataḥ, tadasannidhānāt | śabdatastu gotvāvagame tadeva prathamataśśabdo 'bhidadhāti, nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhiriti nyāyāt | nanu jātiṃ viśeṣaṇatvena viśeṣyetvena ca vyaktiṃ gośabdo vakṣyati; na śak‍noti vak‍tumatibhārāt tadāha—
viśeṣyaṃ nābhidhā gacchet kṣīṇaśaktirviśeṣaṇe || 16 || (avṛmā.) iti ||
nanu daṇḍyādiśabdādiva viśeṣaṇaṃ jātiṃ viśeṣyāṃ ca vyaktiṃ gośabdādeva pratipatsyāmahe; tatko 'syātibhāraḥ?
viṣama upanyāsaḥ | tatra hi prakṛtipratyayavibhāgena prakṛtyarthaviśiṣṭaḥ pratyayārtho 'vagamyate | gośabdena tu naivamiti | na ca vyaktyavagatau gatiranyā nāsti, yenobhayābhidhānaṃ kalpyate | avinābhāvabalena jātipratītāvapi tatpratītisiddheḥ | yadi ca vyaktiśśabdārtho bhavet, vyak‍tyantare gośabdo na prayujyate | na ca na prayujyate, tasmāt sarvavyaktisādhāraṇī jātirasyārthaḥ, na vyaktiḥ |
nanu ca vyak‍tyantaramapi vyaktireva | so 'yaṃ vyaktau gośabdaḥ prayukto, na sāmānye | naivam | evaṃ sati karkādivyaktāvapi prasaṅgaḥ | yatrāsya prayogo dṛṣṭastatra prayujyata iti cet, adya jātāyāṃ gavi mā prayoji | api ca vyaktau padārthe 'iyamiyaṃ vā gauriti pratītiḥ syāt, na punariyamiyaṃ ceti | na ca ākṛtāviva vyaktāvapyānantya— vyabhicārābhyāṃ sambandhagrahaṇamupapadyata iti |
kathaṃ punarimā jātayaḥ parasparato vyāvartamānaśarīrā bhaveyuḥ? rūpameva hyāsāṃ parasparato vyāvarttate | viṣayarūpānurodhī ca pratyayaḥ svākārabhedena tadavacchinatti | tadanuvidhāyinaś‍ca śabdāstathaiva tadupādadate | evaṃ tarhi nityatvādāsāṃ tadrūpāvasāyassadā prasajyeta |
naivam; asannihitāśrayāṇāmanabhivyakteḥ | yadyevamabhivyañjakavaśādavasāyastā— sāmiti sopavyañjanāśśabdairabhidhīyeran |
tanna | yathā kācādarśodakādiṣu pratīyamānabhedo mukhādirarthaḥ kācādidarśanā 'pekṣo na pratīyate | na ca kācādibhirupadarśitamarthamabhidadhānāḥ śabdāḥ kācādīnupādadate, tathā vyaktibhirupadarśitarūpavibhāgā jātayastābhirasaṃspṛṣṭā eva śabdaiḥ pratyāyyante | kathaṃ punarāśrayāśśabdena asaṃspṛś‍yamānabhedā api jātibhedāvagamāya kalpante, yathā cakṣurādayo 'pratīyamānā api rūpādiviṣayaviśeṣapratipattaye | taduktam—
yathā jalādibhirvyaktaṃ mukhamevābhidhīyate |
tathā dravyairabhivyaktā jātirevābhidhīyate || 17 ||
yathendriyagato bheda indriyagrahaṇādṛte |
indriyārtheṣvadṛś‍yo 'pi jñānabhedāya kalpate || 18 ||
vinātmarūpagrahaṇād‍vyañjikā vyaktayastathā |
sāmānye jñānabhedānāmupayānti nimittatām || 19 || (vāpa.jā.29–31)
vyaktireva śabdārtha iti vyāḍīyāḥ | śabdo hi padaṃ, tacca vibhak‍tyantameva na prātipadikamātram | vibhaktiḥ prātipadikāduccarantī prātipadikārthagatameva svārthamācaṣṭe | yugacca tritayaṃ vibhak‍tyarthaḥ 'liṅgaṃ saṅkhyā kārakaṃ' ca | na caitat tritayaṃ prātipadikārthe jātāvanveti; na hi jāteḥ kārakatvam, amūrtatvāt | na saṅkhyāsambandhitvam, abhedāt | na strītvādisāmānyayogaḥ, nissāmānyatvāt |
nanvātmanīnasāmānye kārakatvaṃ bhaviṣyati |
kakṣyāntaritamityeṣa yukto vaibhaktiko 'nvayaḥ || 20 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
naitatsāram | amūrtasyāpyātmano jñānaprayat‍nādiyoge kārakatvamupapadyate | jātestu na manāgapi vyāpārasaṃsparśa iti (mabhā. 1.2.64, śā.bhā. 1.3.9.30, nyāyamaṃ.) |
nanu ca vyaktilakṣaṇayā sarvamupapatsyate |
naivam; lakṣaṇā hi tatra bhavati yatra sakṛtprayuktaṃ padaṃ kañcanārthamabhidhatte, bhūyaś‍cānupapadyamānamarthāntaraṃ lakṣayati, lakṣite ca śaktisaṅkhyādikaṃ niveśayati | atra tu nānyathānupapattyādi saṃvedyate | na ca vyaktipratītirvyavahiteti kecinmanyante | vyaktimeva ca śaktisaṅkhyānurañjitāṃ kāryayoginīṃ paś‍yāmaḥ | ata eva cālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādayo jātau na vidhīyante | na ca ṣaḍ deyāḥ dvādaśa deyāḥ caturviṃśatirdeyā iti bhedasaṅkhyayā jātiryujyate | api tu vyaktirevainaṃ bhāramudvahati | kiṃca jātau padārthe yadi paśurupākṛtaḥ palāyetānyaṃ tadvarṇaṃ tadvayasamālabheta iti paśoranyatvaṃ na yujyate, jāterabhedāt | api ca—
cayāpacayasaṅghātasvasvāmitvādikalpanāḥ |
yānti jātyabhidheyatvapakṣe sākṣānna saṅgatim || 21 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
etena tulyayogakṣematvādākṛtirapi na śabdārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati; tasyā api prokṣaṇādikriyāsādhanatvāyogāt | na hi sanniveśaḥ prokṣyate ālabhyate viśasyate vā | ye ca saṅkhyāyogādayaḥ cayāpacayādayo vā te jātāvākṛtāvapi na yujyante | kiṃca ākṛtivacanatve gośabdasya śuk‍lādiguṇavācibhiḥ padāntaraismāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na prāp‍noti | na hi śuk‍lādayo guṇāḥ ākṛtivṛttayaḥ, api tu vyaktivṛttaya iti | na caitad vācyaṃ vyaktilakṣaṇādvārakamidaṃ
bhaviṣyatīti | lakṣaṇā hi mukhyābhāve pravartate | na khalu ṛjau vahati vartmanyanṛju— radhvāśrayitavyo bhavati | na cānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ sambandhāgrahaṇamiti vaktavyam | taddhi jātimākṛtiṃ vopalakṣaṇamāśritya bhaviṣyati |
yadyevamupalakṣaṇabhūtāṃ jātimākṛtiṃ vābhidhāya śabdo vyaktimabhidhatte |
naivam; āstāmabhidhīyamānaṃ, vidyamānamapi pratipannamātrameva upalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati | tadyathā—'katarad‍devadattagṛham? yatrāyaṃ kāka iti | atra hi na kākalakṣaṇopalakṣaṇadvāreṇa pravṛtto devadattagṛhaśabdaḥ kākārthamabhidhatte, uparate vā kākasambandhe tad‍vyavacchinna— vastuniveśitāṃ jahāti | evaṃ jātyupalakṣaṇadvāreṇa vyaktau pravartamānaśśabdo jātiṃ ca (nābhidhāsyati, tadva‍yavacchinnagovyaktiviniveśaṃ ca hāsyati | etenākṛtirapi śabdenānabhidhīya— mānaiva vyaktimupa) lakṣayatīti lakṣyate | tadyathā— katarat suvarṇaṃ, ya eṣa rucakaḥ svastiko vardhamānaka iti; na hyatra rucakādyākāradvāreṇa pravṛttassuvarṇaśabdo rucakādyākāramabhidhatte, uparateṣu vā rucakādyākāreṣu tad‍vyavacchinnasvarṇārthaparatāṃ parityajati | taduktam—
adhruveṇa nimittena devadattagṛhaṃ yathā |
gṛhītaṃ gṛhaśabdena śuddhamevābhidhīyate || 22 ||
suvarṇādi yathā yuktaṃ svairākārairapāyibhiḥ |
rucakādyabhidhānānāṃ śuddhamevaiti vācyatām || 23 || (vāpa. 3.2.4.)
tathopalakṣaṇe jātāvākṛtau vā samāśrite |
vyaktayo yānti śabdānāṃ śuddhā evābhidheyatām || 24 ||
etena yaduktaṃ vyak‍tyabhidhānapakṣe sarve śabdāḥ sarvārthā bhaveyuriti tadapi nirastaṃ bhavati | tathā hi— yathā cakṣurādiśabdānāmaśeṣarūpādiprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ nalikādisuṣira— vartmani yuktaṃ darśanasya tadavakāśāvasthitarūpabhedoparuddhatayāviṣayāntareṣu na viprakīryate, tathā jātyākṛtibhyāmavaruddhaviṣayā gavādiśabdānāmabhidhānaśaktirnāśvādiṣvatiprasajyata iti | uktaṃ ca—
ākāraiś‍ca vyavacchedātsārvārthyamavarudhyate |
yathaiva cakṣurādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ nalikādibhiḥ || 25 || (vāpa. 3.2.5)
yaccoktaṃ — yathā jalādibhirādarśairabhivyaktāś‍candrādaya eva candrādiśabdaira— bhidhīyante, yathā cendriyabhedagrahaṇamantareṇāpi rūpādiviṣayajñānabhedo bhavati, tathā vyaktibhirupavyañjitā jātaya eva gavādiśabdairabhidhīyante, vyaktigrahaṇe ca tadupavyañjanā
jātirgrahīṣyati (iti), tadapi na samyak | yadā tāvat pratibimbamudakādiṣu bhāvāntaramevopajāyata ithi darśanam, tadā tadrūpabhedānupātinaḥ śabdāḥ kimiti udakādīnupādadīran yato nodakādayastadānīṃ candrādīnāmupavyañjanam, api tu rūpajanana— kāraṇam; na ca kāryavacanāḥ śabdāḥ kāraṇasaṃsparśamanubhavanti | yadā tu darśanaviplavaḥ sa tādṛśa iti pratipattiḥ, tadā dūrotsāritāvakāśo vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ | yadā tarhi jalādyādarśapratighātāt parāvṛtte cakṣuṣi svavaktravaccandrādayo 'pi dṛś‍yanta iti darśanaṃ tadaitadupapatsyate | tadā hyudakādivat sannihitamupavyañjanaṃ rūpabhedena jātimabhivyaktarūpabhedāṃ darśayati | tadeva ca śabdo 'bhidhatte | etadapyavyabhicaritopavyañjanāyattadarśana(nāḥ) jātayaḥ kathaṃ vinopavyañjanaiḥ pratīyanta iti paryanuyogo nāticaturaśram; candrādīnāmanyathāpi darśanopapatteḥ | evaṃ jātibhedapratipattāvapi | yathā darśanādīndriyāyattodayāḥ nīlādyarthāvasāyāḥ kāraṇabhedamanu parivartante naivaṃ jātiparicchedāḥ vyaktirūpapratibaddhotpādāḥ, yena tad‍bhedamanuvidadhyuḥ | tataś‍ca gotvādayo 'pi parasparato na vyāvarteran | saṃvedyamānabhedaś‍ca padārthaḥ kathamakasmādeka iti śraddhīyate?
vyaktereva padārthatvaṃ tasmādabhyupagamyatām |
tathā ca buddhistatraiva śrutaśabdasya jāyate || 26 ||
yeṣāmartheṣu sāmānyaṃ na sambhavati taiḥ punaḥ |
ucyate kevalā vyaktirākāśādipadairiva || 27 ||
evaṃ ḍitthādiśabdānāṃ saṃjñātvaviditātmanām |
abhidheyasya sāmānyaśūnyatvād‍vyaktivācyatā || 28 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
ye punaḥ kalpitānekabhedavṛttiṃ pracakṣate |
vācyaṃ tatrāpi sāmānyamatīva grahilāstu te || 29 ||
na hi ḍitthatvasāmānyaṃ dṛś‍yate gaganatvavat |
kalpanāyāś‍ca nā(no) bhūmiḥ kācidasti vipaś‍citām || 30 || (nyāyamaṃ.) iti ||
(ākṛtipadārthavādaḥ)
ākṛtireva padārtha iti vindhyavāsimatagandhīyāḥ |
tatrākṛtipadeneha saṃsthānamabhidhīyate |
loke śāstre ca dṛṣṭatvānna jātirjaiminīyavat || 31 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
loke yathā 'yatrākṛtistatra guṇā vasanti' iti | śāstre yathā— 'ākṛtigrahaṇā jātirliṅgānāṃ ca na sarvabhāk ||' (mabhā. 4.1.63) iti ||
ubhayatrāpi cākṛtiśabdenāvayavasanniveśaviśeṣa ucyate (nyāyamaṃ.) | vṛddhāś‍ca vyavaharanti yatrārthe yatpadaṃ prayuñjate ta tasyārtho bhavati | tatra yadeṣa gośabdaḥ sās‍nādimati prayujyate na kesarādimati, tadayamasādhāraṇasanniveśaviṣayatāṃ dyotayati |
pratyakṣaviṣaye ca gaurityādipadaṃ prayujyate | pratyakṣaṃ cākṛtiviṣayam | aśvapiṇḍasanniveśāddhi vilakṣaṇo gopiṇḍasanniveśa indriyeṇa pratīyate | tatkṛtameva ca vastūnāmitaretaravailakṣaṇyam | ataḥ pratyakṣaviṣaye gaurityādipadaṃ pravartamānamākṛtāveva pravartitumutsahate | api ca 'ś‍yenacitaṃ cinvīte'ti na jātiś‍cīyate, na vyaktiḥ, api tu ākṛtireva | pradīpapravāhādīnāṃ ca śabdānāmākṛtirevārtho 'bhyupeyaḥ | na hyeṣāmartheṣu vyavasthitaṃ jātirūpaṃ vyaktirūpaṃ vā samasti | yadi cākṛtiśśabdārtho va bhavet, kathamiva gavādiśabdaiḥ gavādyākārameva jñānaṃ janyeta? api (ca) 'tāneva śāṭakānācchādayāmo ye pāṭaliputre, tāneva śālīnbhuñjmahe ye madhurāyām' (mabhā.1.1.2) iti yo 'yamevaṃprakāro vyavahāraḥ, sa ākṛtāveva padārthe saṅgacchate | yacca vrīhyādermukhyasyābhāve nīvārādibhiḥ pratinidhibhiḥ karma samāpyate tadākṛteḥ aśabdārthatve samāpitamapyaṅgahīnatvādaphalameva prāp‍noti; nīvārādau vrīhyādijātivyak‍tyorabhāvāt | yaś‍cāyamarcādipratikṛtau vāsudevādiśabdaprayogaḥ, so 'pyākṛtāveva padārthe yujyate | kiṃcātyanatamadṛṣṭeṣvapyartheṣu śabdād ākāraviṣayaḥ pratyaya upajāyamāno dṛś‍yate | tadyathā— indraḥ skando vaiśravaṇa iti | taccākṛtereva śabdārthatve upapadyate | sambandhagrahaṇaṃ cāsya jātivadupapatsyate, samastagavīṣvapi gosaṃsthānasyaikarūpatvāt | mukhyagauṇabhāve tu prasiddhiraprasiddhiś‍ca niyāmikā bhaviṣyati | prokṣaṇādikriyā śuk‍lādiguṇayogaś‍ca vyaktidvārā ākṛterupapatsyate | na cāmūrtatvādākṛterakriyāṅgatvaṃ, amūrtānāmapi guṇakarmaṇāṃ kriyāṅgatvāt | aruṇayā krīṇāti, abhikrāmaṃ juhotīti | kiṃca—
yathābhūtendriyotpādyamātmakartṛkamiṣyate |
tathā tallakṣitavyaktisādhyaṃ tatsādhyamucyate || 32 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
tasmādākṛtiḥ padārtha iti |
kathaṃ tarhyācāryāṇāṃ matavirodho jātirvyaktirākṛtiś‍ca padārtha iti? gavādi— śabdaistadvato 'bhidhānāt |
nanu ko 'yaṃ tadvānnām? tadasyāstīti tadvāniti viśeṣa evākāra— sāmānyavānucyate | viśeṣavācyatve cānantyavyabhicārau tadavasthau | sāmānyaṃ ca śabdenānucyamānaṃ nopalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati | ubhayābhidhāne ca śabdāsyātibhāra ityuktam |
ucyate nedaṃtayā nirdiś‍yamānaḥ śābaleyādirviśeṣastadvān | na ca sarvaḥ trailok‍yavartivyakti vrātaḥ tadvān, kintu sāmānyāśrayaḥ kaś‍cidanullikhita— śābaleyādiviśeṣaḥ tad‍vānityucyate | sāmānyāśrayatvācca nānantyavyabhicāra— yostatrāvakāśaḥ | na ca viśeṣaṇamabhidhāya viśeṣyamabhidadhāti śabda ityupagacchāmo, yenainamatibhāreṇa pīḍayema | sāmānyāśrayatvamātre saṅketagrahaṇāt tāvanmātraṃ vadataḥ śabdasya ko 'tibhāraḥ? kiṃca—
pratyakṣaṃ na ca niṣkṛṣṭajātyaṃśapariniṣṭhatam |
tad‍gocarapravṛttaś‍ca śabdastatkathayet katham || 33 ||
yugapannanu saṃvittirviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ |
pratyakṣe 'pi na dṛṣṭaiva na ca yuṣmābhiriṣyate || 34 ||
kāryakāraṇabhāvo hi taddhiyo bhavatāṃ mate |
tasmād viśeṣaṇe jātau pūrvamindriyajā matiḥ || 35 ||
padādapi tadāyattasambandhajñap‍tyapekṣiṇaḥ |
tatraiva buddhirityevaṃ na vyakterapi vācyatā || 36 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
ucyate, pratyakṣe tāvad‍dvayorapi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ indriyaviṣayatāsāmānye saṃyuktasamavāyādindriyaṃ pravartamānaṃ viśeṣaṇavad‍‌viśeṣyamapi viṣayīkaroti | na ca sāmānyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ viśeṣo 'numeya iti vyavahāraḥ | evaṃ hi guṇamātragrāhiṇīndriye guṇino 'numeyatvaṃ syāt | na caivamasti | tasmād viśeṣyaparyantaṃ pratyakṣaṃ, tathā padamapi tattulyaviṣayaṃ na sāmānyamātraniṣṭhamiti yuktam | yatta 'sāmānyāṃśādapoddhatya padaṃ sarvaṃ pravartate || 37 || (nyāyamaṃ.) iti kevalavyak‍tyabhidhāne satyānantyavyabhicārabhayāducyate | tad‍vadabhidhāne tu na tadubhayamastīti na śuddhajātyabhidheyatayā śabdavyāpāraḥ saṅkocanīyaḥ |
nanu sarvātmanā pratyakṣatulyaviṣayaś‍cecchabdaḥ pratipattisāmyaṃ prasajeta ? na ca śabdādindriyācca tulye pratipattī bhavataḥ | taduktam— (vāpa. 2.4.19, nyāyamaṃ.)
anyathaivābhi(g‍ni)saṃbandhād dāhaṃ dagdho hi manyate |
anyathā dāhaśabdena dāhārthassaṃpratīyate || 38 ||
ucyate — parihṛtametat sakalaviśeṣagrahaṇāgrahaṇābhyāṃ pratipattiviśeṣasiddheḥ | naitāvatā sāmānyamātraniṣṭhaḥ śabdo bhavati | api ca niṣkṛṣṭasāmānyāṃśavacanatve gośabdād gotvaśabdācca tapalye pratipattī syātām | gauḥ śuk‍la itivacca gotvaṃ śuk‍lamiti buddhiḥ syāt | cāturvarṇyādivacca svārtha eva gośabdād bhāvapratyayastvatalādiḥ syāt |
atha manyethāḥ ākṣip‍tavyaktikāṃ jātiṃ gośabdo vakti, bhāvapratyayāntastu niṣkṛṣṭāmiti, tadanupapannam; anākṣip‍tavyaktikāyāḥ k‍vacidapi jāteradarśanāt | atha gośabdaśravaṇavelāyāṃ na vyaktisaṃsparśaśūnyā jātiravagamyate | bhāvapratyayānte tu gośabde śrute tacchūnyā śuddhāsau pratīyata iti |
yadyevamāgato 'si madīyaṃ panthānam, āśrayavatī cejjātirucyate jātyāśraya ukta eva bhavati; nānyathā hi sāśrayavatyuktā syāt | tadāśrayaparihāreṇāśrayisāmānya— mātravivakṣāyāṃ tvatalādayaḥ prayujyante | tathā cāhuḥ 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād‍dravye śabda— niveśastadabhidhāne tvatalau' (mabhā. 5.1.119) iti | guṇasya bhāvād‍dravye śabdaniveśa ityasmatpakṣasākṣīṇyakṣarāṇi | sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca tatraivopapadyata ityuktameva | tasmāt
yathā vidhyantaparyanto vāk‍yavyāpāra iṣyate |
tathaiva vyaktiparyantaḥ padavyāpāra iṣyatām || 39 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
anuparatavyāpāra eva śabde tadavagamāt—(nyāyamaṃ.)
yenānvitābhidhānaṃ ca padānāmabhyupeyate |
sutarāṃ tena vaktavyā vyak‍tyantaṃ tāvato matiḥ || 40 ||
na hi vyaktyanapekṣāṇāṃ jātīnāmitaretaram |
anvayo 'nanvitānāṃ ca nābhidhānamiti sthitiḥ || 41 ||
gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau yathā sāmīp‍yalakṣaṇā |
naivaṃ gauś‍śuk‍la ityādau vidyate vyaktilakṣaṇā || 42 ||
prayogapratipattibhyāṃ vṛddhebhyo 'dhyavasīyate |
tasmād gavādiśabdānāṃ tad‍vānartha iti sthitam || 43 ||
sarveṣu ca prayogeṣu gāṃ dogdhītyevamādiṣu |
tadvato 'rthakriyāyogāt tasyaivāhuḥ padārthatām || 44 ||
padaṃ tad‍vantamevārthamāñjasyenābhijalpati |
na ca vyavahitā buddhirna ca bhārasya gauravam || 45 ||
sāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahāraś‍ca mukhyayā |
vṛttyopapadyamānassannanyathā yojayiṣyate || 46 ||
tadidamuktaṃ bhagavatākṣapādena, 'vyaktyākṛtijātayastu padārtha' (nyāyasū. 2.2.65) iti | tuśabdo viśeṣārthaḥ; kiṃ viśeṣyate? guṇapradhānabhāvasyāniyamena śabdārthatvam | ataḥ sthite 'pi tadvato vācyatve k‍vacitprayoge jāteḥ prādhānyaṃ vyakteraṅgabhāvaḥ, yathā gauḥ padā na spraṣṭavyeti sarvagavīṣu pratiṣedho 'vagamyate | kvacid‍vyakteḥ prādhānyaṃ jāteraṅgabhāvaḥ, yathā gāṃ muñca gāṃ badhāneti niyatāṃ kāṃcid‍vyaktimuddiś‍ya prayujyate | k‍vacidākṛteḥ prādhānyaṃ vyakteraṅgabhāvaḥ, jātistu nāstyeva | yathā piṣṭamayyo gāvaḥ kriyantāmiti, tatsanniveśacikīrṣayā prayoga iti | guṇaśabdāstu kecit svajātyavacchinnaṃ guṇamabhidhāya tāvatyeva viramanti | kecittu 'guṇamabhidhāya dravyamapyākṣipanti |' tatsāmānādhikaraṇye prayogadarśanāt | tadyathā—
guṇaikaniyatāstāvad gandharūparasādayaḥ |
gandhatvādivyavacchinnagandhādiguṇavācinaḥ || 47 ||
teṣāṃ na dravyaparyantā vṛttiḥ k‍vacana dṛś‍yate |
na gandhaḥ padmamityasti sāmānādhikaraṇyadhīḥ || 48 ||
guṇaṃ śuk‍lādiśabdāstu kathayantastadāśrayam |
dravyamapyākṣipantyeva śuk‍lo 'śva iti darśanāt || 49 ||
kriyāśabdāstu vividhāḥ kecitkartari karmaṇi |
karaṇe ca prayujyante kecidbhāve 'vadhāvapi || 50 ||
kartrādivacanāstāvannimittīkṛtya kāṃcana |
kriyāṃ tadyogini dravye vartante pācakādayaḥ || 51 ||
yatrāpi tatkriyāyogastadānīṃ nopalabhyate |
tatrāpi yogyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā śabdaṃ santaḥ prayuñjate || 52 ||
anye pūrvāparībhūtasvabhāvaparihārataḥ |
siddharūpatayā prāhuḥ śūbdāḥ pākādayaḥ kriyām || 53 ||
anyatpravṛttau śabdasya nimittamavagamyate |
abhidheyaṃ tataś‍cānyadityayaṃ prathamaḥ kramaḥ || 54 ||
pācakādiśabdāṃnāṃ hi pravṛttinimittaṃ kriyā | abhidheyāstu kartrādayaḥ |
k‍vacit punaryadevāsya syāt pravṛttinibandhanam |
tasyaiva vācyatā bhāvapratyayāntapadeṣviva || 55 ||
itīyaṃ leśatastāvannām‍nāṃ vṛttirudāhṛtā |
ākhyātānāṃ tu vācyo 'rthaḥ purastādupavarṇitaḥ || 56 ||
upasarganipātānāṃ nām‍nāmapyavibhāgataḥ |
prayogapratipattibhyāmaneko 'rtho 'vagamyate || 57 ||
upasargavaśād‍dhāturarthāntaravilāsakṛt |
vihārāhārasaṃhāraprahāraparihāravat || 58 ||
anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tadartho 'bhyavagamyate |
tadāgame tatpratītestadabhāve tadagrahāt || 59 ||
ayamasya padasyārtha iti kiṃ cintitena vā |
yo 'rthaḥ pratīyate yasmāt sa tasyārtha iti sthitiḥ || 60 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
(12. vāk‍yārthaḥ)
vāk‍yārthastridhā — 1. bhāvanā, 2. vidhiḥ, 3. pratibhā ca |
(1. bhāvanā)
tatranyotpādānukūlo bhavantaṃ prayuñjānaḥ puruṣavyāpāraḥ karotyartho bhāvanetyucyate |
anavacchinnaś‍cānuṣṭhātumaśak‍ya iti sānnidhyāt samānapadopāttaṃ dhātvartha— mavacchedakatvenāpekṣate | sa caudanaṃ pacatītyādau samānapadopāttatve 'pyayogyatvena sādhyatvāt pracyutaḥ karaṇāṃśo 'bhiniviśamānaḥ pradhānakriyāmodanaphalikāṃ niṣpādayati | karaṇaṃ ca kevalamasādhakatamatvāt k‍vacidapi kriyāṃ niṣpādayannopalabdham | atastatsādhakatamatvasiddhaye kāṣṭhādītikartavyatānupraveśaḥ, phalānupraveśastu taduddeśenaiva bhāvanāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ | ataḥ phalakaraṇetikarttavyatāvacchedāt kiṃ kena kathamityapekṣiṇī tryaṃśaparipūrṇā bhāvanā bhavati | tatra devadattaḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ sthālyāmodanaṃ pacatītyādau odanaṃ phalaṃ, pākaḥ karaṇaṃ, kāṣṭhādikārakacakramitikartavyatā iti | taduktam —
odane sādhyamāne hi pākaḥ karaṇamiṣyate |
sthālyag‍nicullīkāṣṭhānāmitikartavyatā matā || 61 ||
sa ca prayat‍naparispandātmaudāsīnyapracyutyupalakṣyamāṇaḥ puruṣavyāpāraḥ karotyartho bhāvanā | kathaṃ tarhi kāṣṭhānāṃ karaṇatvam? dhātvarthasya kriyātvāt; bhāvanāyāṃ tu dhātvarthasya karaṇatvāt; karaṇavibhak‍tyupādāne ca pradhānāntareṇa sambandhāyogāt |
ucyate— 'bhāvanāsaṃbandhād‍dhātvartho 'pi pūrvāparībhūto bhāvanātmāvagamyata' iti tadapekṣayā kāṣṭhānāṃ karaṇatvam | ataḥ sthitametat— 'tryaṃśaparipūrṇā bhāvanā vāk‍yārtha' iti |
(2. vidhiḥ)
pravṛttinivṛttyorvidhāyako 'rthavādādibhirupakriyamāṇo liṅloṭtavyādivācyaḥ śabdavyāpāro vidhiḥ |
tena hi bhāvanāyāṃ puruṣaḥ pravartyate nivartyate vā | yathā yāvajjīvamag‍nihotraṃ juhuyāt, brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyāt, praiṣānanubrūhi, māpabhāṣasva hotuḥ, aṣṭakāḥ kartavyāḥ (śābhā. 1.3.1), surā na pātavyā, pitaro vandanīyāḥ, guravo nāvamānyāḥ, śivaṃ te bhūyāt, mā tvā ś‍yena ud‍vadhīditi | sa ca sarvavāk‍yānāmarthaḥ; sarvaṃ hi vāk‍yaṃ vidhi /?/niṣedhayoreva paryavasyati | yatrāpi ca liṅādayo na śrūyante tatrāpi vidhiniṣedhaparatayā sarvavāk‍yānāṃ vāk‍yaśeṣabhūtāste 'vagamyante | tadyathā— 'iha deśe subhikṣamityukte 'traiva sthātavyaṃ, madhyāhno vartata ityukte ihaiva bhoktavyaṃ, sacoraḥ panthā ityukte na gantavyaṃ, grāhāḥ sarityasyāmityukte na s‍nātavyamiti pratīyate | kiṃ ca mahākāvyairapi rāmāyaṇādibhiridameva vyutpādyate— 'rāmasya piturājñāṃ pālayato vananivāsino 'pi tathāvidho 'bhyudayaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ, rāvaṇasya paradārānabhilaṣyatastrailok‍yavijayino 'pi tathāvidha ucchedaḥ; tasmāt piturājñāṃ pālayet, paradārānnābhilaṣyet, rāmavad varteta na rāvaṇavaditi |
nanvākhyātavācyatvena bhāvanaiva vidhirityuktaṃ bhavati | kathaṃ ca tatraiva tasya pravartakatvaṃ, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt? tanna, śabdārthabhedena bhāvanāyā dvaividhyāt | taduktam—
abhidhābhāvanāmāhuranyāmeva liṅādayaḥ |
arthātmabhāvanā tvanyā sarvākhyāteṣu gamyate || 62 || (ta.vā. 2.1.1)
tatra śabdabhāvanā preraṇātmikā śabdasyābhidheyā vidheyā ca | taduktam— 'abhidhatte karoti ca' iti | sā tvarthabhāvanāṃśadvayaviṣayā, na phalāṃśaviṣayā | taduktam—
phalāṃśe bhāvanāyāś‍ca pratyayo na vidhāyakaḥ |
abhidadhyuḥ svaśak‍tyā hi vidhimātraṃ liṅādayaḥ || 63 || (ta.vā.2.1.1)
tasyāś‍ca 'kiṃ kena katham' ityapekṣāyāmarthabhāvanāviṣayā puruṣapravṛttiḥ phalāṃśaḥ, preraṇājñānaṃ karaṇāṃśaḥ, arthavādādaya itikartavyatāṃśa iti tryaṃśaparipūrṇatvam; sā ca phalakaraṇayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvamajñātaṃ gamayantī gamakatvāt pramāṇaṃ bhavati | nanu ca
vidhilakṣaṇametāvadapravṛttapravartanam |
ajñātajñāpanaṃ hyevaṃ sarvo 'pi hi vidhirbhavet || 64 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
tathā hi— (ś‍lokavā. 5.12—13)
sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ sarvākhyāteṣu vidyate |
sarvavāk‍yeṣu cākhyātaṃ tenākāṅkṣānivartanāt || 65 ||
