na ca sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagamamantareṇa pravartakatvaṃ na siddha‍yatīti sādhya— sādhanabhāvāvagatiravaś‍yakalpanīyā | preraṇājñānajanakatvenaivāsya pravartakatvāt | kimityasau niṣphale vyāpāre pravartata iti ced, vidhita eteti brūmaḥ | sa hi saphale niṣphale vā vyāpāre puruṣaṃ pravartayatyeva | yacca puruṣeṣvapravartamāneṣvapi prāmāṇyaṃ tadaparihāryameva | kalpite hi phale vaiṣayikasukhadveṣiṇo vītarāgā na pravartante, pravṛddhatararāgāstu na nivartanta iti (nyāyamaṃ.) |
ucyate 'yajeta svargakāma' ityādau vidhirbhāvanāyāṃ puruṣaṃ pravartayati | bhāvyaniṣṭhasvabhāvako vyāpāro bhāvanā | sā ca sādhyādisvarūparityaktā nirupapattikaiva syāt | sādhyatvaṃ ca samānapadopādānasannidhivaśād dhātvarthasyāhosvidiṣyamāṇatayā kāmipadopāttasya svargādeḥ syāditi saṃśaye yogyatvāt svargasyaiva, na dhātvarthasyeti | taduktam— (ś‍lokavā. 5.14—15)
vidhāvanāśrite sādhyaḥ puruṣārtho na labhyate |
śrutasvargādibādhena dhātvarthaḥ sādhyatāṃ vrajet || 66 ||
vidhau kṛtamatikramya svargādeḥ sādhyateṣyate |
tatsādhanasya dharmatvamevaṃ sati ca gamyate || 67 ||
dharme hyadṛṣ‍ṭaviṣaye codanaiva pramāṇam | codanaiva hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ vā 'rthamavagamayituṃ śaknoti, nānyat kiṃcanendriyamiti (śābhā. 1.1.2) etenāpauruṣeyatvena yathārthapratipādakāp‍tapraṇītatvena vā nirastadoṣāṃśasya bādhakapratyaya— rahitasya vaidikasya laukikasya ca vākyasyautsargikaṃ prāmāṇyamuktaṃ bhavatīti vidhirvākyārtha iti |
(3. pratibhā)
svaṃ svamarthamabhidhāyoparateṣu padeṣu padārthapratipattyanantaramupajāyamānā idaṃ taditi avyapadeśyānupadeśasiddhā hitāhitaprāp‍tiparihārahetuḥ pravṛttyanukūlā buddhiḥ pratibhā |
tathā hi— padanibandhanānāṃ padāvayavanibandhanānāṃ ca arthapratyavabhāsamātrāṇāṃ vicchedena pravṛttau padārthaiḥ krameṇa gṛhyamāṇairāhitasaṃskārāsu buddhiṣu sarvārthapratyavabhāsa— saṃsargānugṛhītā pratyastamitabhedapratyavabhāsā pravṛttiphalaprasavānumeyābhinnajātīyaiva pratibhā pratyātmaṃ vivartate | yathā mandaviṣarasādiṣu bhinnānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ pūrvamadṛṣ‍ṭāṃśasaṃsargāt prāp‍taparipākānāṃ madamaraṇasuvarṇādirarthakriyā dṛśyate, tathā pratipadaṃ bhinnānāṃ śabdānāmuccāraṇeṣvadṛṣ‍ṭā, punaḥ krameṇāvicchinnānāmuccāraṇe tāsu tāsu itikartavyatāsvanukūlā prāṇināṃ pratibhopajāyamānā dṛśyate | ayaṃ ca asyā bhāvanādibhyo viśeṣaḥ | yāvat kimatra mayā kathitaṃ pratipannamartharūpaṃ vā pareṇa kathamanusandhīyata iti na vicāryate, tāvadanākhyeyena upāyena pūrvottarānusandhānameṣāṃ prakalpayati | pratyakṣānumānaviṣaye 'pi yāvat pūrvāparapratyavamarśaḥ śabdollekhavān pratibhayā na kriyate, tāvat pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā svakāryaṃ na prasādhayati | pratibhopagṛhītāni sarvapramāṇāni pramāṇatāṃ labhante |
pratibhālocano hi loka itikartavyatāsu pravartate || 68 ||
nanu ca na pratibhā vākyārthaḥ, yato bālānāṃ stanyapānādiṣu, haṃsānāṃ kṣīranīravivecane, jantvādīnāṃ kulāyādikaraṇe, jātamātrāṇāmeva paśumṛgasarīsṛpā— dīnāmudakasantaraṇe, sup‍tānāṃ ca prabodhādau, kumāryāś‍ca śvo me bhrātā āgamiṣyatīti jñāne svabhāvato vākyaśravaṇamantareṇāpi pratibhopajāyamānā dṛśyate | tathā kālaviśeṣāt puṃskokilānāṃ svaravikāre, abhyāsaviśeṣāt rat‍nādi parīkṣakāṇāṃ taddoṣaguṇajñāne, adṛṣ‍ṭād rakṣaḥpitṛpiśācādīnāṃ parāveśāntardhānādau, yogād yogināṃ parābhiprāyāvagatau, ﻿
bāhyendriyavṛttinirodhād vasiṣ‍ṭhādīnāmatīndriyajñāne, kṛṣṇadvaipāyanādyanudhyānāt sañjayādīnāṃ dūradarśanaśravaṇādau, kāraṇāntarebhyo 'pi prātibhamupalabhyate |
ucyate— yathaiva sākṣāt puruṣopadiṣ‍ṭavākyādarthakriyāsu śabdavyāpāreṇopasaṃhṛtā pratipattṝṇāṃ pratibhā vivartate, tathaiva bālādīnāṃ stanyapānādiṣu pūrvaśabdabhāvanānugamād vākyārthapratipattṛbhiraviśiṣ‍ṭaiva pratibhopajāyate | yeṣāmapi ca aprasiddhaśabdanibandhano vyavahāraḥ, te 'pi hastyaśvādayo 'pi janmāntarīyaśabdabhāvanāvaśāt pratyutpannaśabdapratyayāḥ pratibhāmanugacchantaḥ sarvamārabhante | pūrvaśabdabhāvanānugamācca svabījānāmābhimukhye 'pi prakṛṣ‍ṭaśabdavyāpāre kokilādīnāṃ svaravikārādau pratibhopajāyate | pūrvajanmajanita— śabdaśravaṇasaṃskārod‍bodhakāni tvanyāni kālābhyāsādṛṣ‍ṭayogadhyānānudhyānādīni sādhanāni (vāpa. 2.152)| iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ — 'k‍vacit vākyamuccaritamātrameva tamavyapadeśyamasattvabhūtaṃ pratibhāpadābhidheyaṃ svārthaṃ prakāśayati | k‍vacittu ciravyavahitamapi viśiṣ‍ṭapratibhābījabhāvanāniveśānnamittāntarasānnidhye tadeva vākyaṃ paramparyeṇa pratibhākhyaṃ svārthamāvirbhāvayatīti pratibhā vākyārtha iti ||
(kriyāyāḥ padārthatvaṃ bhāvanāyāś‍cāpadārthatvam)
nanu ca kriyāpi nāma vākyārtho vidyate, so 'pi vaktavyo bhavati |
naivam | padārthaḥ kriyā, na vākyārthaḥ | padārthānāṃ tu mithāḥ saṃsarge yadādhikyamupajāyate sa vākyārthaḥ | tadāha—(mabhā. 2.3.46) 'yadatrādhikyaṃ vākyārthaḥ sa' iti | sa kadācit puruṣavyāpārarūpo bhāvaneti, kadācit śabdavyāpārarūpo vidhiriti, kadācid buddhivyāpārarūpaḥ pratibheti |
nanu ca bhāvanāpi padārtha eva dhātorvā pratyayād vā gamyamānā padārthatvaṃ na vyabhicarati |
athaivamucyate — na padārthamātraṃ bhāvanā, api tu paridṛśyamānapūrvāparībhūta— vidhyādibhāvārthasvarūpātiriktaḥ puruṣavyāpāraḥ, so 'pi 'dhātuvācyatve pratyayavācyatve vā na padārthatvamatikrāmati' (nyāyamaṃ.)|
ucyate— 'yajeta' ityādau prakṛtyarthaḥ kriyārūpo yāgādiḥ, pratyayārthaḥ preraṇārūpo vidhyādiḥ, na caitadatirikto bhāvanākhyaḥ kaś‍cidapi puruṣavyāpāro dṛśyate | na ca bhāvanāvācinīṃ kāñcidapi vibhākti liṅādimiva vidhyādau smarati pāṇiniḥ | maivam— ﻿
āstāṃ vidhipadaṃ tāvad vartamānāpadeśinaḥ |
śabdād yajana ityāderbhāvanā sāvagamyate || 69 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
pacata ityāderhi yathā pākādirdhātvarthaḥ pratīyate tathā kartṛvyāpāraḥ karotyartho 'pi, pākādyuparañjakābhāve 'pi1 tatpratīteranapāyāt | yathā hi aupagavaḥ, kāpaṭavaḥ, aupamanyava iti upaguprabhṛtīnāmāvāpodvāpayorapi 'tasyāpatyam' (4.1.92) iti pratyayārtho 'nuvartate, tathā pacati, paṭhati, gacchatītyādāvapi karotyartho 'nuvartamāno dṛśyate | tathā hi— yadā pacatītyākhyātapadasya padārtho vyācikhyāsito bhavati, tadā pākaṃ karotīti vākyaṃ vyākhyātāraḥ prayuñjate | tatra pākaśabdena dvitīyāntena sādhyaṃ prakṛtyarthaṃ kartṛvyāpāraṃ2 tu karotīti padena vyācakṣate | api ca, kiṃ karoti devadatta iti pṛṣ‍ṭāssanto dvaye vaktāro bhavantipacatī'ti, pākamiti | tadidamubhayarūpamapyuttaramekārtham, anyathā na tena praṣ‍ṭā pratyāyyeta | tasmāt pākaṃ karotīti padadvayasya yo 'rthassa eva pacatītyekapadasyeti |
āha— na pratyayāt kartṛsaḍkhyāvyatirekeṇa dhātvarthātirikto vyāpāraḥ pratīyate, pratīyate cet karotītyatrāpi pratīyeta | taduktam—
yathā pākaṃ karotīti vyavahāro vibhāgataḥ |
tathā kāraṃ karotīti pratītirnāsti laukikī || 70 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
tasyāḥ kiṃ bījamiti cet kṛbhvastīnāṃ kriyāsāmānyavacanatvam | na ca sāmānye sāmānyāni bhavanti, yathā hi yajeta dadyājjuhuyāditi karotisāmānyamavagamyate naivamasti bhavatikarotīti |
nanu ca kathaṃ karotyarthaḥ karotiśabdānnāvagamyate?
na nāvagamyate; kiṃtu yāgādiviśeṣānavacchinno nānuṣ‍ṭhānayogyo bhavati |
evaṃ tarhi mā bhūt pratyayārtho bhāvanā | prakṛtyartho bhaviṣyati | yathā hi śābaleyādīnāmanugataṃ gorūpamavabhāsate vyāvṛttaṃ ca śābaleyādirūpam, evaṃ yāgādikarmaṇāmanugataṃ vyāpārarūpamavabhāsate | parasparavibhaktaṃ ca yāgādirūpam | tatra yadanugataṃ karotisāmānyaṃ sā bhāvanā, yad vyāvṛttaṃ yāgādikaṃ sa dhātvarthaḥ | yathā ca śābaleyādeḥ pṛthagdarśayituṃ gotvamaśakyamevaṃ bhāvanāpi yāgādeḥ pṛthagdarśayituṃ na śakyate |
1. rañjakābhāve = rañjakādyupajanābhāve rāghavaḥ | 2. kartṛvyāpāro pratyayārthaṃ iti rāghavaḥ | ﻿
taduparaktatvena sarvadopalambhāt | na caitāvatāsau nāsti, nāstitāyāṃ hi tasyāḥ kiṃ karotīti anavagataviśeṣya(ṣa)vyāpārapraś‍ne pacati paṭhatītyuttaramanuttarameva bhavati | kiṃca—
audāsīnyadaśāyāṃ tu pumān yena pravartate |
sa yat‍no yāgahomādau bhāvanetyabhidhīyate || 71 ||
sā ca sāmānyarūpāpi na gotvādivat kriyātvavad vā siddhatayāvabhāsate, yena vidheyā na bhavati | yadyevam—
kriyāviśeṣa evāsau vyāpāro vyāpāro jñāturāntaraḥ |
spandātmakabahirbhūtakriyākṣaṇavilakṣaṇaḥ || 72 || (nyāyamaṃ)
kriyāyāś‍ca padārthatvamiṣyata eva | nanu ca padārthatve 'pi kriyāyā vākyārthatvameva nyāyyam |
yataḥ padārthā vākyārthabhāvamāyānti saṃhatāḥ |
apekṣānuguṇānyonyavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣitāḥ || 73 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
vyatiṣaṅgaś‍ca pradhānaguṇabhāve bhavati |
sādhyaṃ ca sādhyamānatvāt pradhānamavagamyate |
kriyāto nāparaṃ tacca vākyārtho 'taḥ kriyeṣyatām || 74 ||
yajeta dadyājjuhuyādadhīyīteti coditaḥ |
kriyāṃ sādhyatayā vetti tāṃ ca loko 'nutiṣ‍ṭhati || 75 ||(nyāyamaṃ.)
yaccādhikāripadaṃ svargakāma ityādi tadapi bhāvanāpekṣitakartṛsamarpakatvena saṅgacchate | asyāṃ kriyāyāmayaṃ kartā, anenaiṣā kriyā saṃpādyeti | na cātra kriyā prādhānyamujjhati | na hi kriyā kartrarthā (nyāyama), kartā tu kriyārthaḥ, sa hi tāṃ nirvartayannupalabhyeta | śabdo 'pi tathaivopadiśati eṣa idaṃ kuryāditi | kimarthaṃ punarasau kriyāmanutiṣ‍ṭhatīti cet śabdādeveti brūmaḥ |
bud‍dhvedameva bhagavān dadarśa khalu bādariḥ |
na dravyaguṇasaṃskāravyatirikto 'sti śeṣatā || 76 || (bhā.vi.)
vedād guruniyogādvā śāsanādvā mahībhujaḥ |
na sacetāḥ kriyāṃ kāṃcidanutiṣ‍ṭhati niṣphalām || 77 || (nyāyamaṃ.) ﻿
athocyate 'śabdapramāṇakā vayaṃ yacchabda āha tadasmākaṃ pramāṇam (mabhā.paspa.)| tarhi svargakāmapadamapi śabda eva, tasyāpyatrānvayo vaktavyaḥ (nyāyamaṃ.)|
nanu ca kartṛpadamekaṃ kartā ca kriyārtha iti |
naivam | na kartṛpadaṃ svargakāma iti, api tvadhikāripadam | svarge kāmo 'sya svargaṃ vā kāmayate, svargakāmanāviśiṣ‍ṭaḥ puruṣo 'smātpadādavagamyate | tadatra kāmyamānaḥ svargaḥ kathaṃ yogakriyayā sambadhyate ? svargasya niratiśayaprītirūpatvāt, na prītiradravyatvāt kriyāṅgabhāvaṃ bhajate | na ca prīteḥ kriyārthatvamupapadyate | prītyarthamanyad, nānyārthā prītiriti | evaṃ ca kriyāsādhanānupadeśāt na kartṛsamarpakatvena svargakāmapadasamanvayaḥ, api tvadhikārisamarpakatvena |
atha ko 'yamadhikārī nāma?
karmaṇaḥ svāmī | nanu ca kartaiva karmaṇaḥ svāmī |
naivam, svāmī san kartā, na kartā san svāmī |
nanu kriyākārakasaṃbandhavyatirekeṇa ko 'nyaḥ karmaṇaḥ puruṣasya ca sambandhaḥ?
ucyate— mamedaṃ kṛtyam ahamatra svāmīti svasvāmibhāvamaśakyam (avagatya) pāś‍cāttyakriyākārakasambandho gamyate |
pāś‍cāttya ityatra kiṃ pramāṇamiti cet anupādeyaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣ‍ṭasya puṃso nirdeśastasmādadhikṛtasya kartṛtvaṃ, karturadhikāra iti | itthaṃ ca svargakāmasyādhikāro nirvahati | yadi tatkarma svargakāmaṃ syāt svargo 'pi bhogyo bhavet | kathamahaṃ svargaṃ prāpnuyāmityevaṃ sādhyatvena svargamicchan svargakāma ucyate | yadi ca na svargasādhanaṃ karma syāt tadviruddhamidamāpatati svargaṃ kāmayate yāgaṃ karoti, anyadicchatyanyatkarotīti | ataḥ karmaṇi kāmyamāne sādhanatām (a)pratipadyamānaḥ svargakāmastatra naivādhikriyate | na cānadhikriyamāṇastatra sambadhyate | tadevamadhikṛtatvena svargakāmasya karmaṇi sambandhāt svargayāgayoś‍ca sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagamamantareṇādhikāsyānirvāhād avaśyaṃ kriyāyāṃ sādhanatvaṃ svargasya ca sādhyatavamabhyupagantavyam | ataś‍ca kriyāyāḥ phalaṃ prati guṇabhāvādaprādhānyam, aprādhānyācca na vākyārthatvam | taduktam "karmāṇyapi hi jaiminiḥ phalārthatvād" iti | kā ceyaṃ kriyā? vākyārtha ityucyate ya eṣa yāgādirbhāvārtho dhātuvācyaḥ, uta pratyayārthaḥ, kaś‍cidatirikta iti | tatra bhāvārthasya kāmyamānasādhanatvādaprādhānyamuktameva | pratyayārthastu kāmyamānabhāvārthagatasādhyasādhana— ﻿
sambandhāparityāgenaiva vāk‍yārthatāṃ pratipadyate | tasmānna kriyāmātraparyavasāyī vāk‍yārtha iti |
kimidānīṃ phalasyaiva vāk‍yārthatvaṃ pracakṣmahe |
taddhi pradhānaṃ sādhyaṃ ca tadartho hyakhilaḥ śramaḥ || 78 ||
naivam; yathā kriyāyāḥ phalārthatvādaprādhānyam evaṃ phalasyāpi puruṣārthatvāt | na hi svargaḥ svatantra eva sattāṃ labhatāmiti puruṣo yatate, api tu svopabhogyatayainamabhilaṣati | tadāha — "phalaṃ ca puruṣārthatvāt" (mīsū. 3.1.5)|
tarhi puruṣa eva vāk‍yārtho bhavatu |
naivam; 'yajamānena saṃmitaudumbarī bhavati' iti tasyāpi kriyāṅgatvāt | tadāha 'puruṣaś‍ca karmārthatvāt' iti (mīsū. 3.1.6)| hantaivaṃ kriyā phalārthā, phalaṃ puruṣārthaṃ, puruṣaḥ kriyārtha' iti cakrake patitāḥ kasya prādhānyaṃ śiṣmaḥ?
ucyate— puruṣastāvanna vāk‍yārthaḥ, padārthānāṃ mithaḥ saṃsarge 'pi avyayakāraka— viśeṣaṇārthopagṛhītasyākhyātārthasyaiva prādhānyena vāk‍yārthatvāt |
nanu cākhyāte 'pi yajetetyevamādau kartaryeva lakāraḥ?
maivam; ko 'yaṃ lakāro nāma?
siddhaṃ hi sādhyāyopādīyata' iti pratyayārtho 'pi kartā prakṛtyarthe kriyāyāmeva nyagbhavati | phalamapi na vāk‍yārthaḥ siddhāsiddhavikalpānupapatteḥ | siddhasya tāvat phalasyābhidhānameva nāsti, kāmyamānatvena nirdeśāt |
sādhyamānatvapakṣe tu sākṣāt tatsiddhayavedanāt |
vyāpāra eva tanniṣṭho vāk‍yārtha iti yujyate || 79 ||
ata eva hi vāk‍yārthaṃ bhāvanāṃ pratijānate |
yathocitaphalā maṃśatrayasambandhabandhurām || 80 || (ś‍lokavā.)
bhāvyaniṣṭho hi bhāvakavyāpāro bhāvaneti |
saiṣa dvādaśabhedo 'rthaḥ kriyādiḥ prāk‍prakīrtitaḥ |
vācyo viśeṣyaḥ śabdasya pratyāyyo hyabhyupeyate || 81 ||
na caitad‌vācyaṃ— 'vāk‍yasyaiva pratyāyakatvaṃ na padānāṃ, yato yathā guḍaśabdo guḍadravyamabhidhatte tathā pratyāyayatyapi tadavinābhāvi mādhuryam | yadi vā padānyeva saṃhatyārthamabhidadhati vāk‍yam (śābhā. 3.3.14), ākhyātaśabdo vāk‍yam, padasaṅghāto ﻿
vāk‍yamityapi darśanāni vidyante | kriyādayaś‍ca padārtha evāntarbhavanti | tathā hi— dhātvarthaḥ kriyā, tāṃ kālo viśinaṣṭi, pratyayārthaḥ kārakam, tat puruṣo viśeṣayati | tasyobhayasyāpyupādhayo 'vacchedakā bhavanti | sambhūya prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ brūtaḥ | yaṃ taṃ pradhānamāmananti sa bhedābhedābhyāmupaskārārthaviśiṣṭaprātipadikārthavyapadeśaṃ labhate | tasya śaktisaṅkhyābhivyaktaye vibhaktiḥ, tadantaṃ padaṃ, padānāmapadānāṃ ca sāmarthye vṛttiḥ, vṛttānāmapi ca kṛttaddhitasamāsānāṃ punaḥ prātipadikasaṃjñāyāṃ subutpatteḥ padasaṃjñeti |
vāk‍yaṃ punarakhaṇḍavāk‍yārthapakṣe vācakamapi bhavati | tatra śabdasyārthā— bhidhānasāmarthyaṃ vācakatā | sā tridhā—mukhyā, gauṇī, lakṣaṇā ca | yathā gaurgacchati, gaurbāhīkaḥ, goṣu nivasatīti | āsāṃ ca viśeṣān viśeṣeṇāgrato vakṣyāmaḥ | teṣu prabuddheṣu prabuddhāprabuddhaiḥ prasiddhapadasāmānādhikaraṇyopadeśavṛddhavyavahārebhyo 'dhigateṣu saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhabalena śabdastaṭastha eva gotvamarthaṃ pratyāyayati | tadāhuḥ—
prasiddhapadasāmānādhikaraṇyāt pratīyate |
aprasiddhapadasyārthaścūte rauti piko yathā || 82 ||
tathā hi rauti yaścūte pikaḥ sa iti niś‍cayaḥ |
upadeśād yathārtho 'yaṃ panasākhyaḥ prakāśate || 83 ||
vyavahārāt tu śabdārthasambandhastripramāṇakaḥ |
vṛddhaśabdābhidheyāni pratyakṣeṇātra paś‍yati || 84 ||
śrotuś‍ca pratipannatvamanumānena ceṣṭayā |
anyathānupapattau ca vetti śaktiṃ dvayāśrayām || 85 ||
(ś‍lovā. pratya. 140, 41iti)
svāvacchedena viśiṣṭajñānajanakatā viśeṣaṇatvam | tat tridhā bhedakamanu— rañjakamupalakṣakaṃ ca | yathā viśvajitā yajeta, śvetaṃ chāgamālabheta, lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti | na ca gotvādayaḥ kadācidapi śabdānuvedhavandhyabodhaviṣayatāṃ pratipadyante | tathā hi— 'āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnirakramīt' (tai. saṃ. 1.5.3.1) ityādau yathā jātiguṇakriyāvacchinnaviṣayāvabhāsini savikalpake, tathā nirvikalpake vijñāne śabdaviśiṣṭa evārthaḥ parisphurati | tadāha— (vāpa. 1.123) ﻿
na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaśśabdānugamādṛte |
anuviddhamiva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena gamyate || 86 ||
na caitad‌vācyam—(ś‍lokavā. pratya. 112)
asti hyālocanājñānaṃ prathamaṃ nirvikalpakam |
bālamūkādivijñānasadṛśaṃ śuddhavastujam || 87||
yato bālādayo janmāntarānubhavopajanitanānāsaṃskārajātayo jātyādyullekhenaiva taṃ tamarthaṃ pratiyanti | tathā hi— 'tadaharjātasyāpi bālakasya purato vidagdhavanitāḥ pradīpaṃ na prasthāpayanti karkaṭo X X X nmā bhaviṣyatīti |
atha tathātvātathātvayoḥ madhyasthatā pratītihetutvāt pratyāyakatvaṃ, kathaṃ punaratathābhūtamarthaṃ śabdastathā pratyayayati ?
śabdaśaktimāhātmyāt | śabdaśak‍tyupajanitā hi buddhayaḥ svabījaparipāka— vaśādākāraviśeṣavatya upajāyamānāḥ satyapi vastuno 'bhede bhedamupadarśayanti | tadyathā rāhoḥ śiraḥ, śilāputrakasya śarīramiti | taduktam—
māyendrajālaprakhyo 'yaṃ pravibhāgaḥ prakal‍pyate |
śabdaśaktimahimnaiva nirvibhāge 'pi vastuni || 88 ||
anye tvāhuḥ—
na vastuno 'dhikaṃ rūpaṃ na śabdasyādhikārthatā |
śabdaḥ śabdāntaropādheradhikārthaḥ pratīyate || 89 ||
tadyathā puruṣa iti puruṣamātraṃ, rājña iti śabdāntarasannidhestu sa viśiṣṭaḥ pratīyate puruṣaviśeṣo 'yaṃ rājapuruṣa iti | evaṃ bhavatipacatītyādāvapi pacatīti kriyāmātrapratītiḥ, bhavatīti tu padopādhiḥ kartṛśaktiprayuktā pratīyate |
apare tu manyante sakalavikalpollekhavirahite 'pi vastuni śabdāḥ svamahimnaiva nānāvidhabuddhayutpattikāraṇībhūtāḥ śaktīḥ sanniveśayanti, yadvaśādabhinnarūpamapi vastvanyathā cāvabhāsata iti | tathā hi kathakaḥ kaṃsaṃ ghātayatītyukte kaṃsavadhamācaṣṭa iti pratīyate | yadā tvindraḥ kaṃsaṃ ghātayatīti prayogastadā 'kaṃsaghnaṃ tamupendram indraḥ prayuṅkta' iti |
anye tu kathakaḥ kaṃsaṃ ghātayatītyatrāpi prayojakaṃ vyāpāraṃ bruvate | yataḥ— ﻿
śabdopahitarūpāṃstān buddherviṣayatāṃ gatān |
pratyakṣamiva kaṃsādīn sādhanatvena manyate || 90||(vāpa.sādhana 3.7.5)
teṣāṃ cotpatteḥ prabhṛtyāvināśāt sa vṛddhīrācakṣāṇaḥ parānapi tathaiva pratyāyayati | tathā vaktāro bhavanti 'gaccha hanyate kaṃsaḥ, kiṃ gatena, hataḥ kaṃsa' (mabhā.3.1.26) iti |
athāpareṣāṃ darśanam—
vikalpayonayaḥ śabdā vikalpāśśasabdayonayaḥ |
teṣāmanyonyasambandho nārthaṃ śabdāḥ spṛśantyamī || 91 || (nyāyamaṃ.)
tadyathā—
guṇānurāgamiśreṇa yaśasā tava sarpatā |
digvadhūnāṃ mukhe jātamakasmādardhakuṅkumam || 92 ||
atrārdhakuṅkumetyukte saurabhādiguṇānvitā |
yaśo 'nurāgayorvarṇapraklṛp‍tiravagamyate || 93 ||
vadhūśabdena tu diśāṃ nāyikātvaṃ pratīyate |
na ca sambandhagandho 'pi vāstavasteṣu vidyate || 94 ||
tadupajñaṃ caiṣa laukikaḥ pravādaḥ—
atahaṭṭhie vi taha taha saṃṭhie vva hiaammi jā ṇivesei |
atthavisese sā jaaï viaḍakaïgoarā vāṇī || 95 ||
(atathāsthitānapi tathāsaṃsthitāniva hṛdaye yā niveśayati |
arthaviśeṣān sā jayati vikaṭakavigocarā vāṇī ||)
bhavatu nāma śabdasya vācakatvapakṣe vivakṣānupraveśādarthātathātve 'pi tathā pratyāyakatvam | viśeṣaṇapakṣe tu kathamivaitadupapadyate? viśeṣaṇena hi pradhānānuyāyināṃ bhavitavyam, pradhānena tvavicalitasvārthena |
naivaṃ, viśeṣaṇamapi śabdānurañjakatvenārthamadhyāsīnaḥ kutaś‍cidupādheranyathāva— bhāsamānaḥ svāśrayamapyanyathāvabhāsayati | tadyathā—
magadheṣu stanau pīnau kaliṅgeṣvakṣiṇī śubhe |
bāhū pralambāvaṅgeṣu caraṇau mṛdu || 96 || iti |
atra stanādayo jātiśabdāḥ savyatvadakṣiṇatvajātidvayaikārthasamavāyo— ﻿
pādherekatvayogino 'pi dvitvenāvabhāsamānāḥ svāśrayānapi tathaivāvabhāsayanti | etena vyaktau padārthe bahūnāmapi dvitvāvabhāso vyākhyātaḥ | tadyathā—
daityādhipaprāṇamuṣāṃ nakhānāmupeyuṣāṃ bhūṣaṇatāṃ kṣatena |
prakāśakārkaś‍yaguṇau dadhānāḥ stanau taruṇyaḥ parivavrurenam || 97 || (māgha.3.14)
atra viśiṣṭanakhakṣatabhūṣādiviśeṣopādānāt suvyaktaiva stanaśabdasya vyak‍tyarthateti | evaṃ kadā pūrvāḥ phalgunya iti candramasā saha yoge bahutvavivakṣāyāṃ dvayorapi bahutvenāvabhāsaḥ, kadā tiṣyapunarvas iti tārakānapekṣanakṣatradvitavavivakṣāyāṃ bahūnāmapi dvitvenāvabhāso bhavati |
atha yathā candrayogasyāvivakṣāyāṃ tārakāgatadvitvasaṅkhayā pūrve phalgunyāviti bhavati, evaṃ candramasā saha yogasya tārakāsaṅ‍khyāś‍ca vivakṣitatve bhavitavyaṃ tiṣyapunarvasava iti; prayoge tu na bhavitavyam; na hi loke tādṛśī vivakṣā vidyate; vivakṣā ca kulavadhūriva na lokamaryādāmatikrāmati | tadyathā— (raghu. 3.16)
janāya śuddhāntacarāya śaṃsate kumārajanmāmṛtasaṃmitākṣaram |
adeyamāsīd dvayameva bhūpateḥ śaśiprabhaṃ chatramubhe ca cāmare || 98 ||
nanu cārthopādherapyartho 'nyathābhāsamāno dṛś‍yate | tadyathā—
pāyād vo racitatrivikramatanurdevaḥ sa daityāntako yasyā ' 'kasmikavardhamāna—vapuṣastigmadyutermaṇḍalam |
maulau ratnaruci śrutau parilasattāṭaṅkakānti kramāt jātaṃ vakṣasi kaustubhābhamudare nābhīsarojopanam || 99 ||
tataś‍ca na jñāyate kimayamarthopādhinibandhano 'rthasyānyathāvabhāsaḥ, uta śabdopādhinibandhana iti |
ciraṃ jīva, yadavatīrṇa iva pratipādyārthapadavīṃ dṛśyase; pṛcchāmyāyuṣmantaṃ ka eṣo 'rtho nāma?
kiṃ bravīṣi— 'yaḥ śabdena pratipādyate'?
atha gaurityatra kaḥ śabdārthaḥ?
kimāttha, 'sāsnādimān piṇḍaḥ' iti ?
kathaṃ svarūpamapi pṛṣṭaḥ śabdenaiva vyapadiśasi? ﻿
kimavocaḥ, śabdākhyaviśeṣaṇānuraktasya tasya svarūpamanyathākhyātuṃ na śaknomi, śabdāparityāgalabdhaprakāśayaiva ca tadanubhūtyānubhavāmi?
tarhi śabdāt pṛthagarthatattvasya vyapadeṣṭumanubhavituṃ cāśak‍yatvācchabdasyaivāya— madhyāso vivarto vipariṇāmo vārtho nāma, nānyaḥ kaś‍ciditi niś‍cīyatām | yuktaṃ caitat | na hi nirūpayanto 'pi śabdād vibhinnamarthatattvamupalabhāmahe | anye 'pi caivamāhuḥ—(pra.vā. 2.354)
avibhāgo 'pi buddhyātmā viparyāsitadarśanaiḥ |
grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedavāniva lakṣyate || 100 ||
grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyamāyāpathaparicyutām
namāmaḥ paramānandajyotīrūpāṃ sarasvatīm || 101 || iti |
(vivartaḥ)
kaḥ punarayaṃ vivarto nāma ?
ucyate ekasya tattvādapracyutasya sanniveśaviśeṣādibhirasatyapravibhaktānya— rūpopagrāhitā vivartaḥ |
tatra yathā jalādayaḥ kallolādirūpeṇa sarpādayaḥ kuṇḍalādirūpeṇa nīlādayaś‍citrādirūpeṇa vivartante tathā śabdatattvamavidyopādhestena tenārtharūpeṇa tathā tathā vivartate |
tadyathā 'vyapagataghanapaṭalamacalajalanidhisadṛśavapurambaratalam, añjanacūrṇapuñjaś‍yāmalaṃ śārvaraṃ tamaḥ |' (praprābhā.) iti |
atha yathā śabdasyārtho vivartastathārthasya śabdo yadi bhavet ko doṣaḥ syāt ? na kaś‍cit | kintu—
vāgrūpatā cedutkrāmedavabodhasya śāśvatī |
na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśanī || 102 || (prapābhā.)
idamandhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhuvanatrayam |
yadi śabdāhvayaṃ jyotirāsaṃsāraṃ na dīpyate || 103 ||(kāvyāda.1.4)
nanu cābhidhīyamānateva pratīyamānatāpi vāk‍yārthadharmo vidyate |
yathā cocyate— (dhvanyā. 1.4) ﻿
pratīyamānaṃ punaranyadeva vastvasti vāṇīṣu mahākavīnām |
yat tatprasiddhāvayavātiriktamābhāti lāvaṇyamivāṅganāsu || 104 ||
tasya ca vāk‍yārthabhāvanottarakālamavagateradhyāsapakṣe vivartapakṣe vā kathamivopapattirbhavati ?
ucyate, vipariṇāmād bhaviṣyati |
vastunaḥ avasthāntaragamanaṃ vipariṇāmaḥ | tatra yathā mṛdādayo ghaṭādirūpeṇa kṣīrādayo dadhyādirūpeṇa caitrādayo yuvādirūpeṇa vipariṇamante, tathedaṃ śabdabrahmāpyavidyopādheḥ tena tenārtharūpeṇa tathā tathā vipariṇamate |
tadyathā—'santi me pañca putrāḥ, mātaraṃ pitaraṃ śuśrūṣitavānasmi, yo 'yaṃ yuvā dramiḍadeśe dramiḍakanyābhiḥ sahāvasaṃ so 'hamidānīṃ paś‍cime vayasi gaṅgātīre tapaś‍carāmīti | atra ca śabdārthayoḥ pṛthagavabhāsād vāk‍yārthasyābhidhīyamānatāyāṃ pratīyamānatāyāṃ vā nānupapattiḥ, na caitāvatā śabdavyāpāro viṃrasyati | yatastātparyamasya hyagrato viśeṣeṇa vakṣyamāṇamāste | tasyodāharaṇamātram—
prāp‍taśrīreṣa kasmāt punarapi mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyā— nnidrāmapyasya pūrvāmanalasamanaso naiva sambhāvayāmi |
setuṃ badhnāti kasmādayamiha sakaladvīpanāthānuyāta— stvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ || 105 ||
atra varṇanīyarājaviśeṣasya vijayino yathāśrutavāk‍yārtho 'bhidhīyamānastvayīti pade viṣṇavadhyāsāvatāraḥ samastīti pratīyamānastadavatārāntarāṇāṃ nidrālasatvādidoṣayogādasya ca tadvyudāsāt tato vaiśiṣṭyapratipādanaṃ tātparyam, yasya kāvyeṣu dhvaniriti prasiddhiḥ | taduktam—
1. tātparyameva vacasi dhvanireva kāvye saubhāgyameva guṇasampadi vallabhasya |
lāvaṇyameva vapuṣi svadate 'ṅganāyāḥ śrṛṅgāra eva hṛdi mānavato janasya || 106 ||
kaḥ punaḥ kāvyavacasoḥ dhvanitātparyayorviśeṣaḥ?
ucyate — ﻿
2. yadavakraṃ vacaśśāstre loke ca vaca eva tat |
vakraṃ yadarthavādādau tasya kāvyamiti smṛtiḥ || 107 ||
3. yadabhiprāyasarvasvaṃ vakturvāk‍yāt pratīyate |
tātparyamarthadharmastacchabdadharmaḥ punardhvaniḥ || 108 ||
4. saubhāgyamiva tātparyamāntaro guṇa iṣyate |
vāgdevatāyā lāvaṇyamiva bāhyastayordhvaniḥ || 109 ||
5. adūraviprakarṣāt tu dvayena dvayamucyate |
yathā surabhivaiśākhau madhumādhavasaṃjñayā || 110 || iti ||
6. vibhak‍tyartho 'tha vṛttyarthaḥ padārthaś‍copavarṇitaḥ |
bhāvanādiprabhedena vāk‍yārthaś‍ca prakīrtitaḥ || 111 ||
7. kriyāyāś‍ca padārthatvād vāk‍yārthatvamapākṛtam |
kṛtaṃ ca bhāvanāyāstadapadārthatvahetukam || 112 ||
8. vācyā viśeṣyāḥ pratyāyyāḥ śabdasyoktāḥ kriyādayaḥ |
adhyāsaviparīṇāmavivartāś‍cāsya tān prati || 113 ||
9. vibhaktivṛttyarthavatorupaskriyāpradhānayordhāma padārtha iṣyate |
padaṃ padārthasya tu vāk‍yagocaro bhaved yato 'rthastadato nirūpyate || 114 ||
iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe vibhak‍tyarthādicatuṣṭayaprakāśo nāma
|| ṣaṣṭhaḥ prakāśaḥ || 6 ||
sāhityavidyādhyayanābdhimanthamanthācalaḥ ko 'pi sanātano 'ham |
prakāśametaṃ pratimucya doṣāccharāvato dīpamivāsmi tuṣṭaḥ || ﻿
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe sap‍tamaḥ prakāśaḥ
kevalaśabdasambandhaśaktiprakāśo nāma
tatra 'abhidhā—vivakṣā—tātparya—pravibhāga—vyapekṣā—sāmarthyā 'nvayaikārthībhāva— doṣahāna—guṇopādānālaṅkāra—rasāviyogarūpāḥ' śabdārthayordvādaśa sambandhāḥ sāhitya— mucyate | teṣu—
(1. abhidhā)
śabdasyārthābhidhāyinī śaktirabhidhā |
tayā svarūpa ivābhidheya pravartamānaḥ śabdo vṛttitrayeṇa vartate |
tāś‍ca 1. mukhyā, 2. gauṇī, 3. lakṣaṇeti tistraḥ | tatra —
sākṣādavyavahitārthābhidhāyikā mukhyā |
gamyamānaśauryādiguṇayogavyavahitārthā gauṇī |
svārthāvinābhūtārthāntaropalakṣaṇā tu lakṣaṇeti |
tathā hi — gaurityayaṃ śabdo mukhyayā vṛttyā sāsnādimantamartha pratipādayati; sa eva tiṣṭhanmūtratādiguṇasampadamapekṣamāṇo yadā bāhīke vartate tadā gauṇīṃ vṛttimanubhavati | tadāha—
rụ̄dhyā yatrāsadartho 'pi loke śabdo niveśitaḥ |
samukhyastatra tatsāmyād gauṇo 'nyatra skhalad‌gatiḥ || 1 || (pravā. pratyakṣa 37)
yadā tu śabdaḥ svārthataḥ kriyāsiddhau sādhanabhāvaṃ gantumasamarthastadābhidheyā— vinābhūtamarthāntaraṃ lakṣayati, tadā sā ca lakṣaṇā vṛttiḥ | yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasati | atra gaṅgāśabdo viśiṣṭodakapravāhe nirụ̄dhābhidhānaśaktiḥ | sa ca ghoṣakartṛkāyāḥ prativasanakriyāyā adhikaraṇabhāvaṃ gantumasamarthaḥ svārthāvinābhūtaṃ taṭaṃ lakṣayati | taduktam—
abhidheyāvinābhūtapratītirlakṣaṇeti yā |
saiṣā vidagdhavakroktijīvitaṃ vṛttiriṣyate || 2 || (tavā. 1.4.23)
pratyekaṃ caitāstistro 'pi dvidhābhūya pṛthak ṣọdhā bhidyante | tatra— ﻿
(1. mukhyā)
mukhyā dvidhā— 1. tathābhūtārthā, 2. tad‌bhāvāpattiś‍ca | tayoḥ —
(1. tathābhūtārthā —6)
tathābhūtārthā ṣọdhā— jātiviṣayā, vyaktiviṣayā, ākṛtiviṣayā, guṇaviṣayā, kriyāviṣayā sambandhaviṣayā ceti | tatra—
1. gauraśvaḥ puruṣo brāhmaṇa ityādirjātiviṣayā; yathā—(naca. 1.4)
prasannāḥ kāntihāriṇyo nānāśleṣavicakṣaṇāḥ |
bhavanti kasyacit puṇyairmukhe vāco gṛhe striyaḥ || 3 ||
yathā—
thoratthaṇīeṃ bahuṇo halāeṁ sāmāeṁ maṃdagamaṇāe |
koracchipecchirīe pahuppae ekkamahisīe || 4 ||
(sthūlastanyā vadhvāḥ halāyāḥ śyāmāyā mandagamanāyāḥ |
korakṣiprekṣitāyāḥ prabhavati ekamahiṣyāḥ ||)
2. ayaṃ, saḥ, tvam, aham ityādivyapadeśārhārthā vyaktiviṣayā yathā—
sarvakṣitibhṛtāṃ nātha dṛṣṭā sarvāṅgasundarī |
rāmā ramye vanoddeśe mayā virahitā tvayā || 5 || (vikramo. 4.51)
yathā vā—
nijanayanapratibimbairambuni bahuśaḥ pratāritā kāpi |
nīlotpaleṣu vimṛśati karamarpayituṃ kusumalāvī || 6 ||
3. citrabimbapratimādyarthavācinyākṛtiviṣayā yathā—
iṅgudīpādapaḥ so 'yaṃ śṛṅgiberapure purā |
niṣādapatinā yatra snigdhenāsīt samāgamaḥ || 7 || (urāca. 1.21)
yathā vā—
abhyunnatā purastādavagạ̄dhā jaghanagauravāt paś‍cāt |
dvāre 'sya pāṇḍusikate padapaṅktirdvaś‍yate 'bhinavā || 8 ||(śāku. 3.7)
4. śvetaḥ karkaśaḥ kṛśaḥ sthūla ityādirguṇaviṣayā yathā— (kāvyāda. 2.100)
ś‍yāmalāḥ prāvṛṣeṇyābhirdiśo jīmūtapaṅktibhiḥ |
bhuvaś‍ca sukumārābhirnavaśādvalarājibhiḥ || 9 ||
yathā vā—
tāmbūlabahalaraktaḥ priyabhukto dhūsaraḥ saparyantaḥ |
bālādharo 'dhirohati kusumarucaḥ kāñcanārasya || 10 ||
﻿
5. paktā pacan pak‍vaḥ pacyamāna ityādiḥ kriyāviṣayā yathā— (bhaṭṭi. 18.40)
dātuḥ sthāturdviṣāṃ mūrdh‍ni yaṣṭustarpayituḥ pitṝn |
yudhyabhag‍navipannasya kiṃ daśāsyasya śocati || 11 ||
yathā vā—
kuviāo pasaṇṇāo oruṇṇamuhīo vihasamāṇīo |
jaha gahiā taha hiaaṃ haraṃti ucchaṇṇamahiḷāo || 12 ||
(kupitāḥ prasannā avaruditamukhyo vihasantyaḥ |
yathā gṛhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ haranti utsannamahilāḥ ||)(dra. 7.95)
6. pitā mātā śatruḥ sūnuraupagava ityādiḥ sambandhaviṣayā yathā— (vikramo. 4.38)
sūryacandramasau yasya mātāmahapitāmahau |
svayaṃvṛtapatirdvābhyāmūrvaś‍yā ca bhūvā ca yaḥ || 13 ||
yathā vā—
sapadī sakhībhirnibhṛtaṃ virahavatīstrātumatra bhajyante |
sahakāramañjarīṇāṃ śikhodgamagranthayaḥ prathame || 14 || (bārā.5.41)
(2. tad‍bhāvāpattiḥ —6)
arthasyātathātve 'dhyāsādibhistathātvāpādanaṃ tad‍bhāvāpattiḥ |
sāpi ṣọdhā— adhyāsātmikā, kalpanātmikā, vivartātmikā, vipariṇāmātmikā, viparyayātmikā, pravādātmikā ceti | tatra—
1. jānato 'pyatasmiṃstadetadityāropaṇam adhyāsaḥ | yathā— (gāsa. 6.70)
aï diara kiṃ ṇa pecchasi āāsaṃ kiṃ muhā puloesi |
jāāe bāhumūlammi addhaaṃdāṇa paripāḍiṃvāḍiṃ || 15 ||
(ayi devara, kiṃ na prekṣase, ākāśaṃ kiṃ mudhā pralokayasi |
jāyāyā bāhumūle 'rdhacandrāṇāṃ parīpāṭīm ||)
yathā vā—
kamalamanambhāsi kamale ca kuvalaye tāni kanakalatikāyām |
sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyam || 16 ||
2. asato 'pyutprekṣā kalpanā yathā—
guṇānurāgamiśreṇa yaśasā tava sarpatā |
digvadhūnāṃ mukhe jātamakasmādardhakuṅkumam || 17 ||
﻿
yathā vā— (māgha. 16.24)
anirākṛtatāpasampadaṃ phalahīnāṃ sumanobhirujjhitām |
khala tāṃ khalatāmivāsatīṃ pratipadyeta kathaṃ budho janaḥ || 18 ||
3. vastunaḥ sanniveśaviśeṣeṇāvasthānaṃ vivartaḥ | yathā— (kirātā 5.39)
utphullasthalanalinīvanādamuṣmāduddhūtaḥ sarasiruhodbhavaḥ parāgaḥ |
vātyābhirviyati vivarttitaḥ samantādādhatte kanakamayātapatralakṣmīm || 19 ||
yathā vā—
asminnīṣad—valita—viṣama—stoka—vicchinna—bhug‍naḥ kiñcillīno vipinavinataḥ puñcitaś‍cotthitaś‍ca |
dhūmodgārastaruṇamahiṣaskandhanīlo davāg‍neḥ svairaṃ sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarānabhrabhaṅgān || 20 ||
4. vastuno 'vasthāntaropagamanaṃ vipariṇāmaḥ | yathā—
ya ete yajvānaḥ prathitamahaso ye 'pyavanipāḥ mṛgākṣyo yāś‍caitāḥ kṛtamaparasaṃsārikathayā |
aho ye cāpyanye phalakusumanamrā viṭapino jagatyevaṃrūpā vilasati mṛdeṣā bhavagatī || 21 ||
yathā vā—
cyutāmindorlekhāṃ ratikalahabhag‍naṃ ca valayaṃ samaṃ cakrīkṛtya prahasitamukhī śailatanayā |
avocad yaṃ paś‍yetyavatu sa śivaḥ sā ca girijā sa ca krīḍācandro daśanakiraṇāpūritatanuḥ || 22 ||
5. mithyājñānaṃ vapiryayaḥ | yathā— (vikramo. 4.17)
hṛtoṣṭharāgairnayanodabindubhiḥ nimag‍nanābhernipatadbhiraṅkitam |
cyuta ruṣā bhinnagaterasaṃśayaṃ śukodaraś‍yāmamidaṃ stanāṃśukam || 23 ||
yathā vā—
mā bhaiḥ śaśāṅka mama śīthuni nāsti rāhuḥ khe rohiṇī vasati kātara ! kiṃ bibheṣi |
prāyo vidagdhavanitānavasaṅgameṣu puṃsāṃ manaḥ pracalatīti kimatra citram || 24 ||
6. avastuṣvapi vastuvanmithyāprasiddhiḥ pravādaḥ | yathā— ﻿
gandharvapurasurāyudhakuraṅgatṛṣṇāndhakārūpāṇi |
asatāmasatyadurgrahadurāpamalināni vṛttāni || 25 ||
yathā vā—
rat‍nacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyametat purastād valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuḥ khaṇḍamākhaṇḍalasya |
yena ś‍yāmaṃ vapuratitarāṃ kāntimāpatsyate te barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveṣasya viṣṇoḥ || 26 || (megha.15)
(2. gauṇī)
gauṇī dvidhā— 1. guṇanimittā, 2. upacārānimittā ca |
(1. guṇanimittā —6)
tatra yasyāṃ dvayorvacanayossāmānādhikaraṇyena vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā prayogaḥ, viśeṣaṇa— viśeṣyabhāvānyathānupapattyaikasya pratīyamānābhidhīyamānaguṇadvārakasambandho bhavati, sā guṇavyavahitārthā guṇanimittā ca | tatra ca—
saṃsargi bhedakaṃ yad yat savyāpāraṃ pratīyate |
guṇatvaṃ paratantratvāt tasya śāstra udāhṛtam || 27 || (vāpa. 3.5.1)
guṇaḥ svārtho viśeṣaṇaṃ pravṛttinimittamiti caiko 'rthaḥ | sa dharmaguṇakriyā ' 'kṛti— jātisvarūpādibhedādanantaḥ | tatsambandhena yadyapi tannimitā vṛttiranantaprakāraiva kalpyate tathāpi tasyāḥ ṣaḍeva vikalpā bhavanti — 'mukhyaviṣayaḥ, amukhyaviṣayaḥ, bhedaviṣayaḥ, abhedaviṣayaḥ, viśeṣaṇaviṣayaḥ, aviśeṣaviṣaya' iti |
(1) yatra dvayorapi mukhyaviśeṣyārthayordharmādinimittamekasyetaraviśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhavati sa mukhyaviṣayaḥ |
sa dharmanimittaḥ samāse yathā—
yo hi dīrghāsitākṣasya vilāsavalitabhruvaḥ |
kāntāmukhasyāvaśagastasmai nṛpaśave namaḥ || 28 ||
sa eva asamāso yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.6)
gaurgauḥ kāmadudhā samyak prayuktā smaryate budhaiḥ |
duṣprayuktā punargotvaṃ prayoktuḥ saiva śaṃsati || 29 ||
kriyānimittaḥ samāso yathā—
katto saṃpaḍaï mahaṃ pi piasahi piasaṃgamo ṇisīhe vi |
jā jaaï gahia—kara—ṇiarakhikkhiri caṃdacaṃḍālo || 30 ||
﻿
(kutaḥ sampatati mamāpi priyasakhi priyasaṅgamo niśīthe 'pi |
yāvajjayati gṛhītakaranikarakhikkhirī candracāṇḍālaḥ ||)
sa eva asamāso yathā—
kiṃ dvāri daivahatike sahakārakeṇa saṃvardhitena viṣapādapa eṣa pāpaḥ |
asminmanāgapi vikāsavikārabhāji bhīmā bhavanti madanajvarasannipātāḥ || 39 ||
(2) yatra viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ prathamamevaikamamukhyaṃ bhavati asau amukhyaviṣayaḥ |
sa viśeṣyasyāmukhyatve sāmānādhikaraṇyena dharmanimitto yathā— (māgha. 7.73)
himalavasadṛśaḥ śramodabindūnapanayatā kila tannavoḍhavadhvāḥ |
kucakalaśakiśorakau kathaṃcit taralatayā taruṇena paspṛśāte || 32 ||
sa eva kriyānimitto yathā—
mukhapaṅkajaraṅge 'smin bhrūlatā nartakī tava |
līlānāṭyāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭau sakhi ! yūnāṃ niṣiñcāti || 33 ||
viśeṣasya mukhyatve vaiyadhikaraṇyena ākṛtinimitto yathā—
paḍivak‍khamaṇṇupuṃje lāvaṇṇaüḍe aṇaṃgagaakuṃbhe |
purisasaahiaadharie kīsa thaṇaṃtī thaṇe vahasi || 34 ||
(pratipakṣamanyupuñjau lāvaṇyakuṭāvanaṅgagajakumbhau |
puruṣaśatahṛdayadhṛtau kimiti stanantī stanau vahasi ||) (kāvyāda. 2.93)
sa eva kriyānimitto yathā—(seba. 1.14)
vavasāaraïpaoso rosagaïṃdadiḍhasiṃkhalāpaḍibaṃdho |
kaha kaha vi dāsarahiṇo jaakesaripaṃjaro gao ghaṇasamao || 35 ||
(vyavasāyaravipradoṣo roṣagajendradṛḍhaśṛṅkhalāpratibandhaḥ |
kathaṃ kathamapi dāśaratherjayakesaripañjaraṃ gato ghanasamayaḥ ||)
(3) yatreka eva śabdo 'rthabhedaprakalpanayā guṇanimittaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamanubhavati asau bhedaviṣayaḥ | gauṇamukhyayorguṇanimitto mukhyayoś‍ca jātinimitto yathā—
taha karakamalaṃ kamalaṃ caṃdo caṃdamuhi tujjha muhaaṃdo |
kamalaṃ uṇa kamalaṃ c‍cia caṃdo caṃdo c‍cia varāo || 36 ||
﻿
(tava karakamalaṃ kamalaṃ candraś‍candramukhi tava mukhacandraḥ |
kamalaṃ punaḥ kamalameva candraś‍candra eva varākaḥ ||)
mukhyayorguṇanimitto yathā—
tālā jāaṃti guṇā jālā de sihaaehi gheppaṃti |
raïkiraṇāṇuggahiāiṃ hoṃti kamalāiṃ kamalāiṃ || 37 ||
(tadā jāyante guṇāḥ yadā te sahṛdayairgṛhyante |
ravikiraṇānugṛhītāni bhavanti kamalāni kamalāni ||)
mukhyayoḥ kriyānimitto yathā—(kirātā. 11.73)
grasamānamivojāṃsi sadasā gauravoritam |
nāma yasyābhinandanti dviṣo 'pi sa pumān pumān || 38 ||
svarūpanimitto yathā—
amṛtamamṛtaṃ candraś‍candrasthathāmbujamambujaṃ ratirapi ratiḥ kāmaḥ kāmo madhūni madhūnyapi |
iti na bhajate vastu prāyaḥ parasparasaṅkaraṃ tadiyamabalā dhatte bhāvān kathaṃ sakalātmakān || 39 ||
(4) sādharmyādiprasiddheryatropamānamevopameyaṃ pratyāyayatyasāvabhedaviṣayaḥ |
so 'nyoktau yathā—
pibanmadhu yathākāmaṃ bhramaraṃ phullapaṅkaje |
apyasannaddhasaurabhyaṃ paś‍ya cumbati kuḍ‍malam || 40 || (kāvyāda. 2.206)
samāsoktau yathā—
anurāgavatī sandhyā divasastatpurassaraḥ |
aho daivagatiś‍citrā tathāpi na samāgamaḥ || 41 ||
ubhayoktau yathā—
upādhvaṃ tatpānthāḥ punarapi saro mārgatilakaṃ yadāsādya svecchaṃ vilasatha vilīnak‍lamabharāḥ |
itastu kṣārābdherjaraṭhamakarakṣuṇṇapayaso nivṛttiḥ kalyāṇī na punaravatāraḥ kathamapi || 42 ||
anubhayoktau yathā— (urāca. 1.28) ﻿
athedaṃ rakṣobhiḥ kanakahariṇacchadmavidhinā tathāvṛttaṃ pāpairvyathayati yathā kṣālitamapi |
janasthāne śūnye vikalakaraṇairāryacaritai— rapi grāvā rodityapi dalati vajrasya hṛdayam || 43 ||
(5) yatra viśeṣaṇabhūtaṃ nāma sarvanāma vā viśiṣṭaguṇadharmādikaṃ pravṛttinimittamupādatte sa viśeṣaṇaviṣayaḥ |
sa nām‍no viśiṣṭaguṇanimittatve yathā—
bhavatu ruṣi kaṭhorā kintu ramyā mṛgākṣī nirupadhimadhurāṇāṃ svādavo 'mī vikārāḥ |
śrayati kaṭhinabhāvaḥ śuktipātreṣvapo yaḥ kulajanabahumānastāsu muktāphalāntaḥ || 44 ||
sāṃskārik‍yādijanikā saṃjñāpi tasyāḥ yathā—
s‍nigdhaś‍yāmalakāntilip‍taviyato vellad‌valākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ |
kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi ! dhīrā bhava || 45 ||
sarvanām‍no viśiṣṭaguṇasampattinimittatve yathā—(urāca. 4.12)
sa rājā tat saukhyaṃ sa ca parijanaste ca divasāḥ smṛtāvāvirbhūtaṃ tvayi suhṛdi dṛṣṭe 'dya sakalam |
vipāke ghoro 'sminna khaluṃ na vimụ̄dhā tava sakhī purandhrīṇāṃ cittaṃ kusumasukumāraṃ hi bhavati || 46 ||
mukhyavad gauṇasyāpi viśeṣaṇaṃ tad‌viśeṣaṇameva | tatra sarvanām‍no guṇasampattinimittatva eva yathā—
caāvaḷaa dīhiahimaṃghallahiniadeha |
annajīdi haraloaṇa hotahomuhaaṃdahorevaha || 47 ||
(6) viśeṣaṇamavyabhicaritamaviśeṣaṇaṃ taddharmādiguṇayogena yatra pravartate tadasāvaviśeṣaṇaviṣayaḥ
chinto(?)calaṇeṇa halā mao vi kaṇhassa ko ṇa jīvejja |
so uṇa teṇāvi mao riṭ‍ṭho sac‍ca cia baïllo || 48 ||
﻿
(spṛṣṭaḥ caraṇena sakhi mṛto 'pi kṛṣṇasya ko na jīvet |
sa punastenāpi mṛto 'riṣṭaḥ satyameva balīvardaḥ ||)
cetanaprakṛteryathā— (gāsa.(ve.) 864, dra.sa.ka. pṛ.313)
sac‍ca cia kaṭṭhamao suraṇāho jeṇa haḷiadhūāe |
hatthehi kamaladalakomalehi chitto ṇa pallavio || 49 ||
(satyameva kāṣṭhamayaḥ suranātho yena hālikaduhitrā |
hastābhyāṃ kamaladalakomalabhyāṃ spṛṣṭo na pallavitaḥ ||)
acetanasya yathā—
bhavatu viditametat kāṣṭhamevāsi satyaṃ kimaparamabhidhāsye kānane vardhito 'si |
kuvalayanayanāyāḥ pāṇisaṅgotsave 'smin musala kisalayaṃ te tatkṣaṇādadya jātam || 50 ||
acetanasyaiva prabhāvavato yathā—
anviṣyadbhirayaṃ cirāt kathamapi prāpyeta yadyarthibhi— rnātha tvaṃ punararthinaḥ pratidinaṃ yat‍nāt samanviṣyasi |
prāp‍tau cintitamātrakaṃ dadadasau cintātiriktapradaṃ tvāmālok‍ya vidīryate yadi na tad grāvaiva cintāmaṇiḥ || 51||
(2. upacārānimittā— 6)
mukhyayā gauṇyā vānyaviśeṣaṇasya sato 'nyatrāropaṇam upacāraḥ |
tannimittikopacāranimittā; sā tu gauṇavyavahitārthatvād gauṇī bhavati; tasyā api dharmaguṇākṛtikriyāsvarūpajātyādayaḥ pravṛttinimittam; tadbhedāt sāpi ṣaṭprakārā bhavati—
dharmanimittā, guṇanimittā, ākṛtinimittā, kriyānimittā, svarūpanimittā, jātinimittā ca | tāsu—
(1) dharmanimittā yathā—
bhavatu ruṣi kaṭhorā kintu ramyā mṛgākṣī || 52 ||
tālai; śiñjad‍valayasubhagairnartitaḥ kāntayā me || 53 || megha. 76
atra kaṭhorasubhagaśabdo mūrtimad‍dravyaprāṇiviśeṣayorviśeṣaṇatvena rụ̄dhau, roṣavalayaśiñjayorāropyamāṇau, tadyogānnāyikātālayorapi viśeṣaṇabhāvamanubhavataḥ | ﻿
(2) guṇanimittā yathā— (śāku. 1.17)
kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām || 54 ||
uc‍ciṇassu paḍia—kusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ halia—suṇhe |
esa avasāṇaviraso sasureṇa suo valaasaddo || 55 ||
(uc‍cinuṣva patati—kusumaṃ mā dhunīhi śophālikāṃ hālika—snuṣe |
eṣo 'vasānavirasaḥ ś‍vaśureṇa śruto valaya—śabdaḥ ||) (dhva.2)
atra madhuravirasaśabdāvāsvādyaviśeṣaṇatvena rụ̄dhau tad‍vyavadhānena varṇanayā ' 'kṛtivalayaśabdayorāropitau viśeṣaṇabhāvamanubhavataḥ |
(3) ākṛtinimittā yathā—
aṅkurite pallavite korakite kusumite ca sahakāre |
aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ kusumitaś‍ca hṛdi madanaḥ || 56 ||
yathā vā—(vajjāla. 3.13)
pallaviaṃ piva/via karapallavehiṃ papphulliaṃ va ṇayaṇehiṃ |
phaliaṃ via pīṇapaoharehi ajjāeĕ lāvaṇṇam || 57 ||
(pallavitamiva karapallavābhyāṃ praphullitamiva nayanābhyām |
phalitamiva pīnapayodharābhyāmāryāyā lāvaṇyam ||)
atrāṅkuritapallavitādayo mūrtimatsu bhūruhādiṣu ākṛtiviśeṣato viśeṣaṇatvena rụ̄dhāstad‍vyavadhānenāmūrtayormadanalāvaṇyayorāropyamāṇā gauṇaṃ viśeṣaṇabhāvamanubhavanti |
(4) kriyānimittā yathā—
śaśinamasūta prācī nṛtyati madano hasanti kakubho 'pi |
kumudarajaḥ paṭavāsaṃ vikirati gaganāṅgaṇe pavanaḥ || 58 ||
yathā vā—
avaūhiapuvvadiśe samaaṃ joṇhāe seviapaosamuhe |
māi ṇa jhijjaü raaṇī aparadisāhuttapatthiammi miaṃke || 59 ||
(avagūhitapūrvadiśe samakaṃ jyotsnayā sevitapradoṣamukhe |
mātarna kṣīyatāṃ rajanī aparadiśābhimukhaprasthite mṛgāṅke ||)
atra sevopagụ̄dhādīnāmanyakriyāṇāṃ tad‍vyavadhānenānānyatrāropaṇād viśeṣaṇabhāvaḥ |
kathaṃ punarayaṃ bhedo gauṇyāḥ pṛthagbhavati ? ﻿
yatra prasiddherupamānopameyatvaṃ gamyate, sā guṇavyavahitārthā gauṇī, yāmanyoktiṃ samāsoktiṃ vā varṇayanti | yāsyāṃ punarupameyena guṇasāmyādupamānaṃ gamyate, sā gauṇavyavahitārthā gauṇī, yāṃ samādhimācakṣate | taduktam— 'uktasyāprākaraṇikatve samāsoktiḥ, prākaraṇikatve samādhiḥ' iti |
(5) svarūpanimittā yathā—
kasya nāpanatiṃ kuryād dainyamātā daridratā |
kaṃ vā na madayatyeṣā śrīrunmādakuṭumbinī || 60 ||
yathā vā— (vikramo. 2.3)
ābharaṇasyābharaṇaṃ prasādhanavidheḥ prasādhanaviśeṣaḥ |
upamānasyāpi sakhe ! pratyupamānaṃ vapustasyāḥ || 61 ||
atra daridratāyā dainyajanakatvena mātṛsvarūpādhyāropādapatyatāvyavadhānena sambandhaḥ; daridratā dainyaṃ janayatīti vāk‍yārthaḥ | tasya ca 'śaśinamasūta prācī' ityādivadupacāropapattiḥ | evamuttaratrāpi yojyam |
(6) jātinimittā yathā—
dhṛtiḥ kṣamā dayā śaucamaucityaṃ vāgāniṣṭhurā |
bhūtānāmanabhidrohastap‍taitāḥ samidhaḥ śriyaḥ || 62 ||
yathā vā—
yeṣāṃ prāṇivadhaḥ krīḍā, narma marmacchido giraḥ |
paropatāpaḥ kartavyaṃ te mṛtyorapi mṛtyavaḥ || 63 ||
atrāg‍nisamid‌dharmeṣu martyamṛtyudharmeṣu ca śrīdhṛtyādiṣu mṛtyudurjaneṣu cāropiteṣu saminmṛtyujātyoreva guṇabhāvo na tvag‍nimartyayoriti amīṣāṃ sākṣādasambandhe dīptivināśādidharmadvāraka upacāraḥ sambandhāya kalpate | tenāyamarthaḥ sampadyate— dhṛtyādayaḥ śriyaṃ samedhayanti, durjanā mṛtyumapi mārayanti | sā ceyamanyarụ̄dhā kriyā 'nyatrārop‍yata ityupacāravṛttireva bhavati | yaduktama— (kāvyāda. 1.94)
kumudāni nimīlanti kamalānyunmiṣanti ca |
iti netrakriyādhyāsāllabdhā tad‍vācinī śrutiḥ || 64 ||
evam
'parārthe yaḥ pīḍāmanubhavati' || 65 || (bhallaṭaśatakam 56)
'eti jīvantamānando naraṃ varṣaśatādapi' || 66 || (rāmā. 5.34.6) ﻿
ityādi ca draṣṭavyam |
yadyevaṃ kriyānimittaiṣā kasmānna bhavati ?
kriyāyā eva dravyajātirūpeṇa vipariṇāmāt, yathā dainyamātetyādau vṛttirūpeṇa |
nanu ca yathā gauriva gaustatha samidha iva samidha itīyamaṇi gauṇī kasmānna bhavati ?
bhavati yadi samidha ityanena śriya iti nāpekṣyate, śrīvahneriti vā vahniśabdaprayogo bhavati | yathā vā 'vavasāaraïpaoso' (vyavasāyaravipradoṣaḥ), 'ghaṇasamao' (ghanasamayaḥ), 'aṇaṃgagaakuṃbhe thaṇe' (anaṅgagajakumbhau stanau) iti | etena 'dainyamātā daridratā', 'te mṛtyorapi mṛtyavaḥ' ityāderapi na gauṇatvamityuktaṃ bhavati | ādigrahaṇānnasarvanāmāderapi bhedābhedābhyāmupacāre gauṇavyavahitārthaiva gauṇī bhavati |
sabhedopacāre nāmādhyāropād yathā— (urāca.2.10)
he hasta dakṣiṇa mṛtasya śiśordvijasya jīvātave visṛja śūdramunau kṛpāṇām |
rāmasya gātramasi nirbharagarbhakhinna— sītāvivāsanapaṭoḥ karuṇā kutaste || 67 ||
yathā vā— (rāca. 19.41)
sthāne 'vasīdasi raghūdvaha ! kiṃ vidhāta— rasyāstvayekṣitamalakṣaṇamaṅgakeṣu |
adyāpi jīvasi daśānana ! he hanūman ! keyaṃ tavābhimukhavartiripoḥ pratīkṣā || 68 ||
abhedopacāreṇa sarvanāmādhyāropād yathā—
candrajyotsnāviśadapuline saikate 'smin sarayvā vādadyūtaṃ cirataramabhūt siddhayūnoḥ kayoś‍cit |
eko brūte prathamanihataṃ kaiṭabhaṃ kaṃsamanyaḥ sa tvaṃ tattvaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatastatra pūrvam || 69 ||
yathā vā—
prāp‍taśrīreṣa kasmāt punarapi mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyā nnidrāmapyasya pūrvāmanalasamanaso naiva sambhāvayāmi | ﻿
setuṃ badh‍nāti cāsau kathāmiva sakaladvīpanāthānuyāta— stvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ || 70 ||
atrādyodāharaṇayo rāmahanūmantau nāmaśabdāvatiniṣkarūṇe paribhavāsahiṣṇau ca svamūrtibhede saṃjñāviśeṣaṇatvena rụ̄dhau tad‍vyyavadhānena tad‍‌viparītayorūpacaritasvamūrti— bhedāntarayorāropitāvaupacārikaṃ viśeṣaṇabhāvaṃ bhajete iti gauṇavyavahitārthopacāra— nimittopacāranimitteyaṃ gauṇī | yatra tu na bhedopacāraḥ tatra vyavadhānābhāvād guṇanimittaiva gauṇī bhavati, yathā 'rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe', 'tārkṣyaḥ so 'pi samaṃ nijena vibhunā jānāti māṃ rāvaṇam' iti |
kathaṃ punaḥ śabdārthayorabhede 'pi bhedavyapadeśaḥ ?
sa hi 'rāhoḥ śiraḥ', 'gaurgauḥ kāmadughā' ityādau śabdārthābheda eva dṛśyate |
ucyate— asti tāvadetanmukhyābhāve sati prayojane nimitte ca satyupacāraḥ pravartate | sa cābhinnānāṃ bhedavyapadeśahetuḥ, bhinnānāṃ cābhedavyapadeśaheturbhavati | tatra
abhinnānāṃ bhedā yathā— (kusaṃ. 2.10)
ātmānamātmanā vetsi sṛcasyātmānamātmanā |
ātmanā kṛtinā ca tvamātmanyeva pralīyase || 71 ||
atra paramātmavyatiriktavastvantarābhāvāt karmādikārakavyatirekeṇa ca jñānādi— kriyānupapattereka eva kartṛkarmakaraṇādhikaraṇopacāreṇa bhidyate | siddhe ca bhede sādṛśyanibandhane mukhyānāmivopacaritānāmapyupamānopameyavyavahāraḥ pravartate | tadyathā—
tvanmukhaṃ tvanmukhamiva tvad‍dṛśau tvad‍dṛśāviva |
tvanmūrtiriva mūrtiste tvamiva tvaṃ kṛśodari || 72 ||
vaisādṛśyanibandhanastu vyatireko bhavati | yathā— (kirātā. 11.73)
nāma yasyābhinandanti dviṣo 'pi sa pumān pumān || 73 ||
raïkiraṇāṇuggahiāiṃ hoṃti kamalāiṃ kamalāiṃ || 74 ||
(ravikiraṇānugṛhītāni bhavanti kamalāni kamalāni ||) (dra. 7.37)
tataś‍ca bhinnārthavatsambandhasambodhanavibhakta‍yāderūtpattiryathā— 'rāmasya gātramasi' (urāca. 2.10), 'he hanūman' iti | etena mukhyagauṇayorapi upamārūpakādayā vyākhyātāḥ | yathā—
ayamālohitacchāyo madena mukhacandramāḥ |
sannaddhodayarāgasya candrasya pratigarjati || 75 ||
﻿
candramāḥ pīyate devairmayā tvanmukhacandramāḥ |
asamagro hyayaṃ śaśvadayamāpūrṇamaṇḍalaḥ || 76 || (kāvyāda.2.89–90)
amṛtātmani padmānāṃ dveṣ‍ṭari snigdhatārake |
mukhendau tava satyasminnitareṇa kimindunā || 77 || (kāvyāda. 2.159)
na mīlayati padmāni na nabho vyavagāhate |
tvanmukhendurmamāsūnāṃ haraṇāyaiva yasyati || 78 || (kāvyāda. 2.83)
bhinnānāmabhedopacāro yathottarodāharaṇayoḥ tatra hi pratīyamānābhidhīyamānatulya— guṇopamānaviśeṣaṇamanekaṃ sarvanāma upamānavyadhānenopameye prayuktamabhedopacāreṇo— tkarṣamāropayati |
nanviyamanyoktiḥ samāsoktirūbhayoktirvā kasmānna bhavati ?
tathā hi— pratīyamānābhidhīyamānopameyaguṇavibhūtayaḥ sarvanāmādhyāse 'pyanyokti— samāsokta‍yubhayoktayo dṛśyante | tatra —
anyoktiryathā—
hā saurabhaṃ k‍va tat te k‍va nu te santāpahāri hā śaityam |
aṅgārakārahaste candana ! patito 'si dhig daivam || 79 ||
samāsoktirtathā—
mugdhāmajātarajasaṃ kalikāmakāle bālāṃ kadarthayasi kiṃ navamālikāyāḥ |
anyāsu tāvadupamardasahāsu bhṛṅga ! lolaṃ vinodaya manaḥ sumanolatāsu || 80 ||
ubhayoktiryathā—
kenāsīnaḥ sukhamakarūṇenākarāduddhatastvaṃ vikretuṃ vā tvamabhilaṣitaḥ kena deśāntare 'smin |
yasminvittavyayabharasaho grāhakastāvadāstāṃ nāsti bhrātarmarakatamaṇe ! tvatparīkṣākṣamo 'pi || 81 ||
ucyate— yatropamānameva prayuktaṃ pratīyamānābhidhīyamānaguṇamupameyaṃ gamayati, tatraivānyokta‍yādayo bhavanti | iha tu nopamānaṃ prayujyate | kiṃ tarhi ? tadviśeṣaṇaṃ sarvanāma; ﻿
tena prathamodāharaṇe nānyoktiḥ, dvitīyodāharaṇe tu na samāsoktiriti |
yadyevamadhyāsātmikā tadbhāvāpattiḥ kasmānna bhavati ? yathaiṣa bālābāhumūle bālacandramāḥ; yathā vā— (māgha. 15.63)
kimaho nṛpāḥ samamamībhirūpapatisutairna pañcabhiḥ |
vadhyamabhihata bhujiṣyamamuṃ saha cānayā sthavirarājakanyayā || 82 || iti
ucyate nātra sarvanām‍nāmeva prayogaḥ | kiṃ tarhi ? viśeṣyāṇāmapīti yujyate tadbhāvāpattiḥ | 'candrajyotsnā' ityādau tu sarvanāmādhyāse samādhilakṣaṇayogā— dupacāragauṇyevaiṣā bhavita | yathā ca dharmiṇo 'pyadhyāse samādhirūpapadyate tathāgrato vakṣyāma iti |
(3. lakṣaṇā)
lakṣaṇā dvividhā— 1. lakṣaṇā, 2. lakṣitalakṣaṇā ca |
tayoryasyāmupāttaśabdasyārthasya kriyāsiddhau sādhanatvāyogāt svārtho 'vinābhūta— marthāntaraṃ vyavahitameva lakṣayati sā lakṣaṇā, tad‍vyatiriktā tu vakṣyamāṇānekarūpā lakṣitalakṣaṇeti | tatra—
(1. lakṣaṇā —6)
lakṣaṇā ṣọdhā— sāmīpyalakṣaṇā, sāhacaryalakṣaṇā, sahacaritalakṣaṇā, hetulakṣaṇā, tādarthyalakṣaṇā, parimāṇalakṣaṇā ca | tatra—
1. 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasati', 'mañcāḥ krośanti' ityādiṣu svārthāvinābhūtasamīpā— rthāntarapratītihetuḥ sāmīpyalakṣaṇā | yathā—
'yat tālīdalapākapāṇḍuvadanam' || 83 || (visā. 2.14)
'abhinavakaridantacchedakāntaḥ kapolaḥ' || 84 || iti | (māmā. 1.25)
atra pākacchedayoḥ kriyātvenāmūrtatvāt pāṇḍutvaṃ kāntatvaṃ cāsambhavat samīpasthaṃ pak‍vatālīpatraṃ sadyaśchinnaṃ ca hastidantaṃ lakṣayati | '/?/
2. chatriṇo gacchanti', 'kuntān praveśaya' ityādiṣu svārthāvinābhūtasāhacaryopa— labdhārthāntarapratītihetuḥ sāhacaryalakṣaṇā | yathā— (kusaṃ. 1.2)
yaṃ sarvaśailāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe |
bhāsvanti rat‍nāni mahauṣadhīś‍ca pṛthūpadiṣ‍ṭāṃ duduhurdharitrīm ||
atra dogdhṛsāhacaryācchaileṣvapi duduhuriti prayujyate | yathā vā— ﻿
padepade kūbariṇaḥ śataṃśataṃ śataṃśataṃ mattagajān ratherathe |
nyaveśayad vājiśataṃ gajegaje hayehaye kuntaśataṃ śatakratuḥ || 86 ||
3. yatroktadharmasahacarito 'pi dharmo lakṣyate sā sahacaritalakṣaṇā | yathā—
'madhutṛṣatpiṅgāḥ payobindavaḥ' || 87 ||
'kanakaphalakasphārajaghanā' || 88 || iti |
atra piṅgatvasphāratvasahakṛtāstadāśrayākārakāntyādayo' lakṣyante |
4. 'annaṃ vai prāṇāḥ', 'āyurghṛtam' ityādiṣu svārthāvinābhūtanimittakāraṇārthāntara— pratītiheturhetulakṣaṇā | yathā— 'tvaṃ jīvitaṃ tvamasi me hṛdayaṃ dvitīyam' (urāca.3.26) iti | atra jīvitaśabdena hṛdayaśabdena ca jīvitacaitanyahetuḥ priyatamocyate |
5. 'indraḥ sthūṇā' 'mallikā pradīpā' ityādiṣu tadarthapratītihetuḥ tādarthyalakṣaṇā | yathā—
ārụ̄dho malayācalaṃ jalanidheḥ pāraṃ paraṃ nāyaya— nnaṇḍaṃ dṛp‍tanṛsiṃha siṃhalapaterūcchettumacchaṃ yaśaḥ || 89 || iti |
atra daṇḍaśabdena daṇḍanāprahito loka ucyate |
6. prasthaṃ khalu krośa ityādau parimāṇasādhanabhūtārthāntaraparatītihetuḥ parimāṇalakṣaṇā | yathā—
yasmādanarghāṇi hṛtānyanūnaiḥ prasthairmuhurbhūribhirūcchikhāni |
ạ̄dhyādiva prāpaṇikādajastraṃ jagrāha rat‍nānyamitāni lokaḥ || 90 ||
atra prasthaśabdena prasthaparimāṇasādhanaṃ mānabhāṇḍaṃ kāṣ‍ṭhādimayamucyate |
(2. lakṣitalakṣaṇā—6)
lakṣitalakṣaṇāpi ṣọdhaiva— rūḍhalakṣaṇā, pratīkalakṣaṇā, vivakṣitalakṣaṇā, virūddhalakṣaṇā, tadanyalakṣaṇā, prakīrṇalakṣaṇā ca | tāsu—
1. yasyāṃ yathākathaṃcid vyutpattyā lakṣitenābhidhānena rūḍhalakṣaṇa evārtho lakṣyate sā rūḍhalakṣaṇā | rodaraś‍cakravāko dvirepho bhramara iti | yathā— (kusaṃ. 3.36)
madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikapātre papau prayāṃ svāmanuvartamānaḥ || 91 || iti |
atra rodaratvaṃ dvirephatvaṃ ca kurare 'pi sambhavati, na cātra rụ̄dhā lakṣaṇeti nāyaṃ lakṣyate |
2. yatra pratīkenābhidhānaikadeśena samudāyo lakṣita eva lakṣyate, na yaḥ kaścit, sā pratīkalakṣaṇā | yathā—
'bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ, 'sac‍cā api hoi aïadaṃsaṇaturīā' | atra ﻿
sena—bhāmāśabdo bhīma—satyā śabdapratīkaśravaṇāt bhīmasenaḥ, satyabhāmā ityabhidhānayoḥ pūrvalakṣitayorlakṣaṇayā lakṣyete | na hi bhavati jyeṣ‍ṭhāḥ jyeṣ‍ṭheti, ārdrā vārdreti |
3. yatra yathākathaṃcicchabdaprayoge vivakṣitameva lakṣyānusārato lakṣyate sā vivakṣitalakṣaṇā | yathā
'manasijajaitrarathaṃ vilocanārdhaṃ || 92 || (kirātā.10.52)
'cakitahariṇīhāniranetratribhāgaḥ' || 93 || (?) iti |
atra nārdhaśabdasya tribhāgaśabdasya arthaḥ, kintu tābhyāmasamagrālokanaṃ lakṣyate | na hi bhavati netracaturbhāgo netraṣaḍ‍bhāgo veti |
4. padaṃ kevalamanyasannidhervā yatrābhihitavirūddhaṃ lakṣitamevārthaṃ lakṣayati sā virūddhalakṣaṇā | yathā—
'viṣ‍ṭirbhadrā', 'aṅgārako maṅgalaḥ', 'puṇyavatyahaṃ yasyāstvamevaṃvidhaḥ patirasi' iti | atra bhadrāmaṅgalaśabdau puṇyavacchabdaśca abhadramaṅgalatve apuṇyavattvaṃ ca lakṣitameva lakṣayanti | yathā vā rat‍nāvalyāṃ rājā vidūṣakamāha — 'mahābrāhmaṇastvamasi, ko 'nya evamṛcāmabhijña (rat‍nā. 2.6)' iti | atra mahābrāhmaṇa ityanena ṛcāmabhijña ityanena ca vṛṣalādapyadhamatvaṃ vaidheyatvaṃ ca lakṣyate | yathā ca mālatīmādhave lavaṅgikā madayantikāmabhidhatte— 'kahaṃ ṇāma ṇavabahūvīsaṃbheṇovāajāṇaaṃ laḍahaviaḍḍamahurabhāsaṇaṃ arosaṇaṃ bhādaraṃ de bhattāraṃ samāsādia piasahī (ṇa) dummaṇaïssadi' (kathaṃ nāma navavadhūvistrambhaṇopāyābhijñaṃ laḍahavidagdhamadhurabhāṣaṇamaroṣaṇaṃ bhrātaraṃ te bhartāraṃ samāsādya priyasakhī na durmanāyiṣyate |) (māmā.7.0/1) atra navavadhūvistrambhaṇopāyajñatvādayastadvirūddhamarthaṃ lakṣayanti | evamanye 'pi yathā— (kāvyāda. 2.289)
idamamlānamānāyā lag‍na stanataṭe tava |
chādyatāmuttarīyeṇa navaṃ nakhapadaṃ sakhi || 94 ||
kuviāo pasaṇṇāo orūṇṇamuhīo vihasamāṇīo |
jaha gahiā taha hiaaṃ haraṃti ucchaṇṇamahilāo || 95 ||
(kupitāḥ prasannā avaruditamukhyo vihasantyaḥ |
yathā guhītāstathā hṛdayaṃ haranti utsannamahilāḥ ||) (dra. 7.12)
vayaṃ tathā nāma yathāttha kiṃ vadāmyayaṃ tvakasmādvikalaḥ kathāntare |
kadambagolākṛtimāśritaḥ kathaṃ viśuddhamugdhaḥ kulakanyakājanaḥ || 96 || (māmā.7.0/1)
eteṣvamlānamānaśabdena mānabhaṅgaḥ, utsannaśabdenānucchedāśīḥ, viśuddhamugdhaśabdenāviśuddhiramaugdhyaṃ ca lakṣyate |
5. yatrābhihitaśabdārthatiraskāreṇārthāntaraṃ lakṣyate sā tadanyalakṣaṇā | yathā—
suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīṃ cinvanti puruṣāstrayaḥ |
śūraśca kṛtavidyaśca yaśca jānāti sevitum || 97 || (mahābhārata 5.35.64)
atra na suvarṇaśabdārtho, nāpi puṣpaśabdārthaḥ; kintu suvarṇaśabdena sarvapuruṣārthamūlaṃ hiraṇyaṃ, puṣpaśabdena ca prasavārtho lakṣyate | tābhyāṃ ca lākṣitābhyāṃ vyavasāyināṃ puruṣaviśeṣāṇāṃ vasumatī sarvān kāmān prasūta iti |
6. uktābhyo 'nyā prakīrṇalakṣaṇā | yathā— (raghu. 8.29)
daśaraśmiśatopamadyutiṃ yaśasā dikṣu daśasvapi śrutam |
daśapūrvarathaṃ yamākhyayā daśakaṇṭhāriguruṃ vidurbudhāḥ || 98 ||
hiraṇyapūrvaṃ kaśipuṃ pracakṣate | (māgha. 1. 42)
turaṅgakāntāmukhahavyavāhajvāleva hitvā jalamullalāsa || 99 ||
(māgha. 3.33) iti |
anye punarlakṣitalakṣaṇāmanyathā vyācakṣate— lakṣaṇayopacaritavṛttyā gauṇyā arthena yatrārthāntaraṃ lakṣyate sā lakṣitalakṣaṇeti | yathā— rathāvayavāyudhaḥ, paṅ‌ktirathaḥ (raghu. 9.74), rathāṅganāmeti (raghu. 3.24); atra rathāvayavaśabdena cakraṃ lakṣyate, tena tadākṛtiḥ tannāmā āyudhaviśeṣaḥ; paṅ‌ktirityanena daśākṣaraṃ chando lakṣyate, tena daśaśabdaḥ, tābhyāṃ cāyudhasannidheścakrāyudhaḥ, daśarathaḥ iti devaviśeṣarājaviśeṣau lakṣyete | rathāṅgamityanena rathaikadeśo lakṣyate, tena cakraśabdaḥ, nāmetyanena paribhāṣaṇaṃ lakṣyārthaḥ; tābhyāmanyonyasannidheścakravāka iti pakṣiviśeṣo lakṣyata iti | asyāśca prabandheṣu bhūyasā prayogaḥ | tadyathā— (gāsa. 61)
sūīvehe musalaṃ vicchuhamāṇeṇa daḍ‍ḍhaloeṇa |
ek‍kaggāme vi pio imehiṃ/samehi acchīhi vi ṇa diṭṭho || 100 ||
(sucīvedhe musalaṃ vikṣipatā dagdhalokena |
ekagrāme 'pi priya ābhyām/samābhyām abhyāmapi na dṛṣ‍ṭaḥ ||)
atra sūcīvedhe musalapraveśo na sambhavati, janastu tamapi karotītyanena mukhyayā lakṣitena tasyāsambhāvyamānārthavāditā lakṣyate | yathā—
cuṃbijjaï saahuttaṃ apavāhijjaï sahassasaahuṃttaṃ |
ramia puṇo vi ramijjaï pie jaṇe ṇatthi puṇaruttaṃ || 101 ||1
(cumbyate śatakṛtvaḥ avarudhyate sahasraśatakṛtvaḥ |
rantvā punarapi ramyate priye jane nāsti punaruktam ||)
atra punaruktaśabdo vyarthavāk punaḥprayogaviśeṣe nirūḍhaśaktiḥ, kriyā punaḥkaraṇa— sāmānyaṃ lakṣayati vipakṣi(?) cumbanādi x x x karaṇaviśeṣavaiyarthyāya lakṣayati | evam—
dūi tumaṃ via ṇiuṇā kakkasamahuāi jāṇase volluṃ |
kaṃḍuiapaṃḍaraṃ jaha ṇa hoi taha taṃ kuṇijjāsu || 102 ||
(gāsa. 281)
(dūti tvameva nipuṇā karkaśamṛdukāni jānāsi vaktum |
kaṇḍūyitapāṇḍuraṃ yathā na bhavita yathā taṃ kariṣyasi ||)
atra kaṇḍūyitapāṇḍaramityanena pāruṣyaṃ lakṣyate; tena tu snehakṣatiriti | api ca—
gaaṇaṃ ca mattamehaṃ dhārāḷuḷiajjuṇāi a vaṇāi |
ṇirahaṃkāramiaṃkā harati nīlāo via ṇisāo || 103 ||
(gaganaṃ ca mattameghaṃ dhārālulitārjunāni ca vanāni |
nirahaṅkāramṛgāṅkā haranti nīlā api niśāḥ ||)
atra mattanirahaṅkāśabdāvanibhṛtatvaṃ nibhṛtatvaṃ ca lakṣayantau cetaneṣu rụ̄dhāvacetaneṣu prayujyamānau tayorapi tathāvidhārthayogaṃ lakṣayataḥ | kiṃca— (gāsa.(ve) 969)
aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaaṃ aṇṇā ccia aṃgavạdhḍhaṇacchāā |
sāmā sāmaṇṇavaāvaïssa reha ccia ṇa hoi || 104 ||
(anyallaḍahatvamanyaiva aṅgavarttanacchāyā |
śyāmā sāmānyaprajāpate rekhaiva na bhavati ||
atra rekhāśabdena citrālekhyaṃ lakṣyate, tena ca viśiṣ‍ṭaṃ rūpanirmāṇamiti | aparam—
agaṇiaṇaaṇāāsaṃ mārisaloijjaṃta gataṃ ko hosi maaṇassa(?)|| 104 ||
(agaṇitanayanānāsaṃ māriṣa lokyamāna tvaṃ ko bhavasi madanasya |)
atra madanasya (ko) bhavasītyanena tatsanābhitvaṃ lakṣyate, tena ca tadaupamyamiti | tathā—
1. dhvanyāloke tūttarārdhapāṭha īdṛśaḥ — 'viramia puṇo ramijjaï pie jaṇe ṇatthi' |
pratīcchatyāśokīṃ kisalayaparāvṛttimadharaḥ kapolaḥ pāṇḍutvādavatarati tālīpariṇatim |
parimlānaprāyāmanuvadati dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ kamalinīṃ navīnastanvaḍgayā manasijavikāro vijayate || 106 ||
atra pratīcchatyavataratyanuvadatīti cetanadharmairacetane prayuktairupalakṣiteṣu dhāraṇaprāp‍tyanu, kisalayaparāvṛttyā śvāsadhūsaratvaṃ lakṣyate, tenāpi tatsāmīpyādaśoka— kisalayaupamyamiti; tālīpariṇatyā kamalinīparimlānatayā ca virahakārśyaṃ, tena ca snehātireka iti | evam—(rat‍nā. 2.11)
parimlānaṃ pīnastanajaghanasaṅgādubhayata— stanormadhyasyāntaḥ parimilanamaprāpya haritam |
idaṃ vyastanyāsaṃ ślathabhujalatākṣepavalanaiḥ kṛśāṅgyā: santāpaṃ vadati bisinīpatraśayanam || 107 ||
atra vadatītyanenopacāravṛttyā jñāpayatīti, parimlānamityādibhistaddharmaistasyāḥ tanusanniveśacārutvotkarṣo lakṣyate | api ca—
nirmālyaṃ nayanaśripaḥ kuvalayaṃ vaktrasya dāsaḥ śaśī | (bārā. 1.40)
kandarpasya dhanurlatā kimaparaṃ dvāri bhruvordhāryate || 108 || iti ||
atra nirmālyadāsaśabdabhyāmupacāravṛttyā hīnatvena lakṣitena nayanavaktrayorupamotkarṣo lakṣyate | kandarpadhanurlatāyāstu dvārapraveśakṣaṇopalakṣaṇena hīnatvena tayorapi sutarāṃ brūte | kiṃca— (visa. 2.14)
yat tālīdalapākapāṇḍu vadanaṃ yad durdinaṃ netrayo— ryaccānartitakelipaṅkajadalaṃ śvāsāḥ prasarpanti ca | 109 |
atra durdinaṃ netrayorityatra durdinaśabdaḥ vṛṣ‍ṭimeghāhataśobhe 'hni rụ̄dhābhidhānaśakti— rnetrayorasambhāvyamānatvena svārthāvinābhūtaṃ payaḥpravāhaṃ lakṣayannaśrupravāhaṃ lakṣayati |
anyacca— (mahābhārata 1.119.6)
atikrāntasukhāḥ kāla pratyupasthitadāruṇāḥ |
śaśvat pāpīyadivasāḥ pṛthivī gatayauvanā || 110 ||
atrātikrāntasukhatvādi cetanadharmairacetaneṣu kālādiṣvāropitairateṣu tadasambhavena
tadavinābhūtāstadgatā; prāṇyādayo lakṣyante | tena vak‍tṛnirveda iti |
aparaṃ ca—
'idamandhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhuvanatrayam || 111 ||' (kāvyada. 1.4)
'niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśaścandramā na prakāśate || 112 ||' (rāmā. 3.16.13)
atra yathā andhe rūpaviśeṣābhivyaktirna sambhāvyate evaṃ tamasyapi; yatra nīrandhre rūpaviśeṣābhivyakterasambhavastadandhaṃ tama ityucyate; tathā yathāndho rūpagrahaṇāsamarthaḥ, evam ādarśo 'pi | yo rūpagrahaṇāsamarthaḥ so 'ndha ityucyate; tatropacaritavṛttau yo 'ndhavanna paśyati sa evāndha ityucyate | iha yatra kiṃcinna dṛśyate tatrāpi andhaśabdo lakṣitalakṣaṇayā pravartata iti |
evamanyadapi yathā—
'svalpairasāvapi na dahyata eva kāṣ‍ṭhaiḥ || 113 ||'
'vaassa tumaṃ pi thevacaṃdaṇaraseṇa samasasijjasi || 114 ||'
(vayasya tvamapi stokacandanarasena samāś‍vasihi |)
atra pūrvasmin yathāśrutārtho varṇanīye 'sambhavan yathā vikramādityastathāyamāpi mahāpuruṣaviśeṣa iti lakṣayati | tena ca svalpairvacobhiranākhyeyaṃ māhātmyādiguṇa— goravamubhayorapi lakṣayati | uttaratra tu sa evārtho viruddhalakṣaṇayā vaiparītyenākhyāyata ityevamayamananto lakṣitalakṣaṇāvyāpāraḥ prabandheṣu lakṣaṇīyaḥ | yathā— (dra. sa.ka. pṛ. 185)
ekkiṃhiṃ acchihiṃ sāvaṇu aṇṇahiṃ bhaddavaü |
māhaü mahialamatthari gaṃḍatthala saraü || 114 ||
aṃgahiṃ gimha suhacchii tilavaṇa maggasiru |
muddhihiṃ muhapaṅkaasari āvāsiu sisiru || 116 ||
(ekasminnakṣṇi śrāvaṇo 'nyasmin bhādrapado |
māghaḥ mahītalasrastare gaṇḍasthale śarat ||
aṅge grīṣmaḥ sukhāsikā tilavane mārgaśīrṣaḥ |
mugdhāyā mukhapaṅkajasarasi āvāsitaḥ śiśiraḥ ||)
nīhārajālamalinaḥ punaruktasāndrāḥ kurvan vadhūjanavilocanapakṣmamālāḥ |
kṣuṇṇaḥ kṣaṇaṃ yadubalairdivamātitāṃsuḥ pāṃsurdiśāṃmukhamatutthayadutthito 'dreḥ || 117 ||
(māgha. 4.11)
(2. vivakṣā)
śabdeṣvarthadānābhiprāyo vivakṣā |
yadāha— 'vakturvivakṣitapūrvikā śabdapravṛttiḥ' iti |
tridhā hi vāṅ‍mayam apauruṣeyam, ārṣaṃ, pauruṣeyaṃ ca | tatra—
śabdapradhānam apauruṣeyaṃ mantro brāhmaṇaṃ ca | tatra vakturabhāvād vivakṣā nopapadyate | arthapradhānam ārṣaṃ, smṛtiritihāsaśca | tatra vivakṣāmātraṃ pravartate—(urāca. 1.10)
laukikānāṃ hi sādhūnāṃ vāgarthamanuvartate |
ṛṣīṇāṃ punarādyānāṃ vācamartho 'nuvartate || 118 || iti |
(etadubhaya—)pradhānam1 | (śāstrakāvyādi)pauruṣeyam |
(tac)ca tadubhayamapyabhiniviṣ‍ṭabuddhīnāṃ viśiṣ‍ṭavivakṣābhyo jāyate | tadyathā— 'vivakṣātaḥ kārakāṇi bhavanti' | akṣān dīvyati akṣairdīvyati akṣeṣu dīvyata(ti) iti, valāhako vidyotate, valāhakasya vidyotata iti | (vāpa. 3.7.2)
śaktimātrāsamūhasya viśvasyānekadharmaṇaḥ |
sarvadā sarvathābhāvāt kvacit kiñcid vivakṣyate || 119 ||
kārakeṣvapyakārakavivakṣā yathā— mātuḥ smarati, sarpiṣo jānīte, na māṣāṇāmaśnīyāt |
'naite sukhasya jānanti ye na vatsyanti nandane' || 120 || iti |
atra karmādiṣu śeṣatvena vivakṣiteṣu sambandhamātre ṣaṣ‍ṭhī, na karmakaraṇakartṛṣvapi kārakavibhaktiriti |
akārakeṣu kārakavivakṣā yathā— 'bhavati pacati, bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, asti gacchamo vayamiti | tathā smarasi kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, ehi manye na yāsyasi, paśya mṛgo dhāvati, iha paśyāmaḥ | karmaṇi dvivacana— bahuvacanānyudāhriyanta iti |
kriyāyāmapi kārakavivakṣā yathā— 'corasya rujati, corasyāmayati, coraṃ jvarayati, coraṃ saṃtāpayatī'ti | atra 'rujārthānāṃ bhāvavacanānāmajvarisantāpyoḥ (2.3.54)' iti bhāvasyaiva kartṛtvam |
1. atra rāghavaḥ '(ubhaya)pradhānaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ ca (kāvyaṃ śāstraṃ ca)|' iti pūrayate | itihāsastu tyakta eva sthito 'tra saṃpūrṇe 'pi sandarbhe |
akriyāvivakṣā yathā— 'nīlati vanam, śvetate prāsādaḥ;
viṣavṛkṣo 'pi saṃvardhya svayaṃ chettumasāmpratam || 121 || (kusaṃ. 2. 55)| iti |
kriyāyāṃ kriyāntaravivakṣā yathā— eṣitumicchati, kamituṃ kāmayate, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāditi |
kārake 'pi kriyāvivakṣā yathā—'draṣṭuṃ cakṣuḥ, yoddhuṃ dhanuḥ, gantumanāḥ, gantukāma' iti | atra kriyāyāṃ kriyārthāyāmupapade tumun bhāva uktaḥ | sa cakṣurādīnāṃ kriyāvivakṣāmantareṇa | na sidhyatīti |
asambandhe sambandhavivakṣā yathā—(māgha. 3. 74)
soṭāpamurvīmaniśaṃ nadanto yaiḥ plāvayiṣyanti samantato 'mī |
tānyekadeśānnibhṛtaṃ payodherambhāṃsi meghān pibato dadarśa || 122 ||
acetaneṣu caitanyavivakṣā yathā—nadīkūlaṃ pipatiṣati, aś‍mā luluṭhiṣate |
(cetane acaitanya)—vivakṣā yathā—aśvārohaḥ pipatiṣati |
pradhāne guṇavivakṣā yathā— balākāyāḥ śauk‍lyam, kākasya kārṣṇyamiti |
guṇe pradhānavivakṣā yathā— 'madhuro rasa āpyāyayati, amlo dīpayatīti |
avayave samudāyāvivakṣā yathā— grāmo dagdhaḥ, paṭo dagdhaḥ, akṣṇā kāṇaḥ, pādena khañja iti |
samudāye avayavavivakṣā yathā—'dordaṇḍacaṇḍimamātrāropaṇīye dhanuṣi sati padātilave lakṣmaṇena prabhurāryaḥ', 'māmapi tasyaiva sugṛhītanāmno devasya bhṛtyaparamāṇuṃ vikukṣināmānamavadhārayatu bhavatī' iti |
abhede bhedavivakṣā yathā— parud bhavān paṭurāsīt paṭutara aiṣamaḥ anya evāsi sampannaḥ, rāhoḥ śiraḥ, śilāputrakasya śarīram iti |
bhede 'pyabhedavivakṣā yathā— tāneva śālīnaśnīmo ye madhurāyām, tāneva śāṭakānācchādayāmo ye pāṭaliputra iti |
asato vivakṣā yathā— samudraḥ kuṇḍikā, vindhyo vardhitakamiti |
sato 'pyavivakṣā yathā— anudarā kanyā, alomikā eḍakā iti |
sadasatorvivakṣā yathā— tadidamapameghodayaṃ varṣaṃ, socch‌vāsaṃ maraṇam iti |
sadasatoravivakṣā yathā— 'śailādhirājatanayā na yayau na tasthau' iti | (kusaṃ.5. 85)
stutyā nindāvivakṣā yathā—
guṇānāmeva daurātmyād dhuri dhuryo niyujyate |
asañjātakiṇaskandhaḥ sukhaṃ svapiti gaurgaliḥ || 123 ||
nindayā stutivivakṣā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.271)
capalo nirdayaścāsau janaḥ kiṃ tena me sakhi !
āgaḥpramārjanāyaiva cāṭavo yena śikṣitāḥ || 124 ||
vidhinā niṣedhavivakṣā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.141)
gaccha gacchasi cet kānta ! panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ |
mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyād yatra gato bhavān || 125 ||
niṣedhena vidhivivakṣā yathā—
mā gaccha pramadāpriya priyaśatairbhūyastvamuktau mayā bālā prāṅgaṇamāgatena bhavatā prāpnotyavasthāntaram |
kiṃ cāsyāḥ kucabhārapīḍanaparairyatnaprabandhairapi truṭyatkañcukajālakairanudinaṃ nissūtramasmadgṛham || 126 ||
evamiyamanekadhā vivakṣā viprathate | tadeṣa laukikavādaḥ—(dhvanyā. 3.43)
asminnapāre saṃsāre kavirekaḥ prajāpatiḥ |
yathāsmai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate || 127 ||
api ca—(gaüḍavaho 66)
ṭhiamaṭṭhiaṃ va dīsaï aṭhiaṃ pi jahaṭhṭhiaṃ/pariṭhṭhiaṃ va paḍihāi |
jahasaṃṭhiaṃ ca dīsaï sukaīṇa imāo payaīo || 128 ||
(sthitamasthitamiva dṛśyate asthitamapi yathāsthitamiva/pariṣṭhitamiva pratibhāti |
yathāsaṃsthitamiva dṛśyate sukavīnāmimāḥ padavyaḥ/prakṛtayaḥ||)
kiṃca—
kvacit svalpe 'pyarthe pracuravacanaireva racanā k‍vacid vastu sphāraṃ katipayapadairarpitarasam |
yathāvācyaṃ śabdāḥ k‍vacidapi tulāyāmiva dhṛtā— stribhiḥ kalpairevaṃ kavivṛṣabhasandarbhaniyamaḥ || 129 ||
vivikṣā lokavyavahāre kāvyavyavahāre ca sumatibhirunnīyamānā tridhā vikhyāyate kāk‍vādivyaṅgyā, prakaraṇādivyaṅgyā, abhinayādivyaṅgyā ca | tatra—
(1. kākvādivyaṅgyā —3)
kākuḥ, svaro, viccheda iti kākvādayaḥ | teṣu— (kākuḥ) bhinnakaṇṭhadhvanirdhīraiḥ kākurityabhidhīyate || 130 ||
sā tridhā— 1. niyatapratibandhā, 2. aniyatapratibandhā, 3. apratibandhā ca | tāsu—
(1) niyatapratibandhā dvidhā— sākāṅkṣā, nirākāṅkṣā ca |
tayorvākyāntarāpekṣiṇī sākāṅkṣā |
sā tridhā— ākṣepagarbhā, praś‍nagarbhā, vitarkagarbhā ca |
vākyāntarabhāvinī nirākāṅkṣā |
sāpi tridhā— vidhirūpā, uttararūpā, nirṇayarūpā ca |
tadeva vāk‍yaṃ kākuviśeṣeṇa sākāṅkṣaṃ, tadeva kāk‍vantareṇa nirākāṅkṣam | tatra—
(sākāṅkṣā, nirākāṅkṣā)
ākṣepagarbhā yathā—
yadi me vallabhā dūtī tadāhamapi vallabhā |
yadi tasyāḥ priyā vācastanmamāpi priyapriyāḥ || 131 ||
iyameva nirdeṣṭurvidhirūpā |
praś‍nagarbhā yathā—
gataḥ sa kālo yatrāsīnmuktānāṃ janma valliṣu |
vartante sāmprataṃ tāsāṃ hetavaḥ śuktisampuṭāḥ || 132 ||
iyamevopadeṣṭuruttararūpā |
vitarkagarbhā yathā—(vikramo. 4.1)
navajaladharaḥ sannaddho 'yaṃ na duṣṭaniśācaraḥ suradhanuridaṃ dūrākṛṣṭaṃ na nāma śarāsanam |
ayamapi paṭurdhārāsāro na bāṇaparamparā kanakanikaṣasnigdhā vidyut priyā mama norvaśī || 133 ||
iyamevopadeṣṭurnirṇayarūpā |
evamanyā api—(vikramo. 4. 27)
sarvakṣatibhṛtāṃ nātha dṛṣṭāṃ sarvāṅgasundarī |
rāmā ramye vanānte 'sminmayā virahitā tvayā || 134 ||
ityādayo draṣṭavyāḥ |
tā imāstistro 'pi niyatapratibandhāḥ |
(2) aniyatapratibandhāḥ punaranantāḥ | tāsu —
abhyupagamānunayakākuryathā— (vesaṃ. 1.11)
yuṣmacchāsanalaṅghanāmbhasi mayā magnena nāma sthitaṃ prāp‍tā nāma vigarhaṇā sthitimatāṃ madhye 'nujānāmapi |
krodhollāsitaśoṇitāruṇagadasyocchindatakauravā— nadyaikaṃ divasaṃ mamāsi na gururnāhaṃ vidheyastava || 135 ||
abhyanujñopahāsakākuryathā— (vesaṃ. 1.14)
mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopād ?
duśśāsanasya rudhiraṃ na pibāmyurastaḥ?
sañcurṇayāmi gadayā na suyodhanorū?
sandhiṃ karotu bhavatāṃ nṛpatiḥ paṇena || 136 ||
viṣānnā(amarṣā?)dyākṣepakākuryathā— (vesaṃ 1. 7)
lākṣāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśaiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca naḥ prahṛtya |
ākṛṣṭapāṇḍavavadhūparidhānakeśāḥ svasthā bhavantu mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ || 137 ||
evamanyā api— (rudraṭa. 2.17)
śalyamapi skhaladantaḥ sọdhuṃ śak‍yeta hālahaladigdham |
dhīrairna punarakāraṇakupitakhalālīkadurvacanam || 138 ||
ityādayo draṣṭavyāḥ |
(3) apratibandhā tu ekaguṇā, dviguṇā, triguṇā (caturguṇā) ca | tatra—
ekaguṇā yathā—
bhrukuṭirāracitā, gatamagrato hṛtamathānanamuktamasādhu vā |
iyamapi prabhutā kriyate balādakupito 'pi hi yat kupito janaḥ || 139 ||
dviguṇā yathā—
kiṃkirātena yaccakre samākṛṣya śilīmukhān |
śilīmukhān samākṛṣya kiṃ kirātaḥ karoti tat || 140 ||
triguṇā yathā—
seyaṃ paś‍yati, no kuraṅgakavadhūstrasteyamud‌vīkṣate
tasyāḥ pāṇirayaṃ, na mārutacalaḥ patrākṛtiḥ pallavaḥ |
tāraṃ roditi saiva naiṣa marutā veṇuḥ samāpūryate seyaṃ māmabhibhāṣate priyatamā, no kokilaḥ kūjati || 141 ||
caturguṇā khalvapi yathā— (kirātā. 9.39, 40)
ucyatāṃ sa vacanīyamaśeṣaṃ neśvare paruṣatā sakhi sādhvī |
ānayainamanunīya kathaṃ vā vipriyāṇi janayannanuneyaḥ || 142 ||
kiṃ gatena na hi yuktamupaituṃ kaḥ priye subhagamānini mānaḥ |
yoṣitāmiti kathāsu sametaiḥ kāmibhirbahurasā dhṛtirūhe || 143 ||
sakhyā vā nāyikāyā vā sakhīnāyakayoratha |
bhūyasīnāṃ sakhīnāṃ vā vāci kākuriha sthitā || 144 || (kā.mī. pṛ.12)
evamanyā api ko 'hamityādayo draṣṭavyāḥ |
(svarāḥ)
svarāstridhā — 1. plutādayaḥ, 2. udāttādayaḥ 3. pragṛhyādayaśca | teṣu —
(1) plutādayo yathā—
subhru ! tvaṃ kupitetyapāstamaśanaṃ tyaktā kathā yoṣitāṃ dūrādeva mayojjhitāḥ surabhayaḥ straggandhadhūpādayaḥ |
kopaṃ rāgiṇi muñca mayyupanate dṛṣṭe prasīdādhunā satyaṃ tvad‌virahād bhavanti dayite ! sarvā mamāndhā diśaḥ || 145 ||
tadetatpriyatamāprasādanaparamapi vākyaṃ dṛṣṭe ityatra sambuddhau plutasvarakaraṇā— dutkupitadṛṣṭiprasādanaparaṃ sampadyate | ādigrahaṇena hnasvadīrghānunāsikāḥ saṅgṛhyante | tatra
hrasvasvarakaraṇādarthabhedo yathā— aśvavaditi (aśvāvati iti) sambodhanaṃ pratīyate |
dīrghakaraṇādarthabhedo yathā— viśvāmitro viśvānara iti ṛṣiḥ, saṃjñā ca pratīyate |
anunāsikakaraṇādarthabhedo yathā— 'gambhīraāṁ apaḥ atra' (gabhīra āṁ ugraputre; abhra āṁ apaḥ) (ṛve. 8.67.11, 5.48.1); 'āṅo 'nunāsikaś‍chandasi' (6.1.126) iti īṣadādirthaḥ pratīyate |
na sthāṇudinaṃ (ananunāsikaṃ ?) yathā— (urāca. 2.31)
ā jñātaṃ sa jaṭāyureṣa jarasā kliṣṭo vadhaṃ vāñchati || 146 ||
2. udāttādayo yathā— kalo ravo 'syeti kalaravaḥ, ekaḥ putro 'syetyekaputra iti | samāse bahuvrīhisvaro bhavati, sa ca pūrvapadasyāvantodāttaḥ | kalaścāsau ravaśca, ekaścāsau putraśceti samāse karmadhārayasvaro bhavati | sa ca 'samāsasya' (6.1.223) iti samāsasyāntodātto bhavati | tābhyāṃ cānyapadārtha uttarapadārthaśca pratīyate | taduktam—
saṃśayāya dadhatoḥ sarūpatāṃ dūrabhinnaphalayoḥ kriyāṃ prati |
śabdaśāsanavidaḥ samāsayorvigrahaṃ vyavasasuḥ svareṇa te || 147 ||
(māgha. 14.24)
ādigrahaṇenānudāttasvaritaikaśrutayaḥ saṅgṛhyante | tatra —
anudāttādarthabhedo yathā— pūrvoktayorevodāharaṇayoranyapadārthaḥ pratīyate, nottarapadārtha iti |
svaritādarthabhedo yathā— bhrātṛvya iti bhrāturapatyaṃ pratīyate, na sapat‍naḥ |
ekaśruterarthabhedo yathā— āgaccha bho māṇavaka devadatta3 (mabhā. 1.20.33)
'ag‍nirmūrdhā divaḥ kakutpatiḥ pṛthivyā ayam apāṃ retāṃsi jinvato3m ||' (ṛve. 8.44. 16, kāśikā 1.2.34)1 yatraikaśruteḥ yathā X X X dūrādāhvānamajñaka yathā— X X X sandhīyate X X X tatsvaro 'pi tātsthyāt pragṛhya ityucyate; tato 'rthabhedo yathā— 'ālī āgacchāmi tām itaḥ' iti sakhībhyāmivāgantavyam ityarthaḥ pratīyate, nāgantūnāṃ paṅktirasmād iti |
ādigrahaṇena sandheyasaṃvṛtā saṃgṛhyante | tatra —
sandheyādarthabhedo yathā— āṅgirasa iti;
1. itaḥ param āṅgirasa ityantaṃ bhāgaṃ rāghavo yathā tathā vyākṛtya śrānto 'sphuṭārtha eṣa iti manvāno virarāma |
(vicchedaḥ)
vicchedastridhā— 1. padavicchedo, 2. vākyavicchedo, 3. yativicchedaśca | teṣu—
(1) padavicchedaḥ caturdhā— śṛṅkhalā, bhaṅgaḥ, parivartakaḥ, cūrṇakam iti | teṣu—
śṛṅkhalā yathā— 'kāntāratarutalāsitamṛgayuvaracitāntarā haratyaṭavī' iti | atra yadā kāntāraḥ tarutalaḥ āntarā iti padacchedastadā priyā—sambhoga—maṇita— harṣita—vyādhapradhāna—vyāp‍tamadhyā iti | seyaṃ śṛṅkhalevānyonyasaṅkalācchṛṅkhalā |
bhaṅgo yathā— jāya X X X X vākyaṃ nindārthaṃ kriyate seyaṃ padadvaidhībhāvo bhaṅgaḥ |
parivartako yathā— 'kalikāmadhugarhaṇā' ityavikṛtameva vicchidyate, (tadā) kuṭa‌malamakaranda— niṣyandetyarthapratītiḥ; yadā tu kilakāmadhuk arhaṇeti tadā pūjanaiva kalikāle kāmadhenuriti; so 'yaṃ gakārakakārayoḥ parivartane parivartakaḥ |
cūrṇakaṃ yathā— 'paś‍yaṃ salilaṃ payodherdūrasamunmuktaśuktimīnāṅkāntam'; matsyānāṃ vallabhaṃ payodherjalamavalokayetyarthaḥ; yadā tu dūrasam unmuktaśuktimīnāṅkāntamiti, tadā duḥkhena rasanīyaṃ udvāntamauktikādhāraṃ matsyacihnitaparyantaṃ jalamavalokayeti | atra śuktītyasya saṃyogākṣarasya dūrasamityatra rephasya ca cūrṇanimittaṃ cūrṇakam |
(2) vāk‍yavicchedo 'pi caturdhā— vāk‍yasambhedo, vāk‍yānyathātvaṃ, vāk‍yāsamāp‍tiḥ, vāk‍yānuc‍cāraṇam iti; teṣu—
1. vākyasambhedo yathā—
diṅ‌mātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate siddhā sāpi vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paś‍ta |
viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo yasmādāvirabhūt kathād‍bhutamidaṃ yatraiva cāstaṃ gatam || 148 ||
atra vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paś‍yateti vāk‍yasambhedo vakturbhāvakatvena guṇaviśeṣavijñānātiśayaprakāśanaṃ pratipādayati |
2. vākyānyathātvaṃ yathā— (vesaṃ. 2.5)
sahabhṛtyagaṇaṃ sabāndhavaṃ sahamitraṃ sabalaṃ sahānugam |
svabalena nihanti saṃyuge nacirātpāṇḍusutaḥ suyodhanam || 149 ||
atra pāṇḍusutaṃ suyojhana iti vaktavye pāṇḍusutaḥ suyojhanamiti
bhānumatīvirahavaimanasyaprayuktasya suyodhanavākyasyānyathātvamanucyamānaṃ bhāvino 'rthasya tathātvamavabodhayati |
3. vākyāsamāp‍tiryathā— (urāca. 3.26)
tvaṃ jīvitaṃ tvamasi me hṛdayaṃ dvitīyaṃ tvaṃ kaumudī nayanayoramṛtaṃ tvamaṅge |
ityādibhiḥ priyaśatairanudhya mugdhāṃ tāmeva śāntamathavā kimataḥ pareṇā ||
atra 'śāntamathavā kimataḥpareṇe'ti vāsantīvākyāsamāptiḥ 'suhṛdviṣaye nāmaṅgalaṃ vaktavyami'—ti pratipādayati |
4. vākyānuc‍cāraṇaṃ yathā—
akṣudrā 'rikṛtā 'bhimanyu—nidhana—prodbhūta—tīvra—krudhaḥ kīrṇā bāṣpakaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍājaḍā dṛṣṭayaḥ |
pārthasyā 'kṛta—śātrava—pratikṛterantaśśucā muhyato hā vatseti giraḥ sphuranti na punarniryānti kaṇṭhād bahiḥ || 151 ||
atra hā vatseti vākyānuc‍cāraṇamakṛtaśatrupratikriyāṇāṃ mahātmanāmanucitaṃ paridevanamiti jñāpayati |
(3. yativicchedaḥ)
virāmo yatiḥ | sa caturdhā— pade, pāde, ardhe, sthāne ca |
tasyānyathākaraṇaṃ yativicchedaḥ |
1. tatra pade yathā—
sampado jalataraṅgavilolā yauvanaṃ tricaturāṇi dināni |
śāradābhradalacañcalamāyuḥ, kiṃ dhanaiḥ, parahitāni vidadhvam || 152 ||
atra kiṃ dhanairiti padayatau nyāyyo 'rthaḥ pratīyate, tasyānyathākaraṇaṃ kimityatraiva vicchedaḥ; tena ca kimiti dhanaiḥ parahitāni vidadhvamityanyāyyaḥ |
2. pāde yathā—
purāṇaṃ mānavo dharmaḥ sāṅgo vedaścikitsitam |
ājñāsiddhāni catvāri na hantavyāni hetubhiḥ || 153 || (manu. 12.110)
atra yadā pāde pāde yatistadā nyāyyo 'rthaḥ pratīyate; yadā tvājñāsiddhāni catvāri neti pādamatikramya tadā anyāyya iti |
3. ardhe yathā—(kirātā. 9.39)
ucyatāṃ sa vacanīyamaśeṣaṃ neśvare paruṣatā sakhi ! sādhvī |
ānayainamanunīya kathaṃ vā vipriyāṇi janayannanuneyaḥ || 154 ||
atra yadārdhe yatistadaikasyā evedaṃ vākyamityanyo 'rthaḥ pratīyate; yadā tu tadvicchedāt pāda eva yatiḥ kriyate tadā dvayoḥ bahvīnāṃ vā ekavākyenānya iti |
4. sthāne yathā—
yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purā strīkṛto yo gaṅgāṃ ca dadhe 'ndhakakṣayakaro yo barhipatrapriyaḥ |
yasyāhuśśaśimacchiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ so 'vyādiṣṭabhujaṅgahāravalayastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ || 155 ||
atra dvādaśasu sap‍tasu cākṣareṣu yatisthānam, tadatikrameṇa balijitkāya iti śaśimacchirohara iti ca yatikaraṇe umādhavo mādhavaśca tvāmavyādityarthau krameṇa pratīyete iti |
(2. prakaraṇādivyaṅgyā)
prakaraṇamartho liṅgamaucityaṃ deśaḥ kāla iti prakaraṇādayaḥ |
tatra prakaraṇādyathā saindhavaḥ sāmānyena lavaṇe 'śve puruṣe ca vartamānaḥ bhojanādiprakaraṇavaśādarthaviśeṣapratipattinimittaṃ bhavati |
devo varṣatītyarthāt devaśabdo meghamabhidhatte,
rāmalakṣmaṇāviti lakṣmaṇaliṅgād rāmaśabdo dāśarathau vartate |
puṇḍarīkamukhītyaucityāt puṇḍarīkaśabdaḥ kamalamāha,
amarāvatyāṃ haririti hariśabdo deśataḥ śatakratuṃ brūte,
rātrau pataṅgaṃ paś‍yeti kālataḥ pataṅgaśabdaḥ śalabhamabhidhatta iti |
evamanye 'pi | tadyathā—
bhavatu viditaṃ śabdā vakturvivakṣitasūcakāḥ smaravati yataḥ kānte kāntāṃ haṭhāt paricumbati |
na na na ma ma mā māṃ mā sprākṣīrniṣedhaparaṃ vaco bhavati śithile mānagranthau tadeva vidhāyakam || 156 || iti |
(3. abhinayādivyaṅgyā)
abhinayo 'padeśo nirdeśaḥ saṃjñā iṅgitamākāra ityābhinayādayaḥ | teṣu —
abhinayo yathā—
eddahamettatthaṇiā eddahamettehi acchivattehiṃ |
eddahamettāvatthā eddahamettehi diaehiṃ || 157 ||
(etāvanmātrastanī etāvanmātrābhyāmakṣipatrābhyām |
etāvanmātrāvasthā etāvanmātrairdivasaiḥ ||)
apadeśo yathā—(kusaṃ. 2.55)
itaḥ sa daityaḥ prāp‍taśrīrneta evārhati kṣayam |
viṣavṛkṣo 'pi saṃvardhya svayaṃ chettumasāmpratam || 158 ||
nirdeśo yathā— 'bhartṛdārike diṣṭyā vardhāmahe, yadatraiva ko 'pi kasyāpi (vallabhaḥ) tiṣṭhatīti māmaṅgulīvilāsenākhyātavatyaḥ |'(māmā. 128/29)
saṃjñā yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.6)
apyavastuni kathāpravṛttaye praś‍natatparamanaṅgaśāsanam |
vīkṣitena parigṛhya pārvatī mūrdhakampamayamuttaraṃ dadau || 159 ||
iṅgitaṃ yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.261)
kadā nau saṅgamo bhāvītyākīrṇe vaktumakṣamam |
avetya kāntamabalā līlāpadmaṃ nyamīlayat || 160 ||
ākāro yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.46)
niveditaṃ niḥśvasitena soṣmaṇā manastu me saṃśayameva gāhate |
na vidyate prārthayitavya eva te bhaviṣyati prārthitadurlabhaḥ katham || 161 ||
evamanye 'pi; yathā—
āśleṣe prathamaṃ kramādatha jite hṛdye 'dharasyārpaṇe kelīdyūtavidhau paṇaṃ priyatame kāntāṃ punaḥ pṛcchati |
sāntarhāsaniruddhasambhṛtarasod‍bhedasphuradagaṇḍayā tūṣṇīṃ śāravisāraṇāya nihitaḥ svedāmbugarbhaḥ karaḥ || 162 ||
(3. tātparyam)
yatparaśśabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti tātparyam |
tac‍ca vākya evopapadyate, padamātreṇābhiprāyasya prakāśayitumaśakyatvāt |
tac‍ca vākyapratipādyaṃ vastu trirūpaṃ bhavati —
1. abhidhīyamānaṃ, 2. pratīyamānaṃ, 3. dhvanirūpaṃ ca |
yatra yadupāttaśabdeṣu mukhyāgauṇīlakṣaṇābhiḥ śabdaśaktibhiḥ svamarthamabhidhāyoparata— vyāpāreṣu ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatādibhirvākyārthamabhidhīyate tadabhidhīmānam, yathā— gaurgacchatīti |
vākyārthāvagateruttarakālaṃ vākyārtha upapadyamāno 'nupapadyamāno vārthaprakaraṇau— cityādisahakṛtau yatpratyāyayati tatpratīyamānam; yathā— 'viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣva mā cāsya gṛhe bhuṅkthāḥ' ityukte varaṃ viṣaṃ bhakṣitam, na punarasya gṛhe bhuktamiti pratīyate |
arthaśabdopāyādupasarjanīkṛtasvārtho vākyārthāvagateranantaramanunādarūpaṃ pratiśabdarūpaṃ vā yad abhivyañjayati tad‌dhvanirūpam | tac‍ca na sārvatrikam | tathā hi yathā— nivṛtte 'bhighāte kasyacideva kāṃsyāderdravyasyānunādo jāyate, kasyacideva kandarādeḥ pratiśabdaḥ, yathā ca kasyacideva vākyasya pratīyamānābhidhīyamānavākyārthapratīteranantaraṃ dhvanirupalabhyata iti | nimiṣatyeṣetyukte 'kṣṇornimeṣo 'bhidhīyate, devī na bhavatīti pratīyate, rūpātiśayaṃ ca dhvanati | athaiṣāṃ prayogaḥ |
(1. abhidhīyamānam)
tatrābhidhīyamānaṃ caturdhā— vidhirūpaṃ, niṣedharūpaṃ, vidhiniṣedharupam, avidhiniṣedharūpañ‍ca | teṣu —
vidhirūpaṃ yathā—
dānaṃ vittādṛtaṃ vācaḥ kīrtidharmau tathāyuṣaḥ |
paropakaraṇaṃ kāyādasārāt sāramuddharet || 163 ||
niṣedharūpaṃ yathā—
lokayātrā bhayaṃ lajjā dākṣiṇyaṃ dharmaśīlatā |
yasyaitāni na vidyante na tena saha saṃvaset || 164 ||
vidhiniṣedharūpaṃ yathā—
pak‍vānnamiva rājendra ! sarvasādhāraṇāḥ striyaḥ |
tasmāt tāsu na kupyeta na rajyeta rameta ca || 165 ||
avidhiniṣedharūpaṃ yathā—
na dānena na mānena na śāṭhyena na sevayā |
na śāstreṇa na hṛdyāstāḥ sarvathā kimiva striyaḥ || 166 ||
(2. pratīyamānam)
pratīyamānaṃ punaranekadhā |
1. k‍vacid vidhau niṣedhaḥ — (gāsa. 2.75)
bhama dhammia vīsaddho/visattho so suṇao ajja mārio teṇa |
golāṇaīkacchakuḍaṃgavāsiṇā dariasīheṇa || 167 ||
(bhrama dhārmika vistrabdhaḥ/viś‍vastaḥ sa śunako 'dya māritastena |
godānadīkacchakuñjavāsinā dṛp‍tasiṃhena ||)
atra vistrabdho bhrameti vidhivākye tatra nikuñje siṃhastiṣṭhati, tvaṃ ca śuno 'pi bibheṣi, tasmāttvayā tasminna gantavyamiti niṣedhaḥ pratīyate |
2. k‍vacinniṣedhe vidhiryathā — (gāsa. 7.67)
attā ettha ṇumajjaï ettha ahaṃ divasaaṃ paloehi |
mā pahia rattiaṃdhaa sejjāe maha ṇimajjihisi || 168 ||
(śvaśrūratra nimajjati śete atrāhaṃ divasakaṃ pralokaya |
mā pathika rātryandhaka śayyāyāmāvayorniṅkṣyasi ||)
atra śayyāyāṃ mā niṣatsyasīti niṣedhavākye iyaṃ śvūśrūśayyā, iyaṃ macchayyeti divābhyupalakṣya rātrau tvayehāgantavyamiti vidhiḥ pratīyate |
3. k‍vacidvidhau vidhyantaraṃ yathā— (gāsa. 4.35)
bahalatamā haarāī ajja paüttho paī gharaṃ suṇṇaṃ |
taha jaggijja saajjia/ jjhia ṇa jahā amhe musijjāmo || 169 ||
(bahalatamā hatarātriradya proṣitaḥ patiḥ, gṛhaṃ śūnyam |
tathā jāgṛhi prativeśin ! na yathā vayaṃ muṣyāmahe ||)
atra yathā vayaṃ na muṣyāmahe tathā jāgṛhīti vidhyābhidhāne rātriratyandhakārā, patiḥ proṣito, gṛhaṃ śūnyam atastvamabhayo matpārśvamāgaccheti vidhyantaraṃ pratīyate |
4. k‍vacinniṣedhe niṣedhāntaraṃ yathā—(gāsa. 958 ve.)
āsāiaṃ aṇāeṇa jettiyaṃ tettieṇa baṃdha dihiṃ |
oramasu vasaha eṇhiṃ rakkhijjaï gahavaīchittaṃ || 170 ||
(āsvāditamajñātena yāvat tāvadeva baṃdhāna dhṛtim |
uparama vṛṣabhedānīṃ rakṣyate gṛhapatikṣetram ||)
atra gṛhapatikṣetre duṣṭavṛṣavāraṇapare niṣedhavākye upapativāraṇaṃ niṣedhāntaraṃ pratīyate |
5. k‍vacid vidhiniṣedhe vidhiryathā—(vala. 491)
mahuehiṃ kiṃva paṃthia jaï harasi ṇiaṃsaṇaṃ ṇiaṃvāo |
vāhemi kassa raṇṇe gāmo dūre ahaṃ ekkā || 171 ||
(madhukaiḥ kiṃvā pāntha yadi harasi nivasanaṃ nitambātṣa |
āhvayāmi kasyāraṇye grāmo dūre ahaṃ ekā ||)
atra vidhiniṣedhayoranabhidhāne 'ahamekākinī grāmo dūra' iti viviktopadeśānnitamba— vāso 'pi me hareti vidhiḥ pratīyate |
6. k‍vacid avidhiniṣedhe yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.139)
jīvitāśā balavatī dhanāśā durbalā mama |
gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā kānta ! svāvasthā tu niveditā || 172 ||
atra gaccha vā tiṣṭha vetyavidhiniṣedhājjīvitāśā balavatī dhanāśā durbalā mameti vacanāt tvayā vināhaṃ jīvituṃ na śak‍nomītyupakṣepeṇa gamananiṣedhaḥ pratīyate |
7. k‍vacid vidhiniṣedhayorvidhyantaraṃ yathā— (gāsa. pṛ. 957 ve.)
ṇiadaïadaṃsaṇakkhitta pahia aṇṇeṇa vac‍casu paheṇa |
gahavaïdhūā dullaṃghavāurā iha haaggāme || 173 ||
(nijadayitādarśanotsikta ! pathika ! anyena vraja pathā |
gṛhapatiduhitā durlaṅghavāgurā iha hatagrāme ||)
atrānyena pathā vrajeti vidhiniṣedhayorabhidhāne he svakāntābhirūpatāvikatthana pānthābhirūpaka iha grāme bhavato gṛhapatisutā draṣṭavyarūpeti vidhyantaraṃ pratīyate |
8. k‍vacid vidhiniṣedhayorniṣedhāntaraṃ yathā—(gāsa.(ve) 959)
uc‍ciṇasu paḍia—kusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ haliasuh‍ṇe |
esa avasāṇaviraso sasureṇa suo vaḷaasaddo || 174 ||
(uc‍cinu patitakusumaṃ mā dhunīhi śephālikāṃ hālikas‍nuṣe |
eṣa avasānavirasaḥ śvaśureṇa śruto valayaśabdaḥ ||)
atra patitaṃ kusumamuc‍cinu mā dhunīhi śophālikāmiti vidhiniṣedhayorabhidhāne 'sakhi ! cauryarate prasakte valayaśabdo na kartavya iti niṣedhāntaraṃ pratīyate |
9. k‍vacid vidhāvanubhayaṃ yathā—
saṇiaṃ vac‍ca kisoari pae paatteṇa vavasumahi paṭṭedi/ṭhavasu mahivaṭṭhe |
bhañjihisi vitthaatthaṇi vihiṇā dukkheṇa ṇimmaviā || 175 ||
(śanairvraja kṛśodari ! bahuprayat‍nena vyavasyāmaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ/sthāpaya mahīpṛṣṭhe |
bhaṅkṣyasi vistṛtastani ! vidhinā duḥkhena nirmāpitā ||)
atra śanairvrajeti vidhyabhidhāne hi na vidhirnāpi niṣedhaḥ, api tu varṇanāmātraṃ pratīyate |
10. k‍vacinniṣedhe 'nubhayaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 968 ve.)
de ā pasia ṇivattasu muhasasijoṇhāviluttatamaṇivahe |
ahīsāriāṇa vigghaṃ karesi aṇṇāṇa vi haāse || 176 ||
(prārthaye tāvat prasīda nivartasva mukhaśaśijyots‍nāvilup‍tatamonivahe |
abhisārikāṇāṃ vigh‍naṃ karoṣi anyāsāmapi hatāśo ! ||)
atra nivartasveti niṣedhābhidhāne 'pi na niṣedho nāpi vidhiḥ; api tu mukhendukāntiḥ pratīyate |
11. k‍vacid vidhiniṣedhayoranubhayaṃ yathā—(gāsa. pṛ.944 ve.)
vac‍ca maha c‍cia ekkāe hoṃtu ṇīsāsa—roiavvāiṃ |
mā tujjha vi tīe viṇā dakkhiṇṇahaassa jāaṃtu || 177 ||
(vraja mamaivaikasyā bhavantu niḥśvāsaroditavyāni |
mā tavāpi tayā vinā dākṣiṇyahatasya jāyantām ||)
