mā tavāpi tāṃ vinā tāni jāyantāmiti vidhiniṣedhayorabhidhāne na vidhirnāpi niṣedhaḥ ; api tu kṛtavyalīkapriyatamopālambhanamātraṃ pratīyate |
12. k‍vacid avidhiniṣedhe 'nubhayaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 2.71)
golāṇaïe tūhe/kacche cakkhaṃto rāiāi pattāiṃ |
upphaḍaï makkaḍo khokkhaei poṭṭaṃ ca piṭ‌ṭei || 178 ||
(godānadyāḥ tīrthe/kacche carvayan rājikāyāḥ patrāṇi |
utpatati markaṭaḥ khokkhaśabdaṃ karotyudaraṃ ca tāḍayati ||)
atra na vidhirnāpi niṣedho 'bhidhīyate | nāpyenayoḥ anyaḥ, saṅketakuḍuṃge abhyāgato bhavānna gata iti taṃ jñāpayatīti pratīyate |
(3. dhvanirūpam)
pratīyamānābhidhīyamānavākyārthānāmānantyād dhvanirūpam apyanekaprakārameva | dhvaniśca dvidhā 1. arthadhvaniḥ, 2. śabdadhvaniśca | tayoḥ —
1. arthadhvaniḥ anunādadhvanirūpaḥ pratiśabdadhvanirūpaśca | tatra—
yo 'bhidhīyamānavākyārthānusyūtameva kāṃsyānunādarūpamarthāntaraṃ dhvanati, sa anunādadhvaniḥ | yathā—
śikhariṇi k‍va nu nāma kiyac‍ciraṃ kimabhidhānamasāvakarottapaḥ |
taruṇi! yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśābakaḥ || 179 ||
atra yathāśrutavākyārtho 'bhidhīyamāno bimbaphalāruṇādhara ityupalakṣaṇena rāgātiśayaṃ pratyāyayannālpapuṇyastvadadharapratinidhimapi cumbatīti cāṭunā varṇanīyāyāḥ svānurāga— prakāśanaṃ dhvanati | etac‍ca kāṃsyadhvanivadavicchinnameva dhvanannanunādarūpaṃ pratīyata ityanunādadhvaniḥ | tathā—
śāntyai vo 'stu kapāladāma jagatāṃ patyuryadīyāṃ lipiṃ k‍vāpi k‍vāpi gaṇāḥ paṭhanti padaśo nātiprasiddhākṣarām |
viśvaṃ srakṣyati vakṣyati kṣitimapāmīśiṣyate 'śiṣyate nāgai rāgiṣu raṃsyate 'tsyati jagannirvekṣyati dyāmiti || 180 ||
atra gaṇāḥ kapālalipimaprasiddhakṣarāṃ padaśaḥ paṭhantīti vākyārtho 'bhidhīyamāna— stāni kapālāni brahmādīnāmiti pratyāyayan mahādhvo(rtho)pasaṃhāre bhagavato 'nupahata— prabhāvasyaikākino 'vasthānam iva (iti) dhvanati | tac‍ca 'viśvaṃ' srakṣyatītyādi— padārthānusyūtamevā 'nunādavannirūpyata ityanunādadhvaniḥ | evam—
aṇṇatta/ttha vac‍ca bālaa majjaṃtiṃ/ṇhaaṃtiṃ kīsa maṃ paloesi |
eaṃ bho jāābhīruāṇa tūhaṃ titthaṃ via ṇa hoī || 181 ||
(anyatra vraja bālaka! majjantīṃ/s‍nāntīṃ kasmād māṃ pralokayasi |
evam bho jāyabhīrukāṇāṃ tīrthameva na bhavati ||)
atra kiṃ māṃ majjantīṃ pralokayasi, anyatra vraja, nedaṃ jāyābhīrūṇāṃ tīrthamitya— bhidhīyamāno jāyāyāstvaṃ bibheṣi, tena māṃ na kāmayasa ityupālambhārthaṃ pratyāyayan s‍nehaṃ vinā yuvatīnāmīrṣyāyitaṃ bhavatīti dhvanati | tac‍ca tasyā anurāgārthānusyūtamevānunādarūpaṃ dhvanatītyanunādadhvaniḥ | evaṃ 'attā ettha ṇimajjaï' ityādivākye niṣedhe vidhiḥ pratīyamānaḥ kadācidayamandhakāre madabhrāntyā śvaśrūṃ prati yāyādityutprekṣamāṇāyāḥ skhalitapratividhānarūpaṃ rātryandhapadābhidhānamapi nayavatyā vaidagdhyaṃ dhvanati | tac‍cābhidhīyamānapratīyamānayoranusyūtena pratīyata ityanunādadhvaniḥ | tathā— 'mahuehi kiṃ vi paṃthia' ityādau avidhiniṣedhe vidhiḥ pratīyamāno madhūkāpacāyikāyāḥ prārthanāvaidagdhyaṃ dhvanati | tac‍ca pratīyamānārthānusyūtamevānunādamivopalabhyata ityanunādadhvaniḥ | api ca—'uc‍ciṇasu paḍiaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ' ityādivākye vidhiniṣedhayorniṣedhaḥ pratīyamānaḥ skhalitagopaneṣu sakhīvaidagdhyaṃ dhvanati | sa ca śephālikāpuṣpāvacayavyājena paścād‌vāṭamupagatāyā hālikas‍nuṣāyāstatrāgatenopapatinā saha pravṛtte cauryaratakalahe kuḍyāntaritaśvaśurākarṇyamānamanoharavalayaśabdapratiṣedhaparatayā pravartamānaḥ s‍nuṣānusyūtamela śephālikāśākhāvadhūnanaṃ savalayakarāvadhūnanaṃ ca kāṃsyadhvanirūpeṇānunādo dhvaniṃ pratipādayannanunādadhvanivyapadeśamāsādayatīti |
yaḥ punarabhidhīyamānavākyārthāt pṛthagbhūta iva guhādipratiśabdānurūpamarthāntaraṃ pratyāyayan pratidhvanati sa pratiśabdadhvaniḥ | yathā —
lāvaṇyasindhuraparaiva hi keyamatra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha saṃplavante |
unmajjati dvirakumbhataṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalakāṇḍamṛṇāladaṇḍāḥ || 182 ||
yathā— guhāyāṃ pauruṣādiśabdānāṃ pratiśabdā jāyante, te ca dhvaniṃ janayanta upalabhyante, evaṃ lāvaṇyasindhurityetasmin padyārthe utpalādiśabdānāṃ yathā svopameyalocanādyarthapratiśabdā jāyante, te cārthāntaradhvaniṃ janayanta upalabhyante, tatheha ca yathāśrūyamāṇānāmutpalādīnāmartho 'bhidhīyamānaḥ tasya locanādyarthaiḥ saha sādṛś‍yaṃ pratyāyayan varṇanīyāyāścārutvotkarṣapratītiṃ dhvanati | sā tataḥ pṛthagivopalabhyamānā
pratiśabdadhvaniḥ | yathā—(vāyu. 83.11)
eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet |
yajeta vā 'śvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet || 183 ||
atra bahavaḥ putrā eṣṭavyā iti vākyārtho 'bhidhīyamānaḥ putraiḥ pitṛprītaye prayāgagamanādayaḥ kartavyā iti pratyāyayan pitṛṇāṃ kāmapūraṇaṃ paramapuruṣārtha iti dhvanati | sa ca pitṛvyapadeśaparatayā pravṛttaḥ putroddeśarūpeṇa tatpravṛttiṣu pratiśabdāyamānaḥ pṛthagivopalabhyata iti pratiśabdadhvaniḥ | evam— (gāsā. 886 ve.)
kassa va ṇa hoi roso daṭh‌ṭhūe piāe savvaṇaṃ aharaṃ |
sabhamarakamalapaümagghāiri vāriavāme sahasu eṇhiṃ || 184 ||
(kasya vā na bhavati roṣaḥ dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam |
sabhramarakamalapadmaghrāyiṇi vāritavāme ! sahasvedānīm ||)
atra sakhyupālambhārtho 'bhidhīyamānaḥ patyurīrṣyopaśāntaye bhramareṇāsyā adharaḥ khaṇḍito nopapatineti pratyāyayan skhalitagopaneṣu sakhīvaidagdhyaṃ dhvanati | sa cānyopadeśaparatvena pravṛtto 'nyasya cetasi pratiphalati iti pratiśabdadhvaniḥ | evaṃ 'bhama dhammia vīsaddho' ityādivākye vidhau niṣedhaḥ pratīyamānaḥ tasyā nadīkuñjake kenacit saha saṅketārthaṃ dhvanati | sa vākyārthāt pṛthagivopalabhyamānaḥ pratiśabdadhvaniḥ | 'āsāiaṃ aṇṇāeṇa jattiam' ityādivākye vṛṣanivāraṇaparo niṣedha upapatinivāraṇaṃ pratyāyayan prayokturvaidagdhyaṃ dhvanati | sa cānyābhidhānenānyamabhidadhat tataḥ pṛthagivopalabhyamānaḥ pratiśabdadhvaniḥ | evaṃ 'golāṇaïe kacche cakkhanto rāiāi pattāi' ityapi pratiśabdadhvaniriti |
(2. śabdadhvaniḥ)
evaṃ śabdadhvanirapi dvidhaiva | tatra—
anunādarūpo yathā— (sūryaśa. 2)
bhaktiprahvāya dātuṃ mukulapuṭakuṭīkoṭarakroḍalīnāṃ lakṣmīnākraṣṭukāmā iva kamalavanod‍ghāṭanaṃ kurvate ye |
kālākārandhakārānanapatitajagatsādhvasadhvaṃsakalyāḥ kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kisalayarucayaste karā bhāskarasya || 185 ||
atra bhāskarakarāḥ kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuriti vākyārthaḥ karaśabdaśakti— svābhāvyāt kisalayarucaya ityādisamastatulyaviśeṣaṇayogāc‍ca hasteṣvanunādaṃ janayan bhagavatastejorūpatāṃ puruṣarūpatāṃ ca dhvanati | tadubhayamapi tadanusyūtameveha nirūpyata ityanunādadhvaniḥ | evam— (sūryaśa. 3)
garbheṣvambhoruhāṇāṃ śikhariṣu ca śitāgreṣu tulyaṃ patantaḥ prārambhe vāsarasya vyuparatisamaye caukarūpāstathaiva |
niṣparyāyaṃ pravṛttāstribhuvanabhavanaprāṅgaṇe pāntu yuṣmā— nūṣmāṇaṃ santatādhvaśramajamiva bhṛśaṃ bibhrato bradh‍napādāḥ || 186 ||
atra pādaśabdasvābhāvyāt sarvamapi yojanīyam | iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ—'pūrvatra sādharmyadvāreṇa iha tu vaidharmyadvāreṇe'—ti |
atra ca pratiśabdadhvaniḥ yathā— (sūryaśa. 9)
dattānandāḥ prajānāṃ samucitasamayākliṣṭasṛṣṭaiḥ payobhiḥ pūrvāh‍ṇe viprakīrṇā diśi diśi viramatyahni saṃhārabhājaḥ |
dīp‍tāṃśordīrghaduḥkhaprabhavabhavabhayodanvaduttāranāvo gāvo vaḥ pāvanānāṃ paramaparimitāṃ prītimutpādayantu || 187 ||
atra dīp‍tāṃśorgāvo raśmayaḥ stūyamānāḥ gośabdaśaktisvābhāvyāt tulyaviśeṣaṇa— yogāc‍ca dhenuṣu pratiśabdaṃ janayantyastāsvapi viśiṣṭaṃ māhātmyaviśeṣaṃ pratidhvananti |
evam—
mīlac‍cakṣurvijihmaṃ śrutijaḍarasanaṃ nigh‍nitaghrāṇavṛtti svavyāpārākṣamatvakparimuṣitamanaḥ śvāsamātrāvaśeṣam |
visrastāṅga patitvā svayamapaharatādaśriyaṃ vo 'rkajanmā kālavyālāvalīḍhaṃ jagadagada ivotthāpayan prākpratāpaḥ || (sūryaśa. 31)
atrārkajanmā prākpratāpaḥ kālavyālāvalīḍhaṃ jagadutthāpayan aśriyaṃ vo 'paharatāditi vākyārthaḥ | arkaśabdaśaktisvābhāvyāt tulyakarmakriyāpadādiyogāc‍ca arkavṛkṣajanmā agadaḥ kālavyāladaṣṭamapyutthāpayatīti pratyāyayannarko viṣagh‍nānāṃ śreṣṭha iti pratiśabdarūpaṃ dhvanimutthāpayatīti | evamanye 'pi mahākaviprayogeṣu dhvaniviśeṣā gaveṣaṇīyā iti | yaduktaṃ 'tātparyameva vacasi dhvanireva kāvye'1 ityādi |
kaḥ punaḥ kāvyavacasordhvanitātparyayoḥ viśeṣaḥ ? nanūktaṃ purastāt2—
1. granthārambhe 5 ś‍loke | 2. atraiva 6 prakāśānte |
yadavakraṃ vacaśśāstre loke ca vaca eva tat |
vakraṃ yadarthavādādau tasya kāvyamiti smṛtiḥ || 189 ||
yadabhiprāyasarvasvaṃ vakturvākyāt pratīyate |
tātparyamarthadharmastacchabdadharmaḥ punardhvaniḥ || 190 ||
saubhāgyamiva tātparyamāntaro guṇa iṣyate |
vāgdevatāyā lāvaṇyamiva bāhyastayordhvaniḥ || 191 ||
adūraviprakarṣāttu dvayena dvayamucyate |
yathā surabhivaiśākhau madhumādhavasaṃjñayā || 192 || iti |1
satyamuktama | kintu nādyāpi nidarśanataḥ pratipādyate |
tarhi śrūyatāmidaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ—
yastāvadayamanantaro granthaḥ sa sarvaḥ kāvye dhvanirityavadhāryatām | vacasi tātparyaṃ dvidhā śāstre loke ca | tatra śāstre yathā—'ātmasthitaṃ guṇaviśeṣamahaṅkṛtasya' ityādi | atra 'ātmasthitaṃ guṇaviśeṣamahaṅkṛtasya śṛṅgāramāhuriha jīvitamātmayoneḥ' ityāp‍topadeśarūpa āgamaḥ; 'tasyātmaśaktirasanīyatayā rasatvam' iti saṃjñārthānugāmi pratyātmavedanīyaṃ pratyakṣam | 'yuktasya yena rasiko 'yamiti pravādaḥ' ityarthāpattirūpam anumānam; tathā hi yo 'yaṃ loke raso 'syāstīti rasiko 'yaṃ rasiko 'yamiti vinā1 madhurādīn keṣucideva puruṣaviśeṣeṣu nirapavādaḥ pravādaḥ sa nāntareṇa pratyātmavedanīyaṃ rasāhvayavastusambandhamupapadyate | so 'yaṃ vivakṣitārthasya pramāṇatrayeṇa pratipādanaṃ vākyārtho 'bhidhīyamānaḥ |
pratipādyaśca triprakāraḥ puruṣo bhavati apratipanno, vipratipannaḥ saṃśayita iti | tatra yathāturānāturayorbhojanamanāturaḥ pratipadyata iti tathaiva prakalpyate, tathehāpratipannā— nurodhāditayorapyāgama eva prathamamupanyasyate | atra vipratipannaḥ saṃśayito vāgamaṃ na manyate | atastadarthaṃ sarvapramāṇebhyo valīyaḥ pratyakṣamupanyasanīyaṃ bhavati | tadapi vaiyātyād vipratipanno na manyate | tato 'sya śāsanāya brahmāstrarūpā sārvalaukikī yuktirupanyasyata iti | sa eva pramāṇatrayopanyāsaheturvakturabhiprāyaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pramāṇatrayopanyāsādinā ca sāṅkhyadarśanāśrayeṇa śṛṅgārassannevāvirbhavati, na tvasannutpadyate; sa ca trividhapramāṇāśrayaḥ
1. mādhurā॰ iti tu mūlaṃ syāt | mādhurā māthurāḥ — re.
śreyāniti pratipādanatātparyam | sāṅkhyā hyevamāhuḥ, 'sadevotpadyate, prakṛtireva kartrī, puruṣaḥ punarudāste, udāsīnamapi cainaṃ bhogasampādanāya prakṛtirupasarpati' iti |
nanu ca sāṅkhyānāṃ 'dṛṣṭamanumānamāp‍tavacanaṃ ca' iti pramāṇopanyāsakramaḥ | iha tvāgamasya prathamamupanyāse kiṃ tātparyam ?
nanūktamapratipannānurodhāditi |
anyadapyucyate; 'na tathā padārthāḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyamānāḥ svadante yathā vāggmināṃ vacobhirāvedyamānā' ityāgamasya prathamamupanyāsena sūcayati |
na ca sarvathā sāṅkhyadarśanāśrayiṇo vayamiti pramāṇavyutkrameṇa pratipādayati, sāhityasya sarvapārṣadatvāt |
athātmani pratibimbadvāreṇāvasthitasyāhaṅkāraguṇaviśeṣasya dharmārthaphalabhūta— tṛtīyapuruṣārthajīvitasya 1 śṛṅgārasyābhimānāparanām‍no yānyāvirbhāvakāraṇāni yāni ca tatkāryāṇi tānyanantaraślokena nirdiśati— 'sattvātmanāmamalajanma/ 2dharmaviśeṣajanmā' ityādi | tatrāyamātmanāmanupahatebhyaḥ sukṛtaviśeṣebhya utpadyate | utpannasya3 sarvasyātmā ātmaguṇasampado 4vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāyā udayaheturbhavati | anekajanmānubhavajanitāttu saṃskārādutkṛṣyate | utkṛṣṭaścātmaguṇasampada eva atiśayaheturbhavati | sa cāyameka evaivaṃvidho 'bhimānātmā prakṛtivikāra ātmaviśeṣāṇāṃ tamonirbhedasthāneṣu pratibimbarūpeṇa sup‍ta iva pratibudhyata iti vākyārtho 'bhidhīyamānaḥ | ekaheturityanena ca hetvantarābhāvamātmaguṇasampadaḥ pradarśayan ayameva caturvargakāraṇamiti jñāpayati | 'jāgarti' iti; jāgartiśca sup‍taprabodhadṛṣṭāntena tasyānāvirbhāvāvasthāyāmapi stimitarūpeṇāvasthānādavidyamānatāṃ nirākaroti | 'ko 'pi' ityanenādabhutapradarśanadvāreṇa tadutkarṣasampat janmasahastreṇāpyanākhyeyā iti khyāpayati | 'mānamaya' ityanena cāsyābhimānātmano 'bhimāna eva mūlamityanyāvaṣṭambhaṃ nirācaṣṭa iti | so 'yamevaṃprakāro vākyārthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ, evaṃvidhaṃ vastu vayaṃ ca vaktumudyatāḥ, ataścaturvargārthino 'tra pravartantāmiti śrotṛjanaprotsāhanādasminvacasi tātparyamiti |
1. tṛtīyaḥ puruṣārthaḥ kāmaḥ | tathā ca kālidāsaḥ 'dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāmavatāra ivāṅgabhāk' raghu. 10.84 | 2. '॰mamaladharmavi॰' iti tu prāk‍tanaḥ pāṭhaḥ | tathā hi maṅgale pṛ॰ 3 | janmetyeva pāṭhe tu raghuvaṃśādyabhimatā janmaśuddhiḥ smaraṇīyā 'so 'hamājanme'—ti 1.5 | 3. utpannaś‍ceti tu syāt | 4. ekādaśe prakāśe |
evaṃ laukike 'pi vacasyabhidhīyamānaṃ pratīyamānaṃ tātparyaṃ ca paryālocanīyamiti | etena kāvyavacasordhvanitātparyayośca k‍vacit samplavo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | tadyathā—'acchinnamekhalamalabdhadṛ̣dhopagūḍham' ityādi | atra—
1. kāvyārthastāvat kāntāvimiśravapuṣaḥ purārervapuracchinnamekhalamityādiviśeṣaṇayogād vipralambhasambhogayoḥ sakhyasampādakamivetyutprekṣyamāṇaṃ rakṣatviti vākyārtho abhidhīyamānaḥ |
'kāntāvimiśravapuṣaḥ'—vapurityanena mūrtirevāsya sāṃsārikeṣu karmasvadhikriyate, na punarātmeti pratyāyayati | mūrtiriti ca vaktavye vapuriti padopādānānna kevalaṃ viśvasya rakṣaṇe, sṛṣṭisaṃhārayorapyayameva vyāpriyata iti pratipādayati | vapirhi sṛṣṭau saṃhāre ca dṛś‍yate, bījaṃ vapati, keśān vapatīti |
'kṛtavipralambhasambhogasakhyamiva' ityanena sahānavasthānādibhirdurghaṭānapyayaṃ padārthānmitho ghaṭayatīti jñāpayatīti |
'purāreḥ' ityanena ca kāntāvimiśravapurapyevaṃvidheṣvarivadhādivyāpāreṣu samartha eveti satyāpayati | so 'yamevaṃprakāro vākyārthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ | tadevaprakāramapāramananya— sādhāraṇaṃ ca yasyaiśvaryamasāveva namaskāryo nānya iti tātparyārthaḥ |
evamuttaraśloke 'pi yathāśrutavākyārtho 'bhidhīyamānaḥ 'yatpādapaṅkajarajaḥ— parimārjiteṣu' iti prayojakavyāpāro(pa)darśanād dhyānenānīya gaṇapatirmanasyāropaṇīya ityupadiśati |
'cetassu darpaṇatalāmalatāṃ gateṣu' ityanena cādarśatalānīva bhasmanā smṛtyupahitenāpi tatpādarajasā manāṃsi nirmalībhavantītyabhidhatte |
'śabdārthasampada udāratarāḥ sphuranti' ityanena tu darpaṇataleṣviva nirmaleṣvamīṣu viśve padārthāḥ sphurantītyāvedayati |
'vigh‍nacchide 'stu bhagavān sa gaṇādhinātha' ityanena punarupanyastanyā— yenābhigāmikaṃ guṇayogamasyopadarśayan avigh‍naprārthanayā cikīrṣitaṃ mahāntamārambha— viśeṣamātmanaḥ pratipādayati | so 'yamevaṃvidho vākyārthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ | yasya ca pādapaṅkajasmṛterapyetatphalaṃ tasya sākṣādārādhanādeḥ kimucyata iti tātparyārthaḥ||
2. athedameva ślokadvayaṃ śāstrādau vacorūpeṇa tātparyaparyantaṃ vyākriyate | tatrābhīṣṭadevatā stotavyeti śiṣṭācāraḥ | tato hi viśiṣṭaduṣṭasampatteḥ samīhitaphalāvāp‍tirbhavati |
abhīṣṭadevatā ca dvividhā— 'adhikṛtā 'nadhikṛtā' ca | tatrādhikṛtānadhikṛtayoradhikṛtāyāṃ pratipattirgarīyasītyadhikṛtaiva stūyate | śāstre ceha śṛṅgāro 'bhidheyaḥ, tatra ca yathā bhagavān maheśvaraḥ sarvajñatayā saubhāgyena dayitajānitayā svātantryeṇa paramaparipūrṇatayā samarthatvena cādhikriyate naivamanyastad‍‌vidheyavaibhavaḥ śakrādiḥ | tatra ca prāgukta eva pratīyamānaḥ; tātparyarūpastu nirūpyate | tatra—
iha śāstre śṛṅgāre vaktavyaḥ | sa dvidhā— sambhogo vipralambhaśca | tatra sambhogo vipralambhamantareṇa na prakarṣamadhirohatīti vipralambha eva prathamamabhidheyo bhavati |
sa caturdhā— 'prathamānurāgaḥ, mānaḥ, pravāsaḥ, karuṇa' iti | vicitraścaiṣa sambhogāditi vistareṇocyate |
catastraścāsyāvasthā bhavanti— 'sattā, janma, anubandhaḥ, prakarṣa' iti |
tamimaṃ caturbhedaṃ caturavasthaṃ vicitraṃ ca pūrvārdhena vakṣyamāṇamupalakṣayati |
tatrācchinnamekhalamityanena prathamanurāgaṃ, mekhalācchedāvadhirhi prathamānurāgaḥ;
alabdhadṛ̣dhopagūḍhamityanena mānaṃ, na hi māne dṛ̣dhopagūḍhaṃ labhyate;
aprāp‍tacumbanamityanena pravāsaṃ, na hi pravāse cumbanādayaḥ prāpyante;
avīkṣitavaktrakāntītyanena karuṇaṃ, na hi karuṇe vaktrakāntirvīkṣyate |
athaitadavasthāsvapīmānyeva padāni |
acchinnamekhalamiti vipralambhasattāyām | vipralambho hi mekhalāyāmacchinnāyāma— vaś‍yameva sambhogārthinaḥ sambhavati, sāsya prathamāvasthā |
alabdhadṛ̣dhopagūḍhamiti vipralambhajanmani, vipralambhavān hi mekhalā acchedāt sambhogamalabhamānaḥ preyasīṃ prārthayate, 'ayi priyatame,' yadi me mekhalācchedaṃ na manyase tadāliṅganamapi gāḍhaṃ prayaccha'; tadapratipadyamānāyāṃ ca tasyāmasya vipralambho jāyate, sāsya dvitīyāvasthā | aprāp‍tacumbanamiti vipralambhānubandhe; vipralabdho hi sarvāṅgīṇaṃ priyāsaṃśleṣamalabhamānaḥ vaktramātrasaṃyogamapyabhilaṣati; tadalābhe cainaṃ vipralambho 'nubandhāti, sāsya tṛtīyāvasthā | avīkṣitavaktrakāntīti vipralambhaprakarṣe; apekṣaṇīyāliṅganādyanavāp‍tau hi kāminaḥ priyamāmukhāvalokanamapi bahu manyante | tadapyanāp‍nuvatāmeṣāṃ vipralambhaḥ prakṛṣyate; sāsya turīyāvasthā |
so 'yaṃ caturvidhaścaturavasthaśca vipralambhaścāturvidhyena cāturavasthyenapṛthakpṛthaga— bhidhīyamāno vicitra ityucyate |
sambhogo 'pi caturdhaiva— prathamānurāgānantaraḥ, mānānantaraḥ, pravāsānantaraḥ, karuṇānantara iti | tasyāpi tā eva catastro 'vasthāḥ —'sattā, janma, anubandhaḥ, prakarṣa' iti | so 'yamapi caturbhedaścaturavasthaśca kāntāvimiśravapuṣa ityanenāpi citratvātsaṃkṣepeṇaivopalakṣyate | tatrāpyupasargasya kriyāviśeṣaṇārthavācakatvād yena yena viśeṣeṇa prathamānurāgānantare mānānantare (pravāsānantare) karuṇānantare ca kāntayā saha miśrībhāvaḥ sādhvasotkampaḥ, sarṣyākaṣāyaṃ, sautsukyarabhasaṃ, saharṣavismayaṃ ca jāyate, sa sarva uddiṣṭo bhavati | so 'yaṃ vimiśrapadena sambhogaścaturvidho 'pyākṣip‍taḥ | kāntāpadena punarasya catastro 'vasthā api | tatra yadā kāntāśabdaḥ strīparyāyastadā—
nāmāpi strīti saṃhlādi vikarotyeva mānasam || 193 || (kāmandakaḥ 2.51)
iti sambhogasyādyāvasthā sattāsaṃjñikā pratīyate | yadā tu kāntaśabdo manojñāparyāyastadā
kiṃ punardarśanaṃ tasyā vilāsollāsitabhruvaḥ || 194 || (kāmandakaḥ 2.51)
iti nyāyāt sambhogasya dvitīyāvasthā janmasaṃjñikā pratīyate | yadā punaḥ kāntāśabdo vṛṣasyantīparyāyastadā
punarapi sulabhaṃ tapo 'nurāgī yuvatijanaḥ khalu nāpyate 'nurūpaḥ | (kirātā.10.50) iti nyāyāt sambhogasya tṛtīyāvasthā anubandhasaṃjñikā pratīyate | yadā tu kāntāśabdo vallabhāparyāyastadā
yadeva rocate mahyaṃ tadeva kurute priyā |
iti vetti na jānāti tat priyaṃ yat karoti sā || 196 ||
iti nyāyāt sambhogasya turīyāvasthā prakarṣasaṃjñikā pratīyate | so 'yaṃ caturbhedaścaturavasthaśca vipralambhaḥ, sambhogaścāgrato viśeṣeṇa varṇayitumupakrānto diṅ‌mātreṇātra sūcita iti tātparyam ||
3. athā 'dhikāri nāyikānāyakaviśeṣāṇāṃ kā vārtā ?
'kāntāvimiśravapuṣa' ityasya tantreṇa vyākhyānāntare te 'pi sūcitā eva | tatra hi bhagavato vapurvipralambhasambhogayoḥ kṛtasāhāyyakamiva kāntāvimiśravapuṣaḥ puruṣān striyaśca pātviti vyākhyā bhavati | vimiśraśabdena ca saṃyogina iva viyogino 'pyucyante, vyupasargasya kriyāviśeṣa iva kriyāvaiparītye 'palambhāt | tadyathā vibhakto vikrīta
iti | evaṃ ca kāntābhirvimiśravapuṣaḥ puruṣāḥ kāntairavimiśravapuṣo yoṣitaḥ saṃyuktā viyuktāśca śṛṅgārādhikāriṇa ubhaye 'pi nāyakaviśeṣāḥ pratīyante |
vapuśśabdena punariha viśeṣaṇapakṣe yauvanapallavitalāvaṇyalakṣmīkaṃ samagrātmaguṇasampadāśrayaḥ śarīramucyate, na tvādikartṛkasṛṣṭisaṃhārakādi |
vapirhi sṛṣṭisaṃhārayoriva kāntāvapi dṛś‍yate | tadyathā — 'gobhirvapāvān' (mabhā.2.1.30), vapuṣṭamā nāmāpsaroviśeṣa (mahābhārate 1) iti | tatrācchinnamekhalamityādīni kāntāvimiśravapuṣa iti | samāsapadāntargatayorviyuktisaṃyuktikriyayorgamakatvād viśeṣaṇāni bhavanti; yathā kartuṃmanāḥ kaṭaṃ, gantukāmo grāmamiti |
4. atha sambhogapakṣe acchinnamekhalamityādīni kathaṃ sambandhante ?
ucyate | evaṃ nāma rāgāndhatayā kāntābhiḥ saha te saṃyuktāḥ yena mekhalācchedamāliṅganaṃ cumbanamālokanaṃ ca paramānandamagnāḥ kartuṃ na pārayanti, 'tadyathā priyayā striyā pariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiṃcana veda nāntaram' (bṛpa. 4.3.21) iti; yathā ca—
dhanyāsi yā kathayasi priyasaṅgame 'pi vistrabdhacāṭukaśatāni ratāntareṣu |
nīvīṃ prati praṇihitastu karaḥ (te tu kare) priyeṇa sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiñcidapi smarāmi || 197 ||
evamayaṃ prathamaślokaḥ 'padānyeva saṃhatyārthamabhidadhati vākyam' iti pakṣe vyākhyāyate |
5. athākhaṇḍavākyārthapakṣe vyākhyāyate | tathā hi —
evamiha padānāmanvayo bhavati—'pātu |
kim ? viśvam |
kutaḥ ? apāyebhyaḥ |
kiṃ tat ? vapuḥ |
kasya ? purāreḥ |
kīdṛśasya ? kāntāvimiśravapuṣaḥ |
kiṃviśiṣṭam ? acchinnamekhalam, alabdhadṛ̣dhopagūḍham, aprāp‍tacumbanam, avīkṣitavaktrakānti |
katham ? utprekṣyamāṇam ? kṛtavipralambhasambhogasakhyamiveti |
atra cāyamacchinnaśabdaḥ, bahuvrihiśca samāsaḥ adhyāhriyamāṇapadadvayā dvādaśapadā nāndī (nāśā. 5.104) sadā 'viśleṣaḥ, viśeṣoktigarbha utprekṣāvāṁścāśīralaṅkāro maṅgalārthaḥ | te 'mī catvāro 'pi maṅgalārthāḥ śastrādau prayuktāḥ kartuḥ śroturadhyetura— dhyāpayituśca maṅgalamāvahanti | yadāha —'maṅgalādīni maṅgalamadhyāni maṅgalāntāni ca śāstrāṇyavyāhataprasarāṇi āyuṣmacchrotṛkāṇi ca bhavanti (mabhā. 1.1.1,1.3.1) |
6. nanu ca neha viśvamapāyebhya iti karmāpādānapadayoḥ śravaṇamasti, tatkathamiveyaṃ dvādaśapadā nāndīti ?
ucyate, pātviti śrutipadametat; śruteścānekapadanibandhana ekaśabdaviṣayo vidhyādirarthaḥ; sa cānyathānupapadyamānaḥ svasiddhaye karmakaraṇakartradhikaraṇādikaṃ yadākṣipati sa sarvaḥ śrutipadārtho bhavati | tatropādīyamānamapi kartṛkarmādikaṃ niyamāya, anupādāya vā vijñāyate | tadyathā — sāmānyākṣepe viśeṣapadamupādīyamānaṃ niyamāya bhavati, 'pātu vaḥ paramaṃ jyotiḥ' iti | viśeṣākṣepe tatra tadanupādāya vijñāyate devo jalaṃ varṣatīti | (iha tu) yathā 'aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhmaṇamupanayīta, tamadhyāpayet' iti vacanāt 'svādhyāyo 'dhyetavya' ityatra dvijenācāryādityanupāttamapyavaś‍yameva sannidhīyate, tathehāpyapāyanirharaṇarūpa— tvāt pātvarthasya sthiterīśvarakartṛkasya sṛṣṭisaṃhārayoriva viśvaviṣayatvādapāyebhyo viśvamiti padadvayamanupādīyamānamapi niyamena sannidhīyate |
7. nanu cāśarīriṇo maheśvarasya viśvotpattisthitipralayakāraṇatvābhyupagame 'pi kathamivocyeta vapuḥ pātviti |
aśarīriṇo 'pi vaiśvarūpyeṇa tadupapatteḥ | sa hyevaṃ tattvavidbhiḥ stūyate—
mūlajālamadhibhok‍tṛcetanā śaktayastvadadhibho(yo)k‍tṛsaṃhatiḥ |
jñānametadadhināyakavrajaṃstvatsmṛtau yugapadeva bhāsate || 198 ||
ata eva kāntāvimiśravapuṣa iti purārerviśeṣaṇaṃ tantreṇānyathā vyācakṣate | tadyathā— kaṃ pānīyam ante 'syā iti kāntā pṛthvī, kaṃ sukhamanteṣvāsāmiti kāntā āpaḥ | ko vāyurante 'syeti kānto vahni | kaṃ toyamantatīti kānto vāyuḥ | kaṃ brahma anto 'syeti kāntamākāśam, kāntirdīp‍tistadatiśayavān kāntaḥ sūryaḥ, kāntiḥ kāmanīyakaṃ tadatiśayavān kāntaścandramāḥ, kāntirvāllabhyaṃ tadatiśayavān kānta ātmeti kāntaśabdenāṣṭāpi bhagavato mūrtaya ucyante | tā avantītyevaṃśīlā bhavograbhīmādayo mūrtipatayaḥ kāntāvinaḥ | miśraśabdaḥ pūjāvacanaḥ | tenaiṣāṃ 'praśaṃsāvacanaiśca' (2.1.66)
ityāryamiśrādivat samāsaḥ | tataḥ kāntāvimiśraṃ vapuryasyeti bahuvrīhau vaiśvarūpyasiddhervivakṣitārthasiddhiḥ |
athātrācchinnamekhalamityādīnāṃ kathamanvayaḥ ?
tānyapi vapuṣo viśeṣaṇāni bhavanti | tatrācchinnamekhalamityanena paramucyate | mekhalā hi jaghanaparikṣepasūtram, tadaparicchinnaṃ yasyeti | alabdhadṛ̣dhopagūḍhamityanenāgādhatva— duravagāhatvamākhyāyate; dṛṃhatīti dṛḍha ādhāraḥ, tasyopagūḍhamupaśleṣaḥ pratiṣṭhāsthānaṃ, tadanupalabdhaṃ yasyeti | aprāp‍tacumbanamityanenoc‍caiṣṭvasya niravadhitvaṃ kathyate, cumbanaṃ hi vaktrasaṃyogaḥ tadaprāp‍taṃ yasyeti | avīkṣitavaktrakāntītyanenāpratilaghorasya parisūkṣmatvamābhidhatte | 'vaktrā' kutastyā kutomukhī vetyavijñāyamānā kāntiryasyeti, kṛtavipralambhasambhoga— sakhyamivetyanena tvavijñātaparamārthatvena vipralabhamānamiva pṛthivyādiprasiddharūpatayā sambhujyamānaṃ sambhuñjānamiva ca tadevocyate | yaditthamenamāhuḥ— (kusaṃ. 2.15)
tvameva havyaṃ hotā ca bhojyaṃ bhoktā ca śāśvatam |
vedyaṃ vedayitā cāsi dhyātā dhyeyaṃ ca tatparam || 199 ||
ayamapyāha1—(kusaṃ. 6.26)
viditaṃ vo yathā svārthā na me kāścit pravṛttayaḥ |
nanu mūrtibhiraṣṭābhiritthambhūto 'smi sūcitaḥ || 200 ||
tadamunā viśeṣaṇapañcakenaitaduktaṃ bhavati—(seba. 1.1)
ṇamaha avaḍ‍‌̣dhiatuṃgaṃ avasāriavitthaaṃ aṇoṇaa—gahiraṃ |
appalahua—parisaṇhaṃ aṇāaparamatthapāaḍaṃ mahumahaṇaṃ || 201 ||
(namata avardhitatuṅgamaprasārita—vistṛtamanavanatagabhīram |
apralaghuka—pariślakṣṇamajñātaparamārthaprakaṭaṃ madhumathanam ||)
8. nanu ca pātviti nāyaṃ vidhau loṭ, api tvāśiṣi | sā ca viśeṣasyāśrutau svarūpādevātmaviṣayatayātiṣṭhata iti kathaṃ viśvaviṣayā bhavati ?
ucyate—
ayaṃ nijaḥ paro veti vikalpā laghucetasām |
udāracaritānāṃ tu vasudhaiva kuṭumbakam || 202 ||

9. yadi vā
nāsya vākyasya yaḥ kaścid vaktā; kiṃ tarhi ? pūrvajñaiḥ kramāgataviśvapālane niyukto mahāmāheśvaraḥ ko 'pi puṃviśeṣaḥ | sa ca 'granthaviracanāvyagre mayi mā bhud‌varṇāśramācārasthiteḥ vyākopa' iti maheśvarameva tatsamarthaṃ prārthayate | ato 'tra viśvasyaiva karmatvamavagamyate | rakṣito rājā rājyaṃ rakṣatīti ca nyāyādātmanyapi rakṣaṇīyatāśīrbhavati | atra cāśīreṣaṇā; tistraścaiṣaṇā bhavanti, prāṇaiṣaṇā vittaiṣaṇā paralokaiṣaṇā ca | rājño yā hyeva prāṇaiṣaṇā sā vittaiṣaṇā saiva paralokaiṣaṇeti bhavati | tasya (sa)prakṛtikaṃ rājyaṃ śarīraṃ, tadeva ca vittaṃ, tasya hyasau svāmyamanubhavati | yathoktadaṇḍakarādānādisambhṛtaṃ vasu yaśaśca vittaṃ, sa eva ca dharmaḥ, tena hyasāvimamamuṃ ca lokaṃ jayati; tadetatsarvamapāyebhyo viśvarakṣayo X X X taṃ bhavati | X X X devatā stotavyeti śiṣṭācāraḥ | na cāśīsstutiḥ; evametat; kintu guṇotkarṣaprakāśanena sarvata uparyāropaṇaṃ stutiḥ; sā ca yathā āśāsyamānābhimata— phalaikahetutāprakāśanena pratyāyyate, naivaṃ namastasmai, sa jayatītyevamādibhirityabhiprāyaḥ ||
10. athākhaṇḍavākyārthapakṣāvalambino dvitīyaślokasyaṃ vyākhyā—'sa bhagavān gaṇādhinātho vigh‍nacchide 'stu yatpādapaṅkajarajaḥ parimārjiteṣu darpaṇatalāmalatāṃ gateṣu śabdārthasampada udāratarāḥ sphuranti' iti | ihāpi paṅkajadarpaṇārthasampad— bhagavadādayaḥ śabdāḥ, gauṇī ca vṛttiḥ maṅgalārthāḥ; iyamapi dvādaśapadā nāndyeva; ihāpi rūpakopamāśleṣasamādhigarbhaḥ kāraṇamālāṅgavānāśīralaṅkāra iti yojanīyaḥ |
11. nanu ca sambandhino 'dhyāhārāt trayodaśeha padāni ?
naivam, vibhaktyā kta‍yādipariṇāmena śabdārthasampatparisphuraṇasyaivātra sambandhitvāt | tathā hyevamiyaṃ kāraṇamālā samāpyate bhagavataḥ pādapaṅkajamārjane, mārjanasya nairmalye, nairmalyasya śabdasampadāmarthasampadāṃ ca parisphuraṇe, tasya ca prabandhavigh‍nacchede kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti | rūpakopamāśleṣapadāni ceha pādapaṅkajadarpaṇatalāmalarajāṃsi pratīyante | tatrodāratarāḥ śabdārthasampadaḥ parisphurantīti ca samādhirapi prakāśate | ādarśataleṣu hi kilodāradarśanāḥ striyaḥ svalaṅkṛtamātmānamavalokayanti | sa cānyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiriti | etac‍ca 1varavācāṃ sūcanāparamityavadhāryamāṇamasya vacasastātparyaṃ bhavati; tadidamuktaṃ 'tātparyameva vacasi' iti |
1. varavācāṃ = va(kturudā)ravācāṃ—rāghavaḥ |
12. kaḥ punariha rūpakopamayorviśeṣaḥ ?
ucyate — yatrātyantasādṛś‍yādabhedopacāreṇevādiśabdavikalamupamānapadamevopameye pravartamānaṃ gauṇīṃ vṛttimanubhavat samānādhikaraṇyena viśeṣaṇatvamanubhavati tad rūpakam, yathā mukhacandraḥ, pādapaṅkajamiti | yatra tu mukhyānubhava X X X yamātmanopameyasya sāmyamabhidhatte sopamā, yathā candra iva mukhamādarśatalāmalaṃ ceti ||
13. atha yadeṣadasamāp‍ti—pratikṛtyorbahuc‌kalpabādayaḥ kanādayo (5.3.67, 68,95) vā atyantasādṛś‍yādupameyavṛttibhya evopamānaśabdebhyaḥ svārthikā vidhīyante, tadā kimupamāne pratyaya āho upameya iti |
kiṃcātaḥ ?
yadyupamāne, guḍakalpā drākṣā, kuśāgrīyā (5.3.105) buddhirityupameyaliṅgaṃ na prāp‍noti; upameye, bahuguḍo drākṣā(5.3.68) cañcā ca liṅgaṃ na prāp‍noti | liṅgamaśiṣyaṃ lokaśrayatvāt (mabhā. 2.1.36) | svārthikāśca k‍vacitprakṛtito liṅgavacanānyativartante (mabhā. 5.3.68), yathā 'deva eva devatā' (5.4.27) catvāra eva varṇāścāturvarṇyam (5.1.124 vā.) iti |
kimetad vaktavyam ?
kathamanuktaṃ gamyate ?
ācāryapravṛttirjñāpayati yadayaṃ 'karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām' (3.3.43) iti ṇacaṃ vidhāya tadantāt svārthikavidhāne 'ṇacaḥ striyāmañ' (5.4.14) iti punaḥ strīgrahaṇaṃ karoti | abhedopacāraṇaiva ca pratikṛtiliṅgavacanaṃ X X X yā X X X 'lup manuṣye' iti lukamatikramya pra(ti)kṛtivacanebhyo lupaṃ śāsti |
14. kathaṃ punaḥ 'īṣadaparisamāp‍tau' 'ive pratikṛtau' iti ivārthe vā vidhīyamānaḥ pratyaya upamāna upameye vā śaṅ‌kyeta ?
īṣadaparisamāp‍te kriyātvena ivārthasya cāsattvabhūtatvena liṅgavacanāyogāt pratyayāntareṣu ca liṅgasaṅkhyāvaśādīṣadaparisamāptau cevārthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe pratyayo bhavatīti vijñāyate |
kiṃ punariha nyāyyam ?
upamāne pratyaya iti ||
15. nanu ca guḍa iveyaṃ guḍo drākṣā, cañcevāyaṃ cañcā puruṣa iti guḍādiśabdā mādhuryādiguṇayogena drākṣādiṣu vartante | tataśca drākṣādayaḥ prakṛtyarthā bhavanti | prakṛtyarthe copameye svārthikāḥ kalpabādaya iti kathamupamāne pratyaya iti ?
maivam; na hi drākṣāyāstatrāparisamāp‍tiḥ, api tu guḍasya | yena hi guṇena mādhuryādinā guḍaśabdo drākṣāyāṃ vartamāno gauṇīṃ vṛttimanubhavati tasyaiveṣadasamāp‍tau pratyayo vidhīyate | adyaivaṃ guḍasyeṣadaparisamāp‍tau vartamānasya svārthe pratyayavidhānāt bahuguḍo drākṣeti | so 'yamityabhisambandhād avyatireka iti ced vyatirekamūlatvāda— vyatirekasya prasaṅgaḥ, yathā śuklaḥ paṭaḥ. paṭasya śukla iti |
naivam; upapadyamānavyatirekāṇāmubhayaṃ bhavati | na cātra tadupapattiḥ; na hi yathā śuklaguṇo 'stīti matublopādapṛthaksiddhaśuklaguṇavācinā śuklaśabdena paṭo 'bhidhīyate, tathā guḍa ityanena | sa hi dravyaśabdo dravyāntarasāmānādhikaraṇyānyathānupapattyā gauṇīṃ vṛttimāśritya svanibandhanaṃ dravyāntare vyatirekamupanidhatte | tatra sāmānādhikaraṇyabhraṃśāt guṇavṛtterapi bhraṃśo mā bhūditi na vyatirekalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī bhavati | na ca guṇavacanānāmapi keṣāṃñcilloke vyatireka upalabhyate | na hi bhavati paṭuḥ paṭukalpo 'yaṃ devadatta iti |
16. kathaṃ punarguṇavṛttyāpyupameye vṛtterguḍaśabdāt svārthe vidhīyamānaḥ pratyaya upamānaṃ pratyāyayati,
dravyavat pravṛttinimittasyāpi svārthatvāt | tathā hi cañcā tṛṇamayaḥ puruṣo yaḥ kṣetrarakṣaṇāya kriyateḥ tasya ca puruṣe pravartamānasya svākāraḥ pravṛttinimittam; ataḥ 'ive pratikṛtau' (5.3.96) itīvārthe tatraiva pratyayo bhavati |
17. nanu ca yadi pratikṛtau vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe pratyayaḥ, kim ivārtha ityanena ? athevārthe kṛtaṃ pratikṛtāvityanena ?
ucyate; upacaritaśabdānāṃ śaktimahim‍naiva trayī gatirbhavati | k‍vacidivārtha eva svārthikaḥ, 'kuśāgrīyā buddhiḥ, śaileyaṃ dadhīti | k‍vacit pratikṛtāveva, 'vāsudevo bhīmasena' iti | k‍vacidivārthe pratikṛtau ca, yathā varorūḥ pīvarorūriti | atra yadi varaśabdena pīvaraśabdena vā ūrvoreva guṇo 'bhidhīyeta tadā 'ūrūttarapadādaupamye' (4.1.69) ityūṅna siddha‍yati | tataścaupamyāya kartavyo 'tra ya X X X vaṃ syāt | yadi varaśabdaḥ pīvaraśabdo vā vare pīvare ca rambhāstambhastamberamakarādau vartitvāt tatsādṛś‍yāt tadupameyayorūrvorvarteta, tac‍cevārthe pratikṛtau vartamānayostayoḥ
pratyayalugvidhāve bhavati | anyathā hi 'varatvaṃ pīvaratvameva' ca labhyate, na saṃsthānaviśeṣa iti |
na bhavitavyam | pratyayamantareṇāpi svasradīnāmiva tasya tācchīlikāntatvena strītvābhidhānameva 'ṛnnebhyo ṅīp' (4.1.5) ityasya 'na ṣaṭsvastrādibhyaḥ' (4.1.10) iti pratiṣedhaḥ pratyākhyāyate | kiṃ punaramī upamānaśabdā lup‍tapratyayatvena guṇībhūtā eva kalpabādīnāmutpattinimittaṃ bhavanti ?
bāḍham | 'ajādī guṇavacanādeva' (5.3.58) ityato hi guṇavacanāditya— dhikriyate | tataśca būhuckalpabdeś‍yadeśīyara īṣadasamāp‍tim, evaṃ praśaṃsāyāṃ rūpap vidhīyamānaḥ pacatirūpaṃ pacatorūpaṃ pacantirūpamiti kriyālakṣaṇasya guṇasyaiva praśaṃsāṃ dyotayanti | anyathā hi sarvatraikavacanaṃ na syāt (mabhā. 5.3.36) | na ca dravyasya samāp‍tiḥ asamāp‍tiḥ kutsā praśaṃsā vā svataḥ sambhavati, api tu guṇataḥ | ataśca gauṇyā mukhyayā vā mandamadhyotkṛṣṭeṣu guṇeṣu vartamānāt prātipadikādīṣadasamāp‍tau dyotyāyāṃ kalpabādayo bhavanti |
18. nanu ca nirjñātasyārthasya samāp‍tirasamāp‍tirvā bhavati | guṇaśca anirjñātaḥ, lokato guṇasya nirjñānam | tadyathā paṭurayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ, yo laghunopāyenārthaṃ nirvartayati, paṭukalpo 'yaṃ yo nātilaghuneti | evaṃ 'paṭutaraḥ' śuklatamaḥ kanīyām paṭiṣṭhaḥ utkṛṣṭataraḥ vaiyākaraṇapāśa' ityādiṣu tarabādayo 'pi guṇavacanebhyo vidhīyamānā guṇagatameva prakarṣaṃ dyotayanti |
19. kathaṃ punaratiśāyanādau vidhīyamānāstarabādayo guṇaprakarṣe bhaviṣyanti, na punardravyaprakarṣa iti ?
naiva dravyasya prakarṣaḥ sambhavati |
kiṃ tarhi ?
guṇasya ca(hi) prakarṣo 'sti, tasya prakarṣo bhaviṣyati ?
kathaṃ jñāyate guṇasyaiva prakarṣa iti ?
evaṃ hi dṛś‍yate loke — samāna āyāme vistāre ca paṭasyānyo 'rgho bhavati kāśikasya, anyo mādhurasya | guṇāntaraṃ khalvapi; śilpinaḥ prakarṣāyotpādayamānastameva dravyāntareṇa prakṣālayanti, anyena śuddhaṃ dhautaṃ kurvantyanyena śephālikamanyena mādhyamikamiti | tarhi śuk‍lāt kṛṣṇo mā bhūditi samānagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam |
na kartavyam | spardhā vai prakarṣaḥ, sā ca sāmanaguṇa eva bhavati, na hyạ̄dhyābhirūpau spardhete |
vācakena khalvapyutpattavyam | na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe utpadyamāno vācakaḥ syāt | yatra tat syāt, tatrotpadyata eva, yathā śuklāt kṛṣṇo māsuratara iti |
na tarhīdānīmidaṃ bhavati adhvayurvai śreyān, pāpīyān pratiprasthātā anyebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ | kāṇatama iti kaṇirayaṃ saukṣmye vartate; sarva ime kāṇāḥ kiṃcit paś‍yanti, ayaṃ tu kiṃcidapi na paś‍yatīti kāṇatama ucyate |
tasyā 'dūraviprakarṣa iti vaktavyama | sarṣapād‍‌dhimavato mahattve mā bhūditi |
na vaktavyam | adūraviprakarṣa eva spardhā bhavati | na hi niṣkadhanaḥ śataniṣkadhanena spardhate |
tarhi jāteḥ neti vaktavyam, vṛkṣāt plakṣādeḥ mā bhūditi |
na vaktavyam | jananena yā prāpyate sā jātiḥ | na caitasyārthasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ |
atha śuklatara ityādiṣu kimekaṃ śauklyam, āhosvinnānā |
kiṃ cātaḥ ?
yadyekam, prakarṣo nopapadyate; na hi tenaiva tasya prakarṣo bhavati | atha nānā ? samānaguṇagrahaṇaṃ kartavya, śuklāt kṛṣṇo mā bhūditi | ekaṃ śauklyaṃ, tattu viśeṣavat |
20. kiṃkṛto viśeṣaḥ ?
alpatvabahutvakṛtaḥ | athavā punarastvekaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ ca |
nanūktaṃ prakarṣo nopapadyate, guṇāntareṇa pracchādanād bhaviṣyati |
athehāsya śuklāni vastrāṇi, asyātiśayena śuklānīti śuklataravastra iti prāp‍noti | śuklavastratara iti ceṣyate |
uktamatra;
kimuktam ?
'pūrvapadātiśaya ātiśāyikād bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ' 'uttarapadātiśayaṃ ātiśāyiko bahuvrīherbahvạ̄dhyatarādyarthaḥ' iti ||
atha yatra trīṇi śuklāni prakarṣāpakarṣayuktāni, tatra pūrvaṃ pūrvamapekṣya dve tarabante, tatra śuklataraśabdādutpattiḥ prāp‍noti | śuklaśabdādeva ca iṣyate, śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdo 'pyastīti śuklādevotpattirbhaviṣyati |
naitad vivadāmahe śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdo 'styuta nāsti | kiṃ tarhi ? śuklataraśabdo 'pyasti, tata utpattiḥ prāp‍noti, tadantāc‍cātiśāyiko dṛś‍yate | tadyathā—'devo vaḥ savitā prārpayatu śreṣṭhamāya karmaṇe', 'yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śreṣṭhatamaḥ kurūṇām' (mabhā. 5.3.55) iti |
ayaṃ tarhi parihāraḥ, madhyamācchuklaśabdāt pūrvaparāpekṣāt pratyayenotpattavyam' | madhyamaśca śuklaśabdaḥ pūrvamapekṣya prakṛṣṭaḥ paramapekṣya nyūnaḥ prakarṣāya pravartate |
na ca bahūnāṃ prakarṣe tarapā bhavitavyam |
kena tarhi ?
tamapā | śreṣṭhatamāya, śreṣṭhatama iti chandasyeva bhavati | vācakena khalu utpattavyam; na ca śuklataraśabdādutpadyamāno vācakaḥ syāt | uktaṃ ca (mabhā. 2.3.55)—
apekṣya madhyamaḥ pūrvamādhikyaṃ labhate sitaḥ |
paraṃtu nyūnatāmeti na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate || 203 ||
astu vā 'pi tarap‍tasmānnāpaśabdo bhaviṣyati |
vācakaścet prayoktavyo vācakaścet prayojyatām || 204 || (mabhā. 5.3.55)
21. atha yadyātiśāyikā guṇaprakarṣa evotpadyante kimarthamucyate 'ajādī guṇavacanādeva' (5.3.58) iti ? etau guṇaviśeṣavacanebhya eva yathā syātāmiti | guṇāḥ khalviha dviprakārā viprathante tatsthāśca tadviśeṣaṇāni ca |
yadāha — tatsthaiśca guṇaiḥ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate, na tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ (mabhā.2.2.8) iti | tatra ye bhāvapratyayotpattimantareṇa dravyāt pṛthagākhyātumaśakyāḥ svaśabdairdravya— paratayaivābhidhīyante te tatsthāḥ | tadyathā—'paṭuḥ pumān mṛduḥ śayyā, gurudravyam, laghurupāyaḥ | evamaṇurmahān dīrgho hrasvaḥ, pṛthuḥ kṛśo, dṛḍhaḥ sthūla' ityādayo vaktavyāḥ |
ye tu svaśabdaiḥ pṛthagākhyāyamānā matublopādinā dravyaṃ viśeṣayanti te tad‌viśeṣaṇāni | tadyathā 'śuklaguṇayogācchuklā balākā, 'kṛṣṇaguṇayogāt kṛṣṇaḥ kākaḥ, tīkṣṇaguṇayogāt tīkṣṇaḥ kaṇṭakaḥ, dakṣaguṇayod dakṣaḥ purūṣaḥ, evaṃ śītoṣṇasvādusurabhivatsalotsukarabhasamatsarādayo vaktavyāḥ | tatra yathā 'balakāyāḥ śuklaḥ, kākasya kṛṣṇaḥ, kaṇṭakasya tīkṣṇaḥ, puruṣasya dakṣa' ityādau, tathā 'balākāyāḥ
śauklyam, kākasya kārṣṇyam, kaṇṭakasya taikṣṇyam, puruṣasya dākṣyami'tyādāvapi samāso na bhavati (mabhā. 2.2.8,11) | gandharasarūpasparśa— saṅkhyāparimāṇādayastu na tatsthāḥ, nāpi tadviśeṣaṇāni | teṣāṃ śuklādisaṅghāteṣu śāstrakārasaṅketād dravyavacanatvenaiva rājapuruṣādivat ṣaṣṭhīsamāsā bhavanti | tadyathā — candanagandhaḥ, cūtaphalarasaḥ, kanyārūpaṃ, kucasparśaḥ, puruṣasaṅkhyā, senāparimāṇamiti | yaiśca tīvrādīṃstad‌viśeṣaṇatvenopanyasya ghṛtasya tīvraścandanasya mṛdurityudāhṛtya ca tīvramṛduguṇayogād guṇavṛttyā gandhasparśaviśeṣaṇatvena sāpekṣatve satyasamārthyāllabdhe 'pi samāsābhāve yadā prakaraṇavaśāt tīvraśabda eva viśiṣṭa— gandhavṛttistadā tadarthopacita eva vyatireke ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaprasaṅga iti pratiṣedhopapattiruktā, ta evaṃ praṣṭavyāḥ — kathaṃ prakaraṇādyapekṣāyāmapi sāpekṣatvasya tādavasthyānnāsāmarthyamiti ? tadevaṃ tatsthairguṇaiḥ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate paṭutvādibhiḥ, na tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ śuklādibhiriti |
kiṃ vaktavyametat ?
22. na hi; kathamanuktaṃ gaṃsyate ? ācāryāṇāṃ ca pravṛttayo gamayanti tatrārthaikatvaṃ gosahastram ityādiṣu 'arthaikatvādekaṃ vākyam', 'śatasahastrāntāc‍ca niṣkāt' (5.2.119), 'krośaśatayojanaśatarupasaṅkhyānam' (5.1.74 vā.), 'tatsamudāyaḥ khārīśatamapi na prasūta' (samartha ?) mityādijaiminyādimunicatuṣṭayavacanāt saṅkhyayā parimāṇena ca samāso na niṣidhyate 'vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavad vā (3.3.131), 'aparasparāḥ kriyāsātatye' (6.1.114), 'uttarapadārthaprādhānye' (2.2.6 mabhā.), 'tad yat‍nagauravaṃ prasajyeta' (śābarabhāṣyam 1.1.1) iti sūtrakārabhāṣyakāraprayogāc‍ca kusumasaukumāryādiśabdasiddhiḥ | tenāvagamyate tatsthairguṇairevaṃprakāraiḥ ṣaṣṭhī samasyata iti |
nanvevamapi
'dviradamadajalāsārasaurabhyagarbhaḥ', || 205 ||
'kucakalaśamahoṣmābaddharekhastuṣāraḥ', || 206 ||
'tuhinagiriśilāśaityasaṅkrāntimanti' || 207 ||
ityevamādīnāmanupapattiḥ, sap‍tamīsamāsā ime bhaviṣyanti |
23. kathaṃ punaḥ saurabhyādīnāmādhārataḥ pṛthagupalambhe sap‍tamī bhavati ?
ucyate, samastamūrtimad‍dravyāṇāṃ pāñcabhautikatve vāyunā vibhaktāvayavā āpyapārthivādidravyasūkṣmabhāgā yatrayatra sañcāryante tatratatraiteṣu ghrāṇādisambandhanibandha—
nādyupalabdhirityadhikaraṇavibhakternānupapattiḥ | evamapi bhāgānāmevādhikaraṇatvaṃ, na bhāgavatām; na hi nikṛttasya hastapādādeḥ puruṣādivyapadeśo bhavati |
evametat; kintu pṛthaksthitānāmapyavayavānāmavayavivyapadeśo dṛś‍yate, tadyathā 'rāhoḥ śiro rāhuḥ, śivasya liṅgaṃ śiva' iti |
na caitad vācyam; evaṃ sati samudgakādisthasya karpūrāderbahirupalabhya— mānabahulaparimalasya kālāntareṇopekṣayaḥ syāt; tadvadeva dṛṣṭasannidhestatrānyabhāgānā— mupanipātāt; ata eva purāṇadravyāṇāṃ gandharasarūpasparśagauravaprabhāvavipākavīryaviparyayā yujyanta' iti |
tadevaṃ yaiḥ saha ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa iṣyate tebhya eveyasun—iṣṭhanoḥ vidhānamiti nānarthakaṃ guṇavacanādeveti |
nanu ca guṇamuktavān matubutpatteḥ pūrvamiti guṇavacanaḥ śuklādirguṇaṃ vakṣyati bhāvapratyayotpattyeti guṇavacanaḥ paṭ‍vādiḥ | viśeṣavacanatvāviśeṣe yāvadajādī paṭ‍vādibhya utpadyete tāvacchuklādibhyaḥ kimiti notpadyeyātām | na ca samāsa— vidhāviveha jñāpanādīni santi | kathaṃ na santi ? tadyathā — 'praśasyasya śraḥ' (5.3.60), 'jya ca' (5.3.61), 'vṛddhasya ca' (5.3.62), 'antikabāḍhayo— rnedasādhau'(5.3.63), 'yuvālpayoḥ kananyatarasyām' (5.3.64) iti | api ca 'iṣṭhemeyassu' (6.4.154) ityadhikṛtya yadayaṃ sthūladūrayuvahrasvakṣiprakṣudrāṇāṃ yaṇādi paraṃ lupyate pūrvasya ca guṇo bhavatītyabhidhatte, priyasthirasphirorubahulaguru— vṛddhatṛpradīrghabṛndārakāṇāṃ prasthasphavarbaṃhigarvarṣitrap‌drāghivṛndāḥ ityāha | 'bahorlopo bhū ca bahoḥ' (6.4.158) iti brūte | 'ra ṛto halāderlaghoḥ' (6.4.168) ityatra pṛthumṛdudṛḍhakṛśabhṛśaparivṛ̣dhānāmiti parigaṇanaṃ karoti | tadjñāpayati tatsthaguṇavacanebhya eveyasuniṣṭhanau bhavata iti | tataśca yathā 'śuklataraḥ kṛṣṇatama' ityādi bhavati, naivaṃ śuklīyān kṛṣṇiṣṭha ityādi | yathā ca mṛdiṣṭhaḥ paṭīyāniti bhavati, naivaṃ kārakiṣṭhaḥ pācakīyāniti |
24. kathaṃ tarhi ojiṣṭhaḥ pāpīyāniti ?
'vinmatorluk' (5.3.65) iti jñāpakena tadantād bhaviṣyati |
atha yathā candrakalpaṃ mukhaṃ, guḍakalpā drākṣā, tathā candratamaṃ guḍatameti kasmānna bhavati ?
prakarṣābhāvāt | na hi kenacidguṇenopameyavṛttīnāmupamānaśabdānāmatajjātīyeṣu vartamānānāṃ svārthāpekṣayā prakarṣaḥ sambhavati | yatra tu tajjātīyeṣu guṇābhidhānaṃ tatra bhavatyevātiśāyitam | tadyathā— gaurayaṃ yaḥ śakaṭaṃ vahati, gotaro 'yaṃ yaḥ śakaṭaṃ sīraṃ ca; gauriyaṃ yā samāṃ samāṃ vijāyate, gotareyaṃ yā samāṃsamīnā jīvavatsā ca | dṛś‍yate hi jātivācinastajjātīyeṣvapi guṇābhidhāyitvam |
'saṅgrāmeṣu caratyeṣa puruṣaḥ puruṣo yathā' || 208 ||
'nāma yasyābhinandanti dviṣo 'pi sa pumānpumān' || 209 || (kirātā. 11.73) iti |
yadyevaṃ candraguḍādibhyaḥ kalpabādayo 'pi na syuḥ ?
naivam; teṣāmīṣadasamāp‍tāveva vidhānāt |
tarhi kṛtakalpaṃ bhuktakalpamiti ktāntebhyaḥ na cāsti sambhavo yadbhūtaṃ ca syādasamāp‍taṃ ca ;
'āśaṃsāyāṃ bhūtavac‍ca' (3.3.132) iti vacanād bhaviṣyati ||
(4. pravibhāgaḥ)
pade vākye prabandhe vā 'syaitāvataḥ śabdasyāyamartho 'sminnarkhe cāyametāvān śabda iti śabdārthayormithaḥ sambandhitayā pṛthaktvenāvadhāraṇaṃ pravibhāgaḥ |
sa tri(dvi)vidho 'nvayavyatirekābhyām | iha khalvatyantasaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ padārthānāṃ pravibhāge 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ nānyo heturasti | yathā loke badhiro 'pi 1cakṣuṣmānālokayati, satyapi śrotre upahatacakṣurnālokayati rūpamityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cakṣuśśrotrasannidhāne rūpālokanaṃ cakṣuṣa eva vyavasthāpyate na śrotrasyaḥ tathā śabdaśāstre 'pi subanteṣu tiṅanteṣu ca padeṣvatyantasaṃsṛṣṭā arthātmānaḥ śabdāśca prakṛtipratyayādayo mithassambandhitvenānvayavyatirekābhyāmeva pravibhajyante |
tatrāvasthitasyānuvṛttiranvayaḥ |
tad‌viparyayo vyatirekaḥ | sa dvividho janmahānibhyām | tadyathā—
vṛkṣa ityukte kaścicchabdaḥ śrūyate; vṛkṣa ityakārāntaḥ sakāraśca pratyayaḥ, artho 'pi kaścid gamyate śākhādimattvamekatvaṃ ca |
ṛkṣa ityukte kaścicchabdo hīyate, kaścidupajāyate, kaścidanvayī |
1. 'cakṣuṣmān nālo' iti rāghavaḥ |
vṛkṣaśabdo hīyate, ṛkṣaśabda upajāyate, sakāro 'nvayī |
artho 'pi kaścid‌dhīyate kaścidupajāyate kaścidanvayī;
śākhādimattvaṃ hīyate, saṭādimattvamupajāyate, ekatvamanvayīti |
vṛkṣāvityukte sakāro hīyate, aukāra upajāyate, vṛkṣaśabdo 'nvayī |
arthe 'pyekatvaṃ hīyate, dvitvamupajāyate, śākhādimattvamanvayīti |
tiṅanteṣu khalvapi pacatītyukte kaścicchabdaḥ śrūyate, paca iti cakārāntaḥ, atiśabdaḥ pratyayaḥ, artho 'pi kaścid gamyate viklittiḥ kartṛtvaṃ ca |
paṭhatītyukte kaścicchabdo hīyate, kaścidupajāyate, kaścidanvayīti |
pacchabdo hīyate, paṭhaśabda upajāyate, atiśabdo 'nvayī |
artho 'pi kaścid‌dhīyate kaścidupajāyate, kaścidanvayī; viklittirhīyate, paṭhikriyopajāyate, kartṛtvamanvayī |
pacyata ityukte atiśabdo hīyate, yateśabda upajāyate, pacchabdo 'nvayī;
artho 'pi kartṛtvaṃ hīyate, karmatvamupajāyate, viklittiranvayinīti |
te manyāmahe yaśśabdo hīyate tasyāsāvartho yo 'rtho hīyate; yaśśabda upajāyate tasyāsāvartho yo 'rtha upajāyate; yaśśabdo 'nvayī tasyāsāvarthe yo 'rtho 'nvayīti|
evaṃ vākye 'pi gāmānayetyukte kaścicchabdaḥ śrūyate, gāmiti dvitīyāntaḥ ānayeti ca loḍantaḥ;
artho 'pi kaścid gamyate sāsnādimān karmatvamāpannaḥ ānayeti kriyārthatvavidhi— tvamāpannaḥ athāśvamānayetyukte gavārtho hīyate, aśvārtha upajāyate, ānayanārtho 'nvaya |
gāṃ badhānetyukte ānayanārtho hīyate, bandhārtha upajāyate, gavārtho 'nvayī |
evaṃ gaurānīyatāmaśva ānīyatāṃ gaurbadhyatāmaśvo badhyatāmityādiṣu karmakartṛtvayorhānirupajaniścābhyūhyaḥ | etena prabandho 'pi vyākhyātaḥ |
kaścidāha, mārīco rāmeṇa hataḥ, kaścidāha lakṣmaṇeneti | tatra mārīcamṛgaghāte rāmo hīyate lakṣmaṇa upajāyate, lakṣmaṇo vā hīyate rāma upajāyate, rāmāyaṇaṃ punaranvayīti |
nanu ca vṛkṣaṛkṣa iti vakāro hīyate (ṛkāra) upajāyate vā; pacati paṭhatīti cakāro hīyate ṭhakāra upajāyata iti vaktavye kimarthamucyate vṛkṣaśabdo hīyate ṛkṣaśabda upajāyate, pacchabdo hīyate paṭhaśabda upajāyata iti ? śabdasyārthavattā yathā syāt, na
varṇānām; kiṃ punarna varṇāḥ śabdaḥ? bāḍham; arthāvasāyaprasavanimittaṃ śabda ityabhihitaṃ purastāt |
nanvevamapi vṛkṣādīnāmarthavattā nopapadyate; kiṃ kāraṇam? kevalenāvacanāt |
na hi vṛkṣādinā kevalena kaścidartho gamyate; kiṃ tarhi? sapratyayakena |
kimuktaṃ bhavati? pacatyādiṣvarthavattāsahacaritā kevalavacanatā dṛṣṭā; varṇeṣu cānarthakyasahacaritaṃ kevalāvacanatvam | na caite pacatyādivaddṛś‍yante, varṇavattu dṛś‍yante tasmād varṇavadvṛkṣādīnāmarthavattā nopapadyata iti |
sapratyayasyopapadyata iti cenvaivam | iha yad yasya nimittatvenopādīyate sati tasmistena pravartitavyam | arthavattā ca prātipādikasaṃjñāyā nimittam | sā ca dvidhā laukikī pāribhāṣikīti ca | tayorloke viditā laukikī, kriyāpradhānamākhyātam, sattvapradhānāni nāmāni iti | śāstre vyavahārārthā pāribhāṣikī 'dādhā ghvadāp' (1.1.20), 'tarap‍tamapau ghaḥ' (1.1.12) iti | tatra laukikī tāvadarthopalabdhigamayā; yeṣāṃ ca prātipadikasaṃjñā vidhīyate te na kadācit kevalā upalabhyante | pāribhāṣikī tu paribhāṣayā bhavatyarthavacchabdarūpaṃ, tacca prātipadikasaṃjñamiti | evaṃ ca śabdatvāviśeṣād‌varṇānāmapi prasajyate |
iyaṃ ca paribhāṣā na pravartate 'arthavad‌grahaṇe nārthakasya' iti | tadevamarthavattāyā nimittasyābhāve prātipādikasaṃjñā na pravartate; tadapravṛttau tu kathaṃ pratyayotpattiriti?
naivam | pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasyāprayogaḥ; nityasambandhāvetāvarthau prakṛtiḥ pratyaya iti; ato nityasambandhāt kevalasya prayoge na bhaviṣyati |
nanu ca bhavānāmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārānācaṣṭe, arthavattā nopapadyate kevalenāvacanāditi pṛṣṭaḥ kevalasyāprayoge hetumāha | nābhiprāyāparijñānāt nanvevaṃ bravīmi; yadi tāvat kevalenāvacanādityevamayaṃ heturupanyastaḥ yasmāt kevalo na prayujyate tasmādanarthaka iti, tadevaṃ vaktavyaṃ kevalasyāprayogāditi, na vaktavyaṃ kevalenāvacanāditi | kevalasya prayogaḥ śāstrasamayānnāsti, 'na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā na ca kevalaḥ pratyaya' iti | na ca laukikā evaṃ prayuñjate; ata uktaṃ nityasambandhādayaṃ kevale na prayujyate na tvānarthakyāditi ||
athaivamupanyastaḥ kevalena prayujyamānena nocyate 'sāvartha iti | k‍va punarayaṃ bhavatā kevalaḥ prayujyamāno 'rthamabruvan dṛṣṭaḥ? yadi ca prayujyeta na cārtha upalabhyeta, syādayaṃ hetuḥ kevalenāvacanāditi | anyad bhavān pṛṣṭo 'nyadeva pratividhatte | mayā hyevamucyate,
samudāyasyārthe prayogādavayavārthānāmaprasiddhiriti | yato varṇāstāvadanarthakā bhavatābhyupagatāḥ; teṣāṃ ca samudāyatantrāṇāṃ kevalānāṃ prayogo nāsti | yadyapi prayujyeran anarthakānāmeva prayogaḥ syāt | evaṃ prakṛtīnāmapi samudāyatantrāṇāṃ nāsti kevalānāṃ prayogaḥ; yoge vā satyanarthakāḥ prayujyeran |
athaivambhūtānāmarthavattā, ko nāma matsaro varṇoṣviti ?
ko nāma matsaraḥ, yadeṣāmarthavattve 'rthavatkāryāṇi prāp‍nuvanti |
kānyarthavatkāryāṇi ? arthavatprātipadikamiti prātipadikasaṃjñā, 'prātipādikād' iti svādyutpattiḥ, 'subantaṃ padam' iti padasaṃjñā ca |
tatra ko doṣaḥ?
pratyavayavaṃ vibhakteḥ śravaṇaṃ prāpnoti |
naivaṃ, yadaivāvayavānāṃ prātipadikasaṃjñā pravartate tadaiva samudāyasyāpīti samudāyāntargatatvāt 'supo dhātuprātipadikayoḥ' (2.4.71) iti lukā bhāvyam | tatkuto vibhakteḥ śravaṇam?
nanu ca 'kṛttaddhitasamāsāśca' (1.2.46) iti samāsagrahaṇaṃ niyamārtham, tena cārthavatsamudāyasya vākyasyeva varṇasamudāyasyāpi prātipadikasaṃjñā nivāryata iti kathaṃ tadantargatā vibhaktayo lupyante?
naivam; niyamasya tulyajātīyāpekṣatvāt samāsasyeva bhinnārthasamudāyasya vākyasyaiva prātipadikasaṃjñā nivartate, tvabhinnārthasya varṇasamudāyasyeti | atra hi yenaivārthena samudāyasyārthavattvaṃ tenaiva tadavayavānāmapīti (1.2.45)|
evaṃ tarhi nivṛttāyāmapi vibhaktau padatvād ghanaṃ vanamityādau nalopādīni (8.2.7) prāpnuvanti |
tarhi 'saṅghātasyaikārthyāt subabhāvo varṇāt' bhaviṣyati | vṛkṣa ityatra hyekatvaṃ vibhaktyā dyotyate, taccaikamityekaiva vibhaktirutpadyate, yathā bahavo draṣṭāra ekenaiva pradīpena dṛś‍yamarthaṃ paśyanita, evaṃ sa ca samudāyādeva tantreṇa sarvānugrāhiṇyutpadyate samudāyadvirvacanavat | yathā hi papācetyādau prathamasyaikāco dvirvacanaprasaṅge yenaivācā samudāya ekāc, neva tadavayayo 'pi paśabdaśceti tatra pṛthagavayavaikāco na dvirucyante; kiṃ tarhi? sarvānugrahāt samudāyaikāca eva | tathaihāpi samudāyādutpattau varṇāt subutpattirna bhaviṣyatīti tadabhāvānna padasaṃjñā | apadatvācca nalopādīnāmaprasaṅga iti |
satyametat | kiṃtu varṇeṣvanvayavyatirekayoḥ sadbhāve 'pyarthānvayavyatirekā— bhāvādayamasyārtha iti pravibhāgo na prakalpate | tathā hi vṛkṣaḥ ṛkṣaḥ, pacati paṭhatītyādau yasya hānau yo hīyate, yasyopajane ya upajāyate, yasyānvaye yo 'nugacchati sa tasyārtha iti śakyate vaktum |
naivam, kūpayūpasūpādāviti anarthakā varṇāḥ, arthavanto vṛkṣādaya iti |
nanu yatra bṛṃhitaṃ hīyate, hoṣitamupajāyate, reṇucakramanvayi, tatra hastino hīyante, aśvā upajāyante, pipīlikā anvayinyo, na caitāvatā reṇucakrasya nimittaṃ bhavanti | yatra vā kṣīraṃ hīyate dadhyupajāyate pātramanvayi, tatra mādhuryaṃ hīyate amlatopajāyate tṛp‍tiranvayinī, na cānvayi pātraṃ tṛp‍tiheturbhavati | tadevamanvayavyatireke ca satyapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasyābhāvāt kathamucyate 'nvayavyatirekābhyāmarthavattāvatiṣṭhata iti ?
naivam | avadhāritaṃ hi sāmarthyamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pravibhajyate, na ca pipīlikānāṃ pātrasya vā reṇucakratṛp‍tyoḥ sāmarthyāvadhāraṇamasti, tatsad‪bhāve— 'pyanyatrābhāvāt | yatraiva cānvayavyatirekābhyāmarthavattā śakyate pratyāpattuṃ tatraiva pratipattavyā, na sarvatra | yadyevaṃ prakṛtyādiṣvapi na śakyate | bahavo hi śabdā ekārthā bhavanti, ekaśca śabdo bahvarthaḥ; yadi hi niyogata ekaḥ śabda ekasminnarthe vartate tata eṣa pravibhāgaḥ syāt | yatastu vyabhicaratyetat anekaśśabda ekasminnarthe, tadyathā indraḥ purandara iti, ekaścānekārthaḥ akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti | anumānaṃ caikasyaivākārthavṛttitva eva śakyate kalpayitum; ato vyabhicārādanimitta— manvayavyatirekau prakṛtipratyayārthapravibhāge iti prakṛtireva sarvārthā syāt | pratyayo vā sarvārthaḥ, ubhau vobhayārthau ? yathaikau dṛś‍yate hi dadhi madha vagniciditi prakṛtireva sarvānarthānabhidadhānā, 'adhunā' (5.3.17), iyān 'asyāpatyaṃ iḥ' iti, pratyaya eva vā sarvārthābhidhāyī, haiyaṅgavīnaṃ (5.2.23), śrotriyaḥ (5.2.84), kṣetriyaḥ ityubhayamubhayārthābhidhāyīti | ataḥ kiṃ na sādhīyaḥ, arthavattā siddhā bhavati | yadā hi prakṛtireva svārthādiṣu vartate pratyayo vā, tadā sutarāmarthavattā sidhyati | na brūmo 'rthavattā na sidhyati | tau tvanvayavyatirekau nāvatiṣṭhete | tataśca kuta etat yādayaṃ prakṛtyartho 'yaṃ pratyayārtha iti ? na punaḥ prakṛterevobhāvarthau pratyayasyobhayasya veti sāmānyaśabdā ete evaṃ syuḥ; sāmānyaśabdāśca nāntareṇa viśeṣaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vā viśeṣe 'vatiṣṭhante, yatastu khalu niyogataḥ prakaraṇādimantareṇāpi vṛkṣa ityukte svabhāvataḥ kaścidartho gamyate, ato manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ, prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate, pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe vartata iti | yadi hi
'su au jas' (4.1.2) ityeta eva svārthadravyaliṅgasaṅkhyākarmādivacanāḥ, sahāyamātraṃ prakṛtiḥ, svādibhiḥ sarveṣāmarthānā— mupādānāt, vṛkṣaḥ vṛkṣau vṛkṣā iti | kimarthaṃ niyogena vṛkṣārtha eva gamyate, na punassarve arthāḥ pratīyeran, paryāyeṇa vā kadācit kaścid? na yaugapadyaṃ na paryāyaḥ; tasmādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ samudāyasthāḥ śabdāścāpoddhartavyā arthāśceti vyavasthitā anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyāvahārikī arthavattā | tatredamaparihṛtam—'prakṛtireva sarvānarthānabhidadhānā dṛś‍yate pratyayaḥ sarvārthābhidhāyī ubhayaṃ vobhayārthābhidhāyīti | tatra parihāraḥ—dadhi madhu agnicidityevamādiṣu vacanāntarāṇāmaukārādīnāṃ śrūyamāṇatvādanyeṣāṃ ca savibhaktikānāṃ prayogadarśanāt | adhunā iyānityevamādiṣu pratyayāntaraparāyāḥ prakṛteravasthānāt prakṛtyantarāṇāṃ vā lopadarśanāt, ihāpyakevalasyaivārthābhidhānaṃ prasaktaṃ; lopādidvāreṇa śāstradṛṣṭyā kevalaya vijñāyate |
nanu 'na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā, na kevalaḥ pratyaya' iti śāstrasamayaḥ |
satyametat; kiṃtu yatra prakṛtinimittā pratyayanivṛttistatra kevalāpi prakṛtiḥ prayujyate | yatra vā pratyayanimittā prakṛtinivṛttistatra kevalo 'pi ityabhyanujñāyate | haiyaṅgavīnaṃ, śrotriyaḥ, kṣetriya ityādiṣu tu saṃjñāśabde hyogodohasya vikāra iti, 'śrotriyañchando 'dhīta' iti, 'parakṣetre cikitsya' iti prakṛtipratyayavibhāgakalpanayā vyutpattiryathākathaṃciddharmaniyamāya kriyate | evaṃ yāvakādiṣvapi svārthikeṣu pratyayārthasyāvyatirekāt prakṛtyantarayoge prātipadikānāṃ ca yāvakādīnāmarthabhedāt pratyayāntarayoge prakṛteḥ kalpitāyāmarthavattāyāṃ svārthikatvaṃ vijñāyate | eko dvau bahava ityatra pratyekaṃ vacanāntarabhāvāt karmādiviṣayāvanvayavyatirekāvāśrīyete | sāmānyato dṛṣṭāccānumānāt prakṛtyantaravadekādīnāṃ pravṛttau bhinnarūpāṇi vacanānyasaṅkareṇa vyavasthāṃ prakalpayantīti pratīyate |
nanvevaṃ sati śabdasyaikārthopakṣayasyārthāntareṇa asambandhādarthasyāpyekaśabdo— pakṣayasyānyatrāsaṅkrānteḥ kūpasūpayūpādivadevānvayavyatirekau nāvakalpete | na hi ya evaikatvasambandhī sa dvitvādisambandhī, yo vā prātipadikatvenārthamātrapravṛttiḥ saśaktyarasambandhī na bhavitumarhati | na khalu śabdaḥ kaściduttarakālamarthāntaraṃ parityajatyupādatte vā | taduktam — (vāpa. 2.13)
yadasya (śabdasya) na vibhāgo 'sti kuto 'rthasya bhaviṣyati |
vibhāgaiḥ prakriyābhedamavidvān pratipadyate || 210 ||
evametat | kintu trividhaḥ śabdaḥ — nivartyo 'nvākhyeyaḥ pratipādakaśca1 (vāpa. 1.24, mabhā.1.1.50) | teṣvadharmaheturaprabhraṃśo nivartyaḥ, dharmaheturlokavedayoḥ prayogārho 'nvākhyeyaḥ | prakṛtipratyayādivibhāgakalpanayā tatsvarūpāvabodhakṛt pratipādakaḥ | tadarthamanva— yavyatirekāvavidyamānāvapi vyavasthārthaṃ kalpitau śāstrārthavyavahāranibandhanaṃ sampadyete | śāstravyavahāro hi 'arthavat prātipadikam' (1.2.45) 'kriyāvacano dhātuḥ' (mabhā.1.3.1) ityādiranāśritayoranvayavyatirekayorasukara eva | tadāha — (vāpa. 2.12)
bhāgairanarthakairbhinnāḥ pacatītyevamādayaḥ |
anvayavyatirekau tu vyavahāranibandhanam || 211 ||
abhidhā ca vivakṣā ca tātparyaṃ ca vibhāgavat |
catastraḥ kevalā hyetāśśabdasambandhaśaktayaḥ || 212 ||
yāpekṣā yacca sāmarthyamanvayo yaśca tairmithaḥ |
aikārthyaṃ yacca tāstasya sasahāyasya śaktayaḥ || 213 ||
uktāścatastraḥ prathamāḥ krameṇa kramādathānyāḥ prakaṭīkriyante |
akhaṇḍavākyārthavivecakānāṃ śabdārthasamvitpariśuddhihetoḥ || 214 ||
iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe kevalaśabdasambandhaśaktiprakāśo nāma
|| sap‍tamaḥ prakāśaḥ || 7 ||
revāprasādena sanātanena śrībhojadevasya nibandha eṣaḥ |
kṛto viviktārtha iti prasīdantvatrānuvīkṣācaturā mahāntaḥ ||

(5. vyapekṣā)
tatrodbhūtasambandhavyatirekāṇāṃ padārthānāmitaretarapratyākāṅkṣā vyapekṣā |
sā ca sannihite yogye ca bhavati | tadyathā 'devo varṣatī' —ti varṣaṇakriyākartāramantareṇābhavantī sannihitaṃ yogyaṃ ca devamapekṣate | yatra tu sannihitasya na yogyatā, tatra vyavahitamapi yogyamevāpekṣate, yathā praviśa piṇḍīm ityatra (na) praveśanakriyā sannihitāyāmapyayogyāyāṃ piṇḍyāmasambhavantī vyavahitamapi yogyaṃ gṛhādikamapekṣate | piṇḍīmityetadapi karmapadaṃ praviśetyasminnasambhavad‌yogyameva bhakṣayetyādikriyāpadamapekṣata iti |
seyaṃ vyapekṣā saṃkṣepataḥ padārthānāṃ tredhā sambhavati—
1. ābhidhānikī, 2. naiyāyikī, 3. naiṣedhikī ca | tatra —
śrutisamāropa(samākhyā)vākyavikalpasamuccayātideśādibhirabhidhīyamānā ābhidhānikī |
ūhaviparyayavipariṇāmāyāhāravākya (vi)śeṣavyahitakalpanādibhirupakalpyamānā naiyāyikī |
vacanāsambhavavirodhakṛtārthaparisaṅkhyāvadhāraṇādibhirniṣidhyamānā naiṣedhikī | tāsu —
(1. ābhidhānikī)
ābhidhānikī tāvad yatra dvayoḥ sādharmyārthamāvṛttyā vibhaktiśrutibhedena ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyanirdeśaḥ,
1. sā śrutyābhidhānikī yathā— (megha. 99)
aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhatap‍tena tap‍taṃ sāstreṇāstradravamaviralotkaṇṭhamutkaṇṭhitena |
uṣṇocch‌vāsaṃ samādhikatarocch‌vāsinā dūravartī saṅkalpaistairviśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ || 1 ||
yatrāpi sādharmyārthādeva dvayostantreṇa ca vibhaktyabhedena ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayogaḥ, sā ca śrutyābhidhānikī | yathā—
daivāta/daivādapatramacchāyaṃ phalārthibhirasevitam |
sānujaṃ śākhinamiva dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ ruroda sā || 2 ||1
2. yatra padena vākyena vā saṃjñārtho vidhīyate, sā samākhyābhidhānikī | sā padena yathā—(raghu. 6.21)
asau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatānāmagādhasattvo magadhapratiṣṭhaḥ |
rājā prajārañjanalabdhavarṇaḥ parantapo nāma yathārthanāmā || 3||
vākyena yathā—
saccaṃ saṇṇā dhaṇṇā jā taïā kesaveṇa giridhareṇa |
gurubhāra—vāvaḍeṇa vi, ajjuacchaṃ ciraṃ diṭhṭhā || 4 ||
(satyaṃ saṃjñā dhanyā yā tadā keśavena giridharaṇe |
gurubhāravyāpṛtenāpi ṛjvakṣaṃ/anṛjvakṣaṃ ciraṃ dṛṣṭā ||)
3. yatra vyapekṣotthāpakaṃ vākyamabhidhāya tadupapādakamabhidhīyate, upapādakaṃ vābhidhāya vyapekṣotthāpakaṃ, sā vākyābhidhānikī |
tayorādyā yathā— (hemacandrasya prākṛtavyākaraṇe 4.420)
sā uppaḍī goṭhṭhaühi | ṇokkhī kāvi visagaṃṭhi |
bhiḍiya pacelliu so maraï || jjassa ṇa laggaï laṃṭhi || 5 ||
(sā utpannā goṣṭhabhuvi navīnā kāpi viṣagranthiḥ |
bhittvā na pacan pratyuta sa mriyate yasya na lagati kaṇṭhe ||)
dvitīyā yathā—
vāṇidhamoḍiaccaruṇakhao dāreeṃ tu na diṭhṭha |
māeṇajahuke malaḍollāhia ivaïṭhṭha || 6 ||?
4. vaikalpikābhidhānaprabhavā vikalpābhidhānikī yathā—
aṃbaru aṃci samuddu tari bhamaḍahi ḍoṃgaruāṇi |
sahi mahu piu gaü kalahiaü jeṃva ruccaï teṃva āṇi || 7 ||
1. daivamevātapatraṃ rāmaṃ daivāt apatraṃ śākhinam, sānuni jātaṃ vṛkṣam,anujasahitaṃ rāmam — re |
(ambaraṃ gaccha samudraṃ tara bhrama kāntārāṇi |
sakhi mama priyo gataḥ kalahāyito yathā rocate tathā ' 'nayā ||)
5. samuccayābhidhānaprabhavā samuccayābhidhānikī yathā—(hemacandrasya prākṛtavyākaraṇe 4.315)
hiaï khuḍukkaï goraḍī gaaṇi ghuḍukkaï mehu |
vāsāratti pavāsuahaṃ visamā saṃkaḍu ehu || 8 ||
(hṛdaye śūlyāyate gaurī gagane garjati meghaḥ |
varṣāyāṃ pravāsināṃ viṣamaṃ saṃkaṭam etat ||)
6. sāmānyaviśeṣātideśaprāp‍tadharmāṇāṃ yatrāgrataḥ paścād‌vābhidhānaṃ sātideśābhidhānikī | tatra sāmānyātideśaprāp‍tadharmābhidhānamagrato yathā—
hiaa tiricchīyaï saṃmuha pacchā gahiakaḍakkhāssa |
pahia ekejje goraḍī ṇaṃ caühaṭṭa uvaccha || 9 ||
(hṛdaye tiraścīnā saṃmukhā paścād gṛhītakaṭākṣā |
pathikasyaikaiva gaurī nanu catuṣpathe vrajati ||)
evaṃ paścādapi draṣṭavyam | viśeṣātideśaprāp‍tadharmābhidhānaṃ paścād yathā—
mahilattaṇu ṇivvāhiaü ekkaï vijjupiyāi |
ṇehakkaḍa viavira hunamme vidaṭṭaṇajāi || 10 ||
(mahilāvaṃ nirvāhitamekayā vidyutpriyayā |
.........kadā na api virahaḥ ..... na yāti ||)
7. ādigrahaṇādyatraikamabhidadhānaḥ prasaṅgenānyadapyabhidhatte; sā prasaṅgābhidhānikī | sāpi dvidhā padato vākyataśca | tayorādyā yathā—
sāva—saloṇī goraḍī aharaho mahuraü sāu |
tik‍kha—appa—palovvaṇae—virahu kaḍuu kasāu || 11 ||
(sarva—salavaṇā gaurī adharasya madhuraḥ svādaḥ |
tik‍tā amlā pralokane viraha eva kaṭukaḥ kaṣāyaḥ ||)
atra rūpaṃ varṇayanprasaṅgataḥ ṣaḍrasānabhimatānabhimatatvaṃ ca teṣāṃ nirdiśati | dvitīyā yathā— (murā. 3.21)
pratyagronmeṣajihmā kṣaṇamanabhimukhī ratnadīpaprabhāṇā—
mātmavyāpāragurvī janitajalalavā jṛmbhaṇaiḥ sāṅgabhaṅgaiḥ |
nāgāṅkaṃ moktumicchoḥ śayanamuruphaṇācakravālopadhānaṃ
nidrācchedābhitāmrā ciramavatu harerdṛṣṭirākekarā vaḥ || 12 ||
atra mudrārākṣase cāṇakyena kaumudīmahotsave niṣiddhe rākṣasa(pra)(yukto) vaitālikaḥ prabhāte maṅgalāni paṭhan śaradavatāro vartata iti candragup‍tasya gup‍tamāvedayati |
(2. naiyāyikī)
atha naiyāyikī |
1. yatra pūrvoktameva vāk‍yamarthāntare vaktrantarādibhirūhayitvā niveś‍yate tām ūhanaiyāyikīm āmananti | tadyathā kālidāsaḥ 'kiṃ kuntaleśvaraḥ karoti' iti vikramādityena pṛṣṭa uktavān—
asakalahasitatvāt kṣālitānīva kāntyā mukulitanayanatvād vyaktakarṇotpalāni |
pibati madhusugandhīnyānanāni priyāṇāṃ tvayi vinihitabhāraḥ kuntalānāmadhīśaḥ ||
idamevohayitvā vikramādityaḥ pratyuvāca—
pibatu madhusugandhīnyānanāni priyāṇāṃ
mayi vinihitabhāraḥ kuntalānāmadhīśaḥ || 14 ||
2. yatra pāṭhakrameṇa sambandhānupapattāvarthakrameṇa viparyasya padāni yojayante, sā viparyayanaiyāyikī yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.28)
svayaṃ viśīrṇadrumaparṇavṛttitā parā hi kāṣṭhā tapasastayā punaḥ |
tadapyavā/pākīrṇamataḥ priyaṃvadāṃ vadantyaparṇeti ca tāṃ purāvidaḥ || 15 ||
3. atrātastāṃ priyaṃvadāmaparṇāṃ vadanti purāvida iti paryāyeṇa padāni yojyante | yatra tulyārthapadaprayoge vibhaktivipariṇāmena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoryojyante, sā vipariṇāmanaiyāyikī | yathā—(māgha. 4.40)
dantojjvalāsu vimalopalamekhalāntā—
ssadratnacitrakaṭakāsu bṛhannitambāḥ |
